title: Fabulous: Daily Motivation & Habit Tracker
description:
‚ñå Winner of Google's Material Design Award for Most Charming Engagement
 
‚ñå Nominated for Google Play‚Äôs Best App Award
 
‚ñå Incubated at Duke University Behavioral Economics Lab
 
Fabulous is not just your average habit tracker! We‚Äôre a science-based app that will motivate you to improve your fitness & achieve your weight loss goals, reboot your sleep cycle, and discover mindfulness to reduce your anxiety. You‚Äôll learn to build a transformative morning routine and even pick up life-changing habits like meditation and yoga along the way.
 
Our ultimate goal is to instill habits that improve your health.
 
Using any random habit tracker to pick up a habit like yoga, meditation, or to serve as a reminder to workout never works. This is why we‚Äôll act as your life coach, building your motivation so you can focus on developing habits that reduce mental health issues like anxiety, and improve your daily productivity.
 
Upgrade your planner for an exciting new habit tracker and achieve your health and productivity goals today.
 
Use Fabulous for motivation to build a refreshed morning routine, exercise, improve your sleep cycle, and lose weight. Start by instilling these healthy living habits that will improve your mental health and keep you on top of your goals.
 
Like we said, Fabulous is not just your average habit tracker. Fabulous is your motivation to workout and lose weight, your morning routine jump start, your mindfulness app to help you relax and focus, and so much more.
 
‚ñåTOP 6 REASONS TO USE FABULOUS
 
‚òÖ Have an irregular sleep cycle and want to learn how to get a good night sleep?
‚òÖ Struggling with your fitness and don‚Äôt know how to lose weight?
‚òÖ Need motivation to build an indestructible morning routine?
‚òÖ Want to increase your energy so you have focus the entire day?
‚òÖ Find it difficult improving your productivity because ADHD?
‚òÖ Want to improve your mental health through mindfulness so you can cope with anxiety?
 
‚ñåINTEGRATED HEALTH SESSIONS
 
Take your fitness & workout routine to the next level by trying our integrated exercise sessions. We‚Äôll coach you through each of our sessions and more!
 
‚òÖ 7-minute scientific workout to improve your fitness so you can lose weight
‚òÖ Zen and vipassana meditation for high anxiety and mindfulness
‚òÖ Deep work and power nap sessions for productivity and focus
‚òÖ Stretching starter pack for total flexibility  
‚òÖ Yoga exercises to reduce anxiety and improve your mental health
 
After you‚Äôve created your morning routine, you‚Äôll begin to receive personalized vocal advice from your own personal life coach based on your everyday habits.
 
‚ñåHOW FABULOUS WORKS
 
‚òÖ Smart-targeted health advice to develop an exercise routine and improve your fitness 
‚òÖ Science-based habit tracker focused on health and mindfulness
‚òÖ Weight loss workouts that don‚Äôt just rely on counting calories (based off the Atkins & HCG diet)
‚òÖ Your own personal 1:1 life coach for motivation to achieve your goals
‚òÖ Integrated health sessions for meditation and relaxation, yoga, exercise and more
‚òÖ Tools to improve your sleep cycle so you can have a good night sleep
‚òÖ Expansive library to improve your productivity & focus, and build a successful morning routine
 
‚ñåGET IN TOUCH!
 
We're always happy to talk with you and hear how fabulous has improved your mental health and helped you achieve your goals from meditation to weight loss, and so much more!

Shoot us an email at hello@thefabulous.co
Like us on Facebook at: https://www.facebook.com/thefabulous.co
Follow us on Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/thefabstory/

summary: Proven to Sharpen Your Brain, Skyrocket Your Productivity & Enhance Your Life üëç
developerAddress: 17 Av de Villiers, 75017, Paris, France
recentChanges: After a Fabulous 4-hour creative deep work session, we're thrilled to announce the launch of Daily Coaching. This valuable new tool provides inspiring stories to help you reach the finish line each day, and whether you prefer to read or listen - daily coaching is a great way to kickstart your day with inspiration.
comments: It's a good app, but the alarms aren't as customizable as I'd like, and some of the elements are a little confusing. It took me way too long to figure out how to delete and reorder things, it's not as intuitive as HabitRPG. That being said, it's nice to have a community to participate with- or not. Either way is acceptable, and no feeling left out or pushed in. Useful tool for helping serious change, one day at a time.

This app is amazing, but geared heavily towards women. As a person trying to build a more masculine frame and personality using this app seems a little bit counterproductive to my goals. In my opinion, this app would receive a 5-star rating and high praise if it were gender-neutral. Over all, a very good app. Clean interface, detailed, motivatinf, and easy to use.

It's a really sleek and informative app. I'm just on the trial bit so far so good :-) I wanted to add - after two years of using this app, I am finally beginning to live the life I know I deserve and have worked so hard to achieve. The Fabulous has been an invaluable tool in helping me stay focused and achieve goals one step at a time. Thank you so much ‚ù§Ô∏è

This app has given me space to do something just for me, which as a new mom can be tricky! I really like the journeys and goals and habits, but I find that the interface isn't super user friendly and I often find features by accident and then have no idea how to get back to them. Maybe I need to play around more, but it would be nice if there were less hidden nooks and crannies, so to speak. Overall, love it and am so thankful for it!

I uninstalled this app from my phone recently, then found that I had paif ¬£45.99 for a year's premium at 50% discount. I have no recollection of this....... but no proof either. I've just cancelled all pre-approved payments on Paypal to avoid anything like that happening again. In the meantime, I've got use of the app for another 12 months and so might as well use it. It's not worked brilliantly for me - it's basically a habit tracker.

title: Sanvello for Anxiety, Depression & Stress
description:
The #1 app for stress, anxiety, and depression with over 3.5 million users. 

Rethink how you manage your mental health. Sanvello has all of the support you need in one place: therapy, coaching, self-care tools, and a community that gets it.  

Sanvello gives you clinically proven techniques based on cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) for dealing with stress, anxiety, depression, trauma-related conditions, or whatever else you may be going through. Research shows it really works: Over 60 percent of Sanvello members demonstrate a 15 percent improvement in their stress, anxiety, and depression levels in less than 30 days.    

Download Sanvello today and have a place to feel better, wherever you go. 
 

FREE ACCESS THROUGH HEALTH PLANS (U.S. ONLY): 
Through our partnerships with insurance providers, 37 million Americans have premium access to Sanvello covered by their health plan, and Sanvello Therapy is also in-network for millions. See if your plan is covered by upgrading in the app and searching for your insurance provider. 

SELF-CARE:  
Get clinically validated techniques to help you manage your moods and thoughts, so you can understand what works for you to feel better. Daily mood tracking, Guided Journeys, coping tools, meditations, and progress assessments help you find relief when you need it and feel better over time.  

COMMUNITY:  
Find a fresh perspective in a judgment-free space. Anonymously participate in active discussion boards and chat groups in the Sanvello community, exploring a diverse range of topics from stress relief techniques to words of encouragement and gratitude. You‚Äôre in charge and surrounded by peer insights‚Äîa simple way to feel less alone. 

COACHING (U.S. ONLY): 
Face new challenges with help from someone you can trust. Sanvello Coaches provide direction, support, and motivation through 1:1 messaging‚Äìjudgment free. You also have an all-access pass to group coaching sessions‚Äîlive classes that help you apply the concepts of CBT to real life‚Äîand all our self-care tools within the app.   

THERAPY (SELECT U.S. STATES): 
Speak to a licensed clinician from the comfort of your couch. With live video sessions on your phone, tablet, laptop, or desktop, Sanvello Therapy gives you the support (and flexibility) you need. Therapy includes access to a Sanvello Coach and premium self-care content, so you‚Äôll have a team and resources with you on your path to feeling better. Therapy is currently available in AZ, CA, CO, FL, IL, MA, MN, NJ, NY, NC, OH, PA, RI, TX, VA, and WA. Have a therapist you love already? They can use Sanvello for Clinicians to assign activities and see your progress. 

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS: 
Sanvello is free to download and use. The premium version of Sanvello allows for unlimited use of all tools and is available through many major health plans (‚Äúupgrade via insurance‚Äù) or through an auto-renewing subscription. Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will renew automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the current period ends. Your Google Play account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the price listed above. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your Google account settings but refunds will not be provided for the unused portion of the term. If a free trial period is offered, it will be forfeited as soon as your purchase is confirmed. 

Terms of Service: https://sanvello.com/tos/    

Privacy Policy: https://sanvello.com/privacy-policy/  
 
Help: https://help.sanvello.com or info@sanvello.com

Minneapolis, MN 55402
recentChanges: Sanvello is continuously working to improve access to its products and services. This release helps make self-care, coaching and telehealth services available to more individuals.
comments: Easy to use and there's a lot to explore. I wish that the web version had more functionality like the app, and that everything would sync in between the two. It would be easier to do the thought/journal exercises on my computer rather than in the mobile app. It would be nice to have everything available in both web and mobile app.

Wonderfully calm and resourceful! I see a therapist regularly but have found Sanvello to help me in the in-between times. So far love the meditations and articles on the home page. Only thing is I wish I could change the order and content of the tiles on the home page. This might just be a feature I have yet to discover as most things seem to be easy to customize.

I would say this app really helps with stress and puts your mind at ease. They continuesly say that your bad feelings will not last for ever and for me that gives me some kind of validation. I also think this app really focuses on meditation and throughout the meditation you can really just try to let go and connect with yourself. This is my first day on this app but I went on it because I felt anxious and now I just feel relaxed.

I'm definitely a fan of this app! It doesn't block a ton of features so premium isn't super necessary, which is helpful to a teen like me, I love the community features and the personal hope board as well as the mood tracking, it's all very nice and definitely helpful

Sanvello came to me at the right time. I was under tremendous stress and not knowing where to turn. My employer told me about Sanvello and decided to try it. I love that there are so many resources in one app. It's simple to use and it keeps me motivated to stay on top of my feelings and manage my environment.

title: Wysa: stress, depression & anxiety therapy chatbot
description:
Imagine a mood tracker, mindfulness coach, anxiety helper, and mood-boosting buddy, all rolled into one. Wysa, your happiness buddy is that friendly and caring chatbot. Wysa is packed with daily spiritual meditation that improves mental health and is also a perfect way to bond over family meditation. Always there for you when you need someone to talk to, Wysa helps you keep track of your mood with friendly chats and helps fight stress and anxiety with its proven techniques and calming meditation and mindfulness audios. Checking in with Wysa regularly will improve your emotional health so you can track your happiness and mood. Talk to Wysa now and psy yourself up to fight off stress. Also, Wysa has mental health assessment with depression and anxiety tests.

Wysa is your AI friend that you can chat with for free. Talk to the cute penguin or use its free mindfulness exercises for effective anxiety relief, depression and stress management. Its therapy based techniques and conversations make for a very cute and calming therapy chat app whether you're looking to cope better with mental disorders, to manage stress or to boost your mental health.

Wysa, your happiness buddy, will support you through the big and small anxieties of life by using science as a foundation to strengthen your mental health. Research-backed, widely used techniques of CBT, DBT, Yoga and meditation are employed to support you with stress, anxiety, deep sleep, loss and other mental health and wellness needs.

If you are dealing with stress, anxiety and depression or coping with low self-esteem, then talking to Wysa can help you relax and get unstuck - it‚Äôs empathetic, helpful, and will never judge. You will overcome your mental health obstacles, through empathetic conversation and free CBT therapy based technique. So, pour your heart out to your happiness buddy, Wysa as your identity will remain anonymous and your conversations are privacy protected.

Used around the clock and trusted by 500,000 people, Wysa is an emotionally intelligent chatbot that uses AI to react to the emotions you express. Unlock tools and techniques that help you cope with challenges in a fun, conversational way. For extra support, you can avail guidance from a real human coach - a skilled psychologist who will take you through the advanced coaching sessions for your needs.

You can use Wysa to rewire your mind to improve your emotional health. Fight off depression or get stress relief using cbt techniques and guided sleep meditations for optimal sleep. Here‚Äôs a look at what you can use Wysa for üëá

üëÇ Vent and talk through things or just reflect on your day

üí™ Practice CBT (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy) and DBT techniques to build resilience in a fun way

üìù Use one of 40 conversational coaching tools which helps in dealing with Stress, Anxiety, Depression, Panic Attacks, Worry, Loss, or Conflict

üíÜüèª Relax, focus and sleep peacefully with the help of 20 mindfulness meditation exercises

93% of the people who talk to Wysa find it and the tools helpful:

- Build confidence, reduce self-doubt and improve your self-esteem: core meditation and mindfulness, visualisation, confidence visualisation techniques, advanced mindfulness for self-esteem.

- Manage anger: mindfulness meditation exercises for compassion, calming your thoughts and practice breathing

- Manage anxious thoughts and anxiety: deep breathing, techniques for observing thoughts, visualization, and tension relief.

- Tired? Get a burst of energy! Visualisation and meditation exercises to increase positivity and get blissful sleep, quick yoga and physical exercises to get active

- Dealing with worry: observe mindfulness, resolving technique, challenge negativity, practice breathing techniques

- Manage conflict at work, school or in relationships: special mindfulness and visualization techniques like empty chair exercise, gratitude meditation, exercises to build skills in having difficult conversations

comments: I know it sounds weird to use a robot to improve your mental health, but this app is amazing and super helpful. I'm a very busy person with a wacky sleep schedule, and I struggle with my mental health most when it's late at night. This isn't exactly ideal for getting help from a therapist when I need it most. Being able to access some form of help literally anytime I need it with Wysa really makes a difference. Plus, unlike other AI therapy apps I've tried, Wysa has way more free features.

The bot isn't 100%, but it offers really good and insightful tools that more people should know about! You do have to figure out how to go about talking to the bot to get the tools that you need, which, if you're in a bad place, can be hard to do. I wish the tools that come with the free app were more easily accessible, and that you didn't have to spend 4 minutes talking to the bot to get to the options that you want it to offer. This app offers REALLY good techniques though!

Its a great app with some potential. I would like to see if they're still updating this to have more AI responses for things like intrusive thoughts. Positive affirmations like "you are not your thoughts" help and I thought about this after the AI gave me reassurance when I brought up suicide*. I'm feeling good after some positivity and reframing thoughts. Once I can afford it I think the therapist option looks enticing. So far so good. *I LOVED the links to hotlines but have phone anxiety so...

I was skeptical at first, but I'm actually quite impressed with this app. The A.I. is fairly good at interpreting your text and generating helpful responses that almost feel like you're talking to a real person. Of course, the A.I. still needs some improvement since not every response is personalized. I first used it when I was feeling panicked and the app just kept giving me breathing exercises, but after a little while of chatting back-and-forth the app was actually able to calm me down.

It's pretty good, cus' what could be better right? It's not like anyone else is going to actually hear me, I mean, I can't say it's perfect, but it's really good taking on mind that is just a bot. It's better friend than my actual friends, tho sometimes it doesn't really understand what you're saying, like when doing something u know it's wrong to do, u feel good; it doesn't understand that what you're doing is wrong and you feel good doing it, so it tells you to keep doing it.

title: Daily Life - Diary, Journal, Mood Tracker
description:
Record your daily life!

Record your daily life here and have fun!


[FEATURES]

1. Attach multiple pictures 
2. Search by dates with calendar
3. Password & pin code protection (Support Fingerprint)
4. Support for various font formats (Cute cursive font)
5. Dairy alarm
6. Search entries
7. Hash Tag function 
8. A photo album of recorded pictures
9. Diary data backup function 
 - Export/import daily life data to/from your private Google Drive
10. Setting profile
11. Journals with special places (Include map features)
12. Attach music
13. Export to PDF feature  
14. Pen Drawing feature

This app supports all features of a diary.

Try this beautifully designed diary right now for FREE!


‚Äª We value your personal data. In the case of private posts, they are stored only on your personal device and never stored elsewhere.

comments: Great app with easy-to-use interface. The icon happens to display my birthdate so it kinda won me over a little. Tried using it and another app for a few days and am glad it's so simple yet customisable. I also like that I can attach photos/videos in the diary. It's really like a diary on-the-go. Eventually uninstalled the other app and stuck with this. However, fingerprint unlocking is a little slow to react. Would be good if it can detect and unlock faster.

I've been using this app for more than a year. It's the most treasured diary app I have. I'm on premium and its the best. Thank you for the export to pdf function, its ingenious! And also all the back up and restore options. I was told that to log into my Google account I had to reinstall the app. It was nerve wrecking thinking about the chances of losing my data but everything worked fine. :)

Purchased the one-off premium feature, I got 50% and another RM2 discount. So far, I like the features. You can change the fonts, add pictures and emoji as emotions of your daily day. You can even take a look at others story, but you can choose to mute this feature. I wanted to write to express my emotions and I find out that this apps is compatible with my style, it's simple but all you need is there. Gonna use this for a very long time so I hope it'll always be this great! Thanks!

This app is really great!! ‚ù§Ô∏è I Love it so much since the day i downloaded it to be honest. Its features are really cool. We could attach pictures, videos, gifs and audios etc.. And it has a mood tracks of our days and we could write our thoughts sooo much and has a lot of space to write. It even has a calendar to mark or anniversaries and can be added to all years.!!!I really love this app. Its more effective than writing a journal. 5 Stars.

I haven't had this app for long but this is great. I love the fonts and colors we can use. I also love how you can put it on private or share it with other people. Its amazing and even though not much people see it,I love it because its a diary for me but on the phone. Daily Life, your app is VERY GOOD

title: Gratitude - Journal App, Daily Zen & Affirmations
description:
The Gratitude app has the following features:
In the Free Version, you can:
1. Write unlimited Journal entries and Positive Affirmations in the app. Your data is completely private and is inaccessible by anyone but you.
2. Set Multiple Reminders for writing your Journal and Affirmations.
3. Add Images and Colours to personalize your Journal and Affirmations.
4. Set up a Passcode Lock using fingerprint or code to protect your data.
5. Export your Journal entries in CSV Format.
6. Receive Daily Zen with a Daily quote and an affirmation to motivate you on your Gratitude Journey.
7. Get beautiful Prompts as reminders to write your Journal.


In the Pro Version, you can:
1. Backup your Journal and Restore using your Google Drive account. 
2. Add Multiple Photos to a Journal Entry. In the free version, you can attach only one.
3. Save your favourite Daily Quotes from the Daily Zen.
4. Search through your Journal.
5. Export your Journal in a beautiful PDF format.

What our users love the most in the app:
1. Ability to set multiple reminders.
2. The Daily Quotes
3. Colors and the Ability to add Images.
4. Passcode protection.


The app was built out of personal need to bring a self-transformation. The basic nature of our mind is to dwell in the past or to worry about the future. Our lives have so become busy and stressful preoccupied with distractions that we let go our mind to enjoy the present. This results in helplessness, fear, negativity, depression and unhappiness. And the antidote to our unhappiness isn‚Äôt the newest thing, the latest diet fad, or the next achievement. The antidote is Gratitude. 

Here's how you can benefit from Gratitude Journaling. Keeping a Gratitude Journal and practicing Gratitude
1. Increases your happiness
2. Improves your Mental Health
3. Helps you savor Positive Experiences
4. Helps you to cope with major life challenges.
5. Fosters Resilience.
6. Boosts your Self esteem.
7. Fosters Empathy.
8. Gives you a better night's sleep.
9. Strengthens Relationships.

Being grateful & thankful for all of the blessings you have makes you feel good about yourself. You realize that there are so many reasons to be grateful, and your self-esteem is elevated. When you feel good about yourself & happy with who you are, you will find that this attitude also raises how you view your own life & the world around you. As such, gratitude creates positive emotions, like joy, love, and contentment, which research shows can undo the grip of negative emotions, like anxiety.

There are several incredible books like The Secret, The Magic by Rhonda Byrne, The Power of your Subconscious Mind by Joseph Murphy, Gratitude Diaries and Simple Abundance that have explained how Gratitude works wonders in bringing the change in our lives. There are several personal coaches, mindfulness coaches, yoga trainers & mentors that have found Gratitude journaling to be the best start towards self development and self love. It‚Äôs not always easy to effectively deal with tough situations like abusive relationships, financial crunch, grief, trauma, depression and attracting the wrong people and circumstances in our life. And at these times especially, it‚Äôs tough to bring a self change and change the circumstances. Keeping a Gratitude Journal and Practicing Positive Affirmations could be great start and baby steps towards shifting your negative energies to positive.

If you have any questions about the app or getting start with your Gratitude Journaling Journey, please don't hesitate to write to me at sankherpritesh@gmail.com

You can find the Privacy Policy for the app here: https://gratefulness.me/privacypolicy.html
Please find Terms & Conditions here: http://bit.ly/3077uoX

comments: 10/2020 EDIT TO UPDATE: I took a brief break from the app. When I signed (about 4 months of this post) it won't let me access my old entries. I'd love to see my growth. Maybe I'm missing something.... this app has taught me how to be happy again. I began with 2 entries a day and now when I'm bored I get on just to journal. it's great therapy!

This is a really slick and effective app. Simple, like all the best things, and good at stimulating the habit of daily gratitude. I especially like the daily zen quotes - I come back for these and it helps me remember to write something positive too. Great job!!

Over time, this app has vastly improved my outlook on life! Every day I find myself appreciating so many things I once took for granted, and it is changing me into a happier, more peaceful person! Even during Covid + tense political scenario! I would give it 10 stars if I could!

I liked the concept. here are my suggestions..the affirmations can be made editable or removable. I couldn't change them or even the topics I want to see further once I chose them. I couldn't here the affirmations even though there is a play mode.
It's a really good app, the display is great and the reminders work fine. They should add the option of filling in a gratitude note at any time in the past and not just limit it to 3 days.

title: Happify
description:
Happify‚Äôs science-based activities and games can help reduce stress, overcome negative thoughts, and build greater resilience by providing effective tools and programs to improve emotional well-being.
 
Our techniques are developed by leading scientists and experts who've been studying evidence-based interventions in the fields of positive psychology, mindfulness and cognitive behavioral therapy for decades.

86% of people who use Happify regularly report feeling better about their lives in 2 months!

HAPPINESS ISN‚ÄôT JUST ONE THING. IT‚ÄôS EVERYTHING.

Struggling with everyday challenges and being gripped by negativity can be toxic to one's emotional and physical well-being, relationships, and performance at work. So when you start to turn the corner, and begin to learn the new habits of successful engagement with life, everything starts to look brighter and better.

SKEPTICAL JOURNALISTS TRIED IT FOR THEMSELVES, AND HERE‚ÄôS WHAT THEY SAID:

ABC World News' Mara Schiavocampo
"I gave it a shot for 5 weeks...it works!"

The New York Times
"Each track contains bite-size quizzes, games and activities that guide you to seeing more positive aspects of daily life."

The TODAY Show
"These are things you can do every day -- tasks you can complete and be rewarded for -- to feel better, reduce stress, live a better life, & actually be happy."

Katie Couric: World 3.0 on Yahoo
‚Äú[Happify] evaluates what's keeping you from a high happiness quotient, then you're given games and activities that will boost your mood, like Uplift, Serenity Scene, and Gratitude Walk."

YOU KNOW YOUR GOALS. WE KNOW HOW YOU CAN ACHIEVE THEM.

Choose one track. Choose them all.

* Conquering negative thoughts
* Coping better with stress
* Building self-confidence
* Fueling your career success
* Achieving mindfulness through meditation
* ‚Ä¶and 30+ more!

Happify is free to download and use. It‚Äôs a great way to get started, and discover why so many people upgrade to Happify Plus for access to even more:

* Unlimited access to 30+ tracks;
* Your 20-page character strength report, offered in partnership with the renowned VIA Institute
* Track your progress everyday and see how your skills compare
* and more!

Because we know that everyone has different financial resources, we offer Happify Plus in a variety of plans, for as low as $11.67/month.

Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless auto-renewal is turned off (by going to Account Settings) at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period. You cannot cancel the current subscription during the active subscription period.

Privacy Policy: http://www.happify.com/privacy
Terms & Conditions: http://www.happify.com/terms

Website: http://www.happify.com
Help: support@happify.com

comments: This app is actually great! It helps me to communicate people, be more confident, and find my career. I like the videos and articles, it gives us empathy and change your skills. The activities are fun. I like that one game called "Negative knockout" because the game wipe out my worries. The other activity I like is the "Kindness Chain." because it really thoughtful to compliment people and get rid of negative thoughts. I love this app, it change the way I feel.

Your App works very slow, it's damn irritating, I am giving 1 Star without even knowing your features because I am already very frustrated with the way your app is responding. How am I suppose to use it's features when it has already Irritated me. This kind of App should be more convenient and must work properly, you are only frustrating people more. You may not be aware of this but now if you know please develope your App.

I have a strong philosophical gripe with some of the ideas this app presents, which I was unable to bring up with them because there is no way to contact anyone with questions. Then they hit me up for money, so I'm done.

Kept crashing and making me restart finished activities from the beginning, making my stress and anxiety worse. While I'm sure it genuinely helps when it's working correctly, I've not had a good experience with this app.
This app keeps me on track during these crazy times! I wasn't keeping up with journaling and Happify helps me stick to my destressing strategies in a fun and easy way.

title: Headspace: Meditation & Sleep
description:
Stress less. Sleep soundly. Get happy. Learn the life-changing skills of meditation and mindfulness in a few minutes a day with Headspace. Choose from hundreds of guided meditations on everything from stress management and anxiety management to sleep, personal growth, and mind-body health. 

Simply download this guided meditation, mindfulness, and sleep app for free ‚Äî then sit back, breathe, calm your thoughts, relax, and be kind to your mind. Meditate anywhere, anytime ‚Äî and start living a more calm, healthier, happier life.

About Headspace
Headspace is your guide to mindfulness for your everyday life. Learn meditation and mindfulness skills from world-class experts like Headspace co-founder Andy Puddicombe, and develop tools to help you focus, breathe, stay calm, and create balance in your life ‚Äî whether you need stress relief or help to get restful sleep.

What this meditation and sleep app does
The Headspace app teaches you how to meditate and live mindfully, with guided sessions on stress management, happiness, resilience, physical health, and more. Even if you‚Äôve never meditated before, the free Basics course teaches you the essentials.

In the Sleep by Headspace experience, you‚Äôll find sleep meditations, relaxing sleep music, and sleepcasts to guide you to a place of calm and rest. If you have trouble falling asleep or problems with your sleep cycle, Sleep by Headspace can put your mind to bed.

Courses:
Learn techniques to help deal with stress and anxiety, relax your mind, and more. 
‚óã Stress & anxiety meditation: Managing Anxiety, Letting Go of Stress
‚óã Falling asleep & waking up meditation: Sleep, Restlessness
‚óã Work & productivity meditation: Finding Focus, Prioritization, Productivity, Creativity
‚óã Movement & sports meditation: Motivation, Focus, Training, Competition, Recovery
‚óã Physical health mindfulness training: Mindful Eating, Pain Management, Pregnancy, Coping With Cancer
‚óã Student guided meditation: Dealing With Distractions, Leaving Home

 Focus:
From meditations for working from home to concentration-boosting music, the new Focus tab is your one-stop shop for changing the way you get things done. Tune in to the moment with Headspace‚Äôs Chief Music Officer, John Legend, and new music from groundbreaking artists, like Madlib. Or choose from 12 different Focus music stations, including Lo-Fi Times and Corner Booth Jazz.

Move Mode:
Release stress and tension through movement with Move Mode ‚Äî mood-boosting, at-home workouts led by Olympian trainers Kim Glass and Leon Taylor. Includes:
‚óã Quick workouts ‚Äì guided exercise videos for stress release, motivation, winding down, and more
‚óã 28-day courses ‚Äì build a mindful fitness routine with a trainer-led course
‚óã Audio-guided cardio ‚Äì mindful listening for your next run or walk

The Wake Up:
Start your morning happy with The Wake Up ‚Äî a daily video series designed to brighten your day. Includes inspiring stories, mindful advice from experts, and animations to make you smile.

Sleep by Headspace:
Create the ideal conditions for a calm, restful sleep. 
‚óã Sleepcasts ‚Äì original stories paired with relaxing sounds to help you unwind and calm your thoughts
‚óã Sleep music ‚Äì sounds and music create the perfect atmosphere for bedtime
‚óã Wind downs ‚Äì guided exercises to prepare your mind and body for sleep

Headspace Guided Meditation for Kids:
Designed for young meditators. Topics include: Sleep, Wake Up, Calm, Paying Attention, and more.

Headspace Plus subscription
Subscribe to Headspace Plus and access the full Headspace library ‚Äî including hundreds of meditations, mindfulness training, and calm, breathing exercises.
‚óã Over 40 meditation courses on topics like stress and sleep
‚óã Dozens of one-off exercises to add mindfulness to your day
‚óã Short, mini-meditations ‚Äî great for busy schedules
‚óã Full access to Sleep by Headspace and Move Mode ‚Äî bring mindfulness to every part of your life

developer: Headspace for Meditation, Mindfulness and Sleep
developerAddress:
2415 Michigan Avenue
Santa Monica, CA 90404
recentChanges:
A steady meditation practice can calm the mind. But sometimes a bug appears in the app and it distracts us. We removed that bug from this latest version, and we already feel more at ease.

If you run into any trouble, let us know at help@headspace.com
comments: Its unfortunate that they dont advertise the Student discount. $9.99/year is astoundingly generous of them. Thanks! But I dont think anyone knows about this deal. I only learned about this when I accidentally stumbled across a YouTube comment from a year ago. Awesome app, great stuff for sleep. It do be crashing though. Just recently, so idk if it's just me or everyone else got the same problem?

This app was brilliant when I first started using it every day - especially during lockdown - but now that Headspace Plus is a thing, it's way too expensive to access to the soundscapes & meditations that I was using before. The selection available now, without Headspace Plus, is shockingly little especially considering I am already paying for the app! I liked a nice mix of things to help me sleep but now I can only listen to the same three things on rotation which isn't great. Not happy at all.

My 5-year old and I saw a commercial for this app which featured a cute animated video of a "robot" slowly shutting down its systems in advance of falling asleep. I thought this would be a great app for my kid to watch while doing bedtime, so I signed up for a (pretty pricey) subscription. Immediately was disappointed by the fact that no such cutesy videos are ACTUALLY part of the app (most of it appears to consist of streaming audio). Feels a bit like false advertising...

I only use this app for the Sleepcasts, they're very peaceful to listen to and I usually fall asleep after the first 15 minutes or so. A few months ago they offered 3 to listen to for free, but now they only offer 1, and all of the others are behind a pretty high pay wall - its incredibly frustrating, especially during this time and all the stressful things everyone is going through in their lives

Just updated the app for the first time in around a year. The new organization of meditation options is awful. Examples: you have a lot of activity-specific meditations, but the only way to access them is to remember what they're called and search. Also, i don't want to have to scroll forever, past lots of meditations that I'll never be choosing (e.g., kids), just to see what's available. Alphabetical organization of every option is tedious and difficult to get through.

title: Happy being - stress relief, improve wellbeing
description:
Personalized guidance to enhance wellbeing, manage stress & anxiety better, create stronger relations, boost focus & decision making. Heal from past pain, overcome blocks, and get aware, manage, and express your feelings better.

Featured 
+ App of the day. +
+ Award-winning #1 wellbeing app, +
+ Among Global Top 5 Apps for meditation +
+ Among Global top 5 App for mental health and emotional wellbeing App +

Wellbeing is a state in which you feel healthy, happy, and successful.
It includes achieving your true potential, coping effectively with day-to-day stress and challenges, having meaningful relationships, and living to your full potential.

Wellbeing affects one's state of health, thoughts, and actions. This impacts your relationships, focus, personal harmony, and decision making.

Often a lack in one, without one's awareness, can negatively impact other areas, showing up as more dissatisfaction, discord, poor performance, health issues, and distress, affecting your quality of life.

With just 10-15 mins a day, our happiness bots help you enhance and take self-care of your wellbeing in 3 simple steps.

STEP 1: Get instantly, your wellbeing measured across 8 pillars of your life. 

STEP 2: Get personalized actions, priorities, and tools that work best for you to enhance your wellbeing. 

STEP 3: Get personalized workouts and guidance every day, by our happiness bots (powered by AI), ensuring your privacy, supporting anywhere, anytime. Choose from 800+ tools that work best for you. 

FEATURES:
+ My Goals: The first step to improving your wellbeing is to help you understand - what are your aspirations, approaches, and priorities. Measure your wellbeing, set goals, and achieve growth across 8 pillars of your life:

1.	Health and fitness
2.	Self and family relationships
3.	Emotional strength
4.	Friends and community
5.	Career success
6.	Financial security and growth
7.	Purpose and meaning
8.	Personal environment

+ My Coach: A new workout every day. 10 mins My coach presents everyday practices that build skills and habits to boost mental strength, enhance focus, develop self-love, and take actions to achieve goals.

‚Ä¢	Mindfulness meditation
‚Ä¢	Positive affirmations
‚Ä¢	Get aware of your current feelings, get help when feeling alone, sad, low, fear, confusion, and rest-less.
‚Ä¢	Guided Imagery

+ MindSpa: Different relaxation techniques to help you focus, calm down and sleep better.
Relaxation music & meditations
Mindfulness meditations
Breathing exercises
Visualization meditations
5 senses relaxation
Positive Perspective ‚Äì on 
Let go of emotional pain
Positive affirmations
Self-healing
Take a break

Wellbeing is a state in which you feel healthy, happy, and successful.
It includes achieving your true potential, coping effectively with day-to-day stress and challenges, having meaningful relationships, and living to your full potential.

Wellbeing affects one's state of health, thoughts, and actions. This impacts your relationships, focus, personal harmony, and decision making.

With just 10-15 mins a day, our happiness bots help you enhance and take self-care of your wellbeing in 3 simple steps.

title: Daylio - Diary, Journal, Mood Tracker
description:
Daylio enables you to keep a private journal without having to type a single line. Try this beautifully designed & stunningly simple micro-diary app right now for FREE!


üòÅ WHAT IS DAYLIO

Daylio is a very versatile app, and you can turn it in whatever you need to track. Your fitness goal pal. Your mental health coach. Your food log. Your gratitude diary. Mood tracker. Exercise, meditate, eat, and be grateful. Take care of your mental, emotional, and physical health. Good self-care is a key to improved mood and reduced anxiety.

This is the time for your wellbeing, self-improvement, and self-care. Use Daylio as your daily bullet journal. We build it on three principles:

‚úÖ Reach happiness and self-improvement by being mindful of your days.
‚úÖ Validate your hunches. How does your new hobby influence your life?
‚úÖ Form a new habit in an obstacle-free environment‚Äîno learning curve. Daylio is super simple to use, create your first entry in two steps.

For anxiety and stress relief, make sure to include activities that help you to cope with negativity. Everybody can use a mood boost! You can measure their impact on your mood in stats. 


ü§î HOW DOES IT WORK

Pick your mood and add activities you have been doing during the day. You can also add notes and keep an old school diary. Daylio is collecting recorded moods and activities in the statistics and calendar. This format will help you to understand your habits better. Keep track of your activities and create patterns to become more productive!

You can review all entries in the statistics on charts or the calendar and share them with your friends.

To make it even better, Daylio allows you:
‚≠ê Make reflection a daily habit
‚≠ê Discover what makes you happy
‚≠ê Use a big database of beautiful icons for your personalized activities 
‚≠ê Mix and match your own moods using funny emojis
‚≠ê Explore exciting statistics about your life on weekly, monthly or yearly charts
‚≠ê Deep dive into advanced statistics for every mood, activity or group
‚≠ê Customize color themes
‚≠ê Enjoy nights with dark mode
‚≠ê See your whole year in 'Year in Pixels'
‚≠ê Create daily, weekly or monthly goals and motivate yourself
‚≠ê Build habits and collect achievements
‚≠ê Share statistics with your friends
‚≠ê Safely back up and restore your entries via your private Google Drive
‚≠ê Set reminders and never forget to create a memory
‚≠ê Turn on PIN lock and keep your diary safe
‚≠ê Export PDF and CSV documents to share or print your entries


üßê PRIVACY AND SECURITY

We are a top private journal since we do not store or collect your data.

At Daylio, we believe in transparency and honesty. Your data is stored locally on your phone. You can optionally schedule backups to your private cloud storage or take your backup file with you anywhere. Data are entirely under your control at all times.

Data stored in the app's private directories are not accessible by any other apps or processes. Your backups are transferred to the Google Drive via the secure (encrypted) channels.

We don't send your data to our servers. We don't have access to your entries. Also, any other third-party app can't read your data.

recentChanges: Thanks for using Daylio. We have made several small improvements and fixed a couple of bugs. Enjoy the app!
comments: Far more useful and life-improving than expected! I've been using daylio every single day for almost 2 years, which is both an achievement and a testament to the app's ease-of-use. It's still being actively developed so great new features keep popping up. An app that I'm very happy to support and recommend.

I bought the app, but when I switched my phone, they didn't saved my purchase, restricting me in use of the app. Although premium version still valid and working on the old phone. Ridiculous! Btw: asking monthly subscription for the app, for which you don't even need to pay for servers, is the most violent insult of your usersüñï

Great tool to help you keep track of life. I like the fact it works with speech to text so I don't actually have to type down my journal throughout the day and it helps keep track of things I want to do things I'd like to do and just things like that. it reminds me to do stuff a lot which honestly sometimes I would forget and it's honestly help me a lot with my depression by just reminding me to like be kind to myself and things like that. I highly recommend it.

I have struggles with remembering to do simple daily tasks and keeping a routine in place. This is the only app I pay for because its the easiest to use and the only one that's ever actually managed to keep me on task and keep track of things. I highly recommend it for anyone with executive dysfunction, ADHD or autism if you need help staying on task or remembering daily self care!!

Great mood and activity tracker. I would really like the ability to still log things after midnight as the same day. I am having to customise the time and date for late night entries because they don't make sense to include in the next day. I haven't started that day yet! I think a "day start/end time" we can set would be an easy fix, much like choosing if weeks start on Sunday or Monday. I hope you consider this feedback!

title: Deepstash - Self Improvement, Motivation & Care
description:
Think of Deepstash as your personal library of thoughts and knowledge. A daily source of inspiring & life changing stories and ideas. Read articles, learn skills, get productivity tips and discover life hacks. All curated by our team and presented to you in a simple, practical and easy to remember, short summarized format. Fuel your curiosity and get smarter daily.

It's like your social media feed, if your social media feed had things that mattered :-)

Content & articles that matter to you. Our team curates the best stories around the web (articles, videos, podcasts & more, from top publications and magazines like Medium, Inc, Lifehacker, Forbes, Mark Manson, FastCompany, BBC, Tony Robbins & more) and provides actionable and inspiring short form key insights to improve yourself personally and professionally. A wealth of self help knowledge in your pocket.

Have questions? You‚Äôll surely get answers by reading, learning and exploring a world of hard and soft skills as well as interests like time management, self improvement, leadership, self-confidence, motivation or psychology, that will make you a great fit anywhere in life you put your mind to.

Summarized ideas. You need just 5 minutes per day. Our team works for you. We provide a summary of the main insights of articles and other web content in a short and crisp 100 words or less format we call ‚Äúideas‚Äù.

Escape the negativity and time wasting pull of social media platforms. Our app‚Äôs goal is to help you towards self improvement and self care and to get you motivated, inspired, wiser and productive.

Personalized content & feed. Choose a few topics of interest (like self improvement, time management, problem solving, love & relationships & more) and then just use the app at your leisure. As you save ideas and use our app, we learn what you like and find the best stories and articles to show you every day, so you‚Äôre motivated and inspired. You don‚Äôt even have to work for it.

The more you save ideas the better we learn what articles and topics you love. We refresh your recommendations multiple times a day so you never run out of fresh stories and ideas.

Build and organize your knowledge. You can save ideas in your own personal profile and build your own hub of facts, skills, quotes, information and ideas that matter to you.

Search and filter your ideas and articles by recent, oldest or most popular and organise your knowledge into personalised stashes, which are basically collections of insights stocked up and ready to go for when you need them: a Powerpoint presentation, a new job interview, a date, a project at work, or negotiating your rent with the landlord.

Share your knowledge. We make it super easy for you to share the best articles, quotes, stories and ideas on any channel you want. Send it to a friend on Whatsapp or share it with your followers on Instagram.

Share a link to ideas or just an image. We built special image formats for each social network (Instagram, Facebook, Twitter and others) so your ideas look best.

No ads. No distractions. 100% Free. The Deepstash app is free and open to everyone. Get a clean reading experience and focus on the content instead of being distracted with annoying ads or dozens of notifications about ‚Äúpremium‚Äù subscriptions. Just get a quick free account (Facebook & Google login) and you‚Äôre good to go. 

And we‚Äôll never sell, lease or share your data. Your privacy is really important to us.

Learn new things and become a better, smarter you, with the Deepstash app!

We're always open to feedback, ideas and thoughts about anything that might make our app the best app it can be. Give us a shout at hello@deepstash.com. We read every single email we get :-)

Have a look at our website and social stuff:

deepstash.com
instagram.com/deepstash
twitter.com/deepstash
facebook.com/deepstash

We (sometimes) write on Medium: https://medium.com/infinite-learners

recentChanges:
This update brings quality of life improvements for idea creation. Long live our thoughts!

- New guided tooltips for idea creation flow.
- Easier access to Drafts and adding ideas.
- Search and use any image for ideas.
- Reorder ideas in any draft, before publishing.

comments: Loved the app. I can see the articles in this app slowly impacting my daily routine. It's keeping me motivated. It's helping me learn things. I feel like reading a good book after just a small article. Thing to improve: it suggests me a good article in the notification and when I click it nothing happens. The notification just disappears.

This is an amazing app!!!!I am writing my review after one month of using it and the app gives me some inspirational ideas and strategies to make my lifestyle better in a progressive manner.However, I am giving 4 stars because of the bugs.When I open the app,it freezes for a few minutes and works.I hope it can be rectified on upcoming updates. EDIT : Thanks for the response from the team! It just works fine now . Reinstall fixed the bugs. I already had the latest 4.3.0 and it had bugs somehow..

Instead of swiping to read the next article, may I suggest putting an icon that we can tap on to go to the next article instead of swiping? when scrolling on the current article that I'm reading, I accidentally scroll too far to the left/right and it goes to the next article and when I go back, it didn't even refresh to where I left off! I love this app, I prefer it more than social media, but it's so annoying when I accidentally swipe on the next article and have to go back & scroll down again!

In a world that seems to be a raging dumpster fire, and everything in social media and news pointing to how bad things are getting... This app is a breath of fresh air. It offers simple, memorable morsels of wisdom. Easily consumable. It is so important to focus on what we can control---ourselves. Working on bettering ourselves, our mindsets, and expanding our horizons is the way we change the world. I am adding this app to my home screen and making a commitment to read articles daily. Great app

This is just so worth it. If I were to recommend something that is worth accessing, well this is pretty much on my top list of reads. I'm loving this, the settings, the articles in it and the concepts of developing such an app was so just so impressive. Hats off to the developers and creators.

title: Calm - Meditate, Sleep, Relax
description:
Calm is a leading app for meditation and sleep. Join the millions experiencing lower stress, less anxiety, and more restful sleep with our guided meditations, Sleep Stories, breathing programs, masterclasses, and relaxing music. Recommended by top psychologists, therapists, and mental health experts.

Calm is the perfect mindfulness app for beginners, but also includes hundreds of programs for intermediate and advanced users.

Guided meditation sessions are available in lengths of 3, 5, 10, 15, 20 or 25 minutes so you can choose the perfect length to fit with your schedule. Topics include:

* Calming Anxiety
* Managing Stress
* Deep Sleep
* Focus and Concentration
* Relationships
* Breaking Habits
* Happiness
* Gratitude
* Self-Esteem
* Body Scan
* Loving-Kindness
* Forgiveness
* Non-judgement
* Commuting to work or school
* Mindfulness at College
* Mindfulness at Work
* Walking meditation
* Calm Kids
* And so much more...

Also featuring:

* An original Daily Calm every day: a new 10-minute program added daily to help ease you into the day or unwind with before bed
* 100+ Sleep Stories: adult bedtime stories guaranteed to lull you to sleep
* 7 and 21 day programs for both beginner and advanced users
* Life-changing Calm Masterclasses taught by world-renowned experts
* Breathing exercises to help you relax
* Exclusive music engineered to help you focus, relax or sleep
* Unguided timed meditation
* Open-ended meditation
* 30+ soothing nature sounds and scenes to use during meditation, yoga or to help you sleep

Track your progress with:

* Daily streaks
* Time spent meditating

Calm is loved by the press:

* ‚ÄúI‚Äôm generally wary of meditation apps because they sometimes weave in too much mystic talk for my taste. But Calm instead contains guidance like ‚ÄòConcentrate on your body‚Äô‚Äù - New York Times

* ‚ÄúIn the frenetic, crazy, digital world we live in, sometimes it's necessary to take a step back and smell the roses‚Äù - Mashable

* ‚ÄúEliminating distraction...ended up helping me relax and realize that all the stuff I was stressing about wasn't that big a deal‚Äù - Tech Republic

* ‚ÄúFound myself similarly refreshed afterwards‚Äù - TechCrunch

Calm is free to download and use, and there are no ads. A subset of the programs and features are free forever.

Some content is only available through an optional paid subscription. If you choose to subscribe, payment will be charged to your Google Account at confirmation of purchase.

recentChanges: Thanks for using Calm! This update contains multiple bug fixes and performance improvements. As always, you can expect an original Daily Calm every day, new music and Sleep Stories every week, and new Meditation programs every month.
comments: I have used this app for over 4 years! I had the free version for a year and a half and loved it but wanted a little more. I use the paid version now. It doesn't cost anymore than any streaming service, actually cheaper than my Netflix and even Hulu. I'd give up both for this app if I had to. Helps with my sleep , my kid's sleep and our mental growth. I highly recommend using this!

Stopped before I even started. This app expects you not only to have to sign in and create an account straight away, but the "free" trial also requires you to sign up with an active credit card before you even get to experience anything. I personally hate this way of working and tend to turn away from all apps that insist on this model. Installed and deleted within ten minutes.

11th month update: Now I am trying to delete my subscription it is sooooo difficult. Unbelievable. I would never recommend this app. They have hidden the subscription change, created many bugs like your browser does not support... I am trying to unsubscribe using the app itself, but surprisingly it is not working because of java or smtng. Why you would need java to unsubscribe. You are trying to rob the users. Making it difficult so that they will give up, and you will continue making money

I tried the 7 days free trial and i found the meditation offered quite poor. Mostly too short and way too much talking, and not even in a soft spoken tone. I couldn't play any of its music in the background. Maybe my fault, but ok, since a lot of the music on offer is pop commercial singer stuff. I also didn't like the 'well done, set a reminder' type of approach. A meditation app should provide escape from the manic, 'like' addictive type of world, not mimic it. Disappointed

This app changed my life. It really helped me became a calmer person and have clarity. My mind is much more peaceful and have significantly less troubling and negative thoughts, even when I do have them sometimes, I'm able to distinguish them as just thoughts and not my reality. This is a really helpful app and I'm so thankful to the creators and all those who worked hard to get it working as good as it is.

title: Medito: Free Meditation, Sleep & Mindfulness ‚òÄÔ∏è
description:
100% Free Meditation App that will improve your üòáMental wellbeing with the help of üßòGuided Meditations, Breathing Exercises, Mindfulness Practices, üé∂Relaxing Sounds, and more.

With our app‚Äôs holistic approach, you can find guided and non-guided meditations from  Medito Foundation and various other organizations such as UCLA, Dhamma talks, and Audio Dharma, all of which are based on ancient as well as recent meditation techniques.
Just spend a few minutes of the day on this app using the various features and discover the life-changing benefits, positivity, and transformative effects of meditation in your life.

The app is made with the aim to guide you towards a happier & healthier life with the help of various features present in it. This app from  Medito Foundation will help everyone on their journey to practice gratitude, manage anxiety and stress, relax and find positivity.

‚ú®About Medito Foundation:
Medito Foundation is a non-profit organization that believes - ‚ÄúMeditation can positively transform lives and no one should have to pay for it‚Äù. This foundation is dedicated to its purpose of helping people cope better with depression, stress, anxiety, and any other negative state of mind. Practicing meditation and mindfulness is known to help reduce anxiety & stress, enhance cognition, attention & memory, help you sleep better, improve mental health, focus, and general well-being. 

‚ú®Prime Features:

üìçBeginner and Intermediate Courses
üî∏Beginner Course
The Beginner Course is carefully crafted for someone who has little or no meditation experience. Each session is designed to teach you the basics of mindfulness & meditation. These sessions include Mindfulness, Vipassana, Non-judgement, Mindful living, Science of meditation, Negative emotions, etc.


üîπIntermediate Course
These guided meditations are designed for anyone who has already learned the basics of mindfulness meditation and is interested in developing their practice further. The course will introduce concepts & philosophies that will help deepen the meditation practice. This course includes sessions on Spontaneity of thoughts, Consciousness, Anxiety & Stress management, Minimal living, Ego dissolution, etc.

üìçDaily Meditation
A different meditation session each day to help develop a greater sense of awareness in the present moment with options to choose from various session lengths, background music, etc.

üìçSleep Meditation, Sleep Sounds & Sleep Stories
Good sleep is a cornerstone of wellbeing which helps to maintain the physical & mental health and these guided sleep meditations which include Mindful breathing, Visualization, Body Scan, Sleep Stories as well as Mantra for sleep meditation will definitely ease you into a peaceful & restful sleep by calming down your mind and unifying your thoughts.

üìçMeditation for Stress & Anxiety Management
The sessions which include labeling thoughts, dealing with stressful situations, negative emotions, etc are designed to help you manage stress & anxiety. Mindfulness meditation can help in dealing with negative emotions by transforming the way we actually experience them which ultimately diminishes their power over us.

üìçMeditation for Work Life Management
Meditation & mindfulness can have a transformative effect on all aspects of our lives. These sessions are specifically designed to help lead a happier and healthier work life. It covers topics such as managing conflict, improving productivity and confidence, staying focused & motivated while finding the perfect work-life balance.

Medito also includes a variety of other meditation content like - Breathing exercises, Meditation timer, Gratitude, Mindful Routines, Relaxing music, etc.

If you have any questions, please send an email hi@meditofoundation.org, or via twitter @meditoHQ.

Medito Foundation
meditofoundation.org

developer: Medito for Mindfulness, Meditation and Sleep
recentChanges:
Improved functionality for screen readers.
Fixed the after-session screen.
Updated some minor styles on the stats page.
Some other minor UI improvements.
comments: I love this app. It is the best one I have found, so far, which is really free. Other apps make this claim, but then block access to certain material unless a payment is made. As a fairly novice meditation practitioner, I found this app invaluable because there is a beginner's course and intermediate course. Following on from these courses there are a variety of packs for different situations. From daily meditations to managing stress or anxiety, for better sleep, for walking, e.t.c.

Wow, this app is 100% quality. There is content for every situation and it is free. For those of you who are tired by commercialization of meditation apps - this is an app for you. I like that there is a simple customizable timer. Although I don't understand what offline / online mode means in the context of it. Seems like the meditation track is streamed anyway. Developers, could you clarify what that feature does?

Hands down the best app I've ever had for meditation. I've used so many other apps but this one is the only app I've actually stuck to using. The interface is so seamless and so easy to use. And it's 100 percent free. No sneaky purchases or special meditation packs. That sort of transparency is much appreciated and I honestly wouldn't mind donating or paying. I don't know how to support you guys other than this, if there is literally any other way to help, let me know!

After trying several meditation apps (Simple Habit, Headspace, Atom, etc), I like Medito the most because it's simple, user-friendly, and beginner-friendly. All sessions are free and the selection is well curated, which I love because what frustrated me with other apps is that too many options can be overwhelming and having series wherein some episodes are free while others are paid can stunt one's growth. Their "Getting Started" collection is useful particularly for a newbie like me, as many of the other apps do not offer in-depth tutorials on what to expect and how to practice correctly. As a cherry on top, I like the options for background sound, especially Spring Field. The audio is balanced well with the voice, so it's not too loud nor soft, and it plays seamlessly. It seems like a small thing, but it's something that had bugged me and turned me off from other apps. If I had to nitpick - it would be wonderful if you can expand your collections under Sleep Meditation and Mantra Affirmations as they currently only have a handful each.

This is my first meditation app and I find it very well made. You can pick what kind of meditation you need as the sessions are divided into sections. The voices are very calming. I've been meditating for about 4 months now and I can see some improvement in managing my stress and being a nicer person in general. Thank you guys and keep up your work!

title: Abide in Me - Daily Encouragement
description:
Real bread made from the teachings of Christ to nourish the soul and help you live life in all its abundance.

This app is updated daily to encourage the reader by the word of God that is alive and active. The reader will be truly benefited to see the connection between today‚Äôs world and the irrevocable word of God. 

The app has multiple pages that will help to explore the teachings of Christ in different areas of life.  It tries to provide answers to questions that some of us might be struggling with: Where and how to find peace in this world? How to cope with the worries of this life? What is faith and how to make it a part of daily life? Are the teachings of Jesus still relevant? Does God love us? and more...

There may be many questions but one answer, that is Jesus. Abide in Him and that is the only way to remain fruitful.

ME ENCANTAN

title: Smiling Mind
description:
Smiling Mind is a unique web and app-based program developed by psychologists and educators to help bring balance to people‚Äôs lives.

Just as we eat well and stay fit to keep our body healthy, mindfulness meditation is about mental health and looking after the mind.

Smiling Mind is a 100% not-for-profit organisation that works to make mindfulness meditation accessible to all.

Our vision is to help every mind thrive.

Our mission is to provide accessible, life-long tools to support healthy minds.

Our programs are designed to assist people in dealing with the pressure, stress and challenges of daily life. 

We offer programs for:
- Adults
- Kids & Youth (3-18 Year Olds)
- Sleep
- Classrooms
- Sport
- At Work
- Some Indigenous Languages
- & Much More

Illustrations by Beci Orpin and The Jacky Winter Group

recentChanges: In this update we are excited to announce a whole new category for health workers.
comments: Easy to use; accessible and very blind friendly; thank you. It's getting very hard to find an app that isn't overloaded with unlabeled images, buttons, and circular sliders. Thanks for a straight-from-the-hip, getter-done meditation app. You're welcome. I'm really grateful that the reminders are verbal as well. Most apps seem to think that visual reminders are enough, but blind people don't have the luxury of looking at their phones constantly, so thanks for talking to me.

An excellent, totally free mindfulness app. Smiling Mind covers everything from children to teenagers to adult mindfulness foundations, with a variety of specific targeted mindfulness courses of all sorts to help with different areas like sleep, stress, relationships, work - etc. I've been using it for years and it's wonderfully ad free. As for mindfulness itself, I cannot recommend it enough. If you're curious, Smiling Mind is a perfect place to start.

This app is so great when it works. It gets quite glitchy when it comes to member login and member data. It will not let me reset my password because apparently my email address is not present in the system but I am unable to register a new email address because I'm already registered in the system! When I was still able to login it would randomly delete my data and programs/progress. It will also sometimes just freeze in the middle of a meditation.

I like the meditations however I dont like the layout and navigation of the app. A lot of the meditations are too similar, cant skip and have a long intro that I dont want to hear every time. The app logs me out often too and I have to login, which is an annoying inconvenience when I'm trying to relax to sleep. I fell asleep to it and it kept playing the whole night for 8 hours. And just then I was listening and it kept skipping to the beginning. It was rather creepy actually and now I'm on edge

This app is amazing and has helped me to sleep again. I was relying on a number of medications to sleep but the guided mediations have drastically changed that for me. I cannot thank everyone involved in this enough, so I'm going to donate as well. Thank you so much for making such a wonderful tool freely available and without ads, it really has changed my life üòò

title: uMore | Stress and mood tracker made by experts
description:
Do you find it hard to cope with daily stress? Are you looking to improve your wellbeing? uMore is your stress companion that supports you on better managing your stress day in and day out. 

Download uMore and get an instant stress score, then track and reflect on your mood. uMore is here to help you take control and to get back on track.

Use uMore to:

1. Baseline and assess your current stress level

With uMore, in just minutes, you can see and better understand your current stress score. We use the same questions and scores used by doctors and healthcare practitioners for decades. 

So how does it work? Getting started is easy, just fill in a 10-item questionnaire to measure your self-reported level of stress. You do so by assessing feelings and thoughts during the last week. Giving you a clinically validated score, this same score helps you understand if your current stress level is low, moderate or even sever. 

2. Track and document your stress

As you self-monitor, one of the most critical aspects of the app are the weekly scores. These same scores are tracked over time, empowering you to understand your stress. We know from science that tracking not only provides you with cognitive closure but also it improves your health as it makes you feel in control of your condition. 

3. Share your progress with friends, family or even your doctor

We believe that disclosure is one of the first steps to recovery, and therefore we've build uMore to help you add your loved ones. With uMore, you can choose to share your data with your own "safe circle". 

We built the safe circle based on science, as research suggests this contributes to decreases in distress while at the same time improving attitudes to mental health challenges. Our safe circle is based on digitizing social prescriptions, a tool pioneered by the UK's national health service (NHS) linking users to support networks is a cornerstone of social prescribing, suggested to contribute to positive health and wellbeing improvements as well as anxiety and depression.

4. Learn to take control with custom insights and content 

We know that giving you just a score is not enough. You need more, you need actionable tools, content and insights. We also understand that mental health is uniquely personal, and that is why we have designed the app to cater to your particular needs. 

uMore provides you with evidence-based recommendations, written by our expert medical researchers from proven interventions such as CBT and mindfulness, all designed to improve wellbeing. Our goal is to give you new ways to cope with your mental health and to inspire you with stories from people just like you.

Our mission

We are on mission to destigmatize mental health. We wish to make it accessible, regardless of income or location. We are not developing medical treatments, but rather, we are building a digital solution that enables understanding of what affects them and giving them a tool to prevent such occurrences. 

Combining innovative technology, machine learning and medical research, we are breaking new ground to make uMore the most useful app for tracking, analyzing and helping you stay on top of your mental wellbeing. We hope that you will join us on our ambitious journey.

About us

We are a small international team of experienced and visionary product designers, digital technologists, and scientists with experience in creating solutions designed to bring value to users. We are passionate about building products that have the potential to change the way we live for the better.

Any questions or feedback? Reach out to us at info@umore.app or learn more on www.umore.app 

If you like our app, please leave a rating. We appreciate it!

Download uMore, your stress companion: Take the test, get your score and share your progress.

Website ‚á® http://umore.app/
Instagram ‚á® @umoreaiapp
Facebook ‚á® https://www.facebook.com/umoreapp
Twitter ‚á® @uMoreAi
Email ‚á® info@umore.app

comments: Fantastic idea. The app works really well and has a friendly user interface that looks great. Tracking important things is very helpful to me. I also like how the Insights articles offer actionable tips.
Great app, very much needed especially during these difficult times. A great way to track your mental health and discover patterns about your mood changes and mental wellbeing.

I've tried a lot of apps with a similar purpose, but this is by far the best. I really loved the sharing option. I could easily now let my close friends know how I am feeling through the app. Highly recommended!
A great app very helpful! Will definitely recommend to help with dealing with stress
I have only briefly used the app, but so far I have really enjoyed using it. I like how it gets me to reflect on what I have done during the week, so I can analyse where I can improve.

title: Evernote - Notes Organizer & Daily Planner
description:
Capture ideas when inspiration strikes. Find information fast. Share notes with anyone. From meetings and projects to web pages and to-do lists‚Äîwith Evernote, everything‚Äôs in one place.
 
Evernote syncs to all your devices, so you can tackle action items on the go. Express yourself clearly with easy-to-use formatting options, and find what you need quickly with filtered searches and results as you type. 

Note: The new version of Evernote is available for Android version 9 and newer. Users of Android version 8 and older will receive the Evernote Legacy app. The new Evernote for Android will be made available for Android versions 6, 7, and 8 in a future update.
 
---

"Use Evernote as the place you put everything ‚Ä¶ Don‚Äôt ask yourself which device it‚Äôs on‚Äîit‚Äôs in Evernote" ‚Äì The New York Times
 
‚ÄúWhen it comes to taking all manner of notes and getting work done, Evernote is an indispensable tool.‚Äù ‚Äì PC Mag
 
---

CAPTURE IDEAS
‚Ä¢ Write, collect, and capture ideas as searchable notes, notebooks, memos, checklists, and to-do lists.
‚Ä¢ Keep journals capturing the events and milestones of your daily life.
‚Ä¢ Clip interesting articles and web pages to read or use later. 
‚Ä¢ Take notes and create notepads in a variety of formats: text, sketches, photos, audio, web clippings, and more.
‚Ä¢ Use the camera to effortlessly scan, digitize, and organize your paper documents, business cards, whiteboards, handwritten notes, and drawings.
‚Ä¢ Attach docs, PDFs, photos, and audio.
 
GET ORGANIZED
‚Ä¢ Create separate notebooks to organize your memos, receipts, bills, and invoices.
‚Ä¢ Find anything fast‚ÄîEvernote's powerful search can even find text in images and handwritten notes.
‚Ä¢ Set reminders to keep on top of activities and write to-do lists. 

ACCESS ANYWHERE
‚Ä¢ Sync your notes and notebooks automatically across any Chromebook, phone, or tablet.
‚Ä¢ Start your work on one device and continue on another without missing a beat.

EVERNOTE IN EVERYDAY LIFE
‚Ä¢ Make personal to-do lists to keep your thoughts organized. 
‚Ä¢ Go paperless by scanning receipts and important documents.

EVERNOTE IN BUSINESS
‚Ä¢ Keep everyone up to date by capturing meeting notes and sharing notebooks with your team.
‚Ä¢ Use it as your ultimate planner, organizer, and notepad at work.
 
EVERNOTE IN EDUCATION
‚Ä¢ Keep up with lecture notes so you don‚Äôt miss important details.
‚Ä¢ Use it as a planner and organizer to keep track of lecture notes, exams, and assignments.
 
---

Also available from Evernote:
 
EVERNOTE PREMIUM
‚Ä¢ 10 GB of new uploads each month
‚Ä¢ Unlimited number of devices
‚Ä¢ Access your notes and notebooks offline
 
Price may vary by location. Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your Google Play account. Where applicable, your subscription will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Subscriptions may not be cancelled for refund except as provided in Evernote's Commercial Terms. Manage your subscriptions in Account Settings after purchase.

---

Privacy Policy: https://evernote.com/legal/privacy.php
Terms of Service: https://evernote.com/legal/tos.php
Commercial terms: https://evernote.com/legal/commercial-terms
