comments: I have started to use the application in 2009. Then I liked it. In addition to this, I've decided to purchase for premium, created another account and shared my notebooks with my premium account. Then I couldn't see my shared notebooks on the web and mobile. I've been struggling with technical support for 2 weeks. They have promised for full technical support, I'm writing but they haven't returned for 5 days. Unfortunately, I'm switching back to Microsoft Onenote.

After the major update to the app, the note texts are not readable anymore. Looks like Evernote messed up the text color setting in Android. My noted works fine in iPad and on PC. I always leave the text color as default and never changed it. However, in Android, text is in dark grey in Dark Mode, and light grey in Light mode. So the text color is always very close to the background color no matter which mode I choose. And this MAJOR issue has been there for at least a week!

Ruined after the recent upgrade roll out: 1) Notes take ages to load up. 2) All the fonts which used to be available have now disappeared and all my notes are suddently in Sans Serif. At least it wasn't Comic Sans. 3) None of the desktop keyboard shortcuts I used to use which made this app efficient to use have disappeared. 4) It needs to be online to work - unnecessary and annoying Probably other things have gone wrong - it's only been a few hours since the upgrade. It wasn't broken - why try to fix it?? I've been a Premium subscriber for years - now considering cancelling & switching.

I used to love this app and I use it a lot for work and personal info organisation. The latest update is an utter disaster for me. It requires a constant internet connection, which I - and millions of other people on this planet - don't have. I used to be able to work on notes whether I was online or offline - a helpful little red exclamation symbol would appear on the sync item when the app couldn't sync because the internet was down, so I would be careful not to change to working on the same note on a different device. Now the app insists on me reloading the note when the internet is down and wipes out my latest edits. This is useless! I don't want to have to remove the sync setting as I do want the app to sync regularly when I'm online. If this continues to be a problem I will, finally, have to relinquish my subscription and migrate to a different tool. (NB the Windows 10 app update doesn't even appear to have the option to change the sync setting at all - in fact the settings menu seems to have disappeared completely!!!)

After the recent update, I've lost all my notes from the past 1 week simply because they had not automatically synced. The update was automatic btw. Pathetic experience, and quite stressful too. I was thinking of upgrading to premium but will definitely not do it now, after realizing my content can be deleted anytime without a fair warning.

title: Daily Yoga - Yoga Fitness Plans
description:
We‚Äôre here for you! Daily Yoga opens a Free Collection for you to provide 6 programs and 13 sessions free to everyone, plus the up to 80% Special Off of subscription. We hope to help users to stay safe and keep positive during the uncertain time!

If you're a beginner to yoga, Daily Yoga App provides various guided classes to help you learn the basics before diving into more advanced classes and flows, and if you're advanced‚Äîthere are plenty of the world - class teachers you want to follow with.		

Featured as ‚ÄúWorks with Google Fit‚Äù,‚ÄúTop Developer‚Äù,‚ÄúClear Your MindÔºå Engage Your Body‚Äù, ‚ÄúKeep Calm & Carry On‚Äù in Google Play, 
Voted as‚Äù Best Yoga App‚Äù of the year 2016-2019 by Healthline, 
Awarded by The Wall Street Journal as the ‚Äú5 Addictive Fitness Apps‚Äù.

Various Classes Fit Your Goal‚Ä®
Daily Yoga offers 500+ asanas, 70+ yoga programs, 500+ guided yoga, pilates, meditation sessions plus the largest yoga pose library for man and woman that suit yogis from beginner to advanced. Not only helps you stay with yoga every day, but also provides health benefits for both your mind and body.

Follow the World-Class Master
Altogether 20 yoga masters who are globally respected or the initiator of yoga styles focus on yoga for weight loss, beginner to advanced, better sleep & full relax. Aim to make it easier & convenient to yoga workout and provide programs that align with your current goals. All sessions are taught in English. 

Motivated by Community
The community in Daily Yoga App brings yogis from all over the world closer to one another. Yogis gather here to discuss their practicing experience under the topics, tag and encourage each other to finish the challenge, follow the Yoga Tips to improve their techniques, prepare the weight-control meals according to the selected recipes. Never feel lonely, and become more limber with other motivated yogis around you.

Create Private Yoga Plan
Don‚Äôt like to choose  the default plan? You can create yours. Private Yoga plan is a cycle of 7 days. Set the workout days and rest days according to your own schedule. Then you can combine yoga sessions to each workout day according to your need. If you know your body well, please give it a try to make your workout more efficient.

Adjust to Your Habits¬†
Multiple choices for session duration varied from 5 - 70 minutes to fit your schedule, and 7 languages available worldwide (English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, Chinese, German, French). Support for Dark Mode to help to prevent eye strain.

Track Your Activity
Personal data from various devices can be tracked in App. With smart watch, you can track your exercise duration and calories burned and heart rate to contribute to your activity rings and meet your daily goals.

While you are waiting for the update to install, try this easy abdominal breathing: draw your abdomen inward to stabilise your core. As you inhale, bring your fingertips to touch in front of the belly. As you exhale, open your hands out to the sides. Inhale the future, exhale the past. Have fun with it!‚Ä®

Find out even more at http://www.dailyyoga.com;
Contact:
Email: support@dailyyoga.com
Instagram: @DailyYogaApp
Facebook: facebook.com/DailyYogaApp

Privacy Policy: http://www.dailyyoga.com/privacy.html 
Terms of Service: http://www.dailyyoga.com/terms.html

Wanchai, Hong Kong
recentChanges:
You can enjoy the new Smart Coach now, with 7 categories and over 400 sessions waiting for serving your personal preference.
1. SCHEDULE supports the retake of missed sessions in history now. Try and get more circles.
2. Another upgrade! Tap the screen to check the pose list while exercising. It's much easier to browse and switch poses now.
3. New Courses in November: Winter Energy Flow-Intermediate Element Yoga, Easy Morning Yoga.
Monthly Golden Day, Thanksgiving, and Black Friday are coming!
comments: I keep using the app often. However, it has many bugs to be fixed. The smart coach shows sessions I did as not done. The time is off by a day so I cannot start my training at the correct day. The contact link connects to a share experience link instead. So how to contact you directly? Navigation through the app is not intuitive and it is congested with a lot of ballast. I'd appreciate very much a simplified version that is more straightforward to use.

Smart Coach was available for silver members. Now they have changed it only for gold members. It is like changing the game rules during the game. May be they will take away other things!!! Very poor taste of business. Although I love the app, I am thinking of switching to the other app just for this reason. Lack of business ethics, and in a yoga app. Another issue with the program. Now they have created a schedule to schedule a program. But there is no reschedule option for the missed days. üò≠

The programs and variety are good, but the app is bad. Buggy, and the material you want to get to - ie sessions - is difficult to get to. Constant ads and notifications you can't turn off, even with the Gold subscription, and the support staff's response is either ignoring criticism or suggesting you delete your account. Would suggest looking elsewhere.

This is the best yoga app I have ever tried and worth every penny if you choose to become a gold member. I tested it for a while now. I get usually bored easily with the same routine and this provides loads of options including levels, specific needs, length, time of day, goals,... The list is long and easy to organize with favorites and home page featured workouts. I will be renewing my subscription for sure!

This was my very first time trying yoga, and this was my first session... as a beginner I think it went pretty well. Could really feel my muscles stretching on some of those poses. But I was afraid I wasn't going to hear what the pose was correctly so I tried to keep my phone within eyesight so I could watch the instructor, but I think once I get the hang of it I won't need to look at my phone anymore and I can concentrate more on my poses.

title: The Bible App Free + Audio, Offline, Daily Study
description:
On more than 400 million devices around the world, people are reading, listening to, watching, and sharing the Bible everyday using the YouVersion Bible App‚Äîcompletely free. 1,400+ Bible versions, 1,000+ languages. Listen to audio Bibles. Thousands of Reading Plans & Devotionals in 40+ languages. Download the Bible App!

Customize your Bible with Highlights, Bookmarks, and public/private Notes. Access everything online, or download select versions to read offline. Read, study, and share with friends. Enjoy honest conversations about faith in trusted community. Grow together every day with friends, sharing your discoveries. Create shareable Bible art: add Bible verses to your photos.

READ THE BIBLE DAILY

comments: I love this app. It is so user friendly and well put together. I can find specific verses by simply putting all of the chapters in alphabetical order. And I can bookmark verses that help me with specific issues. Praise be to the most high for giving you version the aptitude to create such an important app.

This app is the real treasure... I'm happy to have downloaded it... it makes life easy for me... during my difficult times, when I need the word of God... I just go through it, and I understand the thoughts of God on my situations... It's helping me now rebuild my relationship with my fiancee... I'm happy

I absolutely love this bible app. It has no ads. It's easy to read, offering lots of bible translations. You can make notes, highlights, and bookmarks easily. It also has a cool option where you can make inspirational pictures from any verse of your choice, and easy to download and share the image. I love this app! God bless üôÇ

Lovely app to have because of all the Bible translations at my fingertips. However, could you please check this: the audio versions ( ESV in my case) tend to abruptly stop and then can't pick up from where one left off listening. So one loses their place in the text. Uninstalling and reinstalling didn't change anything. Thanks.

I like this app. You can highlight and there are several Bible versions and some like KJV you can hear the Bible read to you. It would be great if once you read a plan it can say read or ‚úîmark. It makes it easy to know which plan you read already. It would be fantastic to be able to sort the plan alphabetically so you can find a plan faster. And after each year it could say how many plans you read that year.

title: Stress Management - Effectively Reduce Stress
description:
Everybody goes through different levels of stress throughout their lives. The stress of writing a final exam to raising a child to financial challenges. That being said more and more is expected of us now because of cultural and environmental changes. 

That is why stress management and learning how to reduce your stress is so important in today's society. It is even more important to find ways to reduce, prevent and cope with stress throughout your day and life. 

There are many health issues associated with high stress levels such as: depression, digestive problems, weight problems, and thinking and memory problems to name a few.

We need to be aware of the external and internal causes of stress and not allow them to take over our daily lives. 

External Causes of Stress: 
- Major life changes
- Work or School
- Relationship Difficulties 
- Financial problems
 
Internal Causes of Stress: 
- inability to accept uncertaintly
- rigid thinking, lack of flexiblity
- unrealistic expectations 

If these are some of the difficulties you are facing in your life our Effectively Reduce Stress ebook will help guide you on a less stressful path and teach you some tips and tricks on how to cope and deal with it. 

Included in our free Effectively Reduce Stress app is: 
- ways of responding to stress
- your first step in managing stress
- ways to reduce your stress
- how to manage your stress at work, at home and in your relationship
- and much much more 

We urge you to start learning effective ways of managing your stress and start by downing our free ebook today.

title: Dailymotion - the home for videos that matter
description:
Are you a video lover searching for the next amazing story? Watch videos wherever life takes you, even when you're not connected to the internet.
‚Ä¢Explore the latest and greatest news, highest quality music, sports and more with our redesigned intuitive dailymotion app for Android.
‚Ä¢Immerse yourself in a world of videos delivered straight from the best publishers or tune into Daily Pulse, our daily selection of trending stories that the world will be talking about tomorrow.
‚Ä¢With dailymotion you can:
‚Ä¢Follow video updates from your favorite people, topics and channels
‚Ä¢Discover Daily Pulse, crafted for people who care about valuable news
‚Ä¢Save videos for later when you‚Äôre short on time
‚Ä¢Build and update your own video library
‚Ä¢Save data by taking your library anywhere for free with our offline mode
‚Ä¢Craft your own video playlists for a personalized video experience

comments: I find that sometimes there are technical problems such as the the screen being pixelated(like a television screen type of pixalation) or the app itself not working/crashing without reason (I already checked my internet provider and it seems like it wasn't the source of the problem). I hope such issues would be resolved in the future. The design of the app is very neat and clean. Also, It's great that you've put your policies in the display.

Better than YouTube? Yes. Dailymotion has alot of content, movies to watch, a very clean interface and more up to date sleek channel design look, easy to browse, search filters for searching for videos. There are things which i would like to see for Desktop and Mobile. Dailymotion needs a night mode, the explore page needs a gaming and tech section, search filters needs to have more filters, bring back the thumb's up feature, the browse more section has too much sex and nudity kissing nonsense , that has nothing to do with what you're watching. Great site, but needs more features, but i do recommend Dailymotion over YouTube.

Giving this a 5 stat just because google reeeeeally wants me to delete the app. Whenever I get a notification about deleting apps to make room daily motion is always near the top of the list, despite the fact there are apps I haven't used in almost a year near the bottom. It seems if it's not owned by a big tech corporation Google thinks it's a waste of space on my phone. Couldn't possibly be that google doesn't like a YouTube competator being on my phone.

This actually regards the Smart TV app. It's horrible, logging me out often & we all know how tedious TV "keyboards" are for text entry. I have externally created playlists that do nothing. I can move to each playlist but clicking on it doesn't open it so all playlists are unplayable. Often, recommended videos start playing their audio stream in the background & can't be stopped. Other videos can't be played because unwanted, unstoppable content is already playing. Better 2 cast from Android app

Some, if not most of the videos require following a link to sign up with details. Its hard to find series that you can just watch direct. Plus not all seasons and episodes are available. But as im persistent I take my time to click many videos before I find a link free episode, then enjoy that, but it can be time consuming. Glad it's free tho!

title: Plum Village: Zen Guided Meditation & Mindfulness
description:
Looking to touch peace, calm and ease in today‚Äôs frantic and often stressful world? The Plum Village practices are an invaluable support.

Use mindfulness meditation techniques taught by a renowned Zen Buddhist Master to connect deeply with the present moment, soothe anxiety, experience more joy and happiness, and taste enlightenment.

Explore a wealth of easy-to-use guided meditations, relaxations, and talks.

The Plum Village app enables us to  bring mindfulness into our life, so we can live each moment more deeply and create a happier future.

As Zen Master Thich Nhat Hanh says, mindfulness allows us to be truly alive.

==============================================
Plum Village: Zen Guided Meditation App ‚Äì Main Features
==============================================

‚Ä¢ Free forever with no ads or in-app purchases
‚Ä¢ 50+ guided meditations
‚Ä¢ 10+ mindful practices for daily use
‚Ä¢ 300+ video sessions and Q&A with Zen Master Thich Nhat Hanh
‚Ä¢ A ‚ÄúMindfulness Bell‚Äù to incorporate into our daily routine
‚Ä¢ 10 guided contemplations
‚Ä¢ 6 guided meditations for children
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúFavourite‚Äù your most loved meditations to find them easily
‚Ä¢ Download talks and meditation to app for easy offline practice

The Plum Village app is regularly being updated with new guided meditations and talks. It is completely free to download and all of the content is available for free.

============================================
Plum Village: Zen Guided Meditation App ‚Äì Main Categories
============================================

The Plum Village app is split into four easy-to-use categories ‚Äì meditations, talks, resources, and bells of mindfulness:

Meditations

Meditation is a deep practice that helps us generate peace and calm, master our mind, develop a healthy headspace, and get deep insights into ourselves and the world around us.

Meditations include deep relaxations, guided contemplations, silent meditations, and eating meditations. Whether you have a little time or a lot, and whether you want to be on your cushion or applying mindfulness in your daily life, there are meditations to nourish, inspire, and incorporate into your daily routine.

Talks

Listen and learn from the wisdom of Thich Nhat Hanh: in question-and-response format, or full-length teachings.

Ask Thay includes hundreds of real-life questions asked to the Zen Master, like ‚ÄúHow can we let go of anger? and ‚ÄúHow can I stop worrying?‚Äù His answers are compassionate and infused with insight. 

Dharma Talks are teachings given by Thich Nhat Hanh on how to bring Buddhist wisdom and mindfulness into our life. Rather than discussing theoretical concepts, he focuses on direct and clear teachings to relieve suffering and create happiness in our day to day lives. Topics include depression, PTSD, relationships, sexual abuse, fear, and dealing with strong emotions.

Resources

In Resources you can find a library of  daily practices, chants, poems, and songs. These bring to life the practices taught in Plum Village monasteries around the world and offer ways to bring mindfulness into our world, wherever we are. 

Bell of Mindfulness

In Plum Village monasteries bells of mindfulness chime at regular intervals. Everybody stops and takes three mindful breaths to pause from their thinking or talking, breathe, and return to their bodies. The Bell of Mindfulness allows us to have the same reminder on our phone.

 We can customize the bell to chime at different time periods. Settings include:
‚Ä¢ Start time / End time
‚Ä¢ Chime intervals
‚Ä¢ Bell volume
‚Ä¢ Daily repeating schedule

------------------------------------

Why not give the Plum Village app a try and see how you can benefit from it? The app is a digital companion on your mindfulness journey. Created as a gift to the world, this free app contains invaluable resources to guide you towards inner peace and freedom.

Download today for free!

Listen and learn from the wisdom of Thich Nhat Hanh: in question-and-response format, or full-length teachings.

Ask Thay includes hundreds of real-life questions asked to the Zen Master, like ‚ÄúHow can we let go of anger? and ‚ÄúHow can I stop worrying?‚Äù His answers are compassionate and infused with insight.

Dharma Talks are teachings given by Thich Nhat Hanh on how to bring Buddhist wisdom and mindfulness into our life. Rather than discussing theoretical concepts, he focuses on direct and clear teachings to relieve suffering and create happiness in our day to day lives. Topics include depression, PTSD, relationships, sexual abuse, fear, and dealing with strong emotions.

Resources

In Resources you can find a library of daily practices, chants, poems, and songs. These bring to life the practices taught in Plum Village monasteries around the world and offer ways to bring mindfulness into our world, wherever we are.

Bell of Mindfulness

In Plum Village monasteries bells of mindfulness chime at regular intervals. Everybody stops and takes three mindful breaths to pause from their thinking or talking, breathe, and return to their bodies. The Bell of Mindfulness allows us to have the same reminder on our phone.

We can customize the bell to chime at different time periods. Settings include:
‚Ä¢ Start time / End time
‚Ä¢ Chime intervals
‚Ä¢ Bell volume
‚Ä¢ Daily repeating schedule

------------------------------------

Why not give the Plum Village app a try and see how you can benefit from it? The app is a digital companion on your mindfulness journey. Created as a gift to the world, this free app contains invaluable resources to guide you towards inner peace and freedom.

Download today for free!
summary: Free mindfulness app meditation practices by Zen Buddhist Master Thich Nhat Hanh
recentChanges: This update fixes a bug with the ‚Äúrepeat everyday‚Äù option for the Bell of Mindfulness.

If you speak French, you'll like it, too. I highly recommend this beautiful app especially for during this covid year. I've give this app, 5 stars, unreservedly.

Wow, the latest update is even better than it was before! Lovely collection of knowledge and views of life and beautiful new design and illustrations. I've learned a lot and have a lot more to discover here in the app and outside of it. Thank you for the humble approach on the subject which distinguishes this from other apps.

I just wanted to say thank you for this amazing present, it's like always I can remind myself to stay in touch with my inner-self and even when I'm at work or I'm just on a go. I read 3 off your books, they are amazing. To hear now your voice that gives extra experience. Thank you. Namaste üôè‚ù§Ô∏è

excellent app. breaks up the teaching and meditation into easy chunks. plus has a silent meditations timed out for when you just want to sit for 10 or 20 minutes

title: FeelJoy - Mental Well-Being for Anxiety
description:
Are anxiety, low self-esteem and depressive thoughts bothering you? Have plenty friends but no one to talk to? Feeljoy Buddy is here to support you! Here, you can interact with individuals who are available to talk to you in real time. Learn more about self-care and self-reflection in an ecosystem designed by Feeljoy for the very purpose of helping you cope with the stressors of daily life and promoting emotional wellbeing. Feeljoy Buddy is your new Mental Health companion.

Good at counselling others? Been told that you‚Äôre a good listener? Think you can help others by helping them vent out? Want to help promote the idea of Mental Wellness and Mental Wellbeing? Be a Buddy with us and support others' well-being by being an effective listener.

COMPANIONSHIP
‚Ä¢	Connect with *The Buddy*, your all-time support system.
‚Ä¢	Gain a good listener who is always ready to help.

INTROSPECT THE INNER YOU
‚Ä¢	Self reflection through others' experience.
‚Ä¢	Gain knowledge on your own psychology and therapy.

ANONYMITY
‚Ä¢	An app that guarantees anonymity.

TOP FEATURES
‚Ä¢	Customized
‚Ä¢	Anonymous
‚Ä¢	Connect to a Buddy (free service)
‚Ä¢	Self-Help area
‚Ä¢	User friendly
‚Ä¢	Quick screening assessments: to help you identify problems and get a personalized plan through a Coach

CHARGES
‚Ä¢	FREE

BOOST YOUR HAPPINESS WITH OUR EMOTIONAL WELL BEING APP
‚Ä¢	Learn how to effectively deal with you problems.
‚Ä¢	Learn how to let go of unhealthy coping mechanisms. 
‚Ä¢	If you ever feel exhausted and drained, you have a buddy to listen to all you have to say. 
‚Ä¢	A judgment free zone where you can openly discuss all your problems while staying anonymous. 

*PRODUCT DESCRIPTION*
Everyone faces problems like anxiety, depression, sadness in their daily life but we usually end up keeping it all to ourselves because of various reasons like fear of judgment, fear of rejection, not wanting to ‚Äúburden‚Äù our friends with our problems and the list goes on. Stressors and problems are a part of life that tend to throw us off balance more than we realize. Given our super busy lives, we rarely pay attention to signs of deteriorating mental health, let alone put it to check. Talking it out and sharing your thoughts serves as a great remedy to all such problems. 

Feeljoy Buddy helps you cope with the above problems and gain self-esteem by assigning you a Buddy who‚Äôll listen to all you have to say as well as supporting you. Receive help from individuals who are ready to help. After all to be healthy as a whole, mental wellness plays a very crucial role.

title: Mindwell : Mood & Sleep Lab
description:
Sometimes meditation can fall flat; making our mind wander causing us to miss the benefits of daily practice.

By combining custom (Isochronic) tones, and custom (Solfeggio) frequencies, Mindwell synchronizes with your brainwaves to bring added benefit to your meditation.

We've created a series of these highly customized waves to help you achieve a variety of mental states such as alertness, calmness, sleep, and emotional balance.  We even have waves to support specific moods and goals.

Features:
* Mindwell‚Äôs patent-pending MoodShift to take you to a better place
* Personalized Daily Meditation program created just for you
* Sleep Lab with everything you need for a great night‚Äôs sleep
* Over 350 meditations and guides with ancient Isochronic tones and Solfeggio Frequencies
* Playlist creation to create and share personalized meditation programs
* Sleep stories to relax and soothe any time of the day
* Affirmations to create healthy, happy thoughts
* Stats to track meditation minutes and progression towards mindful and mood goals

Mindwell's meditations last anywhere from 60 seconds to 30 minutes; making it so everyone has time for a quick refresh.

Unlike other meditation apps, Mindwell's meditation topics are for both powering down AND charging up.  Some of our topics include:

* Sleeping Better
* Going Full Thrust
* Improving Relationships
* Turning on Positive Thinking
* Supercharging your Career
* Understanding and Quitting Destructive Behavior
* Meeting Life's Challenges
* Positive Mindset Workouts
* Stopping Anxiety and Worry
* Coping with Fear
* Powering up for College
* Coping with Grief
* Embracing one's self
...and many more!

Additionally, we have a sleep library including beloved classic stories from novels such as The Secret Garden, Siddhartha, Three Men in a Boat and Tom Sawyer.  

If you're into something a little different, Mindwell also includes a series of ASMR tracks which were created to tingle your spine while lulling you into a sense calm.

Get the newest generation of Mindfulness apps today! ‚Äì Download Mindwell now.


Subscription Pricing and Terms:
Mindwell offers an annual subscription for $49.99/year.

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on your country of residence.

comments: A wonderful piece of work that inspires the mind and guide it. I have had mental blockades in the past that it helped. When my mental health started to decline those roadblocks became mountains that seemed too large for just an app to overcome. But I found my peace when resorting to Mindwell when trying to figure myself out. The application itself does wonders. Even when there's the occasional bug or issue, if you think of the issue presented as an obstacle rather than a bug you may learn more.

Offers like approximately 30-50 things you'd like to work on like meditation, health, mental health, sleeping habits, eating, etc..... BUT YOU CAN ONLY CHOOSE ONE then 3 subsets in that choice. Like, for $60 a year, I'd expect to be able to choose 1-max offered. Not just one. Maybe the paid let's you choose 1-max but if not, you just lost $60 to get one choice out of a ton. Not cool at all.

Better than 90% similar apps, has isochronic techniques to actually improve moods. Made me to rate it too fast in the app - at first day - even back button didn't work. There is 7 day trial, but has some info about cancelling - difficult to be sure it would work. So we probably need to built new amazing habit of keeping our debit card mostly empty to give it a try.

There are many useful features on Mindwell like : Playlist creation to create and share personalized meditation programs, Stats to track meditation minutes and progression towards mindful and mood goals,... I have tried some of them and they are extremely useful!
There are many good things to list about Mindwell : the user-friendly interface, its useful features , outstanding performances,... Nothing to complain at all!

title: Self-manage Depression: Daily exercise (GGDE)
description:
Do you feel stuck? Wish to feel better, hop out of the negative cycle and enjoy better wellbeing? GGDE helps people self-manage their depression by learning how to develop healthier inner dialogue and use this power to improve their mental health.

IMPROVING DEPRESSION IS POSSIBLE
Throw away your negative thoughts. Accept your positive thoughts. Learn to identify your inner conversation and respond to real life thoughts. Train daily and improve your thinking and achieve mental wellness.

SCIENCE BACKED
New findings support the effectiveness of the core mechanism used in GG apps.
According to CBT models, negative self talk ‚Äì individuals‚Äô interpretations of the self, others and the world - maintain psychological difficulties such as depression, low mood and maladaptive behaviours. 

DO I SUFFER FROM DEPRESSION? TESTING YOUR DEPRESSION LEVEL
We all sometimes want to know how our situation compares to others and where we are located on the graph. In GG Depression, we introduce an intuitive and quick way for self evaluation - the Assessment level. Please note that the assessment is just a guide designed for personal feedback as well as mean for our system to personalise content based on the results. The assessment test should NOT be used as medical/psychological advice.

HOW DO I PREVENT DEPRESSIVE THOUGHTS?
The foundations of healthy thinking and self-talk are built upon beliefs. Our beliefs have the potential to bias and affect our ability to deal with daily situations. For example, if I believe that "My choices have to be prefect", I won't be able to live up to these expectations. My confidence will decrease, my mood will become low, and depressive thoughts will take over.

BELIEFS AND SELF TALK
Beliefs and self talk are interrelated. Once we learn to embrace healthier and more adaptive self-talk, it can change our beliefs and help us get rid of the ones that negatively affect our confidence and self esteem.

IS THIS APP SIMILAR TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPY?
Our app platform is not designed to be used as a therapy or treatment, however:
1. It is being used by CBT therapists as a complementing tool.
2. It helps in maintaining self esteem during or after therapy.
3. It is found to relieve symptoms of anxiety, worries, obsessions and more. 

STATEMENTS (OR THOUGHTS)
The basic task in the app is simple - you will be presented with thoughts. If the thought promotes negative self talk - throw it away by dragging it on-screen. If the thought promotes positive or neutral thinking, accept it by dragging it towards you.
The more we train, the more automatic this process becomes.
 
HOW MUCH SHOULD I TRAIN EACH DAY?
To feel better and improve your thinking, start today! GG Apps are designed to be most effective in short training sessions. You are advised to complete up to 3 levels per day, which should only take between 2-4 minutes.

LEVELS AND TOPICS
The app's many topics and themes are broken down into more than 40 levels. Each level has a pool of self talk statements (or thoughts).
The topics include: belief in change, self criticism, negative thinking, hopelessness, helplessness, positive boost, being active, loneliness, feelings, self blame, comparing, perfectionism, emotions, social fears, fear of abandonment, trusting and more.

You can also test yourself to see how well your confidence progresses with our self assessment tool.

LEARN MORE ABOUT THE FACTS BEHIND GG APPS
Visit our website: http://ggapps.net


Privacy policy:
http://ggapps.net/privacy-policy

Terms of use:
http://ggapps.net/terms-of-use

title: BUDDHA TEACHINGS
description:
As a child, Siddhartha the Buddha, was troubled by some of the same thoughts that children today have. They wonder about birth and death. They wonder why they get sick and why grandfather died. They wonder why their wishes do not come true. Children also wonder about happiness and the beauty in nature.

Because the Buddha knew what was in the hearts of children and human kind, he taught everyone how to live a happy and peaceful life. 

Buddhism is not learning about strange beliefs from faraway lands. It is about looking at and thinking about our own lives. It shows us how to understand ourselves and how to cope with our daily problems using Buddha's Teachings. In this guide we will be learning about Buddha's beliefs, Buddha's Teachings, & the Buddhists way of meditation. 

In this app, we have included:

- Origins of Buddhism
- Buddha's Teaching
- Buddhist Beliefs
- Birth and Karma
- Buddhist Ethics
- Buddhist Meditation
- Buddhism & Purpose
---And more. 

The teachings of the Buddha are vast, but there are a few basic Buddhist teachings and practices that are fundamental to the path laid out. Although all of the teachings offer us an understanding of the tradition, here are a few that are at the core of Buddhism. We are offering an overview of each teaching in order to really understand how Buddhist's think and where the thinking originated from. 

The purpose of Buddha's teachings is to show you the nature of the human mind, your human potential and how you can develop further. Moreover, this method does not emphasise blind belief in, rather than understanding of, metaphysical processes. However, whether you are religious or non- religious, or a believer or a non-believer, the important thing is to know the nature of your own mind.

App Features:

- Regular Updates 
- In-depth guide & explanations
- Easy to read & follow
- Buddhism FAQ

title: The Power of Positive Thinking
description:
Dr. Norman Vincent Peale is a renowned author best known for The Power of Positive Thinking, his bestseller which has sold over 5 million copies. The Power of Positive Thinking is a classic that pioneered the idea of positive thinking and the power of the mind.

In this book, Dr. Norman teaches you how to get a hold of your life by believing in yourself, change your attitudes and adopt positive thinking and faith for all successes. Here is The Power of Positive Thinking summary that highlights his teachings chapter after chapter.

Believe in Yourself ‚Äì  ‚ÄúBelieve in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble yet reasonable confidence in your own powers, you cannot be successful or happy. But with self-confidence, you can succeed. A sense of inadequacy interferes with the attainment of your hopes, but self-confidence leads to self-realization and achievement.‚Äù


A Peaceful Mind Generates Power ‚Äì  to draw power from your mind you need to have a peaceful mind. You can do this by practicing silence and passing calm and positive thoughts through your mind. ‚ÄúSaturate your thoughts with peaceful experiences, peaceful words, and ideas, and ultimately you will have a storehouse of peace-producing experiences to which you may turn for refreshment and renewal of your spirit. It will be a vast source of power.‚Äù

How to Have Constant Energy ‚Äì the thoughts that you feed your mind become what your body is really experiencing physically. If your mind tells you that you are tired, your body accepts that fact, and you feel tired. To be in a state of constant energy, you need to supply attitudes of faith to the mind. 

Try Prayer Power ‚Äì  You should also adopt prayer in your life, so you are able to open your mind to God. You can use any method that allows you to be free and open up your mind to God. Dr. Norman states that ‚ÄúYou are dealing with the most tremendous power in the world when you pray.‚Äù

How to Create Your Own Happiness ‚Äì  You are the only one who decides whether you will be happy or not and your happiness is determined by your thoughts. 
‚ÄúMany of us manufacture our own unhappiness. Of course, not all unhappiness is self-created, for social conditions are responsible for not a few of our woes. Yet, to a large extent, by our thoughts and attitudes, we distill out of the ingredients of life either happiness or unhappiness for ourselves. Anyone who desires it, who wills it and who learns and applies the right formula may become a happy person.‚Äù

Expect the Best and Get It ‚Äì  ‚ÄúWhen you expect the best, you release a magnetic force in your mind which by a law of attraction tends to bring the best to you.‚Äù However, Dr. Norman states that this doesn‚Äôt mean that everything you will necessarily get everything that you want. It means that when you believe you can get everything you want, it comes to the realm of possibility for you.

I Don‚Äôt Believe in Defeat ‚Äì  most of the obstacles that stand in your way are mental obstacles. You can be able to get through all of the problems that life throws at you with ease if you free your mind to remove the mental hurdles.  You, therefore, do not have to think about defeat, instead, think of the different possibilities you have to overcome a problem. Then with God, you will achieve what you want.

How to Break the Worry Habit ‚Äì  worry is a negative habit that develops but you were not born with. It is, therefore, possible to eliminate worry from your mind if you learn to empty your mind daily.

‚ÄúThe process of mind drainage is important in overcoming worry, for fear thoughts, unless drained off, can clog the mind and impede the flow of mental and spiritual power. But such thoughts can be emptied from the mind and will not accumulate if they are eliminated daily.‚Äù

Power to Solve Personal Problems ‚Äì  if you want to be able to solve personal problems effectively, then you need to remember the fact that God is always with us.
descriptionHTML:
Dr. Norman Vincent Peale is a renowned author best known for The Power of Positive Thinking, his bestseller which has sold over 5 million copies. The Power of Positive Thinking is a classic that pioneered the idea of positive thinking and the power of the mind.

In this book, Dr. Norman teaches you how to get a hold of your life by believing in yourself, change your attitudes and adopt positive thinking and faith for all successes. Here is The Power of Positive Thinking summary that highlights his teachings chapter after chapter.

Believe in Yourself ‚Äì ‚ÄúBelieve in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble yet reasonable confidence in your own powers, you cannot be successful or happy. But with self-confidence, you can succeed. A sense of inadequacy interferes with the attainment of your hopes, but self-confidence leads to self-realization and achievement.‚Äù


A Peaceful Mind Generates Power ‚Äì to draw power from your mind you need to have a peaceful mind. title: How To Deal With Anxiety - Anxiety Treatment
description:
An emotion like fear, or high anxiety, is usually pretty obvious. You don't need me to tell you when you're afraid.

What you might not notice are the other anxiety symptoms that build your emotions of fear and chronic anxiety. You might not even think of them as anxiety symptoms.

Anxiety is a normal part of life and everybody feels it from time to time. However, when anxiety gets overwhelming and doesn't go away, it can be difficult to know how to manage it. By understanding what triggers your anxiety, you can develop strategies to cope.

Anxiety is a normal human experience. It‚Äôs an emotion that drives us to study hard, work hard, and do better in our lives. But it can also make us overthink situations and paralyze us when we're faced with important decisions. An anxiety disorder may develop when the anxiety persists and interferes with daily life.

Anxiety is an uncomfortable, sometimes terrifying emotion, and it's no wonder people try to find ways to minimize, avoid, or shut out those feelings. While alcohol and drugs may lessen anxious feelings in the short term, do they actually make the anxiety worse in the long run?

I actually started drinking exactly because of that anxiety‚Ä¶ At a sleep-away camp, when some guys pulled out vodka and passed it around, I drank because I didn‚Äôt want to stick out, but the near-immediate effect I felt when the alcohol started taking its effect was a substantial reduction in my level of nervousness. This was especially true around girls. All of the sudden, I didn‚Äôt care so much about making a food of myself. It felt good to relax for the first time in years that way.

Do you currently drink or use to overcome social anxiety or to fit in? Do you use alcohol or drugs to cope with stress? Have you tried to quit drinking or drugs and felt so anxious you've started using again? If you answered yes to any of these questions, you might be self-medicating to manage your anxiety. 

As it turns out, there are far better ways to deal with anxiety than through substance abuse. For example: mindfulness, biofeedback, yoga, CBT, and healthy lifestyle choices. We‚Äôll look at these in more detail shortly, but first, I want to explore anxiety, addiction, and how they impact the brain.

Anxiety can affect the way you feel physically and emotionally, the way you think, and how you behave. It‚Äôs something we all feel from time to time, but it can become a problem when it is so overwhelming that it starts to get in the way of your daily life. It may impact your work, study, physical health, and relationships.

Download this How To Deal With Anxiety app now for get more info.

You may search : Depression symptoms, Anxiety medication, Anxiety disorder, Anti anxiety medication, Supplements for anxiety , Depression and anxiety, What causes anxiety, Anxiety treatment

This application features are :-

You can bookmark Favorite articles(post)

This application helps you to read the article(post) - Once click 'Read Article' button, automatically read the page content(Text to Speech).

You can share the article(post) to your friends, family and social networks.

You can copy the text from any post.

You can enable notification

You can adjust font size(small, medium, big) of articles

title: stoic. mental health training.
description:
stoic. can help you live a happier and more tranquil life. you will learn stoicism philosophy and how to cope with stress.

get your daily mental health tracker companion for mood tracking, journaling, meditations, and reflection. it analyzes your emotive influences and gives you insights on how to be happier and more productive.

WHY DO YOU NEED A MENTAL HEALTH TRACKER?
we all experience a complex range of emotions every single day. whether we are feeling positive or negative ‚Äî both of which are completely natural, of course ‚Äî it is essential that we have a clear understanding of our emotional state of mind if we are to achieve self-actualization.

stoicism is a philosophy of leaders, as Tim Ferriss put it:
‚Ä¢ become happier and more productive
‚Ä¢ become less emotionally reactive
‚Ä¢ become a better, kinder person
‚Ä¢ become better at resolving conflicts

MORNING AND EVENING ROUTINE.
‚Ä¢ start a perfect day with a personalized morning routine. prepare for your daily activities so that nothing can surprise you during the day.
‚Ä¢ reflect on your actions in the evening to develop as a human being. get better every day.

REFLECTIVE EXERCISES.
‚Ä¢ journaling. clear your mind, express your thoughts, set goals and be more grateful with guided journaling.
‚Ä¢ negative visualization. discover how many things you have in your life that you should be grateful for. things you take for granted. achievements that you forgot a long time ago. you are luckier and more privileged than you think.
‚Ä¢ meditation. an unguided session of meditation with background sounds and timed chimes.
‚Ä¢ breathing. deep calm and box breathing exercises.
‚Ä¢ quotes. read and save your favorite inspiring quotes from stoic philosophers, Lao Tzu, The Holy Bible, and Gautama Buddha.
‚Ä¢ fear setting. a way of overcoming hard decisions in life introduced by Tim Ferriss. it will help you be less afraid of taking action.
‚Ä¢ thought exercise. stoic interpretation of CBT (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy.) whenever you feel strong negative emotions, try to put corresponding thoughts here. you may notice, that your feelings were caused by your thoughts, and after a small shift in the way you think, you can experience a significant change in your mood.
‚Ä¢ history. browse your old entries or filter them with particular questions. see how your responses change over time and find patterns to help you in your personal development.

STOICISM:
‚Ä¢ stoic wisdom. learn the most practical philosophy that will help you survive in high-stress environments. meditate on quotes by Marcus Aurelius and Seneca and conquer your ego.
‚Ä¢ learn philosophies. with quotes from Lao Tzu, The Holy Bible, and Gautama Buddha you can learn Tao, Confucianism, Buddhism, and Christian approaches to life.
‚Ä¢ and remember "we suffer more in imagination than in reality" - Seneca

developerAddress: Nad Wawozem 12, 30-199 Krak√≥w
recentChanges:
welcome to your stoic journey.

m.
comments: i have tried multiple journaling and mood tracking apps. one timer for meditation, one for journaling, one for mood tracking and another for stoic inspiration. this one combines them together in a way that makes a lot of sense. it's way more convenient and a lot cheaper too. i am setting goals in the morning, keeping them in mind throughout my day and then reflecting on them at night. it makes me want to be my better me. one of the best apps i in a long time. I'm getting premium for sure.

i love this app. it has helped me a lot. it'd have been 5 stars if they let me re-read some of the entries i have answered from their prompts. as in right now the only thing i can re-read is the journal i wrote. but other than that, i'm so grateful i found this app. i'm considering to subscribe to the premium features because i genuinely want to support the dev team. props to them. thank you!

It's beautifully designed and the ideas are good, but it rewards things that shouldn't always be rewarded, like productivity, for instance, because that's something we guilt ourselves for a lot. It's also extremely repetitive and there seems to be no variance, which makes it seem outdated and of limited use.
The app is very immature in terms of development. It needs a lot more work to make it user friendly and useful. It gives the impression of being only half done, and released way too soon.
The best app I have found! It really make me think and wonder how well I'm managing my emotions, the quotes, the writing, all of it.

title: GG OCD Anxiety & Depression
description:
"Most credible OCD App" (highest credibility score of 4.28 out of 5) -International OCD Foundation

MANAGING OCD IS POSSIBLE
Throw away unhelpful thoughts. Embrace helpful ones. Learn to identify your self-talk and respond quickly. Train daily and improve your coping and mental wellbeing.

SCIENCE BACKED
New findings support the effectiveness of the core mechanism used in GG OCD app. Our research supports these findings and shows the positive effect of the app on OCD symptoms and maladaptive beliefs.
According to CBT models, negative self talk ‚Äì individuals‚Äô ongoing interpretations of the self, others and the world - maintain psychological difficulties such as low self esteem, obsessive and maladaptive thinking. 

HOW DO I RELIEVE MY OCD?
Our beliefs have the potential to bias and affect our ability to deal with daily situations. Balancing this natural bias and building helpful thinking habits is shown to improve OCD beliefs and reduce symptoms.

OCD, BELIEFS AND SELF TALK
Beliefs and self-talk are interrelated. Once we learn to embrace healthier and more adaptive self talk, it can change our beliefs and help us become more resilient.

HOW GG OCD WORKS
The application is designed to:
1. Increase your awareness of unhelpful thinking
2. Train you to identify and challenge unhelpful thoughts.
3. Increase your access to helpful thoughts.
4. Increase the automaticity of the above processes.
5. Provide daily mood and self esteem boost.

IS THIS APP SIMILAR TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPY?
Our app platform is not designed to be used as a therapy or treatment, however:
1. It is being used by OCD CBT psychologists as a complementing tool.
2. It helps in maintaining healthy thinking during or after therapy.
3. It is found to relieve symptoms of anxiety, worries, obsessions and more. 

OCD AND THOUGHTS
The basic task in the app is simple - you will be presented with thoughts. If the thought promotes negative self-talk - throw it away by dragging it on-screen. If the thought promotes helpful thinking, accept it by dragging it towards you.

As you make helpful thinking a habit, this process becomes automatic and easier.
 
HOW MUCH SHOULD I TRAIN EACH DAY?
We believe mobile apps allow us to learn and train quickly and effectively. GG OCD is designed to be most effective in short training sessions. You are advised to complete up to 3 levels per day, which should only take between 2-4 minutes.

LEVELS AND JOURNEYS
The app's many topics and themes are broken down into more than 40 levels. Each level has a pool of self-talk thoughts. Complete a set of thoughts to finish the level.
To further strengthen learning of supportive self-talk, some levels you complete are followed by a quick memory game.

The topics include: self esteem, belief in change, self criticism, negative thinking, coping, sin, harm, comparing, perfectionism, emotions, social fears, self as an object, danger and threat, seeing the beauty in the world, fear of abandonment, fear of contamination and more.

You can also test yourself to see how well your confidence progresses with our self assessment tool.

Training using this application, allows for gradual, steady learning of more adaptive self-talk thereby helping to break the vicious thought cycle maintaining low self-esteem.

DO I HAVE TO PURCHASE PREMIUM CONTENT?
GG OCD is designed so you can enjoy the benefits of healthy self-talk without necessarily having to purchase anything. After laying the foundations, premium content lets you discover more advanced, specific topics as well as enjoy complementing modules and premium features.

LEARN MORE ABOUT GGTUDE APPS
Visit our website: http://ggtude.com

OTHER APPS BY GGTUDE
GG Self Care
GG Body Image Distress & Preoccupation
GG Confidence & Self esteem
GG Depression
GG ROCD

summary: Self-manage your obsessive compulsive disorder with Dr. Guy Doron
developerAddress: 11 Dov Hoz Street, Tel Aviv, Israel
recentChanges:
This release features a whole new approach to self-managing OCD with the power of helpful thinking.
We're utilising our entire content library to help you personalize not just your OCD exercises, but additional topics based on your personal challenges.
The complete library includes:
- 20 journeys
- 500+ levels
- Use your app as a personal companion with everyday mental challenges
Please write to us to support@ggtude.com if you have any questions
The GGtude team
comments: This app went from a concise OCD app to an unfocused all-in-one app that deals with too many topics in an unfocused fashion. The old app used to have a "daily play" option once you progressed through the "levels" that let you drop into the app for a nice summary of all the previous statements merged into one level. This doesn't seem to exist anymore. The app is clunky now. The only thing good about it is that the UI looks modern but everything else is trash.

I have the full version and it's genuinely helpful for OCD, but it's also overpriced for how scarce the content is. Also, lots of misspelling errors exist in the app, which make it feel unprofessional especially when you're paying. I'd like to see the devs add around triple the content (more types of exercises and little games to help!) and correct the spelling mistakes. These are two big issues, but I would still recommend the free version to people for calming from OCD caused anxiety attacks.

It's not the most helpful app ever but does kill time and in the moment helps you say nice things to yourself. Worth a shot if you dont know what to say to yourself but doesnt really help to implement those behaviors. Feels more like studying flash cards for a test before learning the material if that makes any sense.

Great app! I do not focus on how fast i go through it, but work to internalize some of the advice as different way of viewing things... One of my fav sayongs is - feeling pass, change, and transform..... Would also be nice if the app included mental compulsions, such as analyzing and reassurance in the assessment... Also, could use an update on a few spelling errors.

Great app! Simple and intuitive but effective. One recommendation: please enable users to proceed to the next level although time limit was exceeded. Personally I like to take time to reflect on each message instead of rushing through them. I believe many others would do the same. Do that and it'll be 5 stars!

title: My Online Therapy: Find Therapists & Counselling
description:
My Online Therapy is your very own virtual clinic with highly qualified psychologists. Get matched with a psychologist and choose how you get therapy or counselling - by video, live chat or daily coaching. Prices start from ¬£49 for a session. 
 
IMPROVE YOUR WELLBEING EVERY DAY WITH OUR NEWEST FEATURE - SELF-CARE. Using evidence-based therapy skills and techniques written by psychologists, support your mental health alongside, or independent of, face-to-face video therapy. Start your 14-day free trial with an annual subscription, or try the 7-day free trial with a monthly subscription today!

Learn how to:
‚Ä¢ Deal with difficult thoughts
‚Ä¢ Calm your anxiety
‚Ä¢ Get a good night‚Äôs sleep
‚Ä¢ Build emotional intelligence
‚Ä¢ Discover your purpose
‚Ä¢ And much more

Get face-to-face therapy with a highly trained psychologist when and wherever's a good time to tap into you

Quality is what sets us apart. Our team of online therapists are all highly qualified psychologists and only deliver research-backed therapy in the style that best meets your lifestyle.

Everyone is unique which means we all respond to different approaches to therapy differently. Our matching algorithm combines 20+ years of clinical experience, matching you to the best online therapist or psychologist and type of therapy according to your specific needs, symptoms and circumstances. This ensures you get the result you‚Äôre looking for.

We believe in modern therapy for modern lives.

Our therapists

All of our online therapists are qualified psychologists and have been through a rigorous selection process. Many of our therapists also have long-standing academic and NHS careers, alongside their private work. They receive regular supervision from experts in their field and engage in a range of professional development and work to ensure they are always up to date with the most cutting edge, research-led therapies.

How we can help 

Our level of expertise means our online psychologist therapists can help with a wide range of mental health difficulties, including: depression, anxiety, PTSD, personality disorders, phobias, stress, health anxiety, social anxiety, panic attacks, work-related stress, bipolar disorder, eating disorders, self-harm, relationship difficulties, substance misuse, anorexia, binge-eating disorder, OCD.

Types of therapy 

Our focus is on providing cutting edge mental health therapies that deliver results, connecting you to qualified psychologists. This means we only offer therapies that are rooted in evidence-based practices and the best available research.

Online therapies include Acceptance & Commitment Therapy (ACT), Cognitive Analytic Therapy (CAT), Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT), Couples Therapy, Dialectical Behaviour Therapy (DBT), Dynamic Interpersonal Therapy, Eye Movement Desensitisation & Reprocessing Therapy, Mentalisation Based Therapy, Mindfulness-based Cognitive Therapy (MBCT), Narrative Therapy, Psychodynamic Therapy, Schema Therapy, Systemic Therapy.

Get started on your path to better in 4 simple steps 

Step 1 - Download the app and sign up

Step 2 - Complete our free online questionnaire by telling us a bit about yourself and your symptoms. We‚Äôll match you to the best online therapists according to your personal needs.

Step 3 - Choose how you want to connect with your qualified therapists and get therapy (by video, live chat or daily coaching).

Step 4 - Start therapy! You can switch how you get therapy at any time.

---

Support

Telephone: 020 3349 7767 (available 9am-9pm Mon-Fri, 9am - 5pm Sat, 12am - 7pm Sun)
Email: support@myonlinetherapy.com

Privacy policy: https://myonlinetherapy.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of use: https://myonlinetherapy.com/terms-and-conditions/

summary: Speak to a therapist from ¬£49 per session. Get anxiety & mental health support.
developer: Lekta Therapy | Talk to a therapist
developerAddress: 2 Lansdowne Row, Suite 163, London, W1J 6HL, United Kingdom
recentChanges: In the latest version, we've made some improvements to those using insurance as a payment method for therapy.
comments: The app in itself is good, and the price is certainly cheaper than a traditional therapist, but still too expensive for me I'm afraid. I think ¬£50 for 30 minutes and ¬£100 for 50 minutes is a bit of a scam. I had three sessions with my therapist, and had to stop because she was very slow and we still hadn't made any progress and I felt like I was losing my money... Not a great therapist either in my opinion, compared to others I talked to in the past. I didn't really feel understood, or heard.

This app looks great and really helpful for those who need it. But the costs are just too much, it excludes and marginalises those with little money. When most have no access to NHS offerings and no money for private this app offers false hope. Make the costs more obvious before people sign up. Going through emotional questions and 'connecting' with a therapist to then find out that it's like ¬£49 for half an hour!?

Waaaaay to expensive. ¬£99 per 50 minutes is ridiculous money. Don't waste your time. Look online at approved registers. You can get someone as qualified as people on this app for ¬£70 per 60 minutes. Furthermore the app or my therpaists camera/ sound quality was terrible. I couldn't hear or see my therapist but then I contacted family after and it was fine. Good idea but not worth it at all.

This seems like a helpful app and I understand obviously why therapy is rather expensive. To improve it you could have an option for 13 or up or maybe even 5 and up with a parent. Although, I think when chosing a therapist you should have the therapists price range andcertain people may not feel comfortable with and may want to change. What I really liked was the audio tailored to your problem with the name of the therapist.

Poor service for me. You fill in a few automated drop down boxes to vaguely describe your problems and symptoms. Then you get allocated a therapist to choose from then before actually speaking to anyone you're expected to pay before you've spoken to anyone to work out treatment plans and unanswered questions. I called the help line they told me to contact the therapist and told me how the therapist returned my message 3 days last saying I need to call the helpline. Still not answered questions

title: Dictionary - Merriam-Webster
description:
Get America‚Äôs most useful and respected dictionary, optimized for your Android device. This is the best Android app for English language reference, education, and vocabulary building.

And now we‚Äôve added new word games! It‚Äôs never been more fun to learn new words and test your vocabulary for everyone from English learners to total word nerds. Hundreds of words to test your skills.

The app is free, and supported by ads.

No internet connection is required to view the definitions or thesaurus (although you do need a connection to view illustrations, hear audio pronunciations, and use voice search).

Features:
* New Vocabulary-Building Quizzes: fun, fast quizzes to learn new words or test your vocabulary
* Voice Search: look up a word without having to spell it
* Word of the Day: learn a new word every day.
* Integrated Thesaurus: synonyms & antonyms are included with the dictionary
* Example Sentences: understand how a word is used in context
* Quick Definitions: perfect for on-the-go lookups
* Audio Pronunciations: voiced by real English speakers, not text-to-speech robots
* Favorite Words and Search History: Keep track of the words that are most important to you
* For tablets: Scrolling Index - lets you browse the entire dictionary

recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: thanks a lot for the free offline quality dictionary. The thesaurus has been far better and wider. So bad to see the learner's definitions are gone, but ok. The biggest matter with me on new version is that the ''tap to open'' function on words which has always been an awesome feature; has been extremely sensitive on touch and opens the words in a very extraordinary way and keeps distracting and bothering me all the time, the way I'm afraid touching the screen. It would be great if you fix this.

Ive been loving this application coz it helps me alot on improving my vocabulary but now I don't know what happened üòî. Everytime I searched for a word it would say, "sorry, not enough storage space. Please free up some space and retry" though I still had enough space. I hope you'll fix this.

Poor user interface: It requires three taps before you're able to start entering a word to look up (which surely must be the primary use case by far). It has no fuzzy lookup (e.g.. soundex). If you don't know how the word is spelled, you can't look it up.

The free version of the free dictionary blows premium paid MW out of the water. I have premium mw and thesaurus and just purchased the premium version of the free dictionary. There is no comparison. Its not just my preference, TFD is demonstrably superior.
It was so helpful for like me, who has a hobby of doing poems. I really enjoyed searching different words to fit to a certain topic of my work. So far there is no any trouble.

title: Anxiety Cures - Relieve Stress, Increase Happiness
description:
Anxiety Cures is an educational/research app to help you end anxiety, improve mental health, manage stress, reduce depression, increase mindfulness, stop panic attacks, and finding happiness. 

The app is updated regularly with in-depth knowledge, extensive research, and tools from many sources, that are scientifically shown to help reduce stress and improve relaxation, like calming sounds generator, brain training, sleep time calculator, and breathing exercises.

How To Use This App For Maximum Results
1Ô∏è‚É£  You will receive one (or more) articles virtually every day.
2Ô∏è‚É£  Spend 1-5 minutes to read/skim the article. If the article interest you, bookmark it for easier find later.
3Ô∏è‚É£  When you have more time in the day, you can dig deeper to understand more the subject taught in the article. Use your daily journal to make some notes as necessary. You can spend 15-30 minutes on this.
4Ô∏è‚É£  If the article requires you to take actions, e.g., to do some breathing exercise, relaxation or meditation, make a plan to find the best time and space where you can perform the actions effectively. You can do it on the same day, or later in the weekend.
5Ô∏è‚É£  Make this as part of your daily/weekly ritual, and you'll see positive changes happening in your life and happiness becomes your life's reality.

In today‚Äôs fast-paced, rapidly-changing world, feeling stressed and overwhelmed has quickly become a big part of our everyday lives ‚Äì and being able to identify and cope with anxiety, stress, and depression is fast becoming an essential life skill.

Features
‚òÖ Contents to help relieve anxiety, sleep well, relaxation, happiness (updated regularly)
‚òÖ Motivational videos
‚òÖ Inspirational quotes
‚òÖ Tools for relaxation, breathing exercise, sleep sounds: rain sound, calming sound, white noise, sleep calculator, brain test, etc.
‚òÖ Free and fun games to help improve your mood, train your mental agility and kill some time.

Download now. Turn your stress to your advantage and your fear into confidence

title: Synctuition Mindspa & Meditation
description:
Relax, get better sleep and live happier with the leading meditation app. With
Synctuition, you can access over 2000 hours of relaxing melodies, binaural beats and
music for sleep to boost your mental health and mind-body connection.

Just download this meditative relaxation app, get yourself comfortable, press the ‚Äúplay‚Äù
button and let your mind wander freely. Enjoy the benefits of meditation regardless of
your level, have fun and begin your journey of self-exploration!

Synctuition is the world‚Äôs first and only Mind Spa:
Synctuition is the first meditation app offering the latest sound technologies and
relaxing melodies. Each audio journey combines binaural beats, 3D nature sounds,
ASMR, mindfulness meditation techniques and gamma waves. Ideal for boosting your
daily meditation and achieving optimal wellness.

3D and ASMR sounds:
Synctiution integrates ASMR into the journeys. By listening to calm sounds, you will
experience superior mind-body relaxation and positive feelings of well-being, making for
a pleasurable experience.

Better sleep:
Prepare your mind for a good night‚Äôs sleep. Synctuition offers relaxing music for sleep,
mindfulness meditation and calm sounds to help you block the stressful thoughts that
are keeping you awake and restless. Wake-up relaxed and revitalized!

Less stress and anxiety:
Synctuition‚Äôs relaxing melodies and sleep sounds transport your mind to beautiful
places, away from stressful and anxious thoughts. The more you listen, the more you
will develop the inner resilience to successfully cope with stress and anxiety on a daily
basis.

The Law of Attraction:
Your mind is a powerful magnet and Synctuition is the app for making the Law of
Attraction really work. Listening to the soothing sounds and following the mindfulness
exercises will clear your mind of negativity, placing you in the perfect state for attracting
what you wisht!

Young and healthy mind:
Through relaxing meditation and sleep sounds, Synctuition stimulates the brain to
improve sleep, creativity and decision making. This makes you feel mentally rejuvenated
after every listening session.

Listen to the most soothing sounds from nature:
Synctuition consists of rich and immersive 3D sound journeys with more than 13 000
natural sounds recorded in over 2000 pristine locations worldwide. The result is an
immersive experience of meditation music and journey through nature from the comfort
of your home.

A 25-minutes of Synctuition = 4 hours of traditional meditation
Because of the advanced technology and unparalleled quality, a listening session of
Synctuition can help you experience all the benefits of complete mental and physical
rejuvenation in just 25 minutes.

Ready to begin? Get your free meditation music today! Simply download and listen to
the first 3 journeys without signing up.

To avoid distractions and fully enjoy the experience, make the journeys available for offline
use. If you have loved a particular journey, you can add it to a list of favorites. And, you can
share your thoughts and discover other people‚Äôs experiences in the comments section.

Subscription, Pricing and Terms:
Please keep in mind that after you subscribe, the payment will be charged to your
Google account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew
unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current
period, and identify the cost of the renewal. You can manage your subscription or turn
off the auto-renew by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Synctuition
also offers a Lifetime subscription.
Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase a
subscription to that publication, where applicable.
Terms and conditions: https://synctuition.com/web/terms-and-conditions/

comments: Very powerful app! I'm recovering from many years of drug abuse. Haven't really felt what I should feel in a long time, and have been battling my own emotions for some time. I have been meditating on my own from time to time, during the short prison sentences I've served, which has given me relief up to a point. This ap, on the other hand, helps me in ways that, as of yet, nothing else has. I have a hard time focusing and my mind wanders easily but this all helps me with that.

Far too expensive for what it is. A monthly subscription tier would be much more suitable than shelling out nearly ¬£100 after 7 free days. No one has that sort of money to burn straight away on an app

Very good app with minor glitches, the idea , what the app provides is excellent this is what I paid for . You will rarely find an app that is perfect which I always make allowances for when I purchase. However in these challenging times and if you want to focus on bringing some relief to your life I recommend this app . It can crash a bit to much but this has not stopped me following the course , maybe it's got to much content but for me I put health and wellbeing above anything .

I have just downloaded the app and only listened to one recording, it sounds amazing and I'm sure I would have a good experience if I decided to purchase it. One thing I find absolutely unacceptable though - why do you keep telling, within the app or in communication I received so far - that my "free recordings are on the way". This is far from being free! Why do you base your marketing on a lie? It's ridiculous and I can't think seriously about a company who doesn't take me seriously as well.

I realise that others have found Synctuition a very positive experience but it was not for me. I stuck with it for a number of months because I'd paid a lot for the subscription and was hoping that things would change as I worked through the levels. Unfortunately they did not. I found the commentaries annoying and the binaural effects hard to discern. If you think that this is for you stick with the free samples. An expensive mistake for me !!!!

title: Untire: Beating cancer fatigue
description:
| GENERAL
Tired of being tired? Cancer Related Fatigue (CRF) impacts millions of cancer patients and cancer survivors around the globe. Untire is here to help you and your friends and family beat CRF and regain energy. The Untire self-help app guides you through a comprehensive step-by-step program comprised of the following features:

‚Ä¢ Education to better understand fatigue
‚Ä¢ Tips and reminders to improve lifestyle
‚Ä¢ Mind and body exercises to increase energy levels
‚Ä¢ Online community for support and communication with other CRF individuals
‚Ä¢ Weekly reporting to keep track of progress and energy levels

The Untire program is based on scientifically proven methods from psychologists and researchers specialized in oncology and CRF. Untire is here to help you gain insight into your behavior, thoughts and symptoms impacting your fatigue. This will allow you to better manage energy levels, adjust behaviors, identify patterns and ultimately get back to living again.


| TOP 5 REASONS TO USE UNTIRE

#1  Finally a solution to help with Cancer Related Fatigue

#2 There is more to managing your fatigue than just dealing with it

#3 Learn ways to increase energy levels and reduce fatigue

#4 A built-in support system to help manage fatigue so you‚Äôre not alone

#5 It works for all individuals regardless of cancer diagnosis so you can engage on your terms


| HOW DOES UNTIRE WORK?

Daily program to build more energy step-by-step. The program consists of positive tips, stress-reduction exercises, physical activities, and education.

‚òÖ We help you step by step to gain more energy, you set the pace

‚òÖ Invite a buddy to help you beat cancer-related fatigue

‚òÖ Track your fatigue & energy levels weekly

‚òÖ Understand complex topics through videos

‚òÖ Library with background information

‚òÖ Audio option to listen to text instead of reading


| 8 IN-DEPTH CRF RELATED TOPICS

‚òÖ Basics: To get started with the Untire program

‚òÖ Fatigue: Understand how your surroundings impact fatigue levels

‚òÖ Anxiety: Understand anxiety‚Äôs impact and how to improve it

‚òÖ Worry: Manage negative thoughts for a more positive outlook

‚òÖ Boundaries: Establish limits to achieve better energy balance

‚òÖ Sleep: Improve your nights and your days

‚òÖ Self-Care: Make yourself a top priority. You‚Äôre worth it!

‚òÖ Nutrition: Learn the right food formula: Eating well = Feeling good

| COMPATIBILITY
Untire is only available for Android 5.0 and higher.

| SUPPORT
If you run into difficulties or if you encounter an issue, please contact us via support@untire.me. 

| GET IN TOUCH
We're always happy to receive your feedback, it helps us to improve Untire. Please, feel free and leave a message at: feedback@untire.me

Like us on Facebook at: https://www.facebook.com/untireapp‚Ä®

Read more about our terms and conditions here - https://www.untire.me/terms-of-use/
Read more about our privacy policy here - https://www.untire.me/privacy/

title: Sadhguru TV
description:
Wisdom, Yoga & Meditation from Sadhguru

Sadhguru, yogi, mystic and visionary, founder of Isha Foundation offers wisdom and powerful yoga and meditation practices to empower every individual to live at their peak potential. 

Sadhguru offers insights on a diverse selection of topics relevant for modern times:
- Tools for raising consciousness
- Enhancing joy, love and happiness in everyday life
- Cultivating loving relationships 
- Managing health and internal chemistry to effectively handle anxiety, stress and insomnia 

This app features:

Learn Guided Yoga Practices: 
Isha Kriya is a powerful guided meditation for clarity, health, and joy. This meditation can be practiced by anyone above 13 years of age. Daily practice, which takes only 12 minutes will help you to reorganize your energies and provides:

- Enhanced Clarity
- Improved Health
- Heightened Focus and Energy
- Peacefulness and Joy
- Free Yoga Tools For Wellbeing

These 5-minute processes are easy to practice yet potent tools to enhance health, joy, peace, love, success, and inner exploration. It helps one cope with the hectic pace of modern life and realize their full potential in all spheres of life. 

- Yoga for Health
- Yoga for Success
- Yoga for Love
- Yoga for Peace
- Joy for Joy
- Yoga for Wellbeing

Chit Shakti Meditations
Using the power of the mind to create what one wants in life is called Chit Shakti. 

- Meditation for Love
- Meditation for Peace
- Meditation for Success
- Meditation for Health

Terms of Service: https://www.sadhguru.tv/tos
Privacy Policy: https://www.sadhguru.tv/privacy
