comments: I purchased the full version of the original app for ~¬£15 (which guaranteed lifetime access) , which I found quite helpful. I was highly disappointed to find out that the original app is no longer on my phone and has instead been replaced by an app that charges a monthly subscription. Fair enough if the creators want to follow this model but I do find it very unfair that the early adopters who paid full price for the original app no longer have access to it.

Updated review: The previous version was very good and I was finding it very useful. The new update locked the app for me again despite having purchased a full unlock and all my progress was lost. But I got help from a developer to unlock the app again and I will try the new one now from the beginning and see how it works for me.

I paid for the full version (which guaranteed lifetime access) before they updated it. Now they're saying I have to pay monthly? This feels like a scam and could potentially damage people who they've once helped. This is dangerous

I like this app, but it only let's you do three exercises a day, and no other way to practice during the day without having to start all over and then you find again at some point, you have to stop at three exercises. They need to have better instructions. There should be a clearly explained way to practice any time you want, as well as do the 3 main exercises a day.

A nice app, but I didn't get a feeling or indication from the app that it was going to be helpful and it's already asking for money. I hope you will let people see more of the app to understand what is happening with the questions we're answering and how everything works, and if it works. Still skeptical, just haven't seen enough yet. Thanks for letting me try it out!

title: Amazon Kindle
description:
READ ANYTIME, ANYWHERE
On the bus, on your break, in your bed‚Äînever be without a book. Built for book lovers, the Kindle app puts millions of books, magazines, newspapers, comics, and manga at your fingertips.

FIND YOUR NEXT GREAT READ
- Find your next great read with Kindle. Choose from over six million Kindle books (including those with Audible narration), magazines, audiobooks, and comics and start reading in seconds. Explore new releases, Amazon Charts best sellers, and titles across genres like romance, science fiction, children‚Äôs books, self-help, religion, nonfiction, and more‚Äîand try any book before you buy with a free sample.

- Subscribe to Kindle Unlimited to enjoy unlimited reading and listening. Explore over 1 million titles, thousands of audiobooks, and current magazines for just $9.99 a month.

- Over 1,000 books, magazines, comics, and more included with Amazon Prime.

- With Kindle Daily Deals, save up to 80% on a new selection of books every day, including romance, science fiction, non-fiction, and books for young readers.

GO BEYOND PAPER
Turn your phone or tablet into a book with the free Kindle app‚Äîso you can read anytime, anywhere. Explore these reading features in the Kindle app:

- Read your way. Customize your text size, font type, margins, text alignment, and orientation (portrait or landscape)‚Äîand choose whether to turn pages from left to right or continuously scroll. Read comfortably day and night with adjustable brightness and background colors. Go to the Aa menu in your book to get started.

- Look up words, people, and places while you read. Breeze through words you don‚Äôt know and characters you can‚Äôt remember with the built-in dictionary, X-Ray, Wikipedia lookup, instant translations, and search within your book. Simply tap and hold a word to view its definition, or use the Google and Wikipedia links to get more information.

- Track your reading progress. See what percent of the book you‚Äôve read, real page numbers (for most top titles), and how much time you have left in the chapter or book based on your actual reading speed. 

- Bookmark places you want to revisit, and make highlights and take notes throughout your book. Open My Notebook to see all your notes in the same place.

- Hop, skim, and jump with Page Flip. Flip between pages or get a bird‚Äôs-eye view of your book with Page Flip‚Äîdon‚Äôt worry, we‚Äôll save your place.

- Zoom in on high-definition color images in Kindle books, magazines, comics, and manga.

- Sync your books across devices. When you‚Äôre reading a book, the Kindle app will automatically sync where you left off‚Äîalong with any bookmarks, highlights, or notes‚Äîso you can start reading on one device and pick up where you left off on another. 

- When you can‚Äôt read, listen. Switch seamlessly from reading your Kindle book to listening to the Audible book, all within the Kindle app. 

- Get notified when authors you love have new releases, or when books you‚Äôre interested in go on deal.

recentChanges:
- You can now see books shared with you through Family Library, with filters for just your items or items shared with you.

comments: I love the Kindle app! Never thought I would read e-books because I prefer to read a physical copy, but with covid and recently down sizing e-books are so much easier to read, and store! They take up no space. Best of all with the free Kindle app you can read books for free. Other books do cost but you do not have to buy anything to be able to read! Book lovers need this app!

This app is well done as expected from Amazon. However, my biggest frustration is that highlighting is based on whole words and not characters. There are times where I will need to highlight one word and the current highlighting system makes it impossible without highlighting other objects around it. There are apps that allow for character based highlighting. Please change this and I will change my review to 5 stars.

Bug-ridden garbage. Latest update 28/1/19 just marked all my books as new & unread when most of them should be partially or wholly read. So much for "bug fixes"! October 2020. There's an expression, "If it ain't bust, don't fix it." Doesn't apply in this case. Definitely bust. Oh, and you'll need a magnifier to see the new Aa menu.

The Kindle icon recently disappeared from my screen, so I reinstalled the app. The icon has re-appeared, but when I try to open any book from my library I get a message saying that Kindle has closed. Kindle no longer works on my device (Google Nexus). Does this have anything to do with the upgrade on 15th October ? If this isn't fixed soon I'm going to be asking for a refund for all the Kindle books in my library. Not happy.

App itself is ok, latest update is hot garbage. Honestly I'm amazed they haven't hotfixed it yet, considering all the people who can't use the store at all right now. Pretty tired of getting push notifications, only to select them and get an error when it tries to display a store page. My other major annoyance at the moment - they decided to default to autoscroll instead of page flip, even when you've previously turned it off. How hard is it to just set it according to what the user specified?

title: Beggar Life 2 - Clicker Adventure
description:
‚óÜ Beggar Life 2 is done in the following way:1. Making money
[Click]: You can make money using a click (tab). 
[Part-time]: You can increase money automatically by hiring Convenience store part-timer . 
[Asset]: You can buy assets and get a market profit.
[Company]: You can acquire a company to gain market profits and profits.
[Country]: You can take over a country and collect money from the people.
[Bank]: You can deposit in a bank to get interest.2. Spending money
[One penny village]: It is used to use various places in one penny village.
[Others]: Money is spent on upgrades and employment, purchases, costumes, and so on.3. Collecting
[Story Card]: Collect story cards of people you meet in one penny village.
[Item]: Increase boss beggar's capacity.
[Background]: Modify the background screen with the background you get when you travel at the airport.
[Costume]: Buy and collect various clothing of boss beggar at a shopping mall in one penny village.
Be the richest man in the world with a dynamic clicker adventure system!
Questions: manababagames@naver.com

But if go in it again it works. Number 2, im kinda sad that the part-time-workers from beggar life are not there :( But otherwise everythings amazing!

Bit Grindy but overall good but I prefer the first. It gets pretty boring after a little I suggest I little bit more action. Like say a boss fight every once a while and more part timer you have it's easier because they do damage to and say if you win you get 10% money boost every click. Remember this is just a suggestion. Feel free to actually do this.

Amazing idle game. It's like other idle games except it has buildings to purchase. A city you can go into with multiple things to do. And not filled with a ton of ads like Alot of other games. I personally love this game and the people who made it. Well that's all. Great game.

Dev replied with game requiring "minimum rights". Here is what they want from you when you start the game. Storage game data, view and manage google drive data, associate with personal info, see your personal info including your email address and your public data. Your game does not need to know all this dev. You can use cloud saves and that is it. You do not need to know what my real name is and where I live. Change it to cloud saves like every other idle game on the app store that is 4 stars and up.

Some ads are just a picture with 0 seconds and the game thinks I did not watch an ad, so I get 0 mana (failed to view ad) Please fix! I am really enjoying the game. I cannot read the price for the upgrades, it is to hard to see (blue + green) Please make Blue and Red, I cannot read the price for part timers!!! please fix, will give 5! thank you

title: GG Relationship Doubt & Obsessions (ROCD)
description:
Created by Dr. Guy Doron (IDC), clinical psychologist and researcher
Feel like you're missing out on the perfect relationship? Finding it hard to commit? Experiencing constant doubts? Suffering from obsessive thinking? Want to expand your mind and make it more adaptive? GGRO is here to help!

RELIEVING OBSESSIVE THINKING IS POSSIBLE
Throw away negative thoughts. Approach positive ones. Learn to identify your inner self talk and respond quickly. Train daily and improve your wellness.

SCIENCE BACKED
New findings support the effectiveness of the core mechanism used in GG apps.
According to CBT models, negative self talk ‚Äì individuals‚Äô ongoing interpretations of the self, others and the world - maintain psychological difficulties such as low self esteem, mood, obsessive, ROCD and maladaptive thinking. 

HOW DO I MANAGE MY ROCD?
The foundations of a healthy mind are built upon flexible beliefs. Our beliefs have the potential to bias and affect our ability to deal with daily situations. For example, if I believe that ‚Äúmy partner has to be perfect‚Äù or ‚ÄúI have to be 100% certain about my partner‚Äú - I won't be able to live up to these expectations and my ability to deal with relationships will decrease.

BELIEFS AND SELF TALK
Beliefs and self talk are interrelated. Once we learn to embrace healthier and more adaptive self talk, it can change our beliefs and help us get rid of the ones that negatively affect our well being.

HOW GG APPS WORK
The application is designed to:
1. Increase your awareness of negative and obsessive thoughts.
2. Train you to identify and challenge negative thoughts.
3. Increase your access to neutral, adaptive and positive thoughts.
4. Increase the accessibility of the above processes.
5. Provide daily mood and self esteem boost.

IS THIS APP SIMILAR TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPY?
Our app platform is not designed to be used as a therapy or treatment, however:
1. It is being used by CBT therapists as a complementing tool.
2. It helps in maintaining healthy thinking during or after therapy.
3. It is found to relieve symptoms of anxiety, worries, obsessions and relationship OCD.

TRAIN YOUR THOUGHTS
The basic task in the app is simple - you will be presented with thoughts. If the thought promotes negative self talk - throw it away by dragging it on-screen. If the thought promotes positive or neutral thinking, accept it by dragging it towards you.
The longer we train making it a habit, the more automatic this process becomes.
 
HOW MUCH SHOULD I TRAIN EACH DAY?
To feel better and improve your mind‚Äôs flexibility, start today! We believe apps allow us to learn and train quickly and effectively. GG Apps are designed to be most effective in short training sessions. You are advised to complete up to 3 levels per day, which should only take between 2-4 minutes.

LEVELS AND TOPICS
The app's many topics and themes are broken down into more than 40 levels. Each level has a pool of self talk statements (or thoughts). Users are required to complete a random set of 'blocks' to complete the level.

The topics include: self esteem, belief in change, self criticism, negative thinking, coping, positive boost, comparing, perfectionism, embarrassment, uncertainty, commitment anxiety, social fears, self as an object, danger and threat, distrust, fear of abandonment, and more.

Training using this application, allows for gradual, steady learning of more adaptive self-talk thereby helping to break the vicious thought cycle of obsessive thinking.

WHAT IF I COMPLETED ALL THE LEVELS?
The key to using the app is learning new topics, but even more importantly - training daily. There are levels designed as "daily training" for you to play once you completed your base course.

LEARN MORE ABOUT THE FACTS BEHIND GG APPS
Visit our website: http://ggapps.net

OTHER APPS BY GG
GG OCD Training App
GG Body Image Distress & Preoccupation
GG Confidence & Self esteem
Good Blocks

recentChanges: This release fixes a notification bug so you can now receive daily training reminders and tips.
comments: To each their own, and I can only speak for me here. However, I love this app. I find it stimulations in areas, for me, that I haven't experienced yet or at least helps me to identify problem areas in which to manage them. I love that it is available. It makes me feel content in knowing that regardless of how I feel.. there's still some positive type of response for me to read or engage and thayd helpful.

I guess it's an ok app/game. Pretty boring. All you do is swipe positive affirmations one way and negative ones the other way. There is no "training" or anything, no advice or tips or anything like that.

I was initially embarrassed to try this app and asked myself why anyone would admit to needing this kind of thing by giving a review. But oh my goodness!! This app is wonderful. It conditions the mind to think positively and embrace resilience and that is a beautiful thing. My husband is trying it now, too, and likes it as well. It has helped me already to have a more positive outlook and improved the way I relate to others. I wouldn't have believed it without trying it. So grateful!!
I've definitely seen improvement in managing my thoughts and it's really nice to see an app specifically for rocd. I'm docking a star simply because a $20 pay wall is extreme.

I was unsure at first because some of the exercises *could* (potentially, in certain situations) make things more difficult, if the relationship is abusive, for instance. *HOWEVER*, assuming that the person using the app does not have an abusive partner and is aware of their own weaknesses, I have found this app to be helpful. It definitely helps with intrusive, obsessive thoughts that sometimes creep into my head for no reason. And it helps me keep my crazy under wraps, lol

title: Asana: Your work manager
description:
Asana is the work manager for teams. But better. From the small stuff to the big picture, Asana organizes work so teams are clear what to do, why it matters, and how to get it done.

‚úî TAKE THE GUESSWORK OUT OF WORK
See who is doing what and by when across the whole team:
Coordinate plans, projects, and tasks in one shared space
Switch between list, kanban board, and calendar views
Organize and assign tasks; set due dates
Attach files to tasks so relevant info is easy to find

‚úî GET THE WHOLE PICTURE‚ÄîEVEN ON THE GO
Keep an eye on progress no matter where you are:
Instantly see if projects are on track, at risk, or off track‚Äîand why
Post status updates, or request updates from project owners
Drill down into tasks for more information

‚úî PUSH WORK ALONG...WITHOUT GETTING PUSHY
Make sure nothing falls through the cracks:
Clarify if tasks are high, medium, or low priority
Approve work or mark tasks for approval
Set tasks as milestones to establish critical checkpoints
Get notified when tasks are completed, overdue, and more

‚úî ASANA MOBILE + WEB = YOUR A-TEAM
Work efficiently whether you‚Äôre at the office or on the go: 
Automatically transcribe voice memos to tasks
Convert photos of whiteboards, charts, or diagrams to tasks
Instantly sync work between the app and web
Work offline without worrying about losing your data

Join more than 75,000 organizations and millions of users worldwide who trust Asana to stay organized and in control of their work. Download the Asana app now.

By downloading Asana, you agree to our Terms of Service, which you can find at https://asana.com/terms

comments: Ever since the update this app sucks outloud. The dashboard in the widget is useless, nothing shows up there. Things that were there before the update are gone. I have to check the calendar at best to find tasks, at worst I have to refer to the email I was sent. Making the app effectively useless. I can just use a calendar app. That way I can see the info i need at a glance without having to dig for it. UPDATE. I don't see ANY of my projects at all in the app. Just deleted the app. Thanks!!

Lot of issues of login. Very stupid idea login by email. You cannot login into your asana account without using the "magic email". There is no option to enter in your password and email combination. Since my email accounts are both Gmail I'd be obliged to logout and login back in each time or create a new account and lose my work. Is it really asking too ...

Chats in a task will better if it's like in WhatsApp or any similar apps. It's familiar and have all the details in the current chats in asana. Now it feels like a lost of msgs.. It's difficult to swiftly check who said wat inside a chat.. Improvement reuiqred..

Update 11.10.2020: After update not even start. After 2 weeks of use: Great app for task a partially also for project management in smaller teams and/or IT companies with agile approach. Not so easily usable for waterfall approach.
It refused to recognize the password I just created and wrote down. Then when I did log in the first time the profile creation just hits a dead end. Not worth wasting any more time on it...

comments: A terribly designed programs. Here is why: 1. Poor search function that requires exactly correct spelling for podcasts search. 2. Cuts the podcast off every 20 minutes so you have to restart the podcast constantly. On a 5 hours podcast that's 15 times. 3. Continues to play in the background even after being closed. Required a 'force stop' to cease activity. Edit: with notifications turned off, there is no mini player in the pull down android menu.

Very convenient to organize/access podcasts, but unfortunately this app seems to cache podcasts in its user data space (not the usual cache space). This led to my phone running out of storage in a couple of weeks, causing all sorts of havoc and stress. It took me a while (after mistakenly blaming the Android OS) to trace the problem to this app - then finally, the used space dropped from Full to only 30% of 64 Gb!

Great experience. Connects to my Bluetooth radio, and pauses and restarts when the Bluetooth connection is severed (turning car off and back on). I have not experienced any problems. You can download podcasts to listen without using data while commuting.

Been on Podbean for 18 months and am EXTREMELY happy with them.We are the #1 Interactive Comedy Podcast because of them .PLUS you keep your content unlike other sites.Your guests or listeners can chat in live session along with you or call in thru the app. Podbean is the future of Podcasting available today.imho

Fantastic blend of content with respectfully pulled-off ads, but only where necessary. Fantastic team effort crew!! Nice product. And I love the fast forward and rewind buttons in the lock screen player.

recentChanges:
Thanks for using Life360! We‚Äôre always making changes and improvements behind the scenes; to ensure that you do not miss anything, please keep your updates turned on.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: Does not give immediate notifications of arrival and departures because the app remains "inactive" and only checks every 30 minutes to save battery; except for the GPS which stays active. At least that's the way support explains it. - The daughter of my wife's friend recently had a wreck in the middle of the night. Life 360's crash detection failed to alert her family. She miraculously survived and phoned home for help. So, we know we can not depend on Life 360 for crash alerts.

Love this app! I've had this for a couple of years now (or so). It's proven really useful! I went on a night out a few months ago and I didn't realise that I lost my phone until morning after! I was distraught!! Luckily, my other half was able to pinpoint the location of my mobile using Life360 and we were able to track and find my phone! Life360 is a lifesaver!

Love the app. Been using it for a year or so, and very happy, but it suddenly decided to quit locating my wife - dementia issues. Note says "End of free history - Free History is only good for two days of history - all I'm looking for is the last couple of hours. That doesn't seem to translate to "the app has quit working", but it seems that's exactly what is happening. The app continues to work fine for MY phone. Very disappointed!

My family has been using this app for years and never had an issue until recently. No body is getting notifications for anything, ie: driving, low battery or arriving/leaving places. This is absolutely unacceptable especially for a "safety" app. You guys should stick to the basics with tracking and stop with all the extra bells & whistles.

The app is great for keeping track of your loved ones. We've used (for example) to locate our son, who was running cross country at an event and we weren't sure where the park was. We pulled up the app and used the directions to him. It was very helpful. We've used it to see if our college age son has left his apartment to head home and estimate when he'll arrive.

title: AT&T Secure Family‚Ñ¢
description:
Peace of Mind Just Got A Lot Easier

As seen on Good Morning America, AT&T Secure Family‚Ñ¢ puts parents in control of their children‚Äôs phone use.  Find your family, control your child‚Äôs screen time and manage their phone use.

Features
*	Locate Family -Track your child on demand or on a regular schedule, for example every day after school
*	Location Alerts - Receive alerts when your child enters or leaves a location, like school or practice. 
*	Location History - Review where your child has been over the previous seven days.
*	Limit Screen Time - Block your child‚Äôs mobile data and Wi-Fi, on demand or on a schedule you choose.
*	Content Filters ‚Äì Block inappropriate Apps and websites by age or customize your own settings.

AT&T Secure Family is free for the first 30 days. After the first 30 days, you will be billed $7.99 each month (includes support for up to 10 lines.)  Service auto renews every 30 days unless cancelled.

AT&T Secure Family Companion App

AT&T Secure Family is designed to work with AT&T Secure Family Companion, a free app in the Google Play Store.  Download it to your child‚Äôs phone and pair it with your phone to get all the features.

AT&T Wireless customers ‚Äì pairing with AT&T Secure Family Companion is recommended to get all the features of Secure Family.  If you do not pair a device, features are limited to AT&T network-based location, scheduled location alerts and location history.
   
AT&T PREPAID wireless customers and customers on other wireless carriers ‚Äì pairing with AT&T Secure Family Companion on the child device is required to use any of the Secure Family features.
Other important information about AT&T Secure Family:

AT&T Postpaid Wireless customers billed by AT&T:
  -   View, modify or cancel anytime within the app.  
  -   Secure Family and Companion app users must be on the same account.  Only authorized app users have permission to locate a family member.
  -   There is a compatibility conflict that can prevent the addition of AT&T Secure Family Companion to your companion device if you have AT&T Mobile Security Plus running on the same companion device.  If you wish to continue with the purchase, you must either remove AT&T Mobile Security Plus from your account or downgrade to AT&T Mobile Security Basic on the companion device before adding AT&T Secure Family Companion. 
  
AT&T PREPAID wireless customers, and customers of other US Wireless carriers billed by Google Play Store:
  -   After first 30 days, $7.99/mo. will be charged to your Google Play account.  Subscription will automatically renew each month unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current month‚Äôs billing period.
  -   To view, modify or cancel your subscription, go to account settings in Google Play Store.  No cancellation of the current month‚Äôs subscription is allowed.  No refunds or credits for partial subscription terms. 

General:
  -   Devices running the Secure Family App or Secure Family Companion App require Android v. 5.0 or higher.
  -   Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically reduce battery life.
  -   Availability, timeliness or accuracy of location is not guaranteed. Coverage not available in all areas. The collection, use, and disclosure of any personal information through this application is governed by AT&T's Privacy Policy found at: att.com/privacypolicy. View the AT&T Secure Family website at att.com/securefamily

recentChanges: Release includes bug fixes plus improved pairing between the parent and child phones for those using the App for location tracking only.  A VPN will not be installed for location tracking alone.  VPN will be required for parental controls features such as pause internet or content filtering.  Includes icons on the Map indicating use of cell towers for network location (lower accuracy) or GPS (higher accuracy).  We continue to listen to our valued customers and work to improve your experience.
comments: Quality just keeps going downhill. Seems like bugs get bigger with each update. Lately, when trying to locate another phone on our plan, it can only tell me the county that the phone is in - which is absolutely useless information. Other times, it can't locate the phone at all. AT&T....if you want people to pay for this app, then you need to get it together.

9/25/2020 Has been much more stable. 7/1/2019 I don't get it, I have many apps but this is the only one that regularly has problems. 11/14/2018 What idiot would discontinue an app that was working perfectly fine before the replacement app was ready? Someone at AT&T is really lacking. Update: And the comedy continues! The new replacement app, "Secure Family", is finally here. Location improvements? Can't even locate anyone at all in my family. Now let's see how long it takes AT&T to fix it.

App wont open, keep getting notifications saying the app is updating...been doing this for 3 days..why is it updating for 3 days....not able to use it at all. This type of problem happens all the time, in the past I have had the problem of it opening and then it immediately closes. Even uninstalling and reinstalling does not help. So frustration.

I keep having the app pause and freeze. It states update and freezes. Everytime it updates that happens and it seems to update often like often. I also placed 3 phones on gps and connected their phones for some reason one phone says it is no longer connected since the update and I dont have phone to fix this error but I need this program because the people that have these phones need to be found if they are lost. And I depend on this app to help do that. That's why I have every 1 hr schelduled

This app is terrible. Att Smart Limits was a much better app. Each time I unpause my sons internet access, he has to restart his phone for it allow him internet. Also the GPS is not accurate. His phone was turned on at 9am and at 1pm I get a notification he arrived at school when he had been there all day. You cannot block specific phone numbers like you could in Smart Limits.

title: News Break: Local Breaking Stories & US Headlines
description:
Local headlines and breaking news ‚Äì get your local news, crime updates,  results and coverage, sports updates and U.S. headlines straight to your phone, with News Break.

Connect with your local community and follow U.S. headlines such as the local news, sports events, lifestyle stories, and even crime updates and traffic. News Break is personalized to your interests, likes and dislikes, so you‚Äôll always get relevant stories that really matter to you.

News Break helps people live safer, more vibrant, more truly connected lives. Whether it‚Äôs your local sports team, lifestyle tips, local headlines, breaking stories, U.S. news and updates ‚Äì you can access local, relevant stories and world news with just a tap.

U.S. News and Highlights

‚Ä¢ Get a curated daily brief focused on breaking stories, the U.S, local headlines, crime updates, traffic, events, sports updates and more U.S. news and local updates
‚Ä¢ Our intelligent local news platform aggregates rich, relevant stories from more than 10,000 trusted news outlets across the U.S.
‚Ä¢ Breaking news - be the first to know about breaking local news, U.S. headlines, world news and local updates

Local Updates: Know Your Town

‚Ä¢ Find local restaurants, local events, shop openings, traffic, breaking stories, and more ‚Äì all in a single app!
‚Ä¢ Read unique perspectives and personal stories from local writers and content creators
‚Ä¢ U.S. headlines, sports updates, lifestyle stories and local events - focus on the incredible things that are happening right where you live and work!

News Commentary: Express Yourself

‚Ä¢ Don‚Äôt just read the news, discuss it with other News Break readers!
‚Ä¢ News Break welcomes all respectful perspectives and points of view

Support the Cause

‚Ä¢ News Break is working hard to revive the local-news ecosystem by supporting small publishers around the U.S.
‚Ä¢ We‚Äôre activating legions of local bloggers and content creators ‚Äì people just like you ‚Äì that have important things to say about their communities. Join in and share your views & news!

What are you waiting for? Download News Break today and start living a safer, more vibrant, more connected life through the power of local news, U.S. news and information!

Your place for local updates, breaking stories and world news. News Break ‚Äì Better Informed, Better Life.

comments: It's a pretty nice app. Loads of information and tons of links. The guys are great. If they run across something that you like, they will email you or text ya. They we're just letting me know about Tom's Place. It's really good too. Kinda slow at times but it's not bad. I would definitely recommend üòä this app.

I am tired of this app crashing, repeatedly. I will be in the middle of an interesting article and the app closes and restarts. I even deleted it and reloaded it and it still happens. To make things worse, I can't always find the article I was reading again. Annoying. Update...Still happening. Still annoyed.

it is a nice site- if you're into everything - I initially downloaded for my breaking neighborhood news - tried to adjust the notifications level to no avail - it resets itself for push, for local, for comments. it slowly started to take up my whole screen with updates on the same story, with nothing new to report on. I had to uninstall. :( updated 10/31 - app send emails only now :) it seems as though it has improved and I look forward to reading the articles now.

I've been using News break for about a year now, and it's been informative and accurate in relating the news. I like this app mainly because if it's wide variety of topics and interest pieces. My news etc. is ALWAYS just a few inches from me. I don't have to go buy a newspaper for almost $2.00 everyday. I feel I get the news I need to keep me up to date between this app and watching Action news a couple times a day.

The developer needs to work on this site!!! They do not respond back, or even care about issues. It freezes up and sometimes takes 30 minutes to as you to "stop"/"wait" or "close out" by that time you are other places. They load too many ads for the screens and ones that take over the whole screen where you can not close out of,you have to leave the app, and come back never to read the article you were trying. The ADs do not format to fit the page right. I need more space here to address issues

title: NOAA Weather Radar Live & Alerts
description:
Get a powerful yet easy-to-use weather station right on your device with NOAA Weather Radar Live & Alerts. Real-time animated weather radar images on a highly interactive map enhanced with severe weather warnings provide accurate weather forecasts that will prevent bad weather from taking you by surprise.

The app reflects accurate real-time weather conditions and provides you with the detailed meteo information you need to know: current and "Feels Like" temperature, the chance of precipitation and humidity info, wind speed and wind direction, pressure changes and more. Customize your weather report according to your taste ‚Äì choose the information you would like to receive!

Take a look at current weather conditions or take the most of the top-notch functionality of the weather radar. Get a push notification whenever an alert is issued (tornadoes, flood warnings, snow storms, and more) without opening the app!

Real-time animated meteo radar on a highly interactive terrain or satellite map enhanced with severe weather warnings and alerts will meet the needs of even the most demanding users. Rainy, snowy, stormy or cloudy weather, you‚Äôll be prepared for it all!

Short-term (24-hour) and long-term (7-day) accurate weather forecast for any location.

Units of measurement:
üåü Pressure in inches, mm, kPa or mbar,
üåü Fahrenheit/Celsius and Miles/Kilometers,
üåü Wind speed in mph, km/h, m/s, knots, Beaufort.

World Weather Map:
üö© Explore the weather on an interactive map. Weather icons will let you know what the local temperature is throughout the world. Tap on them to get more details.

Easy location search:
üö© Toggle between cities and spy on weather in other parts of the world. Bookmarked locations will help you quickly switch to your favorite spots, check today‚Äôs weather or find out the forecast for tomorrow. 

Radar, Satellite and Precipitation Forecast:
üö© Get real-time snow and rain tracking, mixed precipitation data, and cloud cover in high resolution and vivid colors by switching between radar, satellite and rain maps.

Customizable overlays:
üö© Choose background maps and the number of frames; adjust opacity and loop speed for the overlays.

Resizable widget:
üö© Add a nice customizable widget to your screen and get the live-updated weather information you want to know without opening the app.

More handy options for the best user experience!


National Weather Service watches and warnings are shown on the map as interactive warning boxes highlighting the territories they're active for. Tap any to get the card with the full alert text.

Coverage Info:
Radar images: the US (Continental US, Alaska, Hawaii, Guam, Northern Mariana Islands and Puerto Rico), Mexico (northern), Canada (southern), Australia, the UK, Ireland, Germany, France, the Netherlands, Italy (northern and north-western), Denmark, Austria, Sweden, Finland, Spain, Portugal, Switzerland, Norway, Poland, Andorra, Japan, Taiwan.

Precipitation Forecast, satellite images, and detailed weather info are available worldwide.

By downloading this application, you agree to the Apalon Apps End User License Agreement and Privacy Policy.
You can choose from different subscription options.
* A subscription with a free trial will automatically renew to a paid subscription unless you cancel the subscription before the end of the free trial period.
* Cancel a free trial or subscription anytime through your account settings on the Google Play Store and continue to enjoy the premium content until the end of the free-trial period or paid subscription!
 
Go Premium and get some nice extra features:

‚ôõ Alerts for unlimited number of saved locations;
‚ôõ Higher Accuracy precipitation forecast option;
‚ôõ Hurricane tracker for the whole duration of your plan;
‚ôõ Lightning tracker with timely lightning alerts;
‚ôõ Ad-free!

Privacy Policy: http://apalon.com/privacy_policy.html
EULA: http://www.apalon.com/terms_of_use.html
AdChoices: http://www.apalon.com/privacy_policy.html#4

recentChanges:
Check out the new NOAA Weather Radar Live & Alerts release that includes:

- Temperature Map: see how the temperature will change in the coming hours near you and across the globe.
- Performance and stability improvements.

Thank you for your continued support! Help us leverage your experience: share your questions or suggestions via support@apalon.com.
comments: I had been using free version for a long time. As a truck driver, being able to look a few hours ahead to track radar was very helpful to timing travel in mountainous areas. Since i loaded an update, it's worthless. The radar only shows for a short time prior to present. It no longer shows any future projections for radar movement. Way to ruin a good resource for weather info. Certainly not considering a subscription now.

It's not free! It's an expensive trial. Don't waste your time. There are too many free apps with less ads that do way better job than this, which was obviously developed by a programmer in the first grade. use 1weather, had less intrusive ads or use the weather channel. This is for people who buy their first Android phones and don't know any better which is why they have no money

I came to this after Dark Sky's sold out, my big complaint is that it does not offer future predictions on the radar, it only offers current and past. I pay for the yearly membership since I'm a truck driver and its a tax write off and it has other benifits that are helpful to me. I'd love to see this feature added, and if it does it would change my rating to 5 stars.

After my disappointing experience w/the Accuweather and WeatherUnderground apps, I avoid paid upgrades and memberships. So if you do not upgrade and you can tolerate the aggressive pop-up advertising, then in my opinion the free version of the NOAA app is good enough to provide you w/a quick forecast and temperature reading. That's the case for now until paid membership becomes mandatory in the inevitable future. But always, keep your eyes on the skies.

I depend on this app for real time weather. Having a farm with horses it's nice to look and see bad weather that pops up real fast. Direct TV goes down and I get no info on the severity of bad weather without th[s app. The local weather channel gives no up to date even if it is up in running. I even have a NOAA weather radio that is my back up. Awesome app!!!!!

recentChanges: We make regular updates to improve your travels.
comments: As others have said, the app is currently broken. You can only sign in after you reset your password, and even if you do, the app fails to load upcoming trips. Other things are customer unfriendly. For example, if I want to cancel a trip, you now have to chat with a bot (versus just being able to do a simple "click-and-cancel" request). I understand that it may help Expedia's contact deflection measures, but it feels needlessly complicated.

As of October 2020, the app has gotten much worse. Don't bother with it. Original comments: Works, but limited. You get a lot more choices on the webpage than you do in the app; so shopping for travel is mediocre. However, great to have your itineraries on the app. It would be nice if it stored full itineraries locally in case no connection.

Was a pretty good app. Now will not show trips after you book them.. dates change between starting seach and booking. Have had several booking only to show up to hotel or car rental place to find out my booking dates are wrong sometimes days weeks and even months away from the dates I chose. Expedia points not worth the hassles of miss placed bookings maybe time to use a new service if they don't fix this soon!!! Ridiculous that these bugs lasted more then a few days....

The app is very broken. When I open it I am greeted to a screen that is flashing and not responsive. When I go to close the app it opens back up and I have to fight with it. It was a good app before all this mess. Best part is my trip is in 3 days and I'm stuck using the browser on my cell phone. Just fix it.

I rated this app earlier 5 star because it used to work really smooth. Now whenever I try to log in, it makes me do the image authentication plus makes me log in again. I liked it when it was simple and kept me logged on. I want to give it 5 star, so please help me with this so I can update this rating.

title: ÿßŸÑÿ®ÿßŸÇŸäÿßÿ™ ÿ£ÿ∞ŸÉÿßÿ± Azkar AlBaqiyat
description:
ÿßŸÑÿ®ÿßŸÇŸäÿßÿ™ ÿ£ÿ∞ŸÉÿßÿ±-Azkar AlBaqiyat
Al-Azkar ‚Äì Hisn Al-Muslim represents a fortification for the Muslim which helps strengthening his relation with Allah, and guards him against the whisperings of Satan and conditions of soul.
The Prophet (peace be upon him) used to observe supplication when going in or out the house, while moving or setting and in all his actions.
The supplications include the acts concerning both this life and the hereafter. That is, there are supplications for every single act of work or worship to the extent that supplications fill the Muslim‚Äôs life and surround it like a fortification.
Due to the urgent need of Muslims, who adhere to the Prophetic Sunnah, for supplications, and to help them cope with the modern technology, Arabia for Information Technology, the leading company in the field of Islamic applications and software developing, has designed and developed Al-Baqiyat Application for mobile phones and smart devices (iPhone, iPad, Android) in many languages, using the latest programing technologies. This has been done under the generous sponsorship of the ‚ÄúWaqf of Badr Ibn Saleh Ar-Rajhi‚Äôs mother and her Sons‚Äù.
 Al-Baqiyat (Azkar) is an application aimed at displaying the supplications of the Qur‚Äôan and Sunnah through a user-friendly interactive interface which enables many unpreceded features and abilities.
The application was designed to be suitable for all users. One of its main advantages beside the broad range of services it offers to the users is that it adopts the well-known book of ‚ÄúHisn Al-Muslim: Invocations from the Qur‚Äôan and the Sunnah‚Äù by Sheikh Sa`id Ibn Ali Ibn Wahf Al-Qahtani, using various translations.
Contents:
1. Supplications of the Day and the Night (Supplications of the morning, Supplications of the evening, Supplications of sleeping, Invocation said when wearing a garment, ‚Ä¶).
2. Supplications Relating to Acts of Worship (Supplications of purification, Supplications of fasting, Supplications of ·∏§ajj, ‚Ä¶).
3. Supplications of Prayer and Ablution (Supplications of ablution, Supplications of Azan, Supplications of prayer, Invocation said when entering and leaving the mosque, Invocation of Qunut, Invocation of Istikharah, ‚Ä¶) 
4. Supplications of Taw·∫ñid (Virtue of La Ilaha Illa Allah, Invocation for fear of Shirk, Invocation against ascribing things to omens, the Most Beautiful Names of Allah, ‚Ä¶).
5. Supplications of the Family (Marriage, Gatherings, Sick people, ‚Ä¶).
6. Supplications of Social Relations (Sickness, Affliction, Evil eye, Feeling frightened, ‚Ä¶).
7. Supplications said when leaving and entering the home.
8. Supplications of Traveling (Invocation said when mounting an animal or any means of transport, Invocation said when a mounted animal stumbles or any means of transport fails, Invocation said when entering a town or village, Supplication said when returning from travel, ‚Ä¶).
9. Supplications Relating to Conditions of Soul (Pleasure, Grief, Anguish, Debt, Anger, Amazement, ‚Ä¶).
10. Inclusive Invocations.
11. Invocations of the Noble Qur‚Äôan.
12. Invocations of the Prophetic Sunnah.
13. Linking the supplications and invocations to their original sources.
14. Ascribing the hadiths to their original sources from the Books of Sunnah.
15. Full text of the book of ‚ÄúHisn Al-Muslim: Invocations from the Qur‚Äôan and the Sunnah by Sheikh Sa`id Ibn Ali Ibn Wahf Al-Qahtani.
16. Book of ‚ÄúHisn Al-Muslim‚Äù translated into 22 living languages.
17. An electronic counter that help counting up the supplications recommended to be repeated by the Sunnah.
18. An electronic alarm which enables the user to set a predetermined specific time to remind him of the morning and evening supplications.
19. An Audio player feature which enables the user to listen to the supplications and invocations at any time.
20. Displaying the number of repeats for each invocation or supplication. 
21. A screen that automatically displays Al-Azkar once the application opens.
22. Displaying the daily prayer times.

title: Sleep Cycle: Sleep analysis & Smart alarm clock
description:
Relax, sleep better and wake up feeling rested with Sleep Cycle, the smart alarm clock. Track sleep from bedtime to morning, and get detailed analysis with the app that makes waking up in the morning just that bit easier. 

Track sleep using your phone and start your day feeling energized with our intelligent alarm clock and sleep tracker. Its unique design only wakes you up while you‚Äôre in your light sleep phase. Plus, you‚Äôll get detailed reports as Sleep Cycle monitors your sleep patterns, from bedtime until you're waking up. Track sleep and use the data to help you sleep better today! 

‚è∞ Waking up made easy - 5 reasons you‚Äôll love Sleep Cycle:

1. Sleep better with a gentle wake up call - Sleep Cycle‚Äôs alarm clock wakes you up while you‚Äôre in light sleep and is a natural way to start your day.
2. Relax at bedtime and track sleep easily - Learn about your sleep patterns with detailed analysis. 
3. A sleep tracker with a difference - There‚Äôs no phone under your pillow, you can track sleep by placing your device on the nightstand or close by on the floor. 
4. Your health comes first - Your sleep data and reports will help you feel great inside and out. 
5. Sleep better - Relax and let Sleep Cycle analyse your light sleep, deep sleep and overall health.

Relax with a good night‚Äôs sleep that will do wonders for your health. 

Download Sleep Cycle today - waking up in the morning has never been easier! 

Free features

‚àö Sleep analysis with Sleep Cycle patented sound technology, or accelerometer
‚àö Detailed sleep statistics and daily sleep graphs
‚àö Carefully selected alarm melodies
‚àö Snooze by shaking or double tapping the phone lightly
‚àö Customizable wake-up window. From instant (regular alarm clock), up to 90 minutes

Premium features

‚àö Longterm sleep tracker trends
‚àö Compare your sleep data to world sleep statistics ‚Ä¢ Snore trends - view historical snore trends data
‚àö Sleep aid - helps you fall asleep easier
‚àö Sleep notes - see how events such as drinking coffee, stress, working out, or eating late affect your sleep quality
‚àö Wake up mood - see how Sleep Cycle affects your wake up mood
‚àö Online backup - lets you secure your sleep data online
‚àö Export sleep data to Excel for detailed analysis


REQUIREMENTS
Ability to charge your phone by the bed.
Ability to place your phone near the bed, such as on a nightstand table or on the floor.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements.
comments: I love the sleep tracker feature on this! I upgraded just to accurately record my sleep and it has improved over time. One feature I wish it could do in the tracker is combine different sleep sessions in same day. For example, I like to take a 30min nap during lunch break. Sometimes at night, I am woken up to take dog out, or use the facilities. When I stop and restart it, it only records the most recent session.

Doesn't always record analysis. Some mornings you turn the alarm off (the alarm that is part of this app) and it simply does nothing instead of displaying your sleep record. It seems random as to when it works. In particular when you turn the alarm off and it goes to snooze (another glitch) it fails to record.

I benefited from this app a few years ago and need to do this again. Why did it switch from accelerometer to microphone? How will it know if I've stopped breathing or just changed sides? The accelerometer was way cool.

The microphone tracking is a great idea and seems well implemented, but there are two issues that baffle me that are easily fixed: 1) I often wake up early and want to know if I've gotten enough sleep. Show me. Why make me remember what time I went to bed and calculate? 2) It knows when I'm awake or asleep based on the microphone data so why doesn't it subtract out the time I was not sleeping? "In bed" time should be a second, less-important metric. Time actually asleep is more important.

It works. Its got a well designed UX. It really helps people with disorders such as ADHD where following a regular routine is important, but regular alarms are too discordant. I like the fact that the upgrade screen is at the beginning. The design is Honest. So all in all, well done.

title: Flo Health & Period tracker. My Ovulation Calendar
description:
Over 130 million women around the globe have already chosen Flo as their menstrual calendar, fertility tracker and pregnancy assistant!

Flo is a smart and simple feminine menstrual cycle calendar and  PMS symptom tracker, accurate ovulation calculator and helpful pregnancy tracker. The app Flo Period Tracker not only  accurately tracks your cycle and flow intensity,  but is also a sensitive regular and irregular period tracker, reliable trying to conceive app, ovulation calendar, and true fertility friend for you. Flo period diary makes accurate predictions of menstruation, ovulation and fertile days. It‚Äôs the first free period tracking app for Android, pregnancy calculator, fertility calendar, ovulation calendar for wom–µn that uses machine learning (AI). All women, even those with irregular period, can rely on this health tracker. Log your menstruation days & flow intensity in a handy period calendar (menstrual cycle diary), ovulation tracker and fertility calculator, schedule menstrual cycle reminders, record moods and PMS symptoms, use a due date calculator, follow a pregnancy calendar and take full control of your health with the app.
Want to know when your next period is coming? Confused by PMS symptoms? Want to take your birth control pills in time? With this free female period tracker, ovulation calculator and fertility calendar it‚Äôs easy to keep track of your menstrual cycle.

FREE PERIOD DIARY & OVULATION CALENDAR & FERTILITY CALENDAR (CALCULATOR) FOR WOMEN AND TEENS
Download this period and ovulation tracking app and:
‚Ä¢ Track your cycle, period days and PMS with the period calendar for Android
‚Ä¢ Log the start and the end date of menstruation, flow intensity and fertile days in the period calendar
‚Ä¢ Track your fertility window (fertile days) and when do you ovulate to see your chance to get pregnant with the ovulation predictor
‚Ä¢ Analyze your current and past cycles, menstrual flow with the menstrual tracker
‚Ä¢ Get predictions for upcoming periods, ovulation days, and fertility with the period calendar
‚Ä¢ Log ovulation tests results (positive ovulation, negative ovulation) in the app for Android
‚Ä¢ Track basal temperature with the period calendar
‚Ä¢ Log pregnancy tests results in the app for Android
‚Ä¢ Log more symptoms to get improved period predictions if you have irregular periods

PREGNANCY CALCULATOR (PREGNANCY CALENDAR) & TRACKER
‚Ä¢ See countdown to the birth of the baby
‚Ä¢ Track the week of pregnancy
‚Ä¢ Pick and change your pregnancy week by week
‚Ä¢ Get interesting articles on pregnancy every day

LIFESTYLE & FITNESS TRACKER
‚Ä¢ Add your weight, water consumption every day
‚Ä¢ Log your physical activity every day in the app for Android
‚Ä¢ Track your sex drive and moods every day
‚Ä¢ Log your PMS symptoms in the period calendar app

REMINDERS
‚Ä¢ Schedule reminders and get notifications of your period, ovulation days and fertility
‚Ä¢ Get reminders to log weight, sleep and to drink water every day
‚Ä¢ Get reminders on medication and contraception depending on your contraception type

GRAPHS
‚Ä¢ Keep your period, menstrual flow, ovulation, fertility and symptoms history
‚Ä¢ Analyze your cycle and period duration with the menstrual cycle diary
‚Ä¢ See the graph of your BBT and ovulation days
‚Ä¢ Analyze your weight changes and activity during the cycle with the menstrual cycle diary
‚Ä¢ Track your sleep duration and sleep debt every day
‚Ä¢ Control the amount of water consumed every day

MEDICAL AND SCIENTIFIC KNOWLEDGE 
‚Ä¢ Find out more about your body, cycle, ovulation, fertility and menstrual flow with the app Flo Period Tracker
‚Ä¢ Get support from the amazing Flo Period Tracker, Ovulation and Fertility Calendar community

Download this period diary for Android and join millions of women and teens who trust their cycles to this Period Tracker & Ovulation Tracker & Fertility Calendar.

CONNECT WITH THE APP FLO PERIOD TRACKER, OVULATION & FERTILITY CALENDAR
support@flo.health

Discover our biggest update ever ‚Äî Flo 5.0.
Take your health and well-being to the next level with the app used by 140 million women.
Explore more accurate AI-based cycle predictions and a daily well-being plan that includes tailored, practical health insights with cycle- and hormone-based tips for clearer skin, better workouts, and more energy. Explore a new health library co-created with 50+ leading doctors and health experts.
Enjoy! If you like our app, please don‚Äôt hesitate to review us.
comments: I used to love this app. It helped me get diagnosed with Endo after I read one of the helpful articles on irregular periods. Unfortunately, everything has been locked behind their premium membership paywall. All the helpful articles are gone, replaced only with endless prompts to buy their memberships. And so, I too must move on. I understand the need to make money, but for those of us who can't afford it, its merely the nail in the coffin.

I've been able to track my period, ovulation, and even my pregnancy...very useful app! Update: I still love the app and its content. However, it has been difficult trying to change my pregnancy info. I had to uninstall and reinstall the app and there were still some issues as the app tends to save prerecorded data. Also, I would love it if I could log personal notes and reminders. This can be done somewhat using the calender feature but only after that specific date has come or passed.

I've been using this app for over 2 years now and it was great back then. Ever since they upgraded and got premium the user experience has gone down so much. I just like to log and track things and it used to be so quick and easy but every 5 seconds now you get prompted with an 'upgrade to premium' 'look at this premium feature' to the point where it takes so long to just try to mark one thing. You have great content, but when I hit X on something I expect it to close and not keep popping up

Used to really like this app. All of the information was great! Now unfortunately you don't get anything but the tracker unless you pay. I am already paying through the nose for doctors visits and tests to try to get pregnant and unfortunately this just isn't an expense I can justify. I understand the "subscription" income is used to "improve" the app but I feel that myself and a few others would be happier to watch a few adds and still have access. The tracker is accurate most of the time.

ETA: I don't know how others are able to get an option to log menstrual cup use. I've been using it for months and haven't seen that. It's pretty disappointing I have been using My Calendar for a good few years, and it's alright. Flo is great. I love all the information available and actually enjoy the "chats" to learn more about my cycle and my body. I also love how pretty it is, lol. I will definitely recommend it to friends.

title: 9zest Parkinson's Therapy & Exercises
description:
9zest  Therapy helps Parkinson's fighters regain their normal life through convenient, affordable, and at-home solution.  

The exercises are designed by certified therapists and help in activities of daily living such as eating, drinking, writing, dressing up, walking, etc, reducing Parkinson‚Äôs challenges. 

9zest Parkinson‚Äôs Therapy offers a combination of Physical Therapy, Speech Therapy, Occupational Therapy and Yoga to fight Parkinson's symptoms, leveraging Neuroplasticity principles.

9zest, being a tele-therapy solution not only saves on time but also gives the user a premium therapy at a fixed cost. A user can workout from Smartphones (iPhone, Android), Tablets, iPad and Desktop/Laptop/Personal Computer using Google Chrome browser. 

The app prescribed, coach-assisted, and easy to follow videos help a user:

¬∑            Improve Balance and Posture
¬∑            Improve Eating and Drinking related issue
¬∑            Manage Speech and Swallowing disorder
¬∑            Reduce Tremors and Shaking
¬∑            Improve Handwriting
¬∑            Reduce Falls
¬∑            Learn to dress up well
¬∑            Reduce drooling 	
¬∑            Minimize freezing episodes

9zest Parkinson's Therapy comes handy with features like:

¬∑ Easy in-app assessment to create personalized therapy program
¬∑ Easy to follow audio & visual workout sessions along with demo video for each exercise
¬∑ ‚ÄòProgress Meter‚Äô that consists of tests to measure and track the improvements for a chosen goal
¬∑ 'Anytime, anywhere' exercises that can be customized on the basis of variations and intensity
¬∑ Coach Connect that lets you connect to a certified therapist for hassle-free onboarding
¬∑ Smart TV compatible audios and videos

With an aim to provide financial independence to Parkinson‚Äôs fighters, 9zest offers affordable and cost-effective therapy to the users with various benefits that can help them fight Parkinson‚Äôs challenges effectively.

Holistic Parkinson‚Äôs Care at its best:
¬∑ 9zest Parkinson‚Äôs Therapy designs a personalized physical therapy program for better balance, posture, mobility and walking endurance. 
¬∑ With Speech Therapy, individuals are able to resolve speech and swallowing issues and improve their existing speech competency.
¬∑ Use of Occupational Therapy enables people to perform Activities of Daily Living (ADL) by improving Fine Motor Movements.
¬∑ Yoga postures to energize, strengthen and calm the body and hence help to improve sleep and reduce stress and anxiety.

Subscription information:
¬∑ 9zest Parkinson‚Äôs Therapy offers Monthly and Yearly subscription.
¬∑ All users are eligible to avail 7 days free trial post which they will be charged for the monthly or yearly subscription.
A user can also try Basic Plan that lets the user do certain Parkinson‚Äôs exercises known to be helpful in managing Parkinson's symptoms.
¬∑ 9zest does not store any payment/credit card information on subscription purchase. All in-app purchases are securely handled by Google play store.
¬∑ Subscription automatically renews unless Auto-Renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the scheduled date of renewal. One can manage subscription and turn off auto-renewal using Account Settings.

For more information, follow Terms of Use (https://9zest.com/terms-and-conditions-of-use-members) and refer to 9zest Privacy Policy (https://9zest.com/privacy-policy)


About 9zest:
9zest‚Äôs mission is to make the world-class therapy available and affordable for anyone dealing with Parkinson's disease. With the help of certified physical therapists, speech therapists, and yoga coaches, 9zest aims to improve the quality of life of more than 10 million Parkinson's patients, worldwide.


References: https://9zest.com/references

comments: I was diagnosed with Parkinson's several years ago. I found my mobility has been declining gradually, but seems to have improved after just the few weeks that I've been following these exercises. My wife also says that my posture has improved significantly. I will definitely try some of the other routines soon. Very pleased so far!
I have been using this app for about a month. It has presented me with excersizes that I feel are beneficial, and have not been part of other PD therapies that I have tried.
Is it possible to you develop a Portuguese version of this app? Thank you.
Excellent exercises which target affected areas with great results. Good ongoing monitoring of progress. Really impressed.Almost a year on and still keeping me mobile, wonderful system
Loved it

title: Wikipedia
description:
The best Wikipedia experience on your Mobile device. Ad-free and free of charge, forever. With the official Wikipedia app, you can search and explore 40 million+ articles in 300+ languages, no matter where you are.

== What people say about the app ==

‚ÄúIt works without mocking, mistakes, advertisements, all sorts of snaps, and that probably is the most important thing.‚Äù ‚Äì Balan Radu

‚ÄúEverything and more. Free, objective, impartial and neutral. What more could you want?‚Äù ‚Äì Enzo Sinapsi

‚ÄúIt's an essential application for a person like me who is in an academic career.‚Äù ‚Äì A Google User

‚ÄúWikipedia is a complete solution to all of your doubts. If you search anything on the Wikipedia it gives you accurate results about it.‚Äù ‚Äì Debraj Bhattacharya

== Why you‚Äôll love the this app ==

1. It‚Äôs free and open
Wikipedia is the encyclopedia that anyone can edit. Articles on Wikipedia are freely licensed and the app code is 100% open source. The heart and soul of Wikipedia is a community of people working to bring you unlimited access to free, reliable and neutral information.

2. No ads
Wikipedia is a place to learn, not a place for advertising. This app is made by the Wikimedia Foundation, a nonprofit organization that supports and operates Wikipedia. We provide this service in the pursuit of open knowledge that‚Äôs always ad-free and never tracks your data. 

3. Read in your language
Search 40 million articles in over 300 languages in the world‚Äôs largest source of information. Set your preferred languages in the app and easily switch between them when browsing or reading. 

4. Use it offline
Save your favorite articles and read Wikipedia offline with ‚ÄúMy lists‚Äú. Name lists as you like and collect articles across different languages. Saved articles and reading lists are synced across all your devices and are available even when you do not have internet connectivity.

5. Attention to detail and night mode
The app embraces Wikipedia‚Äôs simplicity and adds delight to it. A beautiful and distraction-free interface lets you focus on the essential: reading articles. With text size adjustment and themes in pure black, dark, sepia or light, you can choose the most pleasant reading experience for you.

== Broaden your horizon with these features == 

1. Customize your Explore feed
‚ÄúExplore‚Äú lets you see recommended Wikipedia content including current events, popular articles, captivating freely-licensed photos, events on this day in history, suggested articles based on your reading history, and more.

2. Find and search 
Quickly find what you're looking for by searching within articles or with the search bar at the top of the app. You can even search using your favorite emojis or voice-enabled search.

== We‚Äôd love your feedback ==

1. To send feedback from the app: 
In the menu, press "Settings", then "About the Wikipedia app", then "Send app feedback".

2. If you have experience with Java and the Android SDK, then we look forward to your contributions! More info: https://mediawiki.org/wiki/Wikimedia_Apps/Team/Android/App_hacking 

3. By using this app, you agree to the automatic transmission of crash reports to a third-party service provider. If you would like to disable this feature, press "Settings," then turn off "Send crash reports" under the Privacy section.

4. Explanation of permissions needed by the app: https://mediawiki.org/wiki/Wikimedia_Apps/Android_FAQ#Security_and_Permissions 

5. Privacy policy: https://m.wikimediafoundation.org/wiki/Privacy_policy 

6. Crash report third-party service provider‚Äôs privacy policy:
https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-us/privacystatement 

7. Terms of Use: https://m.wikimediafoundation.org/wiki/Terms_of_Use 

8. About the Wikimedia Foundation:
The Wikimedia Foundation is a charitable nonprofit organization that supports and operates Wikipedia and the other Wiki projects. It is funded mainly through donations. For more information, please visit our website: https://wikimediafoundation.org/

recentChanges:
- Updated design of Search interface. Search your reading lists, browsing history, and Wikipedia itself from a single place.
- Minor bug fixes and enhancements.
comments: As the old saying goes "don't fix it if it ain't broke". Previously, users were able to choose where to save an article, now the article is automatically saved to the list "Saved". Now, if users want to circumvent such automatic saving, you added the options "Add to another...", "Move from..." and "Remove from..." --- problem with that is that these options COULD ALL BE TRIVIALIZED if the previous system was still in place.

After using wikipedia app for about 2 years, I've been encountered some problem,first when you want to read the article that has been saved,sometimes it doesn't load at all,and tell me that i do not connected to the internet even though i already downloaded it,two when it successfully load the page there are some photos that's not loaded,so i don't really know the context of the description of the pictures

Love this app, love wikipedia. Far better than searching Wikipedia articles in a browser on mobile. It's easy to use and the in-page seach function is particularly useful, as well as the quick introduction pieces you would normally only be able to access by hovering over a link on a PC or laptop. The quick edits are pretty good, if I'm bored I might steamroller through a couple of image captions or article descriptions. I also enjoy reading the main page in the morning.

Five stars when the many bugs in the latest version (as of 2020-10-29) are corrected. A pleasure to browse, when working! For now, though: üî∏ I've tested on several devices. The 'loading' animation is endless, and the first paragraph or more is missing. Also, it's now hard to get to History.

Wikipedia is the best thing on the internet. Keep this app on your phone and you will benifit from it. App layout is very nice and clean. Articles can be saved offline and synched across devices. You can customize font size, page color and change language of article.

title: AT&T Smart Wi-Fi
description:
AT&T Smart Wi-Fi connection manager is a free app that finds and auto-connects to available hotspots, logs missed hotspot opportunities for your review and action for later use, and displays your real-time cellular and Wi-Fi data usage.

Let this app help to increase your Wi-Fi connections while minimizing your cellular data consumption. AT&T Smart Wi-Fi helps you find, auto-connect and remember available hotspots in places you frequent. This free app also displays your Wi-Fi and cellular data usage in real-time so you can keep tabs on your data plan usage. Running quietly in the background, AT&T Smart Wi-Fi uses hotspot auto-detection to make it easy for you to discover, select and build a list of available hotspots. Additionally, AT&T Smart Wi-Fi creates a hotspot opportunity list by logging and mapping hotspots you‚Äôve seen -- but not connected to previously. By doing this, you can be notified of relevant hotspots the next time you‚Äôre in that area in order to connect.

AT&T Smart Wi-Fi uses accessibility services.

comments: I hate it. I bought this AT&T LG Phoneix 4G Android mobile phone and 50.00$ unlimited prepaid account card. My device was setup by AT&T Wifi support. I have had nothing but problems since I purchased this telephone and I've purchased the account prepaid card and I can't Register phone it says the phone number is unknown I'd really like to know what AT&T did to my telephone and why it does not work properly and why they won't correct it I'd really like to know because then they made me pay anoth

Terrible app, please don't ask me to comment again I've made my point!!! Worst app ever!!! I'm not sure if I'm paying for it, but the developer needs to Improve this app before I give it 5 Stars!!! Every time I login, I get message, not available, very frustrating!!!
Does not work most of the time. Never shows correct dates I connect to. All the complaint reviews and from all these people and no response isn't a good response. Please fix these problems
Bloatware. Plain and simple, I'd remove if I could. Most phones automatically find available Wi-Fi signals. This app has never found one once. Pure bloat, and useless too.
I don't even understand the point of this app other than to track my location. I was under the impression that it would evaluate wifi signal strength... but it doesn't appear to do that at all.

title: Pill Reminder & Medication Tracker - Medisafe
description:
Get the free ‚ÄúMUST HAVE‚Äù award-winning pill reminder and medication tracker ranked #1 by pharmacists, physicians and patients. Join the millions of people using Medisafe who are taking control of their medication management with our free app - stay on track and never miss another med.

üíä Features
‚Ä¢ Pill reminder and alarm for all medication needs
‚Ä¢ Drug-to-drug interaction checker
‚Ä¢ Family and caregiver support via ‚ÄúMedfriend‚Äù functionality
‚Ä¢ Medicine tracker
‚Ä¢ Refill reminders
‚Ä¢ Dr appointment manager and calendar
‚Ä¢ Support for complex dose schedules 
‚Ä¢ Add ‚Äúas needed‚Äù medications, vitamins and supplements
‚Ä¢ Full selection of OTC and RX medications
‚Ä¢ Daily, weekly & monthly med reporting with logbook to share with your doctor
‚Ä¢ Track health measurements for various medical conditions (diabetes, hypertension, cancer, anxiety, depression, HIV, multiple sclerosis, MS, Crohn‚Äôs, lymphoma, myeloma and leukemia) e.g. weight, blood pressure, blood sugar levels
‚Ä¢ Android Wear enabled
‚Ä¢ Customizable reminders and time settings (i.e weekend mode so you can sleep in)
‚Ä¢ Automatic time zone detection
‚Ä¢ Easily customize your pill reminder notifications. 

‚ù§Ô∏è A Health Tracker Built for You
Medisafe doesn‚Äôt just remind you to take your meds. As a medication management platform, Medisafe is a comprehensive tool that compiles all of your medical and health information in one place: pill and medicine reminders, drug-to-drug interactions, refill alerts, doctor appointments, and health journal with 20+ trackable health measurements


üîíPrivacy
‚Ä¢ Medisafe is available for free and no registration is required
‚Ä¢ We comply with strict privacy laws (HIPAA and GDPR compliant) to safeguard medical information


‚úÖ App Permission Information
Read Your Contacts - used if you choose to add a doctor or Medfriend. The app never stores your address book content and it doesn‚Äôt access your address book without asking you first. 
Find Accounts on the Device - Medisafe uses push notifications to Medfriends to let those with permission know if the main user has forgotten to take medication.


üîé Additional Information
Frequently Asked Questions: http://bit.ly/2yZt1Bh
Terms of Use: http://bit.ly/2Cpoz0n
Privacy Policy: http://bit.ly/2Cmpb7d
Validation by 3rd Party Independent Studies:
‚Ä¢ http://bit.ly/2GjwcYJ
‚Ä¢ http://bit.ly/2gLdPCp

Medisafe is FREE for download and use. Medisafe Premium includes unlimited Medfriends, access to more than 20 health measurements, and the choice of a dozen reminder sounds. Premium is offered by a subscription with automatic renewal.

comments: After a rocky start, I have finally figured out this app and it's almost perfect! Sometimes I run into issues when I experience a time change (for travel or daylight savings), and I would love an option to record a ketone measurement. Other than those, I'm so grateful that this app helps me keep track of my son's complicated medication schedule!

Honestly, this is a life saver! I was losing track of all the meds i was taking, missing out numerous doses and occasionally taking medication twice by accident! This app allows me to add all my medication (and give it an icon that actually looks like the tabley/inhaler/etc) and set up reminders for each day. The great thing is that if I'm in the middle of something and can't take my meds there and then, I can "snooze" the reminder to go off in 5/10/15+ minutes! Fantastic app :-)

This was a good app on my last phone but on my new phone it's very unreliable. Customer support sorted out my problems last time but now it's missing reminders again and I've changed nothing. It's happening every few days. I think the recent update killed it. I've never encountered a more troublesome app, ever! I'm now looking for another medication tracker as these problems seem to be more trouble than they're worth. EDIT: Rating lowered to 2 stars due to app breaking again after another bad update and customer support not responding for 17 days. I've resorted to using my bedside alarm clock and a paper note for guaranteed reminders. EDIT2: I did contact customer support. You choose to not respond. I'm not going to beg for help. Sort your app out. 20 people agree with me so far.

Reminds me when to take my meds and every week it lets me know how often I have missed them. If I miss my meds I am asked a multiple choice question of why. At the end of the week I am able to see why I miss my meds so I have insight on how to fix the situation. This app is better than I expected, although it could be a tad more user friendly.

I found a few glitches here and there but this app is very well done if you're somebody like me who has several serious medical conditions requiring medications at different times a day and you'd like to track on the effectiveness of such medication highly recommend this app. The designers and developers really did put the user in the driver's seat. There is still some work that could be done however I'm extremely impressed and I use this app every day multiple times a day. I love it.

title: Flipboard - Latest News, Top Stories & Lifestyle
description:
Discover quality content for all your interests - from personalized news, entertainment, tech and sports articles to trending lifestyle magazines. We'll deliver the latest headlines, events, and entertainment stories to save you time, keep you informed and make sure you're always up-to-date with what's happening.

NEW: Flipboard TV - watch video from hundreds of publishers, TV stations and independent producers for free. Visit the Explore tab to select from 20 curated video channels for news, politics, travel, lifestyle, celebrity, sports and more.

Trust our unique combination of professional editors and smart algorithms to customize and deliver must-read stories and undiscovered gems. Get the full perspective on the latest news - and share what you find. Our editors blend expert voices and curated sources, and even recommended stories they know you'll like, so you can sit back and flip through what matters most to you. 

You can even customize your personalized newsstand: pick your passions and create a Smart Magazine for each topic feed. Are you interested in world news, events or tech developments? Want to read articles from national newspapers, discover sports podcasts, and skim the latest news? Looking to seize the zeitgeist from trending lifestyle stories? Flipboard has you covered. 

Plus, you can create personal magazines: find articles you want to read later or you want to share, and use the "+" to flip them into your own magazines. 

MAKE THE BEST USE OF YOUR TIME ON FLIPBOARD:

‚Ä¢ Discover the latest news from The New York Times, National Geographic, Vanity Fair, and thousands more top newspapers and magazines, local, national or from around the world

‚Ä¢ Create and customize your Smart Magazines: bundle together sources, people and even hashtags to get access to truly personalized news

‚Ä¢ Customize your home feed: collate up to 9 of your favorite Smart Magazines together for quick access to the features you love

‚Ä¢ Read The Daily Edition: keep up with the latest headlines and trending events in our daily roundup of important stories and personalized news articles

‚Ä¢ Curate your perspective: collect stories around specific themes and add them to personal magazines

TOP PUBLISHERS ON FLIPBOARD:

- News & Politics: discover the latest headlines in national and world news, with newspapers and publications like The New York Times, CNN, Politico, Axios
- Tech & Science: read the latest tech news with TechCrunch, trending science stories with Wired, and more
- Business & Entrepreneurship: get personalized news relevant to your interests from The Wall Street Journal, Bloomberg, Forbes
- Sports: national pastimes or world news, never miss key sporting events with ESPN, CBS Sports
- Entertainment: get world news, even for celebrities and entertainment with People, Rolling Stone, Variety
- Lifestyle & Wellness: explore emerging lifestyle trends with Brit + Co., Self, Women's Health
- Food & Cooking: get some serious food inspiration from Bon Appetit, Food & Wine, Serious Eats
- Travel: feed your wanderlust with National Geographic, Travel + Leisure, Lonely Planet
- Home & Gardening: dream up your ideal home ELLE DECOR, House Beautiful
- Style: avant-garde or corporate with an edge... get sartorial inspiration from Vogue, Refinery29, W Magazine, GQ

KEEP UP WITH FLIPBOARD:

For product updates and the latest headlines from our blog, including tips on how to use Flipboard and interviews with actors, writers, musicians, and more. Follow us on:
www.twitter.com/@flipboard
www.facebook.com/Flipboard
https://www.linkedin.com/company/flipboard-inc-

For videos on how to use Flipboard, visit https://about.flipboard.com/tutorials/

Need help using the Flipboard app? Browse our help articles by opening Settings then Help & Feedback. Or, click the contact button at flip.it/help
