comments: Nice interface. Though each type of device has a different user experience, (iOS, Android, MacOS), a little weird but each is still very good. I like the ability to add and subtract areas if interest. They mark ads/sponsored posts pretty well. Pretty speedy on all devices, even somewhat older ones. Overall a nice news agragator.

I've been using flipboard for years. Now like 80% of the content is videos. And NONE of those videos actually play. It's so weird. They have some new video set up, every time I click on a video, it doesn't play. Just black screen. Click on it, it goes to another black screen. So, two major problems rendering this app useless: 1. Nearly all news is now in the form of videos. I don't want videos. I want to read, and 2. Those videos don't even work. How do you not beta test this, Flipboard??

If I open a page on source like golf or mma or something like that, I get articles that cover something else entirely. I'm really annoyed that I spend more time reporting articles that are not on topic and I don't know why this hasn't changed in years of reporting these articles... Please do something about this.

Been using flipboard for quite some time since you can customize what news you see or just flip through all news. Biggest down side is tbe comment section is really subpar and broken up into different sections. Dont even bother commenting if you see 100 plus comments because your comment is lost at the bottom. Other than that is a nice app to see any news you want.

Can't share URL if you click a link inside an article. Steps to repro: 1. Tap into an article 2. Tap any link on the page that goes to a different site 3. Observe the top toolbar shrinks from several items to 2 items. 4. Tap the share button in that toolbar 5. Pick literally anything on share sheet. 6. See "Couldn't Share item" error every time. If you fix this bug lmk and I'll revise my review! Update: Flipboard denied this obvious, reproducible bug. Smh. Bug does not happen on ios.

comments: I like this app. I really do. But I'm sorry, the watermark thing has to go. It's pointless, for what? Too much ads as well. I cant even download a pic without getting 2 or more ads. I can only download maybe like 5 pictures before my last watermark runs out. These two features are making my experience with this app lower. I understand the ads, advertising, I know. But too much ads. I just don't understand the watermark. Without the Watermark, I would've definitely rated this app 4 stars.
Great app but it could be more useful if users were able to write articles with the app.
Have been a user since 2014.. please stop this watermark thing no one does this it's insane I love this app but that's too much .. listen to your users. Thank you

I have three suggestions: 1. Make your interface look better. It's a really early 2000s look going on and you can do better. 2. When you refresh your discover page it really does nothing but give you the same feed just with 3 or 4 new pictures at the top. I'm pretty sure you're not having a shortage of pictures or something so please improve upon this. 3. The watermark thing has to go. Period. Y'all wildin.

I used to LOVE this app to the point I was a heartist for 3 years in a row, I had deleted it for a while to come back to it being a money pit; want to download so many pictures you have to buy a membership, don't want ads buy the membership, ect. its ridiculous, the app used to be a fun outlet for creativity and now half my pictures are under review and its things like plants and art, I really miss the way it used to be, dont bother getting it anymore unless you want to spend $$ over pictures üò¢

title: The New York Times
description:
Understand the world through award-winning independent journalism, expert reporting and multimedia storytelling with the NYTimes app.

Favorite Features:

‚Ä¢ A redesigned Top Stories provides a more consistent experience across all our apps and  website. Our new home page groups similar stories together so you can easily return to sections that interest you.
‚Ä¢ Breaking News alerts that link directly to developing stories.
‚Ä¢ Save articles for offline reading on any device.
‚Ä¢ Share articles, photos and videos through your favorite sharing platform.
‚Ä¢ Watch exclusive videos and browse our award-winning photography.
‚Ä¢ Experience NYT stories through innovative formats, like augmented reality and 360¬∫ video.
‚Ä¢ International coverage of current events and cultural stories from our 50 bureaus around the globe.
‚Ä¢ Podcasts: Listen to audio series including ‚ÄúThe Daily‚Äù and ‚ÄúModern Love.‚Äù
‚Ä¢ The Mini Crossword: Enjoy wordplay every day with the daily mini puzzle.
‚Ä¢ Read our Spanish-language coverage with NYT en Espa√±ol.
‚Ä¢ Reading at night? Turn on our experimental Night Mode for a dark-friendly app theme.

The NYTimes app for Android is built responsively and is formatted from 4" phones to 12"+ tablets. The app works on all devices running Android OS (5.0+).

The New York Times offers the following subscription options: 

‚Ä¢ Basic Digital Access, which includes unlimited article access. Cancel anytime.
‚Ä¢ All Digital Access: Basic + access to The New York Times Crossword and NYT Cooking. You also receive one bonus subscription to give to anyone you‚Äôd like. Cancel anytime.

The NYTimes app requires certain permissions to provide you with the best possible reading experience. Here‚Äôs a little bit about what each one does:
‚Ä¢ In-app purchases: This allows you to make purchases within the app.
‚Ä¢ Location: In exchange for the free content provided through the NYTimes app, we compile demographic information about our readers in accordance with our Privacy Policy. This information is no more specific than the state in which you are located.
‚Ä¢ Photos/Media/Files: This permission allows the app to cache images locally, reducing load times for pages you revisit.
‚Ä¢ Wi-Fi connection information: This item gives the app permission to use available Wi-Fi networks rather than your mobile network. In the absence of trusted Wi-Fi networks or if Wi-Fi is disabled, the app will make use of your cellular network (if available). Normal bandwidth and usage charges apply as detailed in your service agreement with your wireless carrier.


Privacy Policy: https://www.nytimes.com/content/help/rights/privacy/policy/privacy-policy.html
Terms of Service: https://www.nytimes.com/content/help/rights/terms/terms-of-service.html
California Notices: http://www.nytimes.com/privacy/california-notice

As of version 9.18 of the app will save and honor your privacy preferences across devices when logged in to a New York Times account

Feedback? Suggestions? Issues? Please contact our support team at android@nytimes.com. We‚Äôll do our best to assist you. Your feedback is important to us.

comments: This isn't supposed to be a review of the news itself. The app works well for the most part, but does have bugs loading images and sections when in landscape on my tablet (i.e. it won't load some randomly but does load others). I would also love something like "Download print issue" where you could digitally see exactly what the print newspaper looked like that day, which is a feature for some other papers. Overall, it's a good app, but it does need some improvements.

I love the app interface on my cell phone. Home page is basically just stacked articles w/o any real organization, but every article has a byline and they squeeze a lot of pictures and graphics on the homepage. Still, somehow they make it look very clean. It does lead to more scrolling than most other news apps, but I think the trade-off is worthwhile. And content aggregation is quite good. This is definitely my go-to news app, even over multi-source aggregators. What keeps this from being a five-star review is notifications. Frequency and importance are fine, but often when you expand the notifications they will all (or mostly) be duplicates, even when unexpanded they are different articles. Occasionally the notifications will point to different articles. This used to be a much larger issue, while this has been fixed for the most part it still happens on occasion. I'd also like the search to be included on the main page action bar. But if they fix the notification thing I'll update to five stars.

Love the journalists but hate the app. They put up notifications with interesting leads, but when l click on the notice I am sent to an entirely unrelated story. Of course by then the notification that peaked my interest is gone. The only way to find the story is to locate search (which is buried) and then remember some key words from the notification. Washington Post does not have this problem. Why can't the Times get it right?

App performance issues have improved over the last year or so. But is this app actively under development? I don't see many new features. One request: Night mode has to be manually turned on and off. Can this be done automatically, similarly to the Android system feature that can detect when it's nighttime?

Love this app & The N Y Times. Keep it going. The apps are a fantastic addition to newspapers and may be their salvation. We cannot allow the newspaper industry to die. TV is fine but deep insights can only be gained from quality journalism. Were key newspapers to disappear then very soon the quality of TV journalism would plunge and become less than worthless.

title: Left to Survive: Dead Zombie Survival PvP Shooter
description:
Left To Survive combines a shooter action game with a post-apocalyptic world where zombies have enslaved the Earth and taken control.
Life is no longer what it used to be: humans are running for their lives, and the Earth belongs to the undead from now on. Join tournaments, collect an arsenal and get valuable gear, build a base ‚Äì a new home for many survivors, start expeditions to meet the heroes of this post-apocalyptic reality, challenge other players in PvP matches and helicopter raids, and show your shooting skills.

Protect humanity from HORDES OF ZOMBIES
The world is teeming with the undead. No place to run or to hide. Become a hero of this post-apocalyptic reality and shoot up all the zombies. Start the Campaign, follow the story, and rid the Earth of the undead hordes! Help humanity to rise up like a phoenix from the ashes.

Wide variety of ARMOR at your service!
On your mission to save the world from zombies, a huge range of weapons and gear will be at your service. Make a choice and pick the right one from assault weapons and sniper rifles to machine guns and shotguns that will help you to shoot up all the zombies in no time. Equip your hero with gear to enhance his skills and powers. Upgrade and evolve weapons and gear and make heroes more powerful.

Unite them ALL!
Meet all the heroes of the post-apocalyptic world. Back in the day, they were totally different people, just ordinary humans. Now, it‚Äôs their duty to protect the world from zombies. Each of them has unique skills and abilities. Upgrade and evolve them to level up their skills. Last, but not least, gather all the survivors to give them new hope and new home. These specialists can improve your base and make life easier.

Engines checked, ready to RAID BASES
Tough times have come and only the strongest will survive. Raid other bases with your helicopter and collect resources. Be prepared for a ‚Äúwarm‚Äù welcome, you can get into a serious skirmish: your opponents‚Äô bases are protected by towers and local troops. It won‚Äôt be that easy to take resources out from under their noses. Equip the helicopter with a powerful weapon and upgrade it to have a successful raid.

Challenge other players in PvP MATCHES
Test your skills in PvP matches and become the best shooter among players. It‚Äôs the perfect opportunity to challenge other players, to gain more shooting experience, to find out who is the best shooter among you, and to train before you face zombies as well. Play in 2x2 matches or solo. Team up with your clanmates and challenge other players together.

Build your BASE!
To survive and make the future bright, build a new home for yourself and other survivors ‚Äì your base. Turn it into a place where everyone can find shelter and feel safe: produce food and resources, arm your heroes with unique abilities, modify weapons, etc. Fortify it to protect it from raids and looting.

Follow us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/LeftToSurvive

summary: Survive the zombie war or die! Beware of dead zombies in PVP shooting battles!
developerAddress: Barbara Strozzilaan 201, 1083 HN AMSTERDAM, Nederland
recentChanges:
NEW MATCHMAKING SYSTEM
Introducing our brand new PvP system ‚Äì where players are matched by their rating, instead of ranks.
Get a higher rating for victories and a lower one for defeats. The stronger the foe, the more your rating can go up!
We want to make the PvP system fair and competitive, so we need your feedback on the new system!

NEW COLLECTION EVENT
Forgetful Tony has lost his cards and he‚Äôs got to participate.
Find and return them to receive very VALUABLE REWARDS!
comments: I have loved this game and the play. But in the recent update and event, this has been a monumental failure. The new ranking system of pvp makes it more complicated to play with clan mates and it hasn't done anything to improve matchups. The new horde event with the collecting cards to gather coins to spend on weapons, heroes, and gear is just so complicated and frustrating. Why change something that worked for so long? The old way of milestones is so much better. Please go back to the old ways!

Still a problem with PVP match ups!!!! Still too many cheaters, hackers and aim bots. And the match up algorithm is still a joke. Keep having to go against players with way more power. If you're on a win streak, magically you're going to have to face said cheaters, hackers and aim bots to knock your ranking back down. Been playing for almost 2 years and they still won't really fix this problem. I have too much money invested in this game to delete it. Oh well. Be warned.

The new matchmaking system is just as terrible as the one before it. I have been playing the PVP since they introduced it and I have not gone beyond ranking 19 as I am constantly matched up against opponents far better than me, so nothing has changed besides the developers saying they have addressed an issue that so many gamers were unhappy with. And this new issue will take them years to sort out just like before. Steer clear of this game unless you are willing to spend lots of money.

Great graphics good game except for the greedy pay to play system. This game also seem to have way too many server issues. Sometimes while I'm in the process of making a purchase it tells me I have been awarded the resources but it didn't actually happen. The devs will say it was added to my account when clearly it isn't. The match making system puts you up against players way more powerful than you are and you will often have to play against lame hackers that will not play fair.

PVP is full of cheaters with hack codes, terrible system. Their servers lose connection nearly every day, multiple times, in the middle of a match causing you to lose. Extremely frustrating! If you love a game that the developers aim to beg for your wallet to get anything good to compete, well this game is for you!

title: Audible: audiobooks, podcasts & audio stories
description:
Find a listen for every moment.  Choose binge-worthy audiobooks, exclusive podcasts, bite-sized audio content and genre-bending Audible Originals. Listen to captivating storytelling, and make Audible a part of your daily listening routine.

Sign in securely with your Amazon account for your Audible Premium Plus or Audible Plus membership - your first 30 days are on us.

UNPLUG BY TUNING IN. 
Enjoy storytelling that transports you. Feel good with comedy podcasts, unwind with our meditation titles or tap into your detective skills with a new mystery or true crime podcast. You can download, stream and listen to audio books offline too.

Hear captivating audio books, listen to podcasts and relax with mindful meditation.  Make your Audible Library the listening routine you can‚Äôt live without.

LISTEN TO AUDIO STORIES ANYTIME. 
Our Library of audio entertainment is always open. So come on in and listen to bite-sized audio content such as true crime podcasts, daily news updates, and sci fi audiobooks as you cook, walk the dog, run, work or fold laundry. 
Your listening routine starts here.

Download and listen to books and podcasts offline. Dive into engrossing true crime thrillers, mysteries, fantasy & sci-fi stories, kids stories, meditation titles, memoirs, documentaries, and genre-bending Audible Originals.

With monthly credits, you can find the audio content you want, including bestsellers and new releases. Discover the latest and greatest in audio entertainment with your Audible Premium Plus membership.

Preview Audible Plus. New to Audible, the catalog offers thousands of audiobooks, podcasts and audio titles just for you. 

AUDIBLE PREMIUM PLUS
- Build your own Library and listen to the largest selection of audio titles from the entire Premium selection - titles purchased with credits are yours to keep, even if you cancel.
- Mysteries & thrillers, true crime, sci-fi stories, comedy podcasts, meditation and more - you get 1 monthly credit to pick any title that you want to keep.
- 30% off any additional titles from the catalog, plus access to exclusive deals and discounts. 
- If you don‚Äôt love a title purchased with a credit, you can swap it.
- And, access the entire Audible Plus catalog - thousands of binge-worthy audiobooks, exclusive podcasts and audio entertainment, with fresh audio content added every single week.
- Plus, you can listen offline to any title. You can download, stream or listen to books and other audio entertainment titles from both the Premium collection and the Audible Plus Catalog.

Listen how you want. And never lose your place with seamless cross-device listening with Whispersync, available with all audio book titles, podcasts and selections across your Library.

PREVIEW AUDIBLE PLUS - SELECTED AUDIO STORIES AND TITLES
- Explore the Audible Plus Catalog anytime you want, no credits necessary.
- Thousands of binge-worthy audio books, podcasts and Audible Originals.
- True crime podcasts, comedy podcasts, scifi audiobooks, kids books and thrillers. Listen to books and podcasts from thousands of titles.
- Fresh audio content and new listens added to the Catalog every single week. 
- Listen offline. You can stream and download all you want.

The most compelling stories. Told by inspiring voices. Listen to storytelling that speaks to you, anytime, anywhere. Fall in love with books all over again with Audible, an Amazon company.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and enhancements.
comments: I enjoy the ability to listen to a book as I drive, the only to toddler-free time I have. I love the book exchange, so I can keep the books I truly love. It doesn't make sense to me when you can buy an entire audiobook for one credit, but you only get a dollar off the ebook format. I wish that I could get the ebook for a discounted rate, not using my Audible Credit to only get a dollar per credit off.

While having some great content and a very good media player, this app is quite hard to navigate. The search function needs some serious work; the back button and the back arrow don't correlate so sometimes I want to go back a page and I end up loosing my whole search and there is no way to go from your search page to the main navigation menu. Being able to filter by multiple genres would be of great benefit as well.

The subscription is great if you listen to at least one book a year. Just make sure you're using your points on stuff that costs at least $15 and buying cheaper stuff. Once you're out of points you can buy 3 at once which is good if you're trying to get a whole series of books or just listening a lot. If you use it less you can use it without the monthly plan. There are discounts for members though so it's only cheaper without the subscription for people who don't use the app much.

Audible removed the controls that allow you to control the app (play/pause &back 30 sec) from notifications pane. For me this is a MAJOR loss in functionality for the app. Now I have to unlock my phone, go and open the app just to pause or play my audio book or go back 30 sec. I spoke with their tech support about this. They said the feature had been removed and that this was not a bug. BRING THE FRICKING FEATURE BACK!! Audible responded, said it was there under playback settings. NO, it is not.

Functional but bad. The app does what it's supposed to do at a bare minimum; play audiobooks. Sometimes it loses your place and starts you over from the beginning. Sometimes it doesn't sync with playback on other devices. Sometimes it just doesn't even play the audiobook. But for the most part it works. It doesn't respect your screen real estate in horizontal mode, it takes too many unnecessary taps to get to anything meaningful and it is hard to navigate. Recommendations are a total joke. C-

title: Calorie Counter - MyFitnessPal
description:
Whether you want to lose weight, tone up, get healthy, change your habits, or start a new diet MyFitnessPal has you covered. Our members have lost over 200 million pounds and 88% of people who track for at least 7 days on MyFitnessPal lose weight. Sign up for FREE and start living a happier and healthier life today!

See for yourself why MyFitnessPal is the world‚Äôs most popular health and fitness app.

‚ñåTRACKING FOOD IS FAST AND EASY 
‚ñ† Biggest Food Database -- 11+ million foods in our database including global items and cuisines. 
‚ñ† Barcode Scanner -- Simply scan barcodes to log foods. 4+ million barcodes recognized. 
‚ñ† Recipe Importer -- Easily import the nutrition information for the recipes you cook.
‚ñ† Restaurant Logging -- Quickly log menu items from your favorite restaurants.
‚ñ† Food Insights -- Learn how to make healthier choices about the foods you eat. 
‚ñ† Personalized Experience -- Create your own foods, recipes, and meals and save favorites. 
‚ñ† Calorie Counter -- We automatically calculate the calories in your foods, meals and recipes.
‚ñ† Macro Tracker -- We automatically calculate the macros (carbs, fat, protein) in your foods, meals and recipes.
‚ñ† Track All Nutrients -- Calories, macros (carbs, fat, protein), sugar, fiber, cholesterol, vitamins, and more.
‚ñ† Customize Your Diary -- Log breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacks or create your own meals. 
‚ñ† Water Tracking -- Log water in cups, ounces or ml. We save your recently logged amounts.

‚ñåREACH YOUR GOALS
‚ñ† Choose A Goal -- We support weight loss, weight gain, and weight maintenance goals.  
‚ñ† Goal Setting -- Create your own goals or let us create personalized goals for you, including calorie and macros goals.
‚ñ† Change Habits -- It's almost like having a nutrition coach right inside your pocket.

‚ñåLOG YOUR EXERCISE AND STEPS 
‚ñ† Connect 50+ Apps & Devices -- Syncing your workouts is easy and automatic.
‚ñ† Choose From 350+ Exercises -- Or create your own exercises and workouts. 
‚ñ† Log Cardio Exercises -- Including running, walking, biking, swimming, yoga, pilates and more. 
‚ñ† Log Strength Exercises -- Including sets, reps, and weight per set. 
‚ñ† Track Steps -- Set a daily step goal and see a graph of your step history. 
‚ñ† We connect with all your favorite apps and devices -- Including Fitbit, Jawbone UP, Garmin, MapMyFitness, Runkeeper, Strava, Runtastic, Misfit, Withings, HealthKit, UA Record and many more!

‚ñåGET SUPPORT AND MOTIVATION 
‚ñ† Add Friends -- Connect with friends for an extra layer of support and accountability.
‚ñ† Join Our Community -- Find motivation, support, tips, and advice in our active forums. 
‚ñ† Newsfeed Updates -- Share your accomplishments and see friend‚Äôs progress in the newsfeed.

‚ñåCELEBRATE YOUR SUCCESS 
‚ñ† Chart Your Progress -- Stay motivated with a graph of how you‚Äôre improving over time.
‚ñ† Progress Photos -- Add photos to your weight entries to see and celebrate your progress. 
‚ñ† Nutrition Reports -- View a history of your calories, macros, and nutrient intake. 
‚ñ† Share Your Progress -- Help inspire friends and family members on their own health journey.

Download MyFitnessPal and start living a happier and healthier life today!

For our full terms and conditions and our privacy policy, please visit: https://account.underarmour.com/privacy?locale=en

135 Townsend St
San Francisco, CA 94107
recentChanges:
Whether you want to log your lowest weight in years, your first run in weeks, or your heart healthy afternoon snack, we know you count on MyFitnessPal to be working smoothly.

Want to try new features before everyone else? Join our beta program: https://undrarmr.co/334Jhn7

We hope you enjoy and happy tracking!
comments: The step synching with Samsung Health has stopped working. I thought it was a problem with my phone initially, but as my food entries were synching I realise it's a MFP issue and not the first time. So annoying! 16/10/20 One week later and still not working. What's going on? 29/10/20 Still not synching with Samsung Health. Why is it taking so long? 31/10/20 The new release is not working properly at all, it only syncs a fraction of the total number of steps taken. Just awful!

**UPDATE: I have been using the app since last July 2019. It's a great tool. I have lost 70 lbs. on the keto diet since then, I couldn't have been so successful without it! Helps keep me on track with my goals. **Step tracker is fixed! Thank you! I will say that it was a little frustrating getting an email(actually several) that said my problem was resolved, when it wasn't... their internal term for "yes, we know it's a problem and we're working on it" But it's fixed now, I am happy. !

When it works it helps keep me motivated, and there's a great database. However it wants to know why I haven't logged lunch at 8:10 AM (and yes my settings are on the correct time zone). It locks up often, failing to allow me to add goods in a timely manner. If the glitches don't improve I'll try a different app.

Downloaded the app on the recommendation of my trainer and am finding it very useful. The only frustrating part is trying to find certain foods when tracking meals. There is almost too much choice which makes it frustrating to have to scroll through a massive list if what is typed in doesn't match exactly. Other than that this app has been great. Still debating whether to pay for the premium features but only because I'm cheap.

It used to be amazing. Now, it's riddled with premium forced on you and location tracking prompts that don't stop with no way to say 'never show again.' it's not longer simple to use. Update: the intrusive ads are rediculous. You should not get an ad when you hit ad food, or other important actions. They are put in places to seemingly trick you into clicking them - they often appear just as you are going to naturally push a button.

title: Microsoft Launcher
description:
Microsoft Launcher provides a new home screen experience that empowers you to be more productive on your Android device. Microsoft Launcher is highly customizable, allowing you to organize everything on your phone. Your personalized feed makes it easy to view your calendar, to do lists, and more. Sticky Notes on the go. When you set up Microsoft Launcher as your new home screen, you can either start fresh with your favorite apps or import your current home screen layout. Need to switch back to your previous home screen? You can do that, too!

This version of Microsoft Launcher has been rebuilt on a new codebase to make new features possible, including dark mode, personalized news, and numerous performance improvements (improved load time, less memory use, better battery performance, and fluent animation).
 
MICROSOFT LAUNCHER FEATURES 
Customizable icons: 
¬∑ Give your phone a consistent look and feel with custom icon packs and adaptive icons. 

Beautiful wallpapers: 
¬∑ Enjoy a fresh new image from Bing every day or choose your own photos.
 
Dark theme: 
¬∑ Comfortably use your phone at night or in low light environments with Microsoft Launcher‚Äôs new dark theme. This feature‚ÄØis compatible with Android‚Äôs‚ÄØdark mode settings.
 
Improved performance: 
¬∑ Microsoft Launcher now loads faster, uses less memory, is more battery efficient, and offers fluent animations.
 

TERM OF USE 
By installing this app, you agree to the Terms of Use (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=246338) and Privacy Policy (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=248686). 

Downloading Microsoft Launcher gives the option to replace the default launcher or to toggle between device launchers. Microsoft Launcher does not replicate the user‚Äôs PC home screen on the Android phone. Users must still purchase and/or download any new apps from Google Play. Requires Android 7.0+.

¬∑ Comfortably use your phone at night or in low light environments with Microsoft Launcher‚Äôs new dark theme. This feature‚ÄØis compatible with Android‚Äôs‚ÄØdark mode settings.

Improved performance:
¬∑ Microsoft Launcher now loads faster, uses less memory, is more battery efficient, and offers fluent animations.


TERM OF USE
By installing this app, you agree to the Terms of Use (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=246338) and Privacy Policy (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=248686).

Downloading Microsoft Launcher gives the option to replace the default launcher or to toggle between device launchers. Microsoft Launcher does not replicate the user‚Äôs PC home screen on the Android phone. Users must still purchase and/or download any new apps from Google Play. Requires Android 7.0+.
summary: Personalize your phone and stay organized on the go.
developerAddress: One Microsoft Way
comments: It's a good app. I like what Microsoft is going with it so far, with a productivity first approach. I would like to see some more customization options though, like App folder "Covers" in Action Launcher. You can have quick access to one app with a tap, while keeping the rest of the folders behind a swipe (or a long press). I like to keep a clean desktop, & that'd go a long way to cleaning clutter. I look forward to further updates & features.

Just seems to make sense so far after all the others that just come close but ever just get there. I've tried every one of them. They just seem to leave one particular area unattended to. This one just seems to basically cover everything. I'm sticking with it until I see something better. It's a delicate balance between form and function. It cannot be just about one or the other alone. All the others looked cool and all but, they seemed to have been uncompleted somehow.

I was bored of my system launcher after using it for 3 straight years. And eventually I came across Microsoft launcher and voila I loved it very much , it's very systematic and user friendly. There are few bugs and issues like "Your feed" doesn't load calendar events. But apart from that , it's the best launcher in the store.

Absolutely love this!! I love how we can customise literally EVERYTHING been trying to look for something like this for so long and never would've thought Microsoft has a launcher and it is this good! I downloaded it initially so I can sync the clipboard for the stuff I copied and pasted Little did I know this launcher is actually this amazing My fav is that the "subgrid", "your feed" and that I can swip vertically for my home pages Anyways 5/5 for sure!!

Absolutely brilliant. Clean simple and smooth. There is one thing I would like to see in a future update and that would be for an option to change the color of the gray overlay on left screen and the opacity. I personally would like to change this to a solid black to match my dark theme. Thank you for a wonderful launcher

title: Mind map & note taking tool - MindMeister
description:
Whether you're using it for mind mapping, project planning, brainstorming/idea management, note-taking or presentations, MindMeister can help you organize, prioritize, and even generate new ideas. MindMeister lets you share your mind maps with as many friends or colleagues as you want and collaborate with them in real-time.

Designed from the ground up as an extension to our award-winning, browser-based interface, the MindMeister app stores your mobile creations and seamlessly syncs them with your online account.


Feature highlights:
‚úî Create and edit graphical mind maps
‚úî Seamlessly sync maps and folders with your free online account
‚úî Share maps directly from the device
‚úî Multi-touch support for drag & drop, zoom, pan 
‚úî Add icons, colors, styles, boundaries and map themes
‚úî Edit and view notes, links and tasks on ideas
‚úî Draw connections between topics
‚úî Export as RTF
‚úî Manage Favorites
‚úî Play map-based presentations on your device

Additional features for a paid MindMeister account:
‚úî Export as MindManager, Freemind, PDF, image, MS Word and MS PowerPoint
‚úîUnlimited mind maps
‚úîAttach files and images
‚úîPriority Support

Additional features through www.MindMeister.com interface:
‚úî Unlimited undo/redo
‚úî Import from MindManager, Freemind, Mind and text files

What can you use Mind maps for?
‚úî Idea Management
   - Capture, manage and implement ideas
‚úî Brainstorming
   - Visual real-time brainstorming for teams
‚úî Project Planning
   - Design plans together and put them into reality together
‚úî Note Taking
   - Take meaningful and efficient notes
‚úî Knowledge Management
   - Manage the collective intelligence of your team
‚úî Meeting Management
   - Visualize your agenda, take notes, assign tasks to the persons responsible and work together

NOTE: Requires a free account registration. 


Privacy policy: https://www.mindmeister.com/privacy
Terms of use: https://www.mindmeister.com/legal

recentChanges: With this release we have improved the drag and drop functionality and the compatibility with Android 11. We've also fixed some smaller sync issues.
comments: The New Update Messed it all up. I had purchased a plan and it should download PDF of the same like it used to earlier. Now it Just shows PDF in Queue and doesnt download. I loved the app before this. But I had worked alot over the map I had created and Dont want to do it all over again. Please Fo Something!!!!!

Why is everything about money, cant the app be free or at least have 100 free mind maps. Yet you can only use 3 mind maps for free. Total waste of my time. Its a shame because the actual layout and tools are perfect for revision.
Absolute rubbish portrait mode only, can't drag and re-arrange as you choose, no text align options, can't selection multiple cells at once for editing. WASTE OF MONEY
This application helps me a lot. Mind maps make complicated data very organised and clear And this works for me the best.
1. Hard to use; 2. Not for marketing teams; 3. APP version slow working

title: Lyft - Rideshare, Bikes, Scooters & Transit
description:
Count on Lyft to take you wherever you need to to go. Got an early flight? Need to get to the office to prep for the morning meeting? We‚Äôll match you with a driver, help you find the quickest bus route, or show you the nearest scooter ‚Äî you‚Äôll be on your way in minutes.  If it gets you there, it‚Äôs in the app. 

Save time (and your sanity)
We‚Äôll match you with a driver in seconds.  Your time is your money ‚Äî having to tackle traffic and hunt for parking is a total pain. With Lyft, you can just sit back and relax.

You‚Äôve got options
Choose from 9 different ways to go*, they‚Äôre all available right from your app. Whether you‚Äôre looking for an affordable ride, the most direct route, or a way to treat your crew ‚Äî we‚Äôve got the mode to suit your needs and mood.

Adventure all day and night
Have peace of mind knowing you can always request a Lyft ride 24/7 ‚Äî and share your route with friends. Our Community Safety Program is designed to bring our riders and drivers greater protection ‚Äî from in-person trainings to in-app features.

* Lyft ride types may vary by region. Check the app to see what is available in your city.

recentChanges: Thanks for choosing Lyft! To make your rides even better, we update the app regularly. It‚Äôs like housekeeping: squashing bugs, cleaning up code, and other small-but-mighty improvements.
comments: I have been trying to use my lyft account for about 2 years. When I type in my debit/credit it doesn't not accept it error when I have triple checked it and still won't take it. I typed it in right. It pretty frustrating when you need a ride and can't even access your lyft account for a ride. This has been going of for 2 years now.

Up until tonight Ive loved the app, but as of tonight it charges me for the ride but after I go and order it it just goes back to the select destination screen it doesn't look for a car then it tells me I found a car and be ready in 18 minutes but there's no trace of it inside the app I don't know what's going on right now, I'm very disappointed and kind of stranded not because of this possibly unless this guy just shows up mysteriously in 18 minutes I have no clue if he's going to or not

I have had an account for years but have not used it since 2015. I moved to a new state recently and had re-download lyft and tried to attach my payment methods. I tried to attach every option that is offered and the app wouldn't let me. I even Uninstalled and reinstalled several times. There's is no proper customer service set up. I finally found a number that would keep me on hold then eventually hang up. This is why I prefer uber, I never have these problems with them.

Changed my address a week before downloading. My card didnt match my new address when adding it yet. Understandable. But now that my address is up to date, i still have to use a completely different card. I contacted support who told me my card wasnt working or they dont accept it _. I tried explaining it was my address, they sent me to a link that told me I need to use a new card. Its just very frustdrating. I gave it two stars because the drivers are always awesome and the prices are fair.

Terrible. Added my credit card a day prior and thought it was set to go. Now I request a ride and they want a second credit card that has matching address, provided this unnecessary info and rejected because could not validate, your problem not mine. Dishonest, unreliable, do not use if your ride is a necessity. Unbelievable. 0 stars if I could

comments: This app is still ridiculous when it comes to making or receiving calls so I have resorted to using it only for texting. The texting service is also still incredibly slow- taking up to a minute. Yes, I know 1 minute is not a very long time... But when you need to see messages immediately and instead you're left staring at a screen yelling "come on already!!" It sucks.

The calling feature isn't great. I tried to use the minutes it gave me for free, but I couldn't get the speakerphone to come on, nor could I hear it ringing on the regular headset when I held it to my ear. The texts sometimes get sent in pieces missing half or more of the message which makes conversations hard to have with the people you're trying to get ahold of or speak with. Frustrating. But I like the layout of the app, it's visually pleasing, & there are plenty of great numbers to choose!

It used to be great, now it pops up ads every time you go back or try to click a different conversation. And on top of that it is horribly slow now. Edit: if you rely off ads to make money why am I paying you for minutes? This app used to run slick but now it is a chore to use and now every 1 out of 3 calls now I have to restart my phone cause it locks in the call and I can't end it cause it is loading an ad.

This app is okay for what it is. It has its problems. Sometimes it will drop a call, the person your talking to said it sounds like I am under water, I have fool signal and strong Wi-Fi and it cuts in and out like you have poor signal. Over all for a free app to make free calls it is manageable. Keep the app up to date it will get better. Thanks Textfree for the free app!

So far so good..update hey thanks pinger..yes without your professional services some could be in an emergency so this is very vital to have as I do use this as a backup ...text works great !! One time my phone went out of service and this worked wonderfully ‚ù§Ô∏è I think if I lose my phone that this is here as a safety net and I add money to this asap üòâ ..&goes along way ...for those whom need to know more I use this on phone & my 2tablets & pc has no carrier except textfree thank you so much.

title: Todoist: To-Do List, Tasks & Reminders
description:
üèÜ 2020 Editor's Choice by Google
ü•á "Todoist is the best to-do list app right now" - The Verge

Todoist is used by 25 million people to organize, plan and collaborate on projects, both big and small.

Use Todoist to:
‚Ä¢ Capture and organize tasks the moment they pop into your head.
‚Ä¢ Remember deadlines with reminders and due dates. 
‚Ä¢ Build lasting habits with recurring due dates like "every Monday".
‚Ä¢ Collaborate on projects by assigning tasks to others.
‚Ä¢ Prioritize your tasks with priority levels.
‚Ä¢ Track your progress with personalized productivity trends.
‚Ä¢ Integrate your tools like Gmail, Google Calendar, Slack, Amazon Alexa and more.

Available on any device, Todoist will quickly become your hub for getting work and life organized.

Why you‚Äôll love it on Android:
‚Ä¢ Stay organized from your phone, tablet and watch.
‚Ä¢ Drag the Plus Button anywhere to insert a new task.
‚Ä¢ Simply type details like "tomorrow at 4pm" and Todoist will recognize it all for you.
‚Ä¢ All the power from Android: lock screen widget, Quick Add tile, Assistant, and notifications.

Happy organizing!

‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢

Questions? Feedback? Visit get.todoist.help or reach out on Twitter @todoist.

*About Premium billing*:
If you choose to purchase Premium, payment will be charged to your Google Play account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. You can choose to be billed monthly or annually. You can turn off auto-renew in your Google Play settings any time after purchase.

recentChanges: üêõ You‚Äôll once again see a note at the bottom of your screen when you check something off in task view ‚Äî if there was a mistake, you can quickly undo it!
comments: It really lacks a calendar view or better integration with Google Calendar (e.g. sync more than one project, add colors to tasks in Google Calendar according to labels or projects, etc.). Otherwise it has been great, I'm really enjoying the app! Sub tasks should show their parent in "Next 7 Days" and "Today", this would be super powerful for splitting a task over several days, it would be a game changer for me!

The new widget does not allow me to open the app directly, like it could before. Updates should never remove features. Knocking my review down - rest of the app is still great. Edit: this feature has indeed been fixed, however I can't raise the score because what drove me here was another bug/update. It seems that my tasks/items aren't visible on the widget. I tried a restart and everything. You can still interact with them, but the widget is just a white blank canvas where tasks should be.

Been using for years, and it worked great until 1 day ago. Lists using widgets on Android all have white text on white background now... So obviously unusable. Must have been in an update as multiple Android users are experiencing the same in the last couple of days.

I bet it would work for someone who mainly needs a list, but personally I need alarms and reminders to keep me on track. I was looking for one when I found todoist that was advertised as having a reminder setting. I was disappointed to find out that the reminder function was a paid function, so I uninstalled the app. I bet it would work for someone else, but not for me

Just downloaded the latest update, to find everything on the widget completely clear. All my project lists gone ! Luckily it's all still within todoist but not on the widget. Still nothing after deleting and setting the widget back up. Looks like I'll have to use the icon again !

title: Any.do: To do list, Reminders, Planner & Calendar
description:
üèÜ Editor's Choice by Google

It's the #1 to-do list, reminders, planner & calendar app.
Over 30M people rely on Any.do to stay organized and get more done.

ü•á "A MUST HAVE APP" (Lifehacker, NYTimes, USA TODAY, WSJ).

Any.do is a  free to-do list, planner & calendar app for managing and organizing your daily tasks, to-do lists, notes, reminders, checklists, calendar events, grocery lists and more.

üìÖ Organize your tasks & to-do list

‚Ä¢ ADVANCED CALENDAR & DAILY PLANNER - Keep your to-do list and calendar events always at hand with our calendar widget. Any.do to-do list & planner support daily calendar view, 3-day Calendar view, Weekly calendar view & agenda view, with built-in reminders. Review and organize your calendar events and to do list side by side.

‚Ä¢ SYNCS SEAMLESSLY - Keeps all your to do list, tasks, reminders, notes, calendar & agenda always in sync so you‚Äôll never forget a thing. Sync your phone‚Äôs calendar, google calendar, Facebook events, outlook calendar or any other calendar so you don‚Äôt forget an important event.

‚Ä¢ SET REMINDERS - One time reminders, recurring reminders, Location reminders & voice reminders. NEW! Easily create tasks and get reminders in WhatsApp.

‚Ä¢ WORK TOGETHER - Share your to do list and assign tasks with your friends, family & colleagues from your task list to collaborate and get more done. 

---

ALL-IN-ONE PLANNER & CALENDAR APP FOR GETTING THINGS DONE
Create and set reminders with voice to your to do list. 
For better task management flow we added a calendar integration to keep your agenda always up to date. 
For better productivity, we added recurring reminders, location reminders, one-time reminder, sub-tasks, notes & file attachments. 
To keep your to do list up to date, we‚Äôve added a daily planner and focus mode.

INTEGRATIONS
Any.do To do list, Calendar, planner & Reminders Integrates with Google Calendar, Outlook, WhatsApp, Slack, Gmail, Google Tasks, Evernote, Trello, Wunderlist, Todoist, Zapier, Asana, Microsoft to-do, Salesforce, OneNote, Google Assistant, Amazon Alexa, Office 365, Exchange, Jira & More.

TO DO LIST, CALENDAR, PLANNER & REMINDERS MADE SIMPLE
Designed to keep you on top of your to do list, tasks and calendar events with no hassle. With intuitive drag and drop of tasks, swiping to mark to-do's as complete, and shaking your device to remove completed from your to do list - you can stay organized and enjoy every minute of it.

POWERFUL TO DO LIST TASK MANAGEMENT
Add a to do list item straight from your email / Gmail / Outlook inbox by forwarding do@Any.do. Attach files from your computer, Dropbox, or Google Drive to your to- tasks.

DAILY PLANNER & LIFE ORGANIZER
Any.do is a to do list, a calendar, an inbox, a notepad, a checklist, task list, a board for post its or sticky notes, a task & project management tool, a reminder app, a daily planner, a family organizer, an agenda, a bill planner and overall the simplest productivity tool you will ever have. 

SHARE LISTS, ASSIGN & ORGANIZE TASKS
To plan & organize projects has never been easier. Now you can share lists between family members, assign tasks to each other, chat and much more. Any.do will help you and the people around you stay in-sync and get reminders so that you can focus on what matters, knowing you had a productive day and crossed off your to do list.

GROCERY LIST & SHOPPING LIST
Any.do task list, calendar, agenda, reminders & planner is also great for shopping lists at the grocery store. Simply create a list on Any.do, share it with your loved ones and see them adding their shopping items in real-time.

‚Ä¢ ADVANCED CALENDAR & DAILY PLANNER - Keep your to-do list and calendar events always at hand with our calendar widget. Review and organize your calendar events and to do list side by side.

‚Ä¢ SYNCS SEAMLESSLY - Keeps all your to do list, tasks, reminders, notes, calendar & agenda always in sync so you‚Äôll never forget a thing. Sync your phone‚Äôs calendar, google calendar, Facebook events, outlook calendar or any other calendar so you don‚Äôt forget an important event.

‚Ä¢ SET REMINDERS - One time reminders, recurring reminders, Location reminders & voice reminders. NEW! Easily create tasks and get reminders in WhatsApp.

ALL-IN-ONE PLANNER & CALENDAR APP FOR GETTING THINGS DONE
Create and set reminders with voice to your to do list.

TO DO LIST, CALENDAR, PLANNER & REMINDERS MADE SIMPLE
Designed to keep you on top of your to do list, tasks and calendar events with no hassle. With intuitive drag and drop of tasks, swiping to mark to-do's as complete, and shaking your device to remove completed from your to do list - you can stay organized and enjoy every minute of it.

POWERFUL TO DO LIST TASK MANAGEMENT
Add a to do list item straight from your email / Gmail / Outlook inbox by forwarding do@Any.do. Attach files from your computer, Dropbox, or Google Drive to your to- tasks.

DAILY PLANNER & LIFE ORGANIZER
Any.do is a to do list, a calendar, an inbox, a notepad, a checklist, task list, a board for post its or sticky notes, a task & project management tool, a reminder app, a daily planner, a family organizer, an agenda, a bill planner and overall the simplest productivity tool you will ever have.

Any.do will help you and the people around you stay in-sync and get reminders so that you can focus on what matters, knowing you had a productive day and crossed off your to do list.

comments: I like the fact that I write down ALL my goals and things that i want to do and i can see all of them, then pick the ones that I want to work on today and the ones I want to work on tomorrow and so on. Also, organizing them into sections is a good feature as well. That way i feel i can see all my new years resolution and the steps that i must take to achieve them and drag and drop this step to do today and that step to do tomorrow.

Many errors, the app is good but sometimes with the recurrent task do not work when I use desktop app it do not sync well and I lose many task and this is unpleasant. Pay for this app with this errors is a bad idea. I do no feel secure with app I lose taks and time. I hope the app get better. And the plan my day would be good if add the tasks in someday

This still works pretty well, but I'm not a fan of the updated widget not listing tasks chronologically. Edit: Nevermind, the sort order can be changed through the app. Thanks to the dev who pointed this out to me. You and your app have been helpful :)

I love this app and use it in preference to my inbuilt calendars because it is so user-friendly and reminders really stand out. It does not seem to have any impact on my overall storage either - getting to be a problem for me. Really useful.

I've removed all my other planner/list/grocery/schedule apps. I used to have so many for different things, but this app has it all! And it's so sleek and simple! I absolutely love it! And I'm looking forward to a free dark theme in the future, it's all I miss!

title: Bloomberg: Market & Financial News
description:
Get comprehensive access to global business, stock market and finance news, and trending topics like bitcoin and cryptocurrency.

You can customize the app to monitor your personal portfolio and receive continuous alerts on global stock positions and summarized financial, economic, and corporate information that meets the needs of the global business and financial professional. 

Whether you need to monitor your stock portfolio or just want to discover breaking financial news, Bloomberg provides the news and analysis you require, whenever and wherever you need it. 

FEATURES:

- News: Featured and trending stories in Markets, Industries, Technology, Politics, Luxury, Personal Finance, Opinion and more. 

- Market Data: Latest market data on your customizable portfolio and personalized for your region including Equity Indexes, Futures, Bonds, Commodities & Currencies. 

- Watchlist: Easily track your portfolio by adding a security (stocks, mutual funds, ETFs, currencies, etc.) to your personal Watchlist(s).

- Video: Watch Bloomberg Television Live without the need of any Cable or Satellite subscription. Watch featured videos specifically chosen for top news categories.

- Audio: Listen to interviews and analysis from around the world by the smartest names in Global Finance, Business, Economics & Investment from our radio shows and podcasts.

More Features: 

Markets data in your region and a Watchlist summary with leaders and laggers. Introducing a bold, new look for Businessweek including issue downloading for offline reading.

Download the app now for accurate and concise finance news, stock market intelligence alerts and everything you need to know about currencies, commodities and futures‚Ä¶

A subscription to the Bloomberg app gets you unlimited access to all Bloomberg content within the app and on the website (after linking your account). You can start with a 30 days free trial and then a monthly subscription for $34.99/month.

Your payment will be charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. You may manage your subscription and auto-renew may be turned off by going to Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. 

Terms of Use: https://www.bloomberg.com/notices/tos
Privacy Policy: https://www.bloomberg.com/notices/privacy

Visit us at:

http://www.bloomberg.com

comments: Content great but app very clunky and slow, and loads of ads despite subscription. Main missing feature for me is ability to replay, pause & fast forward interviews. I watch it for an hour or two day, more some days. Ads feel like 30%, and I assume they are filling the time between interviews. Mostly I don't need to watch the interviews live; they should all be available to watch later, skipping the ads, or most of them. (They only have a repertoire of 4 or 5 ads, endlessly repeated)

The app will not get past the loading screen upon opening. It just continually loads and never opens. I read businessweek primarily on my phone and since the new app doesn't open it makes it pointless to have a subscription. Shame because content itself is great.

The app has no dark mode. Big No-No in today's day&age! The app has no video PIP - so I am stuck in it. They should take inspiration from YouTube's PIP allowing one to switch over to another app to read other news in app, or take notes in another app while watching the Live TV. The app's ads are a problem. It starts with 6-10 ads but it horrible because the button of 'Skip ads' has no effect. üòÇ The ads are repeated again if you had to leave app, go to another app and come back. üòÇ
I love watching Bloomberg in the mornings it helps me understand the market before I do my daily analysing also the app makes it easy to be on the move and still keep and eye out on critical news

Intelligent productive news experience Well sourced and a calm effective vocal experience with a neutral voice command ..made the news not only sound archaic but also progressive at the same time ..broad appeal .and yet I'm not a fan of apps in general .I'm not addicted to tech as much as most tech companies and apps for $ think the common occasional user ..I'm not addicted to updates but if I was ..I would be listening to your voice cast

title: OkCupid - The Online Dating App for Great Dates

Great dates come from great connections - that‚Äôs why OkCupid shows off who you are beyond a photo. Find love based on what makes you, well, you - because you deserve it.

recentChanges: - Some new design tweaks and speed improvements
comments: This app has gotten so much worse than before. $45 for 1 month of Basic? It was at least 3 times cheaper than that barely a few months ago? And you only get to match like 8 people before you have to wait 16 hours versus the like 30 something people you used to be able to match. I won't be using this app until it is back to normal.

I have been using this app for 5 years. I met most interesting people of my life here. But unfortunately lately it seems there is an active force to strip down OKCUPID from its beautiful and distinctive features. So the changes are often to make the application worse. Examples: sweep culture. Mixing all the questions which used to be separate groups. Now blending matches in so called "your turn, their turn"

Read the reviews. This app is a money pit. When you first register, you'd be barraged with so many LIKES that you start thinking it just might work. The next thing you know, you're subscribed. Suddenly there aren't any more LIKES and the only ones you get are from places you specified you didn't want. What gives? Their 'match' algorithm is definitely off too and it would seem a lot of people are inactive users. Bottom line, don't download. Not worth the time or money.

OKcupid used to be the best app to meet new people, for romance or friendship. However it regressed during the years into another boring swipe centred app. I used to be able to meet people which I had interests in common with, now you are locked into the 15 recommended profiles which you have to swipe if you want to get more, while before you could check out hundreds. Very disappointed in it. At least they should make the old layout available.

It's ok, but not as good as it use to be, because now you can't browse, it's all swiping which is not what humans should be doing. It's turning into Tinder! Some of the questions are idiotic and totally unnecessary. App has bugs, you have to keep closing and clearing Ram for it to work properly, and the preferences don't work at all. It shows me women not in my age range or even distance, so it's pointless using the app. I have now deleted as it's not worth the time.

comments: Just in the last 4 or 5 days it was great. But, suddenly it stopped working. I keep getting "unknown error try again." So, I tried un-installing only to see an update pending. Even after updating I am still getting the same errors. In addition, its not opening any links left in screen that i get news notifications...sorry I don't know the name of that particular screen. However, I would have given 5 stars! Fix the problem and I'll upgrade my 1-star rating.

Riddled with annoying ads especially the annoying Korean ad dubbed in English of the firefighter using an infrared camera. Very repetitive stories; news content very selective in coverage and is not changed rapidly enough. App indicates on its icon new news stories but when opened the user is not expedited to the new news stories; there is no personalization to filter out content that is less or not interesting to the user with focus on content of interest, not b.s.. CNN the channel is better.

The "cast" button keeps disappearing from my Android phone display. I can watch CNN or HLN on the phone but not cast to the TV. The button appeared once, I clicked it, but now all I see on my TV is the red CNN logo. Plus, what's up with the "two screens" display on the phone at the top? What is that for? So confusing.

I have this app for breaking news alerts, but in the past couple of days I've been getting "alerts" about interviews and other CNN content. In my settings, I ONLY have breaking news selected. If this keeps happening I'll have to find a new breaking news app

Not sure what's going on with the Android version of CNN. Videos don't work at times, links don't go to matching video from Home page on app. And when I open the app, it takes me back to the same article from weeks ago (even when I close the app, or all my app). I'm on a Note 10+ so not on an Android device. It worked bigger on my iPhone 7. Deleting and reading from there or on a browser. Bummer.

title: TSheets Time Tracker
description:
Manage time & log hours with ease! TSheets time tracker for work is a cloud-based time tracking and scheduling app for employees that allows them to clock in and out each work day from their smartphones. With TSheets as the work clock, employees can easily track work hours, create a work log and even track PTO - More than your usual time clock app.

ONLINE TIMESHEETS ‚è≤Ô∏è
 Time logging has never been easier - The TSheets time clock app allows you to replace paper timesheets with accurate, electronic time data and makes payroll and invoicing faster and more affordable. The TSheets time tracking app also accurately tracks time and GPS locations. So, why track work hours manually? Install this time clock app, calculate timesheets automatically and manage time for quick bookkeeping with the best time tracking software. 

SOPHISTICATED TIME RECORDING ‚è≤Ô∏è
Here are some features that make TSheets the best app for tracking work hours: use TSheets time clock features - clock in and out to track work hours, change job codes, edit digital timesheets, view time tracking reports and changes to the work schedule and even track PTO. Time recording is easy with this time tracker app.
‚Ä¢ Track time against multi-level job codes, projects, locations, clients, and more.
‚Ä¢ Track employee hours accurately with a real-time online time clock.
‚Ä¢ Easily switch between job codes, pause time tracking, or take a break.

MANAGE TIME ‚è≤Ô∏è
The TSheets time tracker makes time management a breeze for employers. Save, on average, 6% on gross payroll costs and save three hours per week managing employee time.
TRACK TIME: 
‚Ä¢ Edit, delete, or approve timesheets online to create a time log.
‚Ä¢ Track vacation time, sick time, and holiday time accruals for employees.
REPORT TIME:
‚Ä¢ View time tracker timer history with map.
‚Ä¢ Easily access a breakdown of employee hours by employee, job, customer, or location.
‚Ä¢ Get notifications if employees don‚Äôt clock in to a job or shift as scheduled or approach overtime limits.
‚Ä¢ See day and week totals at a glance.
‚Ä¢ Keep a black-box history of all timesheet edits and deletions, in case of an audit.

SCHEDULE ANYWHERE ‚è≤Ô∏è
The TSheets time tracker also features in-app employee scheduling that allows employers to manage a schedule anywhere and anytime. Features include: drag and drop shifts, assign jobs, and send alerts to managers if employees haven‚Äôt clocked in as scheduled.
‚Ä¢ Schedule builder: Schedule by job or by shift.
‚Ä¢ In-app work scheduling lets employees easily clock in and clock out of assigned jobs or shifts right from the schedule.
‚Ä¢ Notifications let employees know when a new work schedule is published or if a shift is changed.

SIGN UP ‚è≤Ô∏è
This time tracking and scheduling app requires a TSheets account. Sign up now on the app or at https://www.tsheets.com for a free trial with no credit card required. (Or if you have just 1 user, sign up for a free account!)

ALSO INCLUDED ‚è≤Ô∏è
‚Ä¢ Seamless integrations with QuickBooks Online and QuickBooks for PC (Pro, Premier, and Enterprise) for quick bookkeeping.
‚Ä¢ QuickBooks, Square, and Gusto integrations (and more!) to simplify your back office processes.
‚Ä¢ Sync your schedule with Apple iCal, Microsoft Outlook, or Google Calendar for seamless time management.
‚Ä¢ Integrations with popular payroll, accounting, invoicing software.
‚Ä¢ Powerful, real-time reports in multiple formats (PDF, CSV, online, HTML).
‚Ä¢ Safe data storage and detailed time logs protect you in the event of a labor dispute or audit.
‚Ä¢ Configurations for DCAA/DOL compliance.
‚Ä¢ Developer-open API.

SUPPORT, CUSTOMER RATED ‚≠ê ‚≠ê ‚≠ê ‚≠ê ‚≠ê
TSheets offers free unlimited phone, email, and chat support to all of our customers. Have a question? We‚Äôre happy to help! 

Customer Reviews: http://www.tsheets.com/reviews 
Phone: 888.836.2720
DIY Online Support: http://help.tsheets.com
Email: help@tsheets.com 
Webinars: Register for TSheets free, weekly webinars at https://www.tsheets.com/webinars

recentChanges: We squashed those pesky bugs that were causing the app to crash for some of you.
comments: Freezes up every time try to check week time clock and scroll through jobs. Makes checking in a pain in the a$$ Update... 3 updates in the few weeks and still bugs. I'm not able to balance out my crew because I cant check week totals. All these changes to this app are making me want to find a new program.

Ever since they updated with qb security, it takes way too long to log in. Why do I need a verification code EVERY TIME I log in! It's as bad as QuickBooks now. My bank doesn't require a verification code every single time and they are infinitely way more important than QuickBooks or Tsheets. You guys act like you need this much security. Qb is a terrible company. I hope I find another service soon so I can dump them.

After the Tsheets has joined with Intuit it has locked myself and most of my staff out. As we use it for payroll you can imagine the headache. Periodic downtimes, schedule duplication if you have it on separate devices, or making changes that simply disappear are all common issues. Not clocking out or back in or from job to job is an issue for the field as well. I and my office spend more time on this app than needed to. Use another service.

So far this app has been great. Only had it crash once, but once the update came in it was fixed. The only tiny issue i have now is when i clock in it delays a minute before clocking me in causing me to be a minute late. However i'm not entirely sure if that's the app or just my phone.

Horrible since Quickbooks bought the company. I have been a Tsheets user for 3 years. Before QB, it was wonderful and had immediate phone support. QB's made changes to login and have to generate a QB account and even then they email you a verification code every time you try and login. There is no longer any telephone support and have pushed everyone to online chat. My last chat experience took 38 minutes to get a hold of someone.

title: Weather Live
description:
Check the weather around you and all over the world at a glance.
Rely on the accurate weather forecast and adjust your schedule to the weather coming in. You won‚Äôt even have to look out the window as the app will bring current weather just inside your house! 

Weather is sometimes difficult to predict. This accurate weather app allows to find out a detailed 14 day weather forecast (7 in the free version) wherever you are, for any time of the day or for the next days just by tapping on the icons:
- Current and ‚ÄúFeels like‚Äù temperature
- Lightning tracker
- Wind speed and direction
- Pressure and precipitation weather information
- Sunrise/sunset time
- Weather Radar & Rain maps
- Visibility (weather conditions for driving)
- Weather alerts & current condition notifications
and other useful weather data accompanied by live animations and graphics.

Want to customize the way the weather is displayed? You can easily switch between detailed or compact layout to get weather information that is relevant for you. By the way, you can even rearrange weather blocks to spot first things first!

In addition, you can check the weather forecast even without opening the app. A visually appealing widget is easily integrated into your screen. You can set up the weather widget in any of the nine handy options. Choose a detailed full-size widget or keep your home screen as clean as possible with just the essential weather information.

Go Premium and get access to interactive weather maps for the whole duration of your plan. Moreover,, become a Premium user and enjoy ad-free weather on your device.

You can choose from different subscription options:
* A subscription with a free trial will automatically renew to a paid subscription unless you cancel the subscription before the end of the free trial period.
* Cancel a free trial or subscription anytime through your account settings on the Google Play Store and continue to enjoy the premium content until the end of the free-trial period or paid subscription!

Please note that some supplementary features & weather details in the basic (free) version are subject to limitations (ex. UV index, 14 day weather forecast, Sun and Moon, Lightning tracker, Visibility, Air Quality index etc.). These limitations are also subject to change.

By downloading this application, you agree to the Apalon Apps End User License Agreement and Privacy Policy.

A clear and simple live weather app will show you everything you need to know about the weather in any part of the world. Use the weather app to stay tuned with mother nature right on your device.

Enjoy the perfect balance of beautiful pixels and accurate weather forecast!

Privacy Policy: http://apalon.com/privacy_policy.html
California Privacy Notice: https://apalon.com/privacy_policy.html#h
EULA: http://www.apalon.com/terms_of_use.html
AdChoices: http://www.apalon.com/privacy_policy.html#4

comments: it WAS always accurate as far as forcast, current conditions, location, etc. However, for about the past month, it has been forcing a location that doesn't really exist. It has also had me in 3 different cities & states that i'm nowhere NEAR & this all happened within 15 mins while i was sitting in the same spot. I may have to delete this app because of this problem. Shame, i've used it for about 4 years & never had any issues. Always really liked it

Since the last update, I have to keep reloading the live wallpaper (which is the main function I was interested in). It just keeps crashing, whereas it used to work perfectly. What a shame. Now the app forces location permission (you used to be able to select the city you wanted the weather for) - if you don't provide permission the app is unusable because it keeps flashing the permission request on the screen and won't respond.

Constant. repititous, anoying alerts. mostly at midnight. through 3 am! App does not give historical temps, etc. Inaccuweather in the news paper and on tv don't give it either unless it sets a record. Since shuting off notifications during the night for ALL apps I am no longer bothered with annoying alerts. Still I would like to see historical data on the app. Going back just a week would be a huge improvement.

Inaccurate weather and the widget flakes out 2 or 3 times a day. This USED TO BE a great weather app, but I'm having to get my weather info from somewhere else. And the widget looked amazing on my home screen, but I don't like seeing the "thinking wheel" when there's supposed to be a live representation of the weather outside. Extremely disappointing to say the least.

Just because she's "pretty" won't necessarily mean she's "wife material": I wanted to love this app (esp. after being recommended by one of the premiere online Tech Review sites), but after only 1/2 day of being persistently bombarded with annoying in-your-face "nagware" for BASIC forcast information we can grab less painfully from any number of "generic" weather apps, I'm DELETING it from my device ~ which is a shame, bec. it does have a number of appealing features, just not enough to save it!

title: Babylon - Healthcheck, video appointments & more
description:
Babylon is a health app that gives you access to exclusive health tools like Healthcheck and Chatbot Symptom Checker.

And, if you use Babylon through your healthcare provider, you can even speak to a doctor or nurse practitioner through select health plans. 

----------------------------

Don‚Äôt have access through your health plan? You can still get access to our Chatbot symptom checker and Healthcheck for general health care tips and health information about your symptoms.

CHATBOT SYMPTOM CHECKER
Describe your symptoms the same way you would to a doctor or nurse practitioner, and the Chabot will ask questions related to your symptoms and health, so it can help you decide what to do next. 
It can recognize most issues that primary care providers tend to see. 

HEALTHCHECK
Healthcheck was created by doctors and scientists to help you understand your current and future health needs.

Here‚Äôs how it works: 
Answer questions about your lifestyle and family history to generate a wellness report and build a Digital Twin to explore your body from the inside out.
Get insights about your current health and risk factors for future conditions, along with recommendations for staying healthy long-term.

---------------

***COVID-19 CARE ASSISTANT***
Our free COVID-19 Care Assistant makes taking care of yourself and your loved ones easier. 

GET THE LATEST INFORMATION
Find continually updated information on coronavirus, such as how to self-isolate or how to help others dealing with the virus. 

USE OUR SYMPTOM CHECKER & LIVE CHAT
The Babylon symptom checker has the ability to recognize what might be COVID-19 symptoms and suggest possible next steps. Use the live chat feature to ask questions and receive answers from a member of our team, straight from your phone.

GET A CARE PLAN & TRACK YOUR SYMPTOMS
After you have received information about your symptoms, the COVID-19 Care Assistant will provide you with a Care Plan based on the latest guidance. Get daily notifications to track your symptoms, including your temperature, information for the 14-day isolation and general tips

SPEAK TO BABYLON
The COVID-19 Care Assistant allows you to have a video consultation with a clinician via your smartphone, possibly saving you a trip to the doctor. After you enter your symptoms into the symptom checker, it will indicate possible next steps. If you believe you need to speak to a healthcare professional, you can book a video consultation.

----------------------------------

If you have access to Babylon through your healthcare provider, you get access to our video appointments.

VIDEO APPOINTMENTS (for select health plans)
The healthcare providers available through the Babylon app can help care for allergies, congestion, cough, fever, flu, mental health, pain, rashes, upset stomach & more. 
They can also help with prescriptions, specialist referrals, labs, and behavioral health.
You can speak to a healthcare provider via the Babylon app at no cost through select health plans (see details below). 
Video appointments make it easier for you to get a consultation without having to leave the comfort of your own home.

New York Users: New York Telemedicine Associates, available through the Babylon app, are now part of Mount Sinai Health Partners. 
Members of the following health plans are eligible: Humana Medicare Advantage, Empire BlueCross BlueShield Commercial, Empire BlueCross BlueShield Medicare Advantage, Oscar Commercial, and Cigna Commercial. Enter the code NYC when registering. 

California Users: California Telemedicine Associates is available through the Babylon app through certain health plans. Please check with your health plan for the applicable code.

Missouri Users: Your health plan will notify you if Babylon‚Äôs telemedicine services are covered.

Questions about plan eligibility? Please contact the Babylon support team at 800-475-6168 or us-support@babylonhealth.com

---------------

www.babylonhealth.com/us
