We‚Äôve made some improvements! In our latest version, we‚Äôve:

- Launched a personalized care management service for eligible patients
- Improved health monitoring features such as tracking body measurements and personalizing preferences
- Fixed bugs and improved stability to enhance your overall experience

We‚Äôre always looking for ways to make our service even better, so if you have any feedback, please get in touch at us-support@babylonhealth.com
comments: I've already had one appointment and it was easy, fast and convenient. The doctor I seen was very friendly and listened to what I had to say. Appointments are scheduled very fast. No waiting a week to be seen. I was in within 15 minutes from the time I scheduled. Very happy with my experience.

The app doesn't work. I keep getting no appointments available for the entire month (checked oct 1 thru oct 31). I then called for the 2nd time requesting an appt in the evening and was told the latest appt was 1230... all advertisement says appt as late as 7 pm. Asked if I could book for Nov bc all late appts were already booked but they don't do appointments until last week of Oct for nov. Was previously told that for oct but when called all evening appts were booked. This company is a joke!
I love the Dr they chose for me and how easy it was to get appt. I was even able to get an appt at 620 pm!! after work.
I've had two consultations so far and they've exceeded my expectations. The app itself is intuitive and I've had no issues navigating it.
the support number was very helpful and my appointment with a provider was great, I definitely think it's worth calling support if you need to!

title: LinkedIn: Jobs, Business News & Social Networking
description:
LinkedIn has open jobs for every profession.

Find a career and stay up to date on the most relevant openings with the LinkedIn app, the most trusted network. Job search is easy with the most up-to-date job listings and business news, with millions of connections in every industry.

Grow your network with business contacts, stay up to date with companies, and follow thought leaders. Apply for jobs easily and get recommendations for jobs where we think you‚Äôll be a fit. LinkedIn is here to help you land your next job.

Job seeker looking for new employment? Business networking? Business news and industry buzz? Do that and more with the free LinkedIn app.

Filter through millions of openings and customized recommendations to find your perfect career. Safely apply for your perfect position with your resume or professional profile in a few taps, straight through the app. The LinkedIn job search app lets you build a profile highlighting your professional experience, so you can show your successes, skills and network.

Start business networking to keep in touch with connections and other professionals. Find a job hiring near you and use LinkedIn to ask your business contacts for referrals. Check online jobs, share posts and converse with fellow professionals to boost your odds of getting hired.

No matter where you're at or what you're looking for, LinkedIn makes job searching easy. Grow and connect with friends, colleagues, companies, industry experts and the rest of the LinkedIn community.

5 reasons why you‚Äôll love the LinkedIn app:

- Job search & recruiting: Find positions suited to your skills and apply
- Career finder: Research companies you‚Äôre interested and see if their open roles
- Business networking: Network, request referrals, and stay up to date on your contacts
- Business news: Get relevant news delivered to you via your Daily Rundown and write your own 
- Social network: Create your profile, keep an up to date resume online and highlight your skillset

Search jobs, develop business contacts, connect with recruiters, and apply for your next job LinkedIn helps you start and finish your job search!

LinkedIn App Features:

JOB SEARCH APP & CAREER FINDER
‚Ä¢ Find jobs now hiring & apply using your LinkedIn profile and/or resume
‚Ä¢ Apply for jobs for every type of profession ‚Äì salaried, hourly, part-time, remote and more
‚Ä¢ Find jobs through recruiters & find new contacts
‚Ä¢ Job alerts for any new openings you might be interested in
‚Ä¢ Set job alerts to get notified when new jobs from your followed companies are posted

BUSINESS NEWS
‚Ä¢ Share articles with the LinkedIn community & your business contacts
‚Ä¢ Business news from related industries to help you stay up to date
‚Ä¢ Write posts and connect with your community

BUSINESS NETWORKING
‚Ä¢ Network on the go; connect with new contacts and easily find industry experts
‚Ä¢ Follow companies, influencers and professionals
‚Ä¢ Social networking for businesses: showcase your company or product to find new opportunities

RESUME & PROFILE
‚Ä¢ Apply for jobs using your LinkedIn profile
‚Ä¢ Easily submit your resume for any job
‚Ä¢ Keep your LinkedIn profile up to date as a virtual resume highlighting your experience
‚Ä¢ Share accomplishments, job responsibilities and skills on your professional profile

SOCIAL NETWORKING
‚Ä¢ Connect to the largest social network of professionals from around the globe
‚Ä¢ Import contacts for a quick & easy way to grow your network

Find a job with job search tools, recruiters, industry experts and career opportunities at your fingertips. The LinkedIn app is a perfect way to network, apply to jobs and find new contacts - straight from your phone, wherever you are.

Want to make the most of LinkedIn? Upgrade to a Premium subscription for exclusive tools.

We ask for a few permissions when you use this app. Here‚Äôs why: http://linkd.in/1l0S8YZ

Filter through millions of openings and customized recommendations to find your perfect career. Safely apply for your perfect position with your resume or professional profile in a few taps, straight through the app. The LinkedIn job search app lets you build a profile highlighting your professional experience, so you can show your successes, skills and network.

Start business networking to keep in touch with connections and other professionals. Find a job hiring near you and use LinkedIn to ask your business contacts for referrals. Check online jobs, share posts and converse with fellow professionals to boost your odds of getting hired.

No matter where you're at or what you're looking for, LinkedIn makes job searching easy. Grow and connect with friends, colleagues, companies, industry experts and the rest of the LinkedIn community.

5 reasons why you‚Äôll love the LinkedIn app:

- Job search & recruiting: Find positions suited to your skills and apply
- Career finder: Research companies you‚Äôre interested and see if their open roles
- Business networking: Network, request referrals, and stay up to date on your contacts
- Business news: Get relevant news delivered to you via your Daily Rundown and write your own
- Social network: Create your profile, keep an up to date resume online and highlight your skillset

Search jobs, develop business contacts, connect with recruiters, and apply for your next job LinkedIn helps you start and finish your job search!

LinkedIn App Features:

JOB SEARCH APP & CAREER FINDER
‚Ä¢ Find jobs now hiring & apply using your LinkedIn profile and/or resume
‚Ä¢ Apply for jobs for every type of profession ‚Äì salaried, hourly, part-time, remote and more
‚Ä¢ Find jobs through recruiters & find new contacts
‚Ä¢ Job alerts for any new openings you might be interested in
‚Ä¢ Set job alerts to get notified when new jobs from your followed companies are posted

BUSINESS NEWS
‚Ä¢ Share articles with the LinkedIn community & your business contacts
‚Ä¢ Business news from related industries to help you stay up to date
‚Ä¢ Write posts and connect with your community

BUSINESS NETWORKING
‚Ä¢ Network on the go; connect with new contacts and easily find industry experts
‚Ä¢ Follow companies, influencers and professionals
‚Ä¢ Social networking for businesses: showcase your company or product to find new opportunities

RESUME & PROFILE
‚Ä¢ Apply for jobs using your LinkedIn profile
‚Ä¢ Easily submit your resume for any job
‚Ä¢ Keep your LinkedIn profile up to date as a virtual resume highlighting your experience
‚Ä¢ Share accomplishments, job responsibilities and skills on your professional profile

SOCIAL NETWORKING
‚Ä¢ Connect to the largest social network of professionals from around the globe
‚Ä¢ Import contacts for a quick & easy way to grow your network

Find a job with job search tools, recruiters, industry experts and career opportunities at your fingertips. The LinkedIn app is a perfect way to network, apply to jobs and find new contacts - straight from your phone, wherever you are.

Want to make the most of LinkedIn? Upgrade to a Premium subscription for exclusive tools.

We ask for a few permissions when you use this app. Here‚Äôs why: http://linkd.in/1l0S8YZ
summary: Job search & business news, directly through the most trusted network, LinkedIn.
recentChanges: Thanks for using LinkedIn! We regularly update our app to fix bugs, improve performance and add new features to help you connect with your professional network and advance your career.
comments: My experience has been awful. After the 1 month free premium trial I tried to cancel my subscription it would not let me. Day 6 of trying to get a refund, countless hours spent on the 'live chat' feature which kicks you off every 3 minutes. Emailed them with link below. Haven't heard anything yet. This is incredibky disappointing and shows that I cannot support this company with my money as it seems impossible to speak to someone or get an issue resolved. Utterly disappointing customer service.

For a professional tool, there are way too many bugs. For instance, when someone sends us a connection request, we can't click to see their picture. It simply doesn't open. Same thing happens with replying to their message. Unless we accept the connection, go back and enter into the person's profile properly, many features don't work. Sometimes the app needs to be restarted in order for it to start working again. A month after this review still no info from the developers team... Disappointing.

I really like LinkedIn app but I guess your app is couple of steps behind your website. Watching live events on the app is just like being tortured! Comments cover the screen in landscape mode, and if you want to turn it back to portrait mode, the screen becomes too small that makes it impossible to read a single word! Would you please fix it ASAP?

The app is useless for the last few days. I'm following a highly active community on LinkedIn. But same posts from 3-4 days back is always there on top of my feed. No matter how much I refresh the feed, new posts won't appear. I tried everything from clearing cache to reinstalling the app. The feed is like my profile now. There are posts I've liked and commented. Even if there are no new activities on the post by my connection, it's still there.

It will be nice if you were able to edit a conversation piece that you accidentally sent that had mistakes, and that you wanted to correct or unsend. Example if you were sending date each text message (case in point this a speech to text) and there a lot of errors in it. Then you accidentally send it. You can't unsend it. It should be a way to fix an error after it's been sent or unsend something.

title: Fasting App - Fasting Tracker & Intermittent Fast
description:
Fasting Tracker will guide you to a new lifestyle with healthy habits. You‚Äôll lose weight effectively and feel more active! No diet and no yo-yo effect.

IS IT EFFECTIVE?
It‚Äôs proven that intermittent fasting leads to fast weight loss. During fasting, as your glycogen depletes, your body switches to ketosis, which is referred to as the body's "fat-burning" mode. This is an effective way to burn fat.

IS IT SAFE?
Yes. It‚Äôs the most natural and safe way to lose weight. Studies show that eating all the time makes your body unable to take a break from digesting, which can result in health problems, such as diabetes. When you fast, you just take a break from eating, it takes some of the load off your liver.

CAN I USE FASTING TRACKER?
With various fasting plans, fasting tracker is suitable for beginner and experienced, men and women. It guides you through your plan. No need to change your diet, you can easily stick to it. If you are under 18 years old, pregnant or breastfeeding, have health issues or are underweight, please ask your doctor for advice before fasting.

WHY INTERMITTENT FASTING?
‚àö Burn your body fat reserves
‚àö Start the process of regeneration and detox during fasting
‚àö Slow down the aging process
‚àö Benefit for controlling blood sugar
‚àö Reduce inflammation
‚àö Prevent numerous diseases, such as heart diseases and diabetes
‚àö Boost your growth hormone and increase metabolism
‚àö Make you feel healthier and more active
‚àö Improve your body and brain function
‚àö The most natural way to lose weight and keep fit
‚àö Lose weight without diet and exercise

FEATURES OF FASTING TRACKER
‚àö Various intermittent fasting plans
‚àö For both beginner and experienced
‚àö One tap to start/end
‚àö Customize fasting plan
‚àö Adjust fasting/eating period
‚àö Set notifications for fasting
‚àö Smart fasting tracker
‚àö Fasting timer
‚àö Track your weight
‚àö Check fasting status
‚àö Science-based tips and articles about fasting
‚àö No need to count calories intake
‚àö Losing weight has become so easy
‚àö Sync data with Google Fit

SCIENTIFICALLY PROVEN INTERMITTENT FASTING

Effectively Lose Weight
Your body switches into fat burning mode. You‚Äôll burn body fat reserves and prevent food you eat from being stored as fat.

Natural and Healthy
When fasting, your body will actively burn fat, get into detox mode and start the process of regeneration.

Detox
Your body reduces inflammation. Cells break down viruses, bacteria and damaged components.

Prevent Diseases
Studies show that fasting can prevent numerous diseases, such as heart diseases, diabetes and cancer.

Cell Repair and Regenerate
Cells remove unnecessary or dysfunctional components. Damaged cells will be replaced with stronger ones.

Against Aging
Your body initiates autophagy, a process of detoxification, repair and regeneration. This has benefits against aging.

Control Blood Sugar
Fasting helps you become more sensitive to insulin. It‚Äôs beneficial for controlling blood sugar.

Increase Metabolism
During fasting, your growth hormone goes up, and your metabolism will be increased.

recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Bug fixed
comments: Been using it for a little over a month or so. I have such difficulty sticking with fasting, but this app has really helped keep me accountable, plus it's simple and there's not a ton of ads or "extra features" in your face. The overlay timer is a great constant reminder, and I like the water reminders. Only improvement I'd want is an option for the timer to be counting down and not up.

Just started using this app yesterday, but I really like it so far! Best feature I've found is that you can totally customize the amount of water you're drinking. There are so many different sizes nowadays that the ability to adjust the number of ounces makes a big difference. I also love that it tells you what's happening at each stage of fasting throughout the day!

This was the second fasting app I installed, and the one I've stuck with. It's convenient, easy to track, and has most of the features I'm looking for. Previously I gave 5 stars because it seemed to be missing actual start and stop times in the history. But the feature is there, I just missed it. User interface could be improved to make that more obvious. It's a great app and works offline too. This is likely the fasting tracker I will stick with.

I really like the app, it's exactly what I was looking for. It says pay 2.99 for ad removal, but honestly I haven't experienced any ads, besides a very rare one up top. My only complaint would be the subscription, I would pay for it if it was a one time purchase, but I'm not interested in getting a subscription to an app, sorry! 5 stars anyway because the free material does it's job.

I like this app and I appreciate it. Just I have paid $2.99 for ads-removed from the app but the app still shows the ads and ask me to pay again for removing Ads!! I have already sent an email to the developer but I didn't get the response! I'm waiting for your reply as soon as possible. I appreciate your help and support. (UPDATE) I solved this issue by reinstalling the app. Thank you.

title: Clumsy Ninja
description:
Meet Clumsy Ninja, the most hapless ninja ever to grace a touchscreen!

Train him, throw him, tickle him, and even tie balloons to him. Everything you do will make Clumsy Ninja more skillful, and help him find his missing friend, Kira.

Clumsy Ninja is the next generation of interactive characters! He can sense, feel, move, and react uniquely every time. Prepare to be amazed‚Ä¶oh, and please take good care of him!

BELT UP
Train your ninja to learn new tricks and super-special Ninja Moves! Impress his sensei and earn new Ninja Belts on your way to find Kira, or just have fun with over 70 unique interactive items, including trampolines, punch bags, ball guns, a chicken, and‚Ä¶ a squirrel!

ADVENTURE TIME
You and your ninja will travel to new locations, play new games, meet new characters, complete quests, and unlock fun new items to play with. How many will you discover?

CUSTOMIZE
Customize Clumsy Ninja‚Äôs suits, belts, and headbands to match your style. Take photos of your ninja‚Äôs craziest stunts. Keep your eyes peeled: there are many surprises waiting for you!

UNFORGETTABLE MOMENTS
Clumsy Ninja is a living virtual friend who thinks and acts with real intelligence - and a lot of clumsiness! You‚Äôll experience unique moments with your ninja and his companions every time you play!

FIRST ON TOUCH DEVICES!
Clumsy Ninja is the first game on touch devices to ever use the EUPHORIA simulation technology ‚Äì producing the most believable character you've ever seen.

Requires Android OS 2.3 or later. 

PLEASE NOTE! Clumsy Ninja is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money.
To prevent unauthorised purchases, select ‚ÄúSet or Change PIN‚Äù from the Google Play settings menu, create a PIN, then enable the ‚ÄúUse PIN for Purchases‚Äù option. You will then be required to enter your PIN before every transaction.

Requires Android OS 3.x and above

Clumsy Ninja is published by NaturalMotion Games Ltd

recentChanges:
This update includes:
‚Ä¢ Bug fixes and improvements
comments: A great, funny game, I have decided to revisit it after several years, but why is it so much harder to make the ninja stand on top of a tower or a crate than before? It gets annoying when he keeps on tripping himself for 5 minutes and can't stand straight. I have tried a lot of ways(Throw him/Gently place him, etc) sometimes it just comes to luck if he can stand or not, please fix this, thank you.

Honestly, this game was going so well for me personally till the controls and that started messing up bad. When you try and put your ninja on one of the towers you jump off, he wont stay there. He would stand there then walk off it without you telling him to walk somewhere. The camera with it is bad as well. If you try and put the ninja on the tower to jump onto a crate, the camera will move forward and make him stand on that instead, which is rather annoying.

Hi Clumsy Ninja Team. I love this game a lot but as many people's are facing this problem that progress doesn't save. Today I open it and played it I am on Level 29 and going to level 30 but when i opend it again then it get me back to level 1 please fix this issue. I have gain many progress coins all of other stuff please give my Progress back. I didn't expect this as i love this game and today this happened with me. Please Clumsy Ninja Team Fix It.üôèüôè

Love this game, played when I was little. Keep trying to improve the game. Anyone can enjoy even if they are 60 (lol). nothing else to say, but great game, I can see why its called clumsy ninja I've never seen a ninja this funny and clumsy. AMAZING!

The title of this game describes it perfectly. Be prepared for frustrating controls as the ninja flails and falls alot. It doesn't help that it can take quite a few seconds to recover his footing, even longer if he gets stuck in items as he rolls over. Get to the beams and it becomes much worse. Problematic depth detection and a small space to place the ninja resulted in over 5mins just to complete a beam session. Not recommended game unless you have a lot of patience and tolerance for failures.

comments: Very confusing. Every time I try to login I have to change my password. Takes me forever to accomplish anything with ATT. I uninstalled this app, could not get it to let me in. Wanted a wireless number that I do not have. All I want to do is pay my bills. I go through some kind of B.S. every month. Between being on the phone and using the simple AT&T app I have been at this for well over an hour, and still have not paid my bill. Ridiculous!

Update: Originally I could never pay my bill with the app. I always had to call in and explain the difficulties each time. The last 2 or 3 payments have been made so smoothly I would have to say this is now one of the better apps I use. Thanks for fixing all of the issues I have noticed. Original post: This app is absolutely junk. I have so much difficulty with paying my bill each and every month. It just sits there spinning gaining no traction.

I don't really know how good this works. It seems to be working a little bit better now, but it is still having problems remembering my USER ID AND PASSWORD. OH Well, I really hope that is just temporary. On one page it thinks it's 1 thing and on another page it thinks they are something else. For the third time, THIS APP OFFICIALLY STILL WON'T LET ME SIGN IN!üò†üò†üò°üò§ OTHER than that I guess it's ok.

Its been 2 months that me and my wife switched from Verizon to ATT, and yet have been able to get login into an online account. We have spent many hours trying to get this resolved with att and nobody seems to know how to fix the issue, still to this day nothing has been done. The customer service is very unprofessional, and possibly undertrained. I've never had such issues with Verizon and Verizon service is always top notch. Will be back with Verizon after our two years are up.

This app is garbage. You would think AT&T would be sure the app was functioning properly so people could spend money with them, open new accounts, etc., But instead this app literally never works right. It always crashes. It's just garbage. Which reflects AT&T well because none of their stuff ever works. Their service is garbage. And their CUSTOMER SERVICE is even worse. This is so sub par. Verizon is far superior in every way. Unfortunately I live in the woods and AT&T is only one that works

title: Zillow: Find Houses for Sale & Apartments for Rent
description:
Take control of your next move with the Zillow app. Our best-in-class features help you unlock life‚Äôs next chapter by getting into a home you love. 

BUY A HOME ‚Äì Find your place with immersive photos, virtual tours, and the most listings, including things you won‚Äôt find anywhere else.

SELL A HOME ‚Äì Whether you sell directly to Zillow with Zillow Offers‚Ñ¢ or take a traditional approach, we‚Äôll help you navigate the path to a successful sale.

RENT A HOME ‚Äì From shopping on the largest rental network to automating applications, we‚Äôve created a seamless online experience for renters.

The Zillow app gives you resources and tools you won‚Äôt find anywhere else, so you can shop smarter for your next home:

‚Ä¢ The most listings and constant updates so you never miss out¬π
‚Ä¢ 3D Home Tours so you can picture yourself in a home and narrow down which houses to visit in person 
‚Ä¢ Self Tour for Zillow-owned homes, with no appointment and no pressure. Stop by when it‚Äôs convenient and unlock the door with the app
‚Ä¢ Zestimate¬Æ, the industry-leading independent home valuation tool, calculated daily
‚Ä¢ Robust filters for school districts, views, pricing, pets, HOAs, and more
‚Ä¢ Easier co-shopping: Tag your favorite home features and share your favorites to coordinate your search with a partner or roommate
‚Ä¢ Push notifications to let you know when houses come to market, have a sale pending, or drop in price 
‚Ä¢ Neighborhood details including restaurants, grocery stores, parks, and coffee shops
‚Ä¢ Easy access to Zillow Premier Agents, local real estate experts who meet Zillow‚Äôs bar for quality customer service
‚Ä¢ All the pricing and details you need to compare homes & apartments for rent 
‚Ä¢ A personal renter profile so you can visit a house rental and engage directly with potential landlords and property managers who rent homes

1. Most listing based on direct site comparisons

recentChanges: We are always working hard to improve our apps. This is a small update to fix a few bugs. Please continue to send your feedback to androidfeedback@zillow.com. We appreciate it.
comments: Its ok. Its best for home window shopping. If you're seriously looking, it's less convenient. It assumes how much you're going to put down and what interest rate you've been approved for. There's no way to set those things so it gives you a more accurate idea of what you're paying each month. Plus, in my area theres a lot of 55+ communities and theres no way to filter those out, which is irritating.

I like this app, overall, but would really love to have the ability to hide or dismiss a property from my search, if it's not one that meets my needs. I like that I can save homes, but when searching later, homes keep popping up that I would rather not look at again! Also, if there is a way to get HOA/Space rent to be mandatory when there is one for the property, that would be great. I've looked at many that stated there was none, but that wasn't true. Thanks!

Zillow gave the option to turn off cookies, but did not bother to mention that it will erase all of your data when you do this. I went ahead and typed everything in once again, and it erased it AGAIN. Also, you can't add photos, videos, or tours with any Android phone -only i0s I want to know what kind of incentive apple is giving developers to leave these flaws in their designs..

I use this app almost daily, it keeps me up to date on homes that I am very interested in. We will be buying or building in the next 5 months, we are looking forward to building or buying our dream home. I love Zillow, I have found it to be more up to date than a Real Estate office. I highly recommend Zillow. Thank you, carolintallahassee

While the interface is the best I've seen out of all the other real estate options, the information is not accurate or up to date. If you try to get information from the listing agent on the app, a third party starts messaging you and sending your information to unrelated agents. I simply messaged asking about an open house and some random dude was trying to get me a new buyer's agent even though I already have one.

comments: Completely unusable app, none of the pages load, I can't change anything about my account, I can't even view anything about my account, it has been this way for at least 3 years and across three different phones so it's not just an issue with my phone or something temporary. I'm not sure how this app got any five-star reviews not going to lie. if anyone is able to use this app and it's helpful to them in any way, I would love to know your secret.

This app is sooo buggy and nothing has changed for the 3 years I've been a customer! Can't update any profile information ever, it's so annoying. One way or another something is going to glitch out and you won't be able to finish your task or it won't recognize it or won't load the page or whatever. Wish I could just delete it off my phone...

I am satisfied with my service there are no hidden fees or added charges each month. My bill is consistent and that is what I wanted, other networks raised my monthly bill without communicating with me and it caused a financial hardship for me. The T- mobile app is user friendly and easy to navigate. I am very happy with my T-Mobile network service and I would recommend T-Mobile to my friends and family over any other network out on the market today.

I love the T-Mobile app. When I put my new SIM card in my phone, it was not activated yet and I could not make phone calls, but I was able to use the T-Mobile app to live chat with a representative who activated my SIM card for me. Thanks T-mobile! There are also many other things that you can do using the app including lots of information about your account.

Any other app would get 3-4 stars, but T-Mpbil4 has excellent standards and Ledger exclusive customer experiences across almost the entire board except with this app. In one word, this app is CLUNKY. Processes move slow, 2-step verification can close the app out, any smoothness you have is totally lost w/ pop up or split screen and navigation feels like traversing the wreckage of a 4-app collision. Note 10+ 5G this is not hardware issue. 1 star only to bring it to yalls attentjon

title: Yahoo Mail ‚Äì Organized Email
description:
Thanks for checking out the Yahoo Mail app‚Äîthe best email app to organize your Gmail, Microsoft Outlook, AOL, AT&T and Yahoo mailboxes. Whether you need a clutter-free mailbox, added customization, different views for deals, receipts, and attachments, or even more storage, we‚Äôve got you covered. 

Favorite features:

Use any email address
Don‚Äôt make your other inboxes jelly. Add your Gmail, Outlook or AOL account and keep everything in one place. Custom settings, colors and notifications make it a breeze to keep your accounts separate.

Unsubscribe
Go forth and unsubscribe from the spam and junk mail you don‚Äôt want to see in your inbox. Yahoo Mail shows all the mailing lists you're subscribed to on one screen and makes it easy to opt-out in one tap.

Today view
Rain or shine, you‚Äôre one tap away from what‚Äôs happening. Find weather and news highlights right from your email app.

 Attachments view	
Looking for that one doc from that one person? Or, a photo from brunch three Sundays ago? Don‚Äôt panic, It‚Äôs right here. See all of your photos and files attachments in one easy view.

Customization
Your inbox, your vibe. Customize the bottom nav bar with the folders and views you care about most. Then, pick custom sounds, themes, swipes to add your own flavor and unboring your inbox. 

Travel view
Travel stress-free. This view keeps all of your flight information in one organized spot. Smart Updates, from gate changes to delays and cancellations, will instantly appear in the app, so once you check in‚Äîyou can check waaaaaay out.

Deals view
Expires today? Challenge accepted. See the deals from your inbox in one quick view or enable location permissions to see a map of deals near you and get notified in real-time as you walk into your favorite stores.

Groceries view
Win at groceries, every time. Add your grocery store loyalty cards to save coupons that will automatically get applied at checkout. 

People view
Only see emails from your favorite people. Ignore the robots.

Receipts view
No more crumpled receipts in your pocket. Find them neatly organized in your inbox. 

Sounds + notifications
Choose from several categories of notifications, custom sound alerts and visual settings‚Äîso, you get the reminders you need. And none you don‚Äôt.  

Accessibility
Features high contrast themes, dynamic text resizing, and optimized for use with VoiceOver screen readers. Plus, folders at the bottom of the Inbox allow assistive technology users to navigate with less effort.

1000 GB storage
You can‚Äôt see your whole world without room to roam. Download the app and you‚Äôll never have to delete memories to get your mail again.

Yahoo Mail Pro
Get ad-free mail on Yahoo Mail for Android and priority customer support.

+	Available as an in-app purchase at $0.99/month or $9.99/year
+	Subscription will auto-renew each month or year within 24 hours of your renewal date
+	Manage or cancel your subscription via Account Settings

Terms of service: https://policies.yahoo.com/us/en/yahoo/terms/product-atos/comms-mailadfree/index.htm

Privacy policy: https://policies.yahoo.com/us/en/yahoo/privacy/products/mail/index.htm

https://policies.yahoo.com/us/en/yahoo/terms/product-atos/comms-mailadfree/index.htm and privacy policy at https://policies.yahoo.com/us/en/yahoo/privacy/products/mail/index.htm

Please note: This app features Nielsen‚Äôs proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen‚Äôs TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information. You may also visit Settings in the app to opt-out of Nielsen measurement.

developerAddress: 701 First Avenue, Sunnyvale, CA 94089-0703, U.S.A
recentChanges:
This latest release includes a brand new Videos tab where you can:
‚Ä¢ Watch live local and primetime NFL games for free on your phone all season long
‚Ä¢ Access other sports video content on demand when there are no live games scheduled including highlights, predictions, recaps, and more
comments: I hate that ads are automatically placed at the top of my email every time I open the app. Then, when Im scrolling down through my emails, there is this wierd break in the list to show me yet another advertisement in the background. Also, deleting large amounts of email is tedious and takes forever. Half the time, it crashes before deleting anything. That being said, apart from the advertising forced on me, the app looks good and I like that I can change to color of the bar at the top.

This app is harder to use after I updated. The files no longer display a constant subfolder. I have to select from the main folder every time. Also, it takes longer to move from one folder to another. It still has the issue of not allowing me to move a subfolder, so I have to create a new subfolder, move contents from one to another, then delete the old one. The improvements have not improved it. I am a bit sorry I updated.

Really bummed after recent updates. Before, when you wanted to move a number of emails to the same folder and opened up the folders list, it displayed the folder you were using. Now, whenever you open the folders list, you're at the beginning of the list and the first folder. So each time you have to repeatedly scroll to the proper folder. I also don't like the links to similar emails that appear at the top of each email. You have to scroll down to see the email message. Put em at the bottom.

What's happened with this app? It constantly freezes up. I have to keep closing and opening it in an attempt to read my mail. I've used this app for a long time with no problems but lately it is just a horrible experience. I am using a Samsung S2 tablet. I've had similar problems on my S9 phone. My Internet is fine. I have no issues with anything else. What's up?

Nothing but problems since having to reload app on the 20th of October. Been a loyal subscriber for 20 years, but will change if improvement isnt seen in the next day or so. App is taking forever to update and replicate on Samsung S2 Tablet. Never had this issue on the 'old' application. The S20 phone doesn't seem to have a problem other than continually trying to load. It's is not a network or wifi issue.

title: SmartNews: Local Breaking News
description:
SmartNews is the award-winning news app downloaded by 40+ million readers in 100+ countries!

SmartNews analyzes millions of articles every day to deliver the top trending news stories influencing the world right now.

SmartNews delivers high-quality news headlines and breaking news from top news publishers: NBC News, MSNBC, USA Today, TIME, The Huffington Post, Bleacher Report, Quartz, The Verge, VICE, VOX, AP, Reuters, Buzzfeed, Fast Company and more.

***

‚ÄúBrowse headlines quickly, customize your channels and read the news offline. SmartNews is an excellent free alternative to other popular news apps.‚Äù 
- CNET

***

Breaking News --
Notifications for breaking news headlines.

Smart Mode -- 
Readability mode for optimal news reading experience.

Offline News Reading -- 
Fetch trending news and read it offline.

***

Awarded Best News App:
- Best App of the Year, 2013 (Japan) - Google

summary: Breaking local news and weather forecasts from your neighborhood.
recentChanges:
- Find out when it will start raining straight from your home screen! New Rain Radar & Weather Forecast widgets are now available. (iOS14 required)
- New channels include Good Morning America, Health Digest, Blinkist and many more.
comments: From 5 star app to 1 star, way to go.... When I started using this app it was great. Over time it got more and more bloated, plastered with ads and no longer being able to select the sources. I think this last update is the straw that breaks the camel's back. I do not like the new look at all. I have used this app since it came out but I'm off to find greener pastures, the app has lost everything that made it stand out from any other news portal.

Keeps going downhill. This used to be the best news app out there. Now all the forced adds you can't close until timer runs down, make it almost unusable. You already mix adds in with articles then force MORE ADDS on top of that..RIDICULOUS! Suggestion you wanted: Don't add a timers to adds. That just pisses people off. Don't act like this is an acceptable alternative to a subscription fee. Good luck trying to charge one to view other news source's articles.

Love this app. Absolutely hate the new format of the top news tab.Originally I took off just 2 stars, but it just bugs.me so much I hate it. Wish they would put it back the way it was or have the option. ******EDIT****** Rating from 1 to 5 stars. the top news tab had changed so that pictures for each story were large and I could only have 1 headline on screen at a time.So I had to scroll a lot just to scim through.They have put it back to they way it was before! Mostly. Ads are big but thats OK

The ads are minimal (make your money, booboo) But I originally downloaded the app because I thought it cast a wide net of views, but it feels like its just giving me more of what I regularly click on. Still, I get enough to feel tired of the world, which is really all I want from a news app anyway. Good job, persons.

Seems to be excellent... Since my original review, some of the news options come out of left field (crazy). Also when reviewing articles, nonsense symbols show up in the body of text, sometimes making it unreadable. e.g. "eadquarters√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢√¢‚Ç¨≈ìTrump Store,√¢‚Ç¨ÔøΩ" So, lose a star on the rating scale.

title: Verizon Messages
description:
Stay connected using Verizon Messages sync features for your Smartphone, tablet, and computer. Keep the conversation going even when you‚Äôre switching between devices. Connect with family, friends, teammates, and more through personalized group chats, texts, photos, videos and gift cards worth up to $100 at stores like Starbucks, Dominos, and more. Now anyone can download and chat with Verizon Messages, even non Verizon customers (available on compatible devices).

GROUP CHATS ‚Äì Create larger group chats with up to 250 people. Send and receive photos/videos in seconds. Personalize your chat experience with avatars, backgrounds and more. You can even mute a conversation or add or remove members or without creating a new group.
YELP INTEGRATION ‚Äì Tap the plus menu and easily access Yelp from within the app. Search for restaurants, entertainment and directions. Make plans and share the details all within your chat.
SHARE YOUR LOCATION ‚Äì Glympse‚Ñ¢ lets you share your location with the people you choose for the length of time you set. Perfect for meeting up, or letting people know you‚Äôre running late.
SEND AN eGIFT ‚Äì Tap the plus menu and select eGifts icon. Easily send an eGift card right through text message. eGifting has been expanded to include eGift cards from more than 30 brands
SYNC ACROSS DEVICES ‚Äì Download Verizon Messages on all your devices, and sync messages across your smartphone, tablet and computer. Switch devices whenever you want. Make calls with your tablet anywhere.
DRIVING MODE ‚Äì Turn on driving mode to send an Auto-Reply message and disable incoming message notifications so you don‚Äôt get distracted on the road.
HD VOICE CALLING ‚Äì Eligibility rules apply. Link your phone number to the Verizon Messages app on your tablet and make and receive calls wherever they want on any network (cellular or Wi-Fi).

Other features:
# Schedule messages to be delivered at a specific date/time, even if your phone is turned off.
# Search the web for images and gifs to include in your chat with Yahoo search.
# Express yourself through colorful Emoji‚Äôs by tapping on highlighted keywords when composing messages.
# Send and receive messages over Wi-Fi from your smartphone, iOS device, tablet, PC, MAC, and web browser.

Need Help? Visit our Support Pages at
http://support.verizonwireless.com/clc/features/data_services/verizon-messages.html
View the complete Terms & Conditions at:
https://www.verizonwireless.com/support/verizon-messages-legal/
View the Verizon Messages privacy policy at:
https://www.verizon.com/about/privacy/verizon-messages-app-privacy-policy

developerAddress: One Verizon Way, Basking Ridge, New Jersey
comments: On 9/14 /2020 my phone stopped sending and receiving picture, audio, video, and group texts. The other line on my account did the same thing. Same time. We have done the software and app updates and it still isnt working. Edit: It's now 10/29/2020. It has been 6 weeks and we still can't send or receive any media. This is ridiculous. I've reported it several times and no one seems to care to fix it.

The app was great until my last update. Now it doesn't alert me with a sound or a number to indicate how many messages I have, when I get a notification. I went into setting to make sure my permission is on, & it is. I have to tap on the icon & open it to see if I have any messages. I'm missing, important information & meetings if I don't keep looking!

Latest version is NOT as good as previous. When I upgraded phone to Galaxy s20, I expected the app to work better;thinking the software was not updating on an older model. Looking at other reviews, the new version of the app seems to be the issue. Since this is a new phone, I am stuck with non working version Auto Reply and scheduling features are now missing and not functioning over multiple devices. I preferred this app because it also worked with other service providers. No longer the case.

Recently switched to a new phone and I am not getting txt messaging unless I open the app. I have gone through all the settings and uninstalled/reinstalled the app but still no fix. I have reported the bug several time. Apparently, a lot more people are having the same issue of not getting txt messages on time unless app is open. Please fix this issue.

The app is great. Have used it for years, but just got a new phone and it uses the phones default notification sound when new texts come in. The only way to change it is to customize it in each text. You used to be able to change the notification sound in the main customization and all texts would come in with the sound you selected. That option is still there, but doesn't work anymore. I like different sounds for texts, emails, and regular notifications.

title: Fresh To Home - Order Chicken, Raw Seafood & Meat
description:
With the FreshToHome mobile app, you are only one click away from getting Amazingly Fresh Fish - free of any added chemicals, Antibiotic residue free Chicken, Safe to eat Fruits & Vegetables, Naturally raised Mutton, Duck and other meats, No-Preservative added Marinades and ready to cook products, Halal-cut and delivered fresh to your home in the UAE or India.

FreshToHome is now the regions largest e-commerce venture in the fresh chemical-free fish and meat vertical. For fish, we buy only from country boats and small trawlers that return within 24 hours from the sea to ensure you get the most fresh seafood possible. We use the latest sustainable aquaponics based farming techniques for Fresh Water Fish and Veggies.  We contract farm Anti-biotic Residue free chicken and also source responsibly for our mutton and other meats. We own a large fleet of refrigerated trucks and other cold chain infrastructure and can confidently tell you where our fish or meat is coming from. You can rest assured that our products are extremely safe for you and your family. 

We deliver at customer‚Äôs doorstep through our own specialized logistics team. Both Cash on Delivery and Online Payments are supported on FreshToHome app. We have thousands of happy customers in Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Sharjah, rest of UAE, Bangalore, Delhi, Chennai, Mumbai, Pune, Hyderabad, Cochin, Trivandrum, Calicut and Thrissur.

recentChanges: Improved experience and bug fixes
comments: Thank you so much team! Bcs I searched a lot for home delivery of such products but most of them didn't meet my expectations. Some may be having problems with delivering to this particular location but coming to this app, it changed everything. It was quite difficult to be calm for not having fish for more than 3-4 months; even if I went to market I couldn't find the ones which we use to have! This app provides at least few from our list. The delivery is also good; no complaints! Best Wishes ‚ù§Ô∏è

Good App, No Technical issues, and Excellent delivery. But the packing could be made mess free. After multiple instances of leaking package, I've stopped ordering. Very very careless packaging. Most of the time the seal breaks and water(smelly) leaks out.

On time delivery and good quality of ordered items. Reasonable price compared to other apps. Lots of love Fresh to home ‚ù§ Only one suggestion is, try to make it available of 90 min delivery for all items!! Because sometimes customers look for particular item but no option of 90 min delivery which makes them to turn to another app!! All the best team üëç

Since no 4.5 rated it 4. Prompt in delivery and good quality. I did not use the app for long time due to negative reports about the App. For placing order it works very well. Yes offers like ADCB it doesnot work. Value for money for sure.. Dont compare it with deals and offers apps. The products are quality based. Certain quality products r slightly high. . 100% Value for Money. I have been buying for last 2 months. I use it almost daily basis. Worth trying it. Cut meats r excellent.

Really good and user friendly app. It's a good app and it has More than 500+ varieties of groceries and milk and dairy products to choose from. and also it has Customizable subscription. i love the most is NO delivery charges and NO minimum order value. Feels great to share this experience :)and delivered a order before 7:30

title: Microsoft To Do: List, Task & Reminder
description:
Microsoft To Do is a task management app to help you stay organized and manage your day-to-day. You can use Microsoft To Do to make shopping lists or task lists, take notes, record collections, plan an event, or set reminders to increase your productivity and focus on what matters to you. Microsoft To Do makes it easy to stay organized and manage your life.

Accomplish what's meaningful and important to you each day with My Day and Suggestions, your personalized daily planner tools. Intelligent suggestions recommend tasks from across your lists that may be relevant for the day. From grocery lists to housecleaning routines, daily tasks are simple with To Do. When you're quickly switching between contexts and tasks, it's important to have tools that help you achieve what matters. Microsoft To Do helps you quickly capture and retrieve your lists and tasks across devices and between multiple accounts.

Capture tasks from different Microsoft apps and services and sync them with Microsoft To Do. Flag emails as tasks in Outlook or any email account hosted by Microsoft, add to lists with Cortana, and see tasks assigned to you from Microsoft Planner. Get peace of mind knowing that your tasks and lists are hosted on the Microsoft 365 service ‚Äì one of the most reliable services with industry-leading security offerings.

Microsoft To Do‚Äôs modern, easy-to-use experience makes your lists unique, with customizable features like emoji in lists, colorful themes, dark mode, and more. Plus, shared lists help you stay connected and collaborate with family, friends, and colleagues.
 
Microsoft To Do features:

Daily planner
‚Ä¢ A daily planner personalized with suggested tasks: My Day
‚Ä¢ To do lists are accessible anywhere, on any device
‚Ä¢ Share lists and assign tasks with your friends, family, colleagues, and classmates
‚Ä¢ Task management features break your tasks into manageable steps
‚Ä¢ Take notes to add to any task
‚Ä¢ Group lists together by topic or project

Task manager
‚Ä¢ Add reminders, tasks and lists with the To Do widget
‚Ä¢ Daily organizer personalized with bold and colorful backgrounds
‚Ä¢ Reminders with one-time or recurring due dates
‚Ä¢ Make task lists and switch between school, work, and personal lists 
‚Ä¢ Attach up to 25 MB of files to any task

To Do lists for any purpose
‚Ä¢ Bill planner
‚Ä¢ Shopping list
‚Ä¢ Reminders
‚Ä¢ Task management
‚Ä¢ Take notes
‚Ä¢ And more

Office 365 integration
‚Ä¢ Sync reminders and task lists between Outlook and To Do
‚Ä¢ Lists and tasks are hosted with the security of Microsoft 365
‚Ä¢ Task lists are compiled from the apps and services across Microsoft 365
‚Ä¢ Add multiple Microsoft accounts 

Microsoft To Do helps you organize and simplify your plans, whether it's for work, school, or home.

To Do is free and available across the web and iOS, Mac, Android, and Windows devices.
 
Learn more: https://to-do.microsoft.com
Follow us on Twitter: @MicrosoftToDo
Have an idea or feature suggestion? https://todo.uservoice.com/
Need support? https://todosupport.helpshift.com/
By installing Microsoft To Do, you agree to the Microsoft Terms of Use: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=842575

summary: Increase productivity! Make a daily to do list, create a reminder & share notes!
developerAddress: One Microsoft Way
recentChanges: In this release we have made fixes to improve Sync in To Do.
comments: Love the app but have a few suggestions to make it even better. Have scheduled todo items show up on the Outlook calendar app; This would be awesome!! Have an option to hide certain lists from "my day". I have some lists I use as filler projects when there's free time and I don't want them taking priority over other necessary items I haven't scheduled yet. Thank you for a great app thus far!

For me, the best app for organizing your life. But some things should be improved though: 1. You can't set Monday as the first day of the week. 2. Having some of your notes appear both in Planned and Tasks and some in Planned but not in Tasks is bewildering. Besides Planned and Tasks there are two more lists - My Day and Important. Why so many overlapping lists? 3. You can't change fixed time for reminder alarm. For example, "tomorrow" is always at 9 a.m. You can't change that to, say, 10 a.m. 4. You can't set quick alarm. For example you can't type some note and then tap "remind me in half an hour" or in 15 minutes, in two hours etc. There's no such option. 5. You can't insert a photo or voice recording into your reminders. 6. You can't protect your reminders and notes with a password. Anyone can read them.

Redudant and limiting. There should be a way to share specific lists, but keep some private-a "Honey-Do"list; to be able to schedule minders for the 3rd level items and further break down tasks; to be able to reorder 3rd level sending completed to bottom; to be able to prioritize which list I want at the top and if I don't use Important, Planned, Tasks, then I want to move it down and pin what I want on top; to be able to set custom alarms, not notifications, for very important things...

Used to take the place of Wunderlist. Actually liking it much better. It would be helpful to see who created the task, who edited it and when. Also being able to add comments others would notice was an addition, or ask questions on it that would alert the creator there was a comment/question, would be super helpful. Other than that, very satisfied.

Granted, I just downloaded the app, but I have yet to find anything useful about it. Copy/pasting in and then reorganizing a basic task list took me about a half hour (seriously? No drag and drop?) and I haven't been able to figure out how to share a task list with someone else. If I can't share the task list, why is there an "assigned to me" toggle? Instructions on the MS website seem to be referencing a completely different version than the one I have. Utterly useless and frustrating.

title: Zello PTT Walkie Talkie
description:
Turn your phone or tablet into a walkie talkie with this lightning fast free PTT (Push-To-Talk) radio app. Talk to your contacts privately or join public channels to engage in a hot debate. 

Zello features:

‚Ä¢ Real-time streaming, high-quality voice
‚Ä¢ Contacts availability and text status
‚Ä¢ Public and private channels for up to 6000 users
‚Ä¢ Option to map hardware PTT (Push-To-Talk) button
‚Ä¢ Bluetooth headset support (selected phones)
‚Ä¢ Voice history
‚Ä¢ Call alert
‚Ä¢ Images
‚Ä¢ Push notifications
‚Ä¢ Works over WiFi, 2G, 3G, or 4G mobile data

Zello uses proprietary low-latency push-to-talk protocol and is not interoperable with Voxer, Sprint Direct Connect or AT&T Enhanced PTT. Zello Android client supports free public service, ZelloWork cloud service, and private Zello Enterprise Server.
 
We are working hard to improve the app so please expect frequent updates. If you have questions or issues send us an email at support@zello.com

‚ñ∫ Visit our website https://zello.com/ to get Zello Walkie Talkie for your PC or different platform
‚ñ∫ Connect with other Zello users on Facebook: https://facebook.com/ZelloMe
‚ñ∫ Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/zello

developerAddress: 1717 W 6th Suite 450, Austin TX, 78703
recentChanges: In this update we introduced notifications for new conversations and fixed several small issues.
comments: One of the best Moble Walkie Talkies every used. Mic clicks are some of the best ever used. You guys are doing great keep up the good work, can't wait for future updates.

Was my favorite app for months, but: Problems in standby/offline mode: - In group chat you don't receive notification any more. Moreover, the chat is not saved for you, so it's lost if you are offline for a while. - Notification are displayed after two messages are received from someone. You need to send "Hello" twice. I'm using it with my friends. I thought it can not be any better.
Keeps disconnecting even tho we are sitting infront of our router and high wifi signal. But stll app drops? 4 star. Fix the dropp issue and I give it 5*.

Does not work offline as advertised. At least through social media. The person that told me about this app said that it could work like a true walkie talkie. But it needs internet or towers. Which defeats the purpose of using it like a walkie talkie. Maybe one day we will get an app that doesn't need internet, bluetooth, wifi or towers. But it's not today, and not with this app. For what it's worth, with towers, internet and bluetooth it's an excellent app truly.

Use to be good. I think with there paid version now the free one is not even back burner worthy to them. Good luck with customer support. Last couple if uodates now make a bluetooth mic useless and no way to fix it nor will they respond on how to. Update Over a month and still no response to inquery as to why zello is messed up when usinh a bluetoothe device. Have 2 different units and it does same on both which means a zello issue. But i am not a buisiness class user so it doesnt matter to them

comments: The app is good, I can communicate with other fans and my idols but the main problem is notifications üò∂I don't know when my idol post something or comment on someone's post. Normally everyone gets notifications but I don't at all. Secondly the translation; it's very bad. It misinterprets what people post a lot like all the time. So I don't know exactly what they said and I don't understand üòê cause of the translator. Please fix these issues üôÇ

This app is really good. It's a great source to communicate with our favorite idols and our idols can also share their moments with us. I will give this app 5 stars but the problem is translation . The translations are weird. Sometimes it makes zero sense. Which is a problem for the international fans as most of them don't speak Korean. So, in my humble opinion they should work a little more to update the translation system.

Sadly this app keeps getting worse by the day. I cannot comment on anything. Nothing will translate because the servers are always busy. I continually get an network connection error, even though I am practically sitting next to my modem. I am also having issues watching items I have purchased without receiving an error message and the video will not play. These are just some of the many issues myself and others are dealing with. Please fix this.

Perfect app for BTS followers! A platform which connects BTS and army together. It allows you to interact with your idols as well as other fans. The only problem I face is of the translator. Some translations get wrong and changes the entire meaning. Apart from the translator, this app is amazing. Let the tie get more stronger with weverse.

I really like this app. There's one feature that I'd like it to have and that is, an option to delete selective notifications. For example, if I post something then I would obviously like to know who cheered or commented on my post. But after sometime, it becomes irrelevant. So I'd want to be able to select the notifs that I don't want and delete them. This way, I can get rid of the unwanted notifs and can keep in updated with the artist posts and their new comeback announcements etc.

title: T-Mobile Scam Shield
description:
Scam Shield protects every customer with T-Mobile's advanced scam-blocking technologies‚Äîfor FREE. And with our Scam Shield app, you can easily manage your anti-scam features. Plus, everything is saved on our network, so your settings will stay, even if you remove the app or get a new phone.



Features included with the T-Mobile Scam Shield app:
‚Ä¢	Scam Block: helps keep all likely scammers off your phone entirely, so you can answer more confidently.
‚Ä¢	Scam Reporting: identifies suspicious callers or fraudsters and helps prevent their calls from being received by you‚Äîor others‚Äîin the future.
‚Ä¢	Caller ID: reduces unidentified calls by displaying a caller's information, even if they're not in your contact list.
‚Ä¢	Scam Counter: shows you the number of likely scam calls blocked and kept off your phone when Scam Block is turned on, and the number received when it's turned off.
‚Ä¢	Mark Your Favorites: ensures that calls from important numbers always come through‚Äîeven if they've been labeled as Scam Likely.



Upgrade to Scam Shield Premium to enjoy even more call protection features. 

T-Mobile Scam Shield Premium features:

‚Ä¢	Manage your block list and send calls to voicemail.
‚Ä¢	Send categorized call types to voicemail.
‚Ä¢	Get information with reverse number lookup.
‚Ä¢	Get voicemails texted to you automatically.*
And more!

*Requires additional activation via My T-Mobile or app download.

https://www.t-mobile.com/customers/scam-shield-app

recentChanges: Authentication/Login improvements and minor copy changes.
comments: Was working great but I didn't realize it was blocking phone calls from doctor's office, and similar places. No option to program it not to block those numbers so I have to turn the blocking off. Also everything prompts you to go premium...I thought the last uncarrier move said this would be free? Now it just feels like a additional ploy to get money out of us...sneaky.

It's been a long time coming for this app and finally its here Thank you T-mobile I no longer have to go through phone call after phone call. I would get more phone calls from scammers more than my own personal calls on a daily I never wanted to answer my phone cause I just knew it was probably a scam of some sort I can't explain how annoying that is. So thank you so very much T-mobile....

**Response to developer: Scam block is already turned on, it just doesn't work very well. Make the app better instead of blaming your customers please.** Doesn't block very many calls, but has blocked calls from contacts. That can be fixed by adding them to favorites, but it's still annoying. I liked it better when the TMobile system would say "scam likely" which seems to have been discontinued after this app launched. It sounds good but doesn't work very well.

Useless, reroutes spam callers to voicemail. Basic app notifications are locked behind paywall. Just download Google Phone cause unlike this it's free, it works, and you can mark callers as spam from the phone app immediately, unlike this where you wait hours . App has a problem where voicemail calls and unknown numbers call don't appear, so you cannot mark them as spam. The entirety of this should be free for all T-Mobile customers. Better yet opensoure it, so people can fix it.

At first this worked great. I wasn't getting any calls that ever said scam likely. Until the last few weeks I have been receiving four or five calls a day from a number that has the same area code and prefix as my number. I block the number, just to get another call from the same area code and prefix. Of course I don't answer. I block, they change the last four digits in their number and call again within 10 minutes.

title: Word Cookies!¬Æ
description:
üç™ Here come some tasty Word Cookies hot out of the oven! Take a bite! üç™ 
Word Cookies is an addictive cross between all the word games you love! With so many exciting challenges, you'll soon be obsessed with testing your spelling and vocabulary limits to make as many words as you can!

HOW TO PLAY
‚Ä¢ Swipe the alphabet cookies on the baking pan to spell words.
‚Ä¢ Fill up Jack's cookie jar with extra words you find to earn coins!

SPECIAL FEATURES
‚Ä¢ LOTS OF LEVELS: We are always adding more levels to the 2000+ we already have!
‚Ä¢ KEEPS YOUR BRAIN ACTIVE: Highly entertaining & educational for everyone!
‚Ä¢ DAILY REWARDS: Play everyday to earn bonus rewards!
‚Ä¢ HINTS AVAILABLE: Shuffle the letters to spark your memory, or use hints to get clues!
‚Ä¢ NO TIME LIMITS: Take your time and go at your own pace!
‚Ä¢ FREE TO PLAY: The word puzzles are all free, but you can pay for extra hints or to remove ads.
‚Ä¢ SUPPORTED ON VARIOUS DEVICES: Enjoy on smartphone or tablet!

comments: Great game. Very suspicious when routinely you get to the third level of tournament play and tend to always lose by approximately 200 points. This is especially if you are not choosing to watch the videos. Another concern is the daily wheel- and this is not just an issue I noticed- you never get more than 20 coins no matter what. How many sections are there on the wheel? 8, 10? odds would make it so you would land on each piece every 8 to 10 days.you wouldn't go a year without getting over 20

This is not a bad word game. But I wonder why I have never ever on the wheel spun and stopped on the 50 coins?!!!! ALWAYS the SMALL ones.....5, 10, 1 or whatever that very small one is!! I've been playing long enough to have at least once or twice stopped on something LARGE!! And pls don't tell me it's according to how I spin. Is there something you can do re this? Thank you.... Barbara Felton

The game is very addictive and fun to play. I love how it gives you so many things to do so you never get bored! For example: There's quests, special events, league, levels and daily levels. But what's unique about this ios game is that their's barely any ads! Overall, I think this game is very fun and I recommend you install it if you have'nt already.

We have played the game for years, and do enjoy the challenges. Sometimes you have words that no one in normal life would recognize, but that's where good ol' phonics comes in. But why, recently, have you changed the daily spin rewards to only 10 or 15 coins ( with a rare hint or a 20)? I've seen others comment on this, and a promise to look into it, but it doesn't seem to be getting back to the old way.

I love the game BUT lately it stalls when ads pop-up and they will not go away eventho I allow them to play out. I have uninstalled several times and reinstalled to no avail. Most of the ads are USELESS to me as I am retired, will not be starting a business and/or cannot use a RX card because I have Medicare Advantage insurance. Very irritating! 10/29/2020 UPDATE: New tablet and can now play the game with no problems. Highly recommend.

title: Wordscapes
description:
üíïPlaying Wordscapes 10 mins a day sharpens your mind and prepares you for your daily life and challenges! üíï

This text twist of a word game is tremendous brain challenging fun. Enjoy modern word puzzles with the best of word searching, anagrams, and crosswords! Immerse yourself into the beautiful scenery backgrounds to relax and ease your mind.

Challenge yourself to connect letters and find as many hidden words as you can! Unlock stunning landscape backgrounds to escape from home and relax your brain.

You‚Äôll never experience a dull moment after you try this addicting word puzzle game! Play this crossword puzzle once and just you won‚Äôt be able to put it down. Enjoy word connect and word find games? This is your final destination!

‚ñ∫Escape and relax your brain by visiting the beautiful destinations of Wordscapes!
‚ñ∫ Show your vocabulary power by connecting letters and finding all the hidden words.

The top-rated word game, from the makers of Word Stacks, Word Chums, Word Flowers, Word Mocha, Wordscapes Uncrossed, and Spell Blitz.

comments: Fun game, but the tournaments and the teams ruin the whole thing. In order to place high in the tournaments, you have to spend practically entire weekends on the game because of the poor tournament design. It's also impossible to find an active team, but nobody will join a brand new team. The game should hide inactive teams. If the leader hasn't been on in a while, the team should no longer show up. The tournaments should be unique puzzles, not just how fast you can run through levels.

I love this game. However last week it started crashing every time I tried to open it. There were no updates available and I tried restarting my phone and nothing worked. I uninstalled and reinstalled the app because I didn't know what else to try and it works BUT I'M BACK AT LEVEL ONE!!! I have been playing this for years and was at level 1600 something!! Is there any way to restore at least some of the progress I had made??

Was a great game that I'd play every night to pass the time. Then suddenly the game would hang and freeze for no reason. So I uninstalled and installed the app again, only to discover that not only does it continue to hang and freeze, but now I lost all of my coins and helpers. I contacted support through the app a few days ago and still no response from them. Very frustrating.

The game is good. Only problem is that every other game, you get bombarded with adverts. Now I could let this slip by, if the adverts featured weren't the banned ads of Gardenscapes and Fishdom! While every other game has removed those ads, you've left them in. They were banned for a very specific reason, and that is false advertisement, which is a breach of the false advertising standards. When the ads are removed, I will consider upping my rating.

My longest played game. The visuals are soothing, and not too many ads to distract from the play. Mostly you play against yourself, then occasionally you get a tournament if you are feeling competitive. Very few repeated games, and I've played tons of them. The best thing about the game is the soothing photos though. Ty

title: OfferUp: Buy. Sell. Letgo. Mobile marketplace
description:
Buy. Sell. Letgo. - OfferUp and Letgo are now one big mobile marketplace.

Buy, sell and shop deals on thousands of unique items nearby! So whether you want to make some extra money by selling your used furniture or want to do some clothes shopping the choice is yours with OfferUp. 

OfferUp makes it easy to find great deals on the things you want and make money on the things you want to sell. Ditch the Classified Ads and garage sales -- this is the best way to buy and sell in your community or neighborhood with a mobile marketplace you can trust.

Cars, clothes, shoes, vintage fashion, and more! Here‚Äôs how shopping and selling with OfferUp works:

‚Ä¢ Buy or sell anything; easily offer up your items for sale in 30 seconds.
‚Ä¢ Find great deals and discounts on clothes, shoes, furniture, vintage fashion, cell phones, electronics, baby & kids items, sports equipment, used cars, home goods and more.
‚Ä¢ Use reputation features like ratings and profiles to see who you‚Äôre dealing with and build trust.
‚Ä¢ Shop local items for sale with thousands of new postings daily.
‚Ä¢ Message buyers and sellers securely from within the app.
‚Ä¢ Build your reputation with your unique seller profile page.
‚Ä¢ Browse and shop items by image and sort by category or location.
‚Ä¢ Join millions of people using OfferUp across the country.
‚Ä¢ Skip the garage sale! OfferUp is the simplest way to buy and sell locally.

Fun facts about shopping and selling with OfferUp:

1. With OfferUp you can easily sell anything like clothes and shoes, used cars, electronics, vintage fashion, and furniture.
2. OfferUp shows you what‚Äôs selling nearby in your local community.
3. Communication between buyers & sellers happens through the app via secure messaging.
4. OfferUp is better than a garage sale; you can do your shopping right on your phone or tablet.

Be part of the community:

We‚Äôre making local shopping and selling an experience that everyone can try and trust. The community at the heart of our marketplace is what makes that possible. When you join OfferUp, you‚Äôre joining millions of people helping each other make money and save money around the nation -- and right in the neighborhood.

From shoes to cars, vintage fashion to furniture - unearth unique items that you can‚Äôt find anywhere else with OfferUp. Download OfferUp today and enjoy the mobile marketplace with plenty of hidden gems just waiting to be discovered.

The two leading mobile marketplaces in the U.S., OfferUp and Letgo, are joining forces to create a new powerhouse. OfferUp acquired Letgo on July 1, 2020.

comments: This app seems to be littered with dozens, if not, hundreds of ads that have been up for, in some cases, over 2 years. I sent one a message asking if it was available, and didn't receive a reply. After seeing that the ad was still posted, I also noticed that it was posted 2 years ago. I saw a few other listings that had the same story. I liked how LetGo didn't leave listings over a couple months old without asking the lister if it was still relevant.

This app is far less usable than Letgo was. The second I click on one thing to see what it is, I am immediately bombarded with listings of similar items from ebay. If I wanted to look on ebay, I would use that app. Don't assume I need to see 20 of that item. Prices aren't listed in the browse page so I have to click to find them. And when something sells, it doesn't disappear. It just stays with the other listings and says "Sold". I dont need to see all the things I cannot buy.

Over 70% of the messages you will get will be fraudulent scams (they are quite obvious, but it's annoying to deal with). There is not much support for when you have issues with the app and I kept getting my posts removed for items being "intangible", which was not true, had photos and descriptions of actual items and there was nothing I could do about it, so it just became pointless and frustrating to use. Stick with FB marketplace or CL or other platforms

Titles, descriptions, and prices of items are not shown in search results, leading me to click a bunch of images only to see that the item is not what I want or out of my price range. PLEASE add titles and prices to search results page. Also the gallery of pictures that are not in any order or in one grid make it confusing to look through listings. I don't get what the intent is... To have me looking through the app forever and never finding what I am looking to buy???? Please fix the UX.

The app already sucked, but now it's worse. Why would you combine 2 apps and not take the good from the other app? To many old listings, nothing expires. Messaging is a joke, you're better off talking to the wall. An speaking of messages, how can I sell something if I dont get notified? To many times I've had to open the app just to see multiple messages, days old, and the buyer long gone, thanks offer up. I remember when this app came out, that was its prime, now it's just garbage.

title: Microsoft Outlook: Organize Your Email & Calendar
description:
Easily organize with email, calendar, and files in one app with Microsoft Outlook. With intelligent email, calendar reminders and contacts, Outlook for Android lets you do more from one powerful inbox. Connect. Organize. Get things done.

Email friends, family and colleagues from multiple accounts on one app and see what matters most first with the Focused Inbox that keeps the important messages on top. Switch between your emails and calendar to schedule your next meeting or share your availability with anyone with just a few taps. Email a document from your Files list or a photo from your Gallery and attach it easily.

Microsoft Outlook provides seamless inbox management that enables you to stay connected on the go. Outlook includes Office, Word, Excel, PowerPoint and OneDrive integrations to help you manage and send files and connects with Teams, Zoom and other video calling providers without hassle.

Customize email and calendars so you can stay on top of your busy day. Listen to what‚Äôs new in your inbox, organize  schedules and more. Find what you need with Search- it‚Äôs only a tap away or you can use your voice and ask for what you need with language you use every day.

Outlook for Android works with Microsoft Exchange, Microsoft 365, Outlook.com, Gmail and Yahoo Mail.

 MICROSOFT OUTLOOK FEATURES:

 One Place ‚Äì Email, Calendar, Contacts & Files
‚Ä¢ Email, calendar, contacts and files are all together in one place.
‚Ä¢ Calendar and file access right from your inbox.
‚Ä¢ Connected experiences with Office, Word, Excel, PowerPoint and OneNote.
‚Ä¢ Microsoft Office documents are accessible from Outlook, stored locally, or on OneDrive or other cloud storage.
‚Ä¢ Create and join your online video calls and meetings with Teams, Zoom, BlueJeans and Webex.

Organized ‚Äì Email & Day Planner Management
‚Ä¢ Outlook helps you stay on top of your day with customized calendar and email capabilities.
‚Ä¢ Know what‚Äôs Up Next in your day from your calendar with a glance at your inbox.
‚Ä¢ Email inbox management displays your most important messages first and enables swipe gestures and smart filters.
‚Ä¢ Use as an organizer & share calendars to easily coordinate schedules.
‚Ä¢ RSVP to invitations from your inbox and send a personalized comment too.
‚Ä¢ Add schedules from Facebook or of your favorite sports & TV shows through Bing calendars.

Intelligent ‚Äì Calendar & Inbox Organizer
‚Ä¢ Outlook provides helpful ways for you to stay focused.
‚Ä¢ Use your voice to find people, contacts, emails, events and attachments with Search.
‚Ä¢ Use suggested replies instead of typing out your message responses to get things done faster.
‚Ä¢ Email manager highlights actions for you through @mentions.
‚Ä¢ Calendar automatically updates with travel and delivery information.
‚Ä¢ Focused Inbox keeps important emails and conversations front and center.
‚Ä¢ Email organizer groups same subject emails and conversations for easier tracking.
‚Ä¢ Listen to your emails with Play My Emails in English and catch up hands-free to get time back in your day.

Secure ‚Äì Safe Email Management & Spam Protection
‚Ä¢ Microsoft Outlook protects your information with security you can trust.
‚Ä¢ Simple, secure sign-on to authenticate and protect your identity.
‚Ä¢ Email management with built-in protection against viruses and spam.
‚Ä¢ Advanced protection to keep your messages safe from phishing attacks and other online threats.
‚Ä¢ Microsoft security and privacy keeps your email, calendar, contacts and files safe.

Get management for contacts, email, work schedule, files and more with Microsoft Outlook today.
