developerAddress: One Microsoft Way
recentChanges: Sick of that company-wide email that everyone is still replying all to? So are we. Stay focused on what's important by getting it and all future replies out of your inbox and straight into deleted items with our new Ignore Conversation feature.
comments: Love Outlook! Always have! I've used other formats & platforms over the years, when working at someone else's house or office, or using equipment not my own, but nothing has ever come close to matching the complete package that is Outlook. It's extremely user friendly & even the tech-challenged can usually sort their way through pretty much any function, with relative ease. I have always used Outlook & at 55 years old, don't imagine I'll be changing anytime soon.

I use this for work. There is often an extremely long delay between getting a notification for an email and actually being able to view it. The email will be instantly available in Outlook online, but can take up to 5 minutes to load in mobile. The app sends notifications for meetings 15 minutes in advance, but clearing the notification in any way just results in the app resending the notification. Oh, it does the same thing with "meeting has ended" notifications. Atrocious app design.

On my old Samsung phone I had the outlook app and NEVER had problems with it. I have had a new phone for 2 weeks and this app has had endless problems. It freezes, it doesn't load emails, it won't send emails and every variation in between. I have followed online suggestions to clear the cache and data and yes the problem is solved for no more than 1 day. I have also uninstalled and reinstalled the app and again the problem is solved for a day and then back to having the same issues. Woeful!

Whilst I love the features of Ms Outlook, the app has pitfalls. I will receive a notification of a new email, click to review said email and it will be no where to be found. Refresh, refresh, nothing! However, if I go on the desktop web version I will see everything as it is to date. ... This app defeats the purpose of having a mobile service if I always have to draw for my laptop to review emails.

This version of Outlook (mobile, Android) seems appropriately scaled down to suit small screen and "keyboard" use and appears to have been optimised for email. Most (or maybe all?) of its original functionality is there, but some features might need a bit of hunting, until you learn how to find them. . Great to be able to use full strength email via phone, with that robust corporate look & feel that Outlook is known for.

title: LINE: Free Calls & Messages
description:
LINE reshapes communication around the globe, allowing you to enjoy not only messaging but also free voice and video calls wherever you find yourself. 

Download LINE and discover the reasons for its global popularity and number one ranking in 52 countries.

LINE's latest features

‚òÖ Intimate conversations or large round tables can happen anywhere with group video calls
Chat with up to 200 friends in your group simultaneously! Enjoy face to face video chats with friends as well!

‚òÖ Use polls to quickly see what your friends think
From where to meet to what to eat, avoid lengthy discussions and make decisions easily by creating a poll.

LINE's main features

‚òÖ Free voice and video calls anywhere, anytime 
Enjoy great quality calls at no charge, no matter where you are. Even international calls with up to 200 people at the same time are completely free! Use effects and filters for even more fun during video calls. (Note that this feature may not be available on certain devices.)

‚òÖ Convenient chats where anything is possible 
Share messages, photos, videos, stickers, voice messages, and locations easily with friends. 

‚òÖ Fun and easy-to-use social networking features 
From messages and photos to videos and locations, share your daily moments with friends on Timeline! 

‚òÖ Find the world's most popular characters at the Sticker Shop 
Browse hundreds of popular free stickers plus adorable stickers of the world's favorite characters! Choose from a variety of LINE sticker sets to liven up your messages in your own unique way. 

‚òÖ Auto-sync your device and PC 
Whether on the go with the mobile version or connected to the desktop version using your PC or Mac, your LINE chats are always up-to-date and synced automatically across all versions. 

‚òÖ Your own personal storage space: Keep 
Store messages, photos, videos, and more in Keep where you can easily share them with friends.  

‚òÖ  Stay informed with LINE official accounts
Connect directly with your favorite celebrities and companies by friending their official accounts.

‚òÖ Get connected to new apps
LINE provides a gateway to entertainment and lifestyle apps that will keep you entertained and bring new convenience to your life.

‚òÖ Make international calls with LINE Out
Place international calls to mobile phones and landlines at low rates. You can even call friends who aren't on LINE.
Plus, enjoy free calls after watching ads with LINE Out Free.

‚òÖ Face Play: May the best face win!
Get ready to stretch those facial muscles! Rack up new high scores in solo mode, or battle it out with your friends in duo mode for double the fun. Don't forget to collect your special trophy and skin when you complete a mission or become the season champion!

‚ñ† We recommend using a data plan or connecting to Wi-Fi as you may incur data usage fees otherwise. 
‚ñ† Please also use LINE with Android OS versions 4.4 and above to enjoy LINE to the fullest extent.

**********
If your network speed is too slow or you don't have enough device storage, LINE may not install properly.

If this happens, please check your connection and try again.
**********

comments: I was working perfectly until yesterday. I opened it this morning to send some stuff but the message still isn't delivered. It doesn't work on both devices i used it on. I tried everything, deleting and reinstalling, updating, restarting my phone, logged out and in. Still doesn't work. My wifi is also perfectly fine with other apps and webs.

This works ok. I been getting annoyed because I don't always get a notification that I got a message. For example ill randomly open it and than it will tell me I got a message a few hours back im like WTH it's supposed to tell me when I get it. You guys need to fix that issue it happens too often

It works most of the time, what irritates me is the lack of fluidity of the performance given by the app when using it even on the highest-end devices. Other third-party apps on my phone works fine, smooth like butter except LINE, it stutters frequently without any explanations or whatsoever. I hope this can be fixed in the future. And I also hope that it will be more optimized for tablets because, I cant use the app on landscape mode except in chats....which is.... odd.

Please fix the verification problem. When I log in on my laptop, the phone won't show box to put in the number. Used to work regularly until yesterday. Perhaps it's because I chance my email and it's a bug? QR code log in is fine but I don't like to do it every time I turn on my laptop. Please fix this and I will rate back to 5 stars. Thank you.

The reason why i gv 3 stars,it becoz when we login in other device all chat disappear. Line gv an option to save the chat to google drive,unfortunately every time I try to sv in drive,its not works. Eventhough if it works sv in drive,still faces an isssue which is we cant open it,or its not appear directly like in other apps did. It would be great if Line can make all chat not dissapear,like messenger on FB did,which is the chat appear same like when the last time i see in other device. Thanks!

title: TextNow: Free Texting & Calling App
description:
*NEW FEATURE* Now you can use TextNow without WiFi! Get unlimited calling and texting in the US over the Nationwide Sprint Network -- for FREE.  Check if your phone is eligible, and get phone service without the phone bill by clicking on "Free Coverage" in the app menu.

Local US or Canada Phone number
Give your friends your very own phone number they can call!

Unlimited Text & Picture Messaging 
You can send as many text messages as you want to US & Canada - FREE!

Unlimited Calling to USA and Canada 
Make unlimited free phone calls to any phone number in the US & Canada!

Cheap International Calling
TextNow offers low-cost, international calling to over 230 countries. Stay connected longer with rates starting at less than $0.01 per minute. Add money or earn free money by completing offers to your account and make low-cost international calls.

Features:
- Make and receive voice calls
- Emojis, stickers and gifs
- Full picture messaging : send, receive and save pictures!
- Video messaging: Send videos to your friends and family
- Voicemail Transcription: transcript of your voicemail
- Caller ID
- PassCode: keep your messages under lock and key
- Google SmartLock: no need to remember your password
- Call Forwarding
- Conference calling
- Signatures: add your own personalized signature to each text
- Customizable text-tone, ringtone & vibration
- Customizable backgrounds
- Assign individual contacts their own ringtone & background
- Quick Reply to easily (and quickly) respond to friends
- Home screen widget to launch TextNow, compose a new message or quickly make a call
- Unified inbox: send and receive your texts, SMS and GIFs directly via TextNow - use TextNow as your one-stop SMS texting app!
- One number, multiple devices ‚Äì Send messages and make calls on your computer or tablet, then access them from your phone while on the go.
- TextNow.com - text from your computer too! All messages seamlessly synchronize with your mobile device.
- Turn your Wi-Fi enabled tablets into a phone.
- Elastic calling to protect you from dropped calls. Elastic calling is TextNow‚Äôs unique ability to have our calls choose the best possible route for your call to improve quality

Is it really free? 

There is no catch. No yearly or monthly fees! It is completely free! Download today and start sending and receiving your unlimited texts, pics, videos, and SMS messages.

How can all this be free?

The app comes with a few ads. If you don't like ads, you can purchase a subscription to remove them. Join the 100 million people who have already found a better way to talk & text free.

recentChanges:
New & Noticeable:
- No new features, as our engineering elves were busy working under the hood this week. We update every week, so keep checking this space for new features and other nifty stuff.

New and Not-so Noticeable:
- Many bug fixes, plus performance and stability improvements.
comments: Ever since the update it made it worse. It rings again, that's good. Problem is, people can't hear me but I can hear them. I have to use LINE for the time being until it gets fixed. Dont tell me to get the latest update either etc. I did all that. You guys need to update this again because my callers can't hear me when talking. It works then I stops working.

Its great! Actually free. Ive had it for a 2nd private line since like 2016. But you have to pay attention to your account. Because I didn't use mine for a while, lapsed & I still had an account sort of. But I lost my phone number. But its totally not a big deal! For real only actually free. When I lapsed I didn't renew right away because textnow had changed with how it had always been. But now that I renewed, its like it was before and even better! Katy

Totally free for calling, texting and calling landlines and toll free # also when I traveles overseas I could call landlines and office numbers with ease and for free. I use this as a number to give out to people who i buy stuff from online or when companies ask for my # to send ad text, as wel. If it is not used, you will lose the number. I do not recommend using for sensitive data as it is easy to lose the number assigned . that said it is easy to get any # in any area code within the US. üëç

I love this app. Been using it for about 3 years now. I always tell people about this app. It's a great way to have a secondary phone but on same device. Plus it works really well and offers great plans and If you cant afford a plan you can still use it and keep your # for free if needed. Even free for all incoming/outgoing calls with voicemail and text messages also. So you can stay in touch with friends, family, and/or work anytime needed!! Awesome app!!

Beautiful app. I have been using this app for several years and find it very useful and stable. My only reservation is the possibility of losing your phone number if it is not used for a while. The time needs to be extended as sometimes people are unable to use the phone for extensive periods either because of illl health or because the device the number was loaded on has become temporarily unavailable.

title: Toca Life World: Build stories & create your world
description:
Create stories and build your own world with Toca Life World. You‚Äôll get all the fun of your other favorite Toca Life apps such as City, Vacation, Office, Hospital, and more, all together in one place. 

INTRODUCING TOCA LIFE WORLD
Want to give grandma a wild hairstyle? Bring a sloth to the Skate Park? Or just hang out with friends? If you thought it was fun to dive into a Toca Life app and do whatever you want then you were right. This is your own world where you build characters and create stories your way. Make storylines and discover that anything is possible today. 

You can even go further and create stories with your favorite characters in any location you want. Want to take a pet to School? Go for it. Take the doctor to the Salon and dye her hair green? Rock on. In Toca Life World you‚Äôre the boss. Build characters, create stories, and play the way you want.

MAKE STORYLINES, BUILD CHARACTERS & CREATE YOUR OWN WORLD - WHY YOU‚ÄôLL LOVE TO PLAY TOCA LIFE WORLD

FIRST 8 LOCATIONS & 39 CHARACTERS INCLUDED
You can visit Bop City, a vibrant city area with 8 different locations for you to discover, like the hairdresser, the shopping mall and food court, or even an apartment. It‚Äôs a great start when you want to build your own world!

KEEP THE TOCA LIFE APPS YOU ALREADY HAVE
Do you already play other apps within the Toca Life series? City? Vacation? Office? Great! When you download Toca Life World, we‚Äôll help you bring all of that stuff into the mega-app. Then you can start mixing and matching locations and characters to create heaps of new storylines. 

BUY NEW LOCATIONS AND CHARACTERS
If you want to discover more locations, that‚Äôs cool. Toca Life World has a shop where more than 50 locations, 300 characters, and 125 pets are available for purchase. With different prices from small to big, you can decide to add a little or a lot. We‚Äôll always be updating with more locations, characters and crazy things to do.

GIFTS EVERY WEEK
Guess what? You don‚Äôt need to make purchases in the shop to get new items to add to your world. Check back every week and discover exclusive surprise gifts!

Discover exciting storylines, build characters, and don‚Äôt miss out on a moment of fun - download Toca Life World today! 

About Us:

At Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play to spark kids‚Äô imaginations and help them learn about the world. We design our products from the kids' perspective to empower kids to be playful, to be creative and to be who they want to be. Our products include award-winning apps that have been downloaded more than 200 million times in 215 countries and offer fun, safe, open-ended play experiences. Learn more about Toca Boca and our products at tocaboca.com.

Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more about how we work with these matters, please read our privacy policy: https://tocaboca.com/privacy

NEW FEATURE in Home Designer! Design walls and floors with colours, wallpapers and patterns! Wallpapers with clouds? Brick walls? Wooden floors? You choose!

You can now also build the MISTY COTTAGE in Home Designer. The house has a small garden and it comes packed with lots of furniture and decorations. Time to light up the old fireplace!

comments: 100% amazing app! For a while though, i have thought of ideas for the home designer. Its ok if you don't use them. 1. A resturaunt i know its not a house but it would be cool. 2. Daycare 3. Space theme 4. Hospital 5. School i know these already exist but they would be cool to customize. 6. Pets to the customize list 7. Clothes to the customize list. 8. Masks, hand sanitizer, and gloves to the list also. I know its a lot and it doesn't effect my game if they don't exist. I love your game! Bye!

This game is amazing I love it so much and it is even better with the free updates , I can not believe they are free! But talking about what is free or not,the game is only starts getting really fun when you make purchases which is not so cool. Over all amazing game it is fun and cool.I love toca boca !!! I hope who ever reads this rewiew has a long awesome life,may you find someone you love and who will cherish you forever . ü§ó

I would have given it five star but u can fix the bug that when we keep things in our house from somewhere else and when we reopen the game it goes back in it's original place and the full version of the game is very costly u can at least give the full game for free only for three days trail so that we can see the other places that how it is like and then buy it. But it's the best game for kids worth game.

I absolutely love this game! However I think there is a bug now that they added the Halloween update. I have seen other reviews that say that the houses are total wrecks. Mine is the same. My houses I decorated have furniture just in a pile, and everything else is just purple. Purple walls, outside on the balcony is purple, the floors are purple, and I cant move anything. Please please fix this bug. I have spent a lot of birthday money on this.

The game is overall good, but before I bought the misty cottage. I had an amazing world and I must have atleast spent 5 hours working on it in total. But as soon as I got the misty cottage, the game started glitching out. Early morning the next day I went on the game and my whole world reset. Now that got me upset. I wish to report this app and I want it to be reported and sorted out immediately. I have everything in the game and its around ¬£70 for it all. Not funny at all. Sort it out please

title: Walmart Shopping & Grocery
description:
Our award-winning shopping app helps you save time and money. 

The Walmart app is the most convenient way to check off your shopping and your groceries list. Get it done all at once from our store to your door. 

The essential Walmart app offers many great ways to shop for everyone: 

Shop millions of items, available for delivery and pickup 

With Walmart as your local grocery store, getting groceries have never been easier - do your grocery shopping through the app and select the best option for you: curbside pickup or delivery 

Our pharmacy makes ordering a prescription or getting a flu shot quick and simple, too 

Walmart+ is here!   It‚Äôs the membership that helps you save even more time and money.   

With the Walmart app, you can easily access your member-only benefits. 

Free unlimited delivery  
This is grocery shopping made simple - save time by getting groceries while you shop for electronics, home goods, and more, from our store to your door 

1-hour delivery windows as early as the same day on fresh food 
Same everyday low prices you love. 

Member prices on fuel  
Save 5¬¢ per gallon at Walmart and Murphy stations.  
Available at over 1,500 convenient locations.  

Mobile scan & go 
Shop and check out with your phone in-store. 
Contact-free checkout.  
 ‚ÄØ 

Do Not Sell My Personal Information 

‚ÄØPlease scroll down to the footer of our Privacy Policy below to find the "Do Not Sell My Personal Information" link.‚ÄØ 

https://corporate.walmart.com/privacy-security‚ÄØ

recentChanges: This version contains stability fixes, making your shopping experience more seamless.
comments: The newer versions have a lot of glitches and is extremely slow. For example, sometimes I add items to my cart and then they all disappear. Sometimes the app will suddenly have every item listed as out of stock and you have to restart. When you add items and hit + to increase the number of items it takes forever. Hopefully they fix these issues.

This new update is buggy and I can't check out. It took me an hour to fill my cart due to all the bugs and when I finally clicked check out of course that failed too and I lost the last pick-up slot of the day and have to go grocery shopping in the snow now... I have a Samsung Galaxy. The bugs were: search wouldn't work, browse by category wouldn't work, the app kept crashing and removing most of the items in my cart, and when I clicked check out it said "failed to fetch payment."

This app gets slower everytime I use it. It's more like a glitch generator, and an anger creator. But, compared to going inside of that level of hell, there's really no difference, other than not dealing with the public clowns and Karen's. I continue to use this app though. Am I a glutton for punishment, or a slave of this corporate world that is left no other options?......yes.

This ap is FRUSTRATING and is getting worse! The screen constantly freezes, it won't allow you to side swipe when you are supposed to be able to and right in the middle of looking at something the screen will go blank to "update" the page and sometimes it will come back up to the page you were on and sometimes take you all the way to the very beginning of opening the ap. And it's not my internet because it's very reliable and the ap does this no matter what service I'm using.

I thought it was me!! I literally bought a new phone to see if it would fix the issues. When uninstalling and reinstalling the app I just happened to take a look at the reviews, lo and behold every single person in the world has the same problem I do since they combined the websites,hece it completely sucks. I like everyone on here I'm going to have to use a different online shopping app for a different store because this app is useless.

title: News by The Times of India Newspaper - Latest News
description:
Get Daily updates of the Cricket Match 2020 & Match Live Score, Breaking News on US Elections 2020, Bihar Elections Up  Bigg Boss 14 Updates, Entertainment News & more.

The Times of India App - Made in India News App, brings the latest News of India & World and top news headlines. Read latest news, Central & State politics news headlines, news alerts, Bollywood news & celeb photos, Cricket updates, live news from Business, Travel, Gadgets, Education of India & around the World or watch live TV news channels, news in photos & videos anywhere, anytime. Download the TOI news app on your mobile to get news updates on the go.

‚òÜ Latest News ‚òÜ Top News ‚òÜ Live TV News Channels ‚òÜ Photogallery ‚òÜ Briefs

TOI News App Features

‚Ä¢ Language: Now choose the language you prefer, read the news in the chosen language. TOI App offers news in 14 languages i.e. English, Telugu, Tamil, Malayalam, Hindi, Bengali, Gujarati, Kannada, Nepali, Urdu, Marathi, Assamese & Odia

‚Ä¢ Briefs: Read articles in a crisp format & stay updated with the latest news on the go

‚Ä¢ My Feed: Receive customized feeds as per language preference from The Times of India & other regional publishers

‚Ä¢ Live TV: Watch as it happens! Catch the live coverage of all breaking news, business & Bollywood news on Times Now, ET Now & Zoom Live TV

‚Ä¢ Latest, Trending & Breaking News: Get the latest & breaking news updates from India & around the world.

‚Ä¢ Morning & Evening Updates: News updates every morning & evening, catch up the latest news & headlines of the day with smart updates feature 

‚Ä¢ Offline Reading: Read the latest news in offline mode without internet with TOI offline reading feature

‚Ä¢ Bookmark: Now bookmark articles & news stories & read news anytime

‚Ä¢ Customize Notifications: Control the time & frequency of your news update notifications & receive as per your interests

‚Ä¢ Night Mode Reading: Use the Black & Sepia themes built in the app to have a pleasant reading experience even in poor lighting conditions

‚Ä¢ Swipe for Next: Swipe left & right for a faster & seamless reading experience

‚Ä¢ Save Data: Download images only when you want to, based on your preferred network settings (Wi-Fi, 2G, 3G, 4G) 

‚Ä¢ Share: Like a story? Share it with your friends & loved ones using Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, Email & more!

Why TOI App?

‚Ä¢ The Times of India live news app offers everything that an avid news reader is looking for ‚Äì breaking news, latest headlines, trending videos, and in-depth coverage of sports, entertainment, technology, politics & more in English and other languages.

‚Ä¢ From India news to world news, politics to cricket news, technology news to celebrity news, movie reviews of Bollywood, Hollywood & regional films

‚Ä¢ Latest news & updates related to Narendra Modi, Cricket News, Live Score Card, Elections & stories related to our neighbors- Pakistan, Nepal, Bangladesh

‚Ä¢ View photo galleries of Bollywood celebrities, industrialists, politicians, sportsperson & events/parties that are the talk of the town, page 3 parties in magazines.

‚Ä¢ Daily video updates from the world of news, entertainment, sports, cricket, lifestyle, business, technology

‚Ä¢ Exhaustive news coverage from more than 50 Indian cities

‚Ä¢ A special section has been created for NRI users across the world who enjoy reading the TOI app for news from India & abroad

The Times of India app is India‚Äôs premier news app and is used by over 70 million users in India & abroad. Our users read the news on the TOI app with access from more than 225 countries in the world. TOI is the first choice of Indians & NRI‚Äôs alike for India & world news.

REACH US

Please share your valuable feedback, if you enjoy using the app, do give us a 5-star rating!

Email: toi.android@timesinternet.in
Privacy Policy: http://m.timesofindia.com/androidprivacypolicy.cms

comments: The notification algorithm on this app is incompetent. After disabling notifications for Entertainment/Health and Lifestyle, I continue to receive Bollywood news updates. And those are the only ones that I receive. I don't know if that's paid promotion. I just received a notification on how Fatima Sana Sheikh considers Dharamshala her second home. What help is that to me? Please work on this. You are a news app. Stick to that. Leave the entertainment for others.

There was once a time that TOI had some value. It's such a shame that the digital side has taken such a dip. Way too many ads. Content material and the language it's like nobody proof reads them anymore. Most common error seen tome over time is that they keep putting the wrong KSRTC image for the Karnataka SRTC content. So many Ads... Way too many. If the intent is to get users to pay for having the ads removed, my friend, that will be a very bad idea. Some of the articles here are vry vry old.

Until few years back I had great respect for TOI but just from the past couple of years, the content and the quality of reporting has gone down very badly. Too many ads in the app doesn't help either.
Had a lovely experience by downloading the app. Try he best part is that we can get instant news without the need of switching on the internet. Superb!!!

Please remove this payment system from the articles. You can use the premium version for the ads free facility but some of your article are not available full because of the premium subscription. title: Two Dots
description:
Join two brave dots as they traverse the arctic tundra, navigate fiery jungles, and plunge the ocean depths in the #1 hit game in over 100 countries. 

-------------------------------

‚Ä¢ FREE to play for life
‚Ä¢ CONNECT one dot to another, sink anchors, make a line, create bombs, fight fire, and much more in this fun free puzzle game
‚Ä¢ ADVENTURE through 2875 fun and addicting levels
‚Ä¢ ADORABLE fun, and thoughtful game design in this beautiful game about connecting
‚Ä¢ ENJOY beautiful minimalistic flat design with relaxing game music and fun sound fx
‚Ä¢ PLAY at your own pace to figure out the perfect move without having to worry about the old time clock
‚Ä¢ CHALLENGE your friends to a Two Dots match on Facebook, beat their scores, and earn medals
‚Ä¢ MAKE a line or a square, not a circle, to connect every dot of a single color

-------------------------------

developerAddress:
416 West 13th St.
Suite 203
New York, NY 10014
recentChanges:
NEW LEVELS have sprouted on the Burgeoning Beanstalk!
Climb your way up 3050 treacherous challenges.
comments: My favorite game, I literally deleted my other games because this is the only one I play now, I love it so much. Everything from how positive it is, to the perfectly fitting audio that plays. I love how simple and easy going this game is and I love how this games helps you succeed. The levels where you can locate items are super fun as well, recommending this game to everyone I know literally!!

Caution. This game is really nicely crafted, very visually rich, and enjoyable to play from levels 1-10. After this, things start to go absolutely mental. There is pop-up after pop-up, harassing you about another new feature. You quickly get to a point where you're bamboozled - everything on the screen is shouting at you. This appears to be by design, hyper confusion and attention hijacking to nurture addiction. This app is nefarious and should be enjoyed only with huge restraint.

Never log into Facebook. It causes you to lose the prizes from any contest you won. I had tons of things coming from a dots race and they vanished the second it connected to Facebook. Also, the game freezes and crashes a lot when watching videos to get a bonus box. You have to be patient when you open the app. It can take over five minutes to come up.

Honestly was obsessed with this game for awhile, but they made a bunch of updates and now every time you view the map about four or five different windows pop up to tell you about the different games. It used to just be the daily bonus. Tired of exiting out of a bunch of stupid notifications just to be able to click on the game I want. They ruined a good thing.

You get to a certain point and you can't win anything without spending money. With prices on everything else in life steadily increasing the last thing I wanna spend money on is a silly phone game. If you could just spend money once or twice, maybe no big deal. But you have to constantly spend money to get perks to help you thru the levels and clearly this is by design. It's a really cool game, and very disappointing to have to delete, but I'm just not up for money hungry games like this.

title: Wells Fargo Mobile
description:
Simplify your life and stay in control with the Wells Fargo Mobile¬Æ App. Manage your finances; make check deposits, transfer funds, and pay bills, all within the app. 

Manage Your Accounts
‚Ä¢ Quickly access your accounts with Fingerprint Sign On¬π (smartphones only)
‚Ä¢ View key account information without having to login with FastLook 
‚Ä¢ Review activity and balances in your accounts
‚Ä¢ View your credit card transactions and manage your rewards program
‚Ä¢ Easily activate or replace credit/debit cards
‚Ä¢ Enjoy Card-Free ATM access to your accounts at our 13,000 ATMs¬≤, coast-to-coast
‚Ä¢ Set your language preference to English or Spanish¬≥

Deposit Funds
‚Ä¢ Deposit checks with ease using your Android phone‚Äôs camera
‚Ä¢ Instantly view the processing deposit in your account

Make Transfers and Payments
‚Ä¢ Transfer funds between your Wells Fargo accounts and to other financial institutions 
‚Ä¢ Securely send and receive money with friends and family using a mobile number or email address with Zelle¬Æ‚Å¥
‚Ä¢ Pay your bills with Wells Fargo‚Äôs Bill Pay service

Track Investments
‚Ä¢ Monitor balances, holdings, account activity, and open orders for your Wells Fargo Advisors and WellsTrade¬Æ accounts
‚Ä¢ Get real-time quotes, charts, market data, and news

Help Stay Secure
‚Ä¢ Visit the Security Center to report fraud and learn how to help keep your accounts safe
‚Ä¢ Configure and receive near real time alerts
‚Ä¢ Get notified of suspicious activity with text or email alerts
‚Ä¢ Get easy access to your FICO¬Æ Credit Score
‚ÄÉ
Contact Us
‚Ä¢ Email appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com
‚Ä¢ Locate one of our 13,000 ATMs or approximately 5300 retail banking branches near you via GPS
‚Ä¢ Set up an appointment to meet with a Banker
_____________________________________________________________________________________

3. The Wells Fargo Mobile¬Æ App may not be available in Spanish to all Wells Fargo customers. Not all products and services are available in Spanish.
4. Mobile numbers may need to be registered with Zelle before they can be used. Available to U.S. based bank account holders only.

summary: Wells Fargo Mobile allows you to access your investment and bank accounts.
recentChanges: Minor Performance improvements and bug fixes.
comments: Used to function perfectly but for the last couple months the mobile deposit feature very rarely works. It says that the check amount doesn't match the picture and to try taking the picture again but it never resolves the error. Changing the background, light source, angle, distance and uninstall/reinstall doesn't make a difference. I've wasted so much time on this nonsense.

I've always had a good experience with the app. I appreciate how Wells Fargo keeps me updated on new features, changes and privacy policy updates. I'm also not very tech savvy and the app. is very easy to navigate through and understand. Personally, especially in times like this, I'd rather do my banking from the comfort of my home, car, office instead of standing in line waiting.

Great app. The easiest app I've ever used compared to the one that my credit union uses. Just point and it will do the rest for you. Other app that I've used were not as friendly and hard to take photos that I have to do it a couple of times. This app makes all the adjustments for me.

On its own it's OK. Basic functions are all there but the UI and UX could use a some improvement. When compared to the banking apps of competitors, the design and layout feels a decade behind. Things that take 1 (e.g. swipe left or right) action on competitors apps take 3 on this app (e.g. tap menu, scroll to selection, select action). Not an issue if used infrequently, but the little things could get annoying if Wells Fargo was my main account.

Great app. Makes online banking simple and easy to use. I have all my finances in one easy to use app. My only issue is that when I login sometimes the app doesnt recognize my password. Which is frustrating sometimes. But other than that it's a great app.

title: Credit Karma - Free Credit Scores & Reports
description:
From spotting identity theft to getting personalized loan and credit card recommendations. Ready to make financial progress?

‚Ä¢ Check your free credit scores ‚Äì Take a look at your free credit reports to learn what affects your credit score and how you can take control.

‚Ä¢ Explore the Relief Roadmap ‚Äì Connect with government stimulus programs, unemployment benefits, debt relief opportunities, loan options and more.

‚Ä¢ Credit Karma Savings ‚Äì You worked hard for your money.  Now Credit Karma Savings makes your money work harder for you.  Open a savings account* in minutes and start earning a high-yield interest rate that's optimized across a network of 800+ banks.

‚Ä¢ Free ID monitoring ‚Äì We help you spot potential identity theft and give you tips for keeping your personal information safer.

‚Ä¢ Free credit monitoring ‚Äì Get credit alerts when we see important changes happen to your Equifax or TransUnion credit reports.

‚Ä¢ Personalized Approval Odds ‚Äì See which credit card and personal loan offers you‚Äôre more likely to get before applying.

‚Ä¢ Credit card choices ‚Äì Browse great credit card offers based on your unique credit profile.

‚Ä¢ All things auto ‚Äì Tune up your auto loan, save on car insurance, see open recalls and find vehicle records.

‚Ä¢ Home sweet home ‚Äì Calculate how much home you can afford, see personalized home loan offers and get a mortgage pre-qualification letter.

‚Ä¢ Credit Karma Tax¬Æ ‚Äì Filing your 2019 state and federal tax returns with the IRS is 100% free from start to finish, plus you‚Äôll get our Maximum Refund Guarantee**, Audit Defense*** and dedicated support.

‚Ä¢ Personal loan shopping ‚Äì Whether you want to refinance credit card debt or borrow for an emergency, we‚Äôll show you personalized offers based on your credit profile.

‚Ä¢ Search unclaimed money ‚Äì See if any of the more than $40 billion in unclaimed money has your name on it. 

‚Ä¢ Financial calculators ‚Äì You can see how different actions impact your finances with our free simple loan calculator, debt repayment calculator, mortgage refinancing calculator and more.

Join more than 100 million members and get all these features, and more, for free. Download the Credit Karma app now.

DISCLAIMER

*Banking services provided by MVB Bank, Inc., Member FDIC. Maximum balance and transfer limits apply. Maximum 6 withdrawals per monthly statement cycle.

**If you receive a larger federal tax refund amount or owe less in federal taxes using the same Tax Return Information when filing an amended return through another online tax preparation service, then you may be eligible to receive the difference in the refund or tax amount owed up to $100 (minimum $25) in the form of a gift card from Credit Karma Tax¬Æ. For details and eligibility, see https://www.creditkarma.com/tax/programterms#1.

***For details and eligibility, see https://www.creditkarma.com/lp/audit-defense-terms/.  Exclusions apply.

$2781 provided in the Credit Karma Tax phone screen image is the average 2018 Federal tax refund based on data provided by the IRS. $2973 is the average 2018 State tax refund in CA based on data provided by the CA Department of Revenue.

Insurance services offered through Credit Karma Insurance Services, LLC (dba Karma Insurance Services, LLC; CA resident license #0172748).

summary: Make the most of your finances with your free credit scores and reports.
recentChanges:
Thanks for using Credit Karma!

Our app is regularly updated to make it easier for you to track your financial progress. This version includes a number of performance improvements and squashes a few small pesky bugs.
comments: I like the new layout and look. However, I would give 5 stars if I didn't have to search for what comes through on the alert notifications. Example, "there's a special loan offer", where?! I have search for it, when the app should go right to the information that is on alert notification, and not just the home page. Many alerts I just ignore, because I become frustrated trying to find them. Just open directly to them once pressed, otherwise I'm just wasting time seeing the same information.

I really love this app and the website. It's convenient and easy to use. My only complaint right now it that no matter how many times I click on "Recommendations" and scroll through it, it ALWAYS says there is 1 waiting. It's been going on for a while and it's on both desktop and mobile, so I know it's not just this latest update to the app. I don't like the advertising of the credit cards all the time but I get it, to keep the app free you need to have ads, no problem. Recommend me stuff all the time, I don't care, just register that I've seen it once I have.

Great app, I mean ausome app, in less than a year, this app has helped me get all three of my credit scores boosted. They were all between 510-530 and now, only a year later all three range from 622-643. So this app has done wonders. After a year of doing what the app said I went from having no credit to having 3 credit cards and owning a house. SO CREDIT KARMA GETS A 10 STAR RATING FROM ME. I USED TO SPEND MONEY AS FAST AS IT HIT MY POCKET NOW I HAVE OVER 10,000 IN SAVINGS AND I'M A PACK RAT.

Good app, but this latest update sucks. I don't like the new UI, and it feels slower now. And one thing that's been bugging me forever, when you open the app and it displays where you enter your pin, raise all the numbers up. It's way too low. But the in app UI sucks now. Change it back please. It was easier on the eyes before and easier to read

I've been monitoring my credit for a couple years now with Credit Karma, but this is thee worst update they've done! Not to mention, your score in the app will never be what a lender pulls. So I just use it to monitor credit card usage and any collections. Other than that, the app is garbage. Edit to include CK's response: I already know that. I am informing others, because clearly your formula isn't accurate. And if it's not accurate... it's not useful.

title: Cash App
description:
Cash App is the easiest way to send, spend, save, and invest your money. It‚Äôs the SAFE, FAST, and FREE mobile banking app.

SAFE: Protect all of your payments and investments with a passcode. Pause spending on your Cash Card with one tap if you misplace it. All of your information is stored securely.

FAST: Sign up and make your first payment in minutes. Instantly send and receive money from friends. Transfer money from Cash App to another bank account instantly instead of waiting days. Use your Cash App account and routing number to receive deposits up to two days earlier than is standard with most banks.

FREE: Send and receive money at no cost. Get a completely free virtual Visa debit card in minutes, and we‚Äôll mail you your custom physical debit card for free in about a week. Invest in your favorite stocks commission-free with as little as $1. 

* HERE‚ÄôS HOW IT WORKS *
Download and sign up for Cash App in a matter of minutes. The signup process is simple and fast so that you can start using Cash App right away.

* SEND AND RECEIVE MONEY INSTANTLY * 
Receive, request, and send money from friends and family instantly with only a few taps. Cash App is the easiest way to pay a friend back for dinner or split rent with your roommates.   

* GET A FREE CUSTOM VISA DEBIT CARD *
Order your Cash Card (a customizable Visa debit card) directly from Cash App. You‚Äôll be able to instantly make online purchases using your virtual card or in-store purchases by adding your Cash Card to Google Pay. We‚Äôll also mail you your physical laser-etched Cash Card about a week so you can swipe, dip, or tap at any merchant.

* RECEIVE YOUR PAYCHECK UP TO TWO DAYS EARLY *
Deposit paychecks, tax returns, unemployment benefits, government stimulus payouts and more directly into your Cash App balance using your account and routing number. Receive deposits up to two days earlier than is standard with most other banks. Use the same account and routing information to pay bills using your Cash App balance.  

* GET INSTANT DISCOUNTS WITH CASH BOOST *
Cash Card is the only free debit card with instant discounts at your favorite stores, websites, apps, and restaurants. These instant discounts - Cash Boosts - are easy to use and are applied to Cash Card transactions instantly. Just select a given Cash Boost in your app and then use your Cash Card to pay. It‚Äôs that simple. No points, no waiting, just instant savings.

* BUY, SELL, DEPOSIT, AND WITHDRAW BITCOIN * 
Cash App is the easiest way to buy, sell, deposit, and withdraw Bitcoin. Track the BTC price in realtime in your app and get started by buying as little as $1 of Bitcoin. Your BTC arrives in your app instantly. You can then decide to keep it safe in Cash App or withdraw it to a different wallet.

* BUY & SELL STOCKS COMMISSION-FREE * 
Instantly begin investing commission-free with Cash App. You can buy as little as $1 of stock in top US companies. Track stock prices in realtime in your app and monitor the performance of your overall investment portfolio. Create a list of companies to follow so you can stay up to date on performance. Brokerage services provided by Cash App Investing LLC, member FINRA / SIPC. Investing involves risk; you may lose money. Investments are not FDIC insured.

summary: Send, Spend & Invest Cash
recentChanges: Various bug fixes and improvements
comments: I have used the app with the same bank and information for over a year only changing my phone number. Initially I had no issues. Three last the months however, I haven't been able to use the app for anything as it can't seem to verify my information. I am unable to receive payments, send payments, add money or cash out money that's in my cash app account. I've reached out to support numerous times with no response. I love there convenience of the app and the boosts I was getting but not anymore.

I hate this app! It's useless. Can't do anything like you're suppose to be able to. Linking cards and accounts never works like it should or even like it did one time before. I had to replace my card, same card and company just a new numbers but it won't link the new information?! The card is allowed and supported but now I can't load money. Hate using this app unless it's completely my last resort!

This app is a scam to me now unlike before that it's working well. When you download it it will be asking for your SSN. Its really frustrating. Some guys are patronizing themselves as customer care representatives all they do is hack your bank accounts and all your hard earned money is gone. The money sent to me can't be accessed too for the past 2 weeks. I don't encourage anyone to download this app

Cashapp is GREAT! That is, until you have ANY problem with your account! Support is useless! I've sent FIFTEEN (15) emails in the last 2 days because I had to order a new card and I've been sent TWO (2) that don't match the new card info on my account, with only 2 responses, neither of which got the problem fixed, and nothing further from them. CASHAPP DOES NOT HAVE RELIABLE SUPPORT. IF YOU NEED TO HIRE MORE PEOPLE, I WILL APPLY FOR THE JOB AND SHOW YOU HOW TO MANAGE A BUSINESS AND KEEP FANS!

This app is horrible in scanning id. There is no button to use when taking a picture of front and back of id. The front i had to click on flash sign, the back side i had to close app and reopen to even see a flash sign and then when i clicked for back side, the functions changed ot just lit up id. The app took a picture on its own of back side as i was moving my id arpund for 30 min annoyed. And then it only took when i put super close, taking only an 8th of whole back side, twice!

title: V LIVE
description:
Connect & Share Moments Together
V LIVE, the community where stars and fans connect

# Connect with your star and other fans
Visit your star's channel!
Keep up with the star's updates and connect with other global fans.

# Get comments and likes from your star
Check out your star's comments and likes and get closer to them.
Maybe you'll get comments and likes from your star, too!

# Watch live moments of your favorite star
You'll be surprised at your star's special moments in their live broadcasts.
Send live chat messages and hearts to your star no matter where you are in the world.

# View updates by each star member
View posts and photos posted by each member, and also leave a fan letter.

# Never miss your star's upcoming events
Check all schedules including live broadcasts, concerts, birthdays, etc.

# Special benefits for fans
Join your favorite star's MEMBERSHIP and enjoy benefits
that your star has prepared for you such as Welcome Kit and early ticketing.


----
Developer Support : 1588-3820 
naver_market@naver.com 
6, Buljeong-ro, Bundang-gu, Seongnam-si, Gyeonggi-do, Republic of Korea

V LIVE has been updated to the community where stars and fans connect.

‚ñ∂ The general channel and the paid channel are combined into one.

‚ñ∂ You can use different profiles for each channel.
Also check your membership grade that changes depending on your activity!

comments: The app was great. However, the new update (oct. 30th) has been frustrating and its hard to navigate. You cannot reach the catagory of years for videos anymore. It's a lot less organized on the idols pages, it was much easier with it's past organization. So in general, it's just more of a downgrade and it is just harder to find videos or certain things you are looking for.

Bugs over bugs. Artists happen to suddenly not be able to read comments during a live, I cannot watch any replays anymore because the app just keeps crashing every single time?? I like the new design but it's unacceptable to release a version of an app that isn't even working properly. Right now, this is just taking up my storage space, nothing more.

The new update is horrible. It won't let me watch any videos, it just lags and then the app closes. You also have to pay now to comment on lives, which you previously didn't have to do, don't they already have enough money? Not to mention the new confusing layout, which they clearly just copied from weverse (their biggest competitor right now). I'm honestly thinking of uninstalling.

my experience with vlive is normally great but just today, after the unexpected update something was wrong. first, the pause/play button disappears from time to time while watching so i have to exit full screen to be able to pause/play; second, i missed a live today. i didn't get any notifs about it and i can't find it anywhere even though the live is being tweeted about and has been seen by many of my peers. please fix it üò≠üò≠. i want to at least be able to watch the video even if not live.

There's a bug, everytime I play a video the app crashes! I tried to reinstall it but it keeps happening. Please do something with it. Plus the new layout doesn't allow us to browse through videos of channels and you made the following and unfollowing of channels so much more complicated. All those features of creating a profile for each channel are so unnecessary. It was better the way it was.

title: Verizon Cloud
description:
Cloud storage for your mobile devices. Easy to backup, search and share. 

Sign up today for 600 GB or 2 TB of storage and your first 30 days are on us.

Features:  
‚Ä¢	BACK UP your photos, videos, contacts and more to a secure cloud storage
‚Ä¢	SYNC & ACCESS across devices ‚Äì Backup, sync and access your content when you need it, from your smartphone, tablet or computer
‚Ä¢	PRIVATE FOLDER with PIN-protection for your sensitive content 
‚Ä¢	ORDER PHOTO PRINTS & GIFTS using your favorite photos in app
‚Ä¢	CREATE MOVIES AND CUSTOMIZE PHOTOS Make masterpieces with music, filters and fun stickers to share
‚Ä¢	FLASHBACKS ‚Äì Relive your memories from past years with weekly photo flashbacks
‚Ä¢	CAST TO YOUR TV ‚Äì Share your pictures, videos and music with family and friends on the big screen 
‚Ä¢	SHARE select media content from your Cloud using your favorite native apps
What's New in Version 20.10
‚Ä¢	Enhanced Stories for Fall. Highlighting Halloween and Thanksgiving 
‚Ä¢	Backend updates, bug fixes and performance improvements 

Get started with Verizon Cloud today to securely back up, access & share photos, videos, contacts & more!

The Verizon Cloud app can be downloaded and used on any smartphone or tablet running Android software. Go to www.vzw.com/cloud for the complete list.
New Verizon subscribers: Download and install the Verizon Cloud app on your Android Smartphone for a 30-day premium trial of 600GB or 2TB of storage. You will automatically be billed $5.99/month or $12.99/month, respectively, once the trial ends. You can opt out of the trial through the Verizon Cloud app at any time during the 30-day period and enjoy free 'Contacts Only' support. 

* Data charges apply.
View the complete Terms & Conditions at: http://www.verizonwireless.com/support/cloud-legal/

comments: Absolutely no issues to report. MotoZ4, running Android 10. It's a basic app but, that's exactly what you want in cloud storage. Simple and to the point. Transitions are a little slow but, I'm fine with it; this app is doing what it's supposed to üëç. Total app size: 114 MB. No issues with this. Hey people: a 128 GB Samsung EVO memory card is $20 on Amazon. If your phone is "full," clean it out and expand the storage if you can.

So far good. Will need to see down the calendar a ways. 10/30 - still can't access cloud account. 'Sign in and password valid. We can not verify you have a valid account'. (Paraphrasing). When I purchased this tablet, I also purchased a 1TB account. Why can't I get in?

The latest update (10/9/2020) on my Samsung Galaxy J3V is quite a space hog. The amount of space used has gone from around 40 MB to over 400 MB. The creepy part is that it continues to grow with no end in sight like some weird tumor. The growth is classified as data rather than cache. I was told could delete data but it would then have to re sync. It is now the largest app in memory. Asked if I could safely uninstall this update still waiting for an answer. Less than 3 GB left in storage space.

Upload speeds to cloud server are extremely poor (1-5Mbps), files in the Verizon Sync folder fail to upload and will just repeatedly try over and over (which I suspect is the cause of reviews saying this app used up all their data), desktop app is clunky and outdated, can not log into my account via app from a second phone (my work phone), connections to the cloud service often time out. Competing services have never given me any of these issues and are far more price competitive. This service was included in my cell plan but I would rather pay to use a different service than fight to make this one work for free.

Have never even used this app yet since the latest update my phone has completely run out of space. I have deleted hundreds of pictures and videos (DAILY), deleted apps, and am still unable to use literally anything in my phone. Can't so much as make a call or even try to open any app, including cloud, because they close instantly as it still says it's 100% full. Last night I just happened to notice that this app, that has never been used, is now taking up 10gb! That is completely unacceptable.

title: The Oregon Trail: Settler
description:
You‚Äôve conquered the trail, now it‚Äôs time to tame the frontier! Experience the next step in The Oregon Trail story, where you and your family can finally settle down and build a new home in the Wild West‚Ä¶

***** ‚ÄúVery addictive. I can't put my phone down‚Äù

***** ‚ÄúGreat combination of building, socializing, and side games‚Äù

***** ‚ÄùLove it! This game is awesome, I remember it as a kid but now it‚Äôs even better‚Äù

The Oregon Trail: American Settler is a fun and addictive game stocked with heaps of engaging features to keep you entertained for hours and hours! Build the largest and greatest town the Wild West has ever seen!

FEATURES:
‚àö A fun, free-to-play adventure!
‚àö Create and manage your own frontier town
‚àö Relive memorable moments from The Oregon Trail!
‚àö Place hundreds of buildings, livestock and crops
‚àö Customize your character with various outfits
‚àö Play hunting or fishing mini-games for resources
‚àö Go prospectin‚Äô to uncover daily rewards
‚àö Face the dangers of the Wild West: stampedes, hurricanes and more!
‚àö Visit neighboring villages to gather hearts and use them to grow your village!

So go ahead, start playing for free and join the many other players who‚Äôre already having fun on the frontier! For fans of simulation, farming and tycoon games.

___________________

The Oregon Trail: American Settler is free to download and play. You will collect virtual currencies called ‚ÄúCoins‚Äù and rarer ‚ÄúCash‚Äù as you play which you can use to care for your town or buy in-game items, energy, and resources. If you don‚Äôt have enough virtual currency to buy an item, restore energy, or perform an action, you can choose to earn additional currency gradually over time as you play the game, or purchase additional virtual currency with real money. In-app purchases range from $1.99 to $99.99. You can restrict in-app purchases by adjusting your User Controls in your Play Store settings.

Supported languages: English, Chinese, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish, Traditional Chinese

An additional download of 50 to 150MB is required to play this game. Please note, the size of this required download may change without notice.

Certain aspects of this game will require the player to connect to the internet. 

Certain aspects of this game will require the player to connect to a social network like Facebook. Please note this connection is never compulsory to progress through the game.

This game may contain third party advertisements that will redirect you to a third party site.

For customer care matters please visit http://support.gameloft.com/

_____________________________________________

Visit our official site at http://www.gameloft.com
Follow us on Twitter at http://glft.co/GameloftonTwitter or like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/Gameloft to get more info about all our upcoming titles.
Check out our videos and game trailers on http://www.youtube.com/Gameloft
Discover our blog at http://glft.co/Gameloft_Official_Blog for the inside scoop on everything Gameloft.
_____________________________________________

This app allows you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third party advertisements that may redirect you to a third party site.

Privacy Policy : http://www.gameloft.com/privacy-notice/

summary: Saddle-up for an all-new Oregon adventure!
developerAddress: 14 rue Auber 75009 Paris
recentChanges: Various bug fixes and improvements.
comments: It is very fun but there are a few ways you could make the game better. The tutorial doesn't fully explain the game and I had a hard time figuring out how to play the game. The other way you can make the game better is by making it way easier to get bills. It is so hard to see all of these cool buildings in the shop that cost over 100 bills, I hardly get over a bill per week! Overall great game and it is very enjoyable.

Takes you energy away if you have any when you level up. Example I have full energy with little xp to go before I level up. Then I get the xp to level up and then of course I get replenished energy but the energy I previously had is now gone. Energy with rollover capability would be great. Won't load friends either. When connected to facebook.

The game itself is fun but it can get a bit repetitive at times. It also doesn't help that I can't do some of the mini games without the game itself crashing. The fact that some of the quests the town's people give you need dollars, which you either pay for or get extremely lucky to get from the prospecting minigame is a bit ridiculous.

Update 10.15.20 The ap still crashes everything i try to go into the travel map thing.. ORIGINAL POST: Everything was working just fine until I switched phones. Now the ap crashes everything I try to download the new map. It is kind of frustrating because I was getting a lot of special items there. It made the game a little more fun.

Game is nice but the clitches with not being able visit random towns or loading issues in friends to send and receive items is a real pain. The main reason though why I give it 3 üåü is no way to long term save and move game to other devices, yet you want people to spend/invest money on a game they can easily lose and have to start over.. yeah I don't think so. You created a cute game.. adding a way to save and move between devices would get a lot more players playing your game long term.

title: The Walking Dead: Road to Survival
description:
The Walking Dead Road to Survival is the definitive Walking Dead strategy RPG game, brought to you by Robert Kirkman, creator of The Walking Dead comic series.

Build your team of Survivors and develop battle strategies to lead them into battle in an uncompromising story, fraught with danger. Fight for survival against walkers and humans alike, using strategy to attack enemy weak points and deep RPG progression to decide your path. Build a town to keep the walkers at bay, but be warned ‚Äì The horrors that lurk outside aren‚Äôt the only threat, and your decisions are all that stand between life and death.

Based on an all-new story from award-winning Walking Dead writer Jay Bonansinga, the dark aesthetic of this game reflects the uncompromising decisions you will need to make as you strategize for survival.

Stand with Michonne, Rick and other survivors from The Walking Dead, and join the epic battle against the darkest enemies from the Governor to Negan.

THE WALKING DEAD: ROAD TO SURVIVAL FEATURES:

Fight Walkers & Survivors
‚Ä¢ Battle against fierce opponents and use your best strategy to survive
‚Ä¢ Charge opponents with special melee and ranged attacks using deadly weapons like Michonne‚Äôs katana

Collect & Recruit Survivors
‚Ä¢ Collect new Survivors from The Walking Dead universe, each with their own specialized battle strategy

Upgrade Your Survivors 
‚Ä¢ Level up and customize Survivors to enhance their fighting strategies, weapons and skills
‚Ä¢ RPG progression makes your Survivors stronger as they cut down more walkers

Strategy Gameplay - Capitalize on Strengths & Exploit Weaknesses
‚Ä¢ Battle strategy is key to scoring powerful hits ‚Äì but watch out for retaliating strikes
‚Ä¢ Your battle strategy is all that‚Äôs keeping the Survivors of Woodbury safe ‚Äì Strategize and strike to win

Maps & Locations From The Walking Dead
‚Ä¢ Explore a new 3D map featuring real locations from The Walking Dead comics

Build your Community Base & Expand into the Wasteland
‚Ä¢ Build houses to hold Survivors, a Town Hall to expand your city, a Workshop to craft items, and more

PvP - Raid Enemies
‚Ä¢ Use your battle strategy to raid enemy factions for resources in the All Out War online mode
‚Ä¢ Strategic Multiplayer battles in a wide-open world filled with potential enemies and vicious walkers. 

Alliance Factions & Online Strategy
‚Ä¢ Multiplayer alliances and battle strategies keep you safe. Join allies in a faction to create a battle strategy and pool resources in the harsh world of The Walking Dead
‚Ä¢ Battle and build together with friends in multiplayer role-playing strategy gameplay

Battle in Iconic The Walking Dead Locations
‚Ä¢ Fight alongside your faction for control of areas from The Walking Dead
‚Ä¢ Battle to conquer and defend locations like Alexandria, Woodbury, Sanctuary, and more

Make Strategized Decisions to Change the Story
‚Ä¢ Decisions impact the story mode and make each game campaign unique
‚Ä¢ Write your own Survivor story in this dynamic and compelling Walking Dead RPG

Live In-Game Events 
‚Ä¢ Play to obtain valuable resources and new, exclusive Survivors.

Walkers tear at your city walls, while desperate Survivors rip apart the town‚Äôs foundations from the inside. When the time comes to fight, what will you choose?

Terms of Service: http://scopely.com/tos/
Privacy Policy: http://scopely.com/privacy/
Additional Information, Rights, and Choices Available to California Players: https://scopely.com/privacy/#additionalinfo-california.

recentChanges:
The Total War update is here!
-Two all new War maps have been added: Sanctuary and Kingdom
-Mercenaries have been added to War! Allowing you to jump into the fight faster in Road to Survival's premier event!
-Intra-region matchmaking has been added to Cross Region War! You can now be matched against factions on your region and other regions during CRW events!

comments: Better since last updated . Before i had lots of issues with the game and now its just an occasional hiccup and when it does go out its game wide and everyone gets some type of apology gift. Still a lot of differences between free vs pay but better for free now than it was in the past. I love my faction and this is the best aspect of the game. They make me want to log in even on busy or bad days. Try it, just wait to be sure that you're gonna keep playing before you spend too much $$$.

I absolutely love this game but my biggest complaint as I've gotten into later game play is that, every time I try to raid, I have to refresh for up to 30 or more minutes trying to find an opponent within even 90,000 levels of my rank. I've even been given the rank 23 person twice before I've gotten someone close. A person whose rank 100,000 should not have to almost exclusively fight people in the top 1000 players. They're characters are exceptionally stronger.

These seasonal events and just events in general need to be lowered in team power all together. Literally feel like i cant do anything in the Halloween event because you need a S11 or higher team.... Hey Devs? You want poeple playing and enjoying your events and content later on yes? Why have the power for seasonal events on the roadmaps be for S11 - S12 and up? Why not have as many people as possible enjoying it? Why save it for players at the end of the game, or people who pay lots of cash?

One of the best game i've ever played but the raid is so unbalanced,the wars is the worst its so unbalanced that it's almost impossible to win.Imagine workimg hard to get strong then ended up being defeated by a rich player who is at low level but have strong characters.

Royal Coins fail. I've won enough to at lease have 800 TWD points/coins but yet my number is still stuck at 550. Between yesterdays jackpot and today's I should have had enough to unlock TWD Shane. But its like its stuck to that number. Can someone like help me.

title: Digital Secure
description:
Protect your private information from digital threats. 
Digital Secure is a one-stop suite of privacy and security tools for your mobile devices and home computers. Safeguard your internet connection and personal data with antivirus, anti-malware and identity theft protection so you can browse with peace of mind. 

Here‚Äôs what you‚Äôll get with Digital Secure.
You‚Äôll get free security and privacy tools, plus you can get advanced protection for $5/mo per line or $10/mo per account.

1. Security and Privacy
Protect your device from online threats and get around-the-clock peace of mind. 
Get warnings when connecting to an unsecure network, visiting risky websites or attempting dangerous downloads. Plus, you‚Äôll be able to see how installed apps are currently using your personal information. 

2. Safe Wi-Fi 
Connect with confidence to any public Wi-Fi. 
With Digital Secure, it‚Äôs easy to make any Wi-Fi connection private. You‚Äôll get an on-the-go secure VPN connection so you‚Äôll be able to keep personal data and online activities to yourself. 

3. Identity Theft Protection (IDTP)
Take control with always-on IDTP and social media monitoring, dark web surveillance and theft alerts.
24/7 cyber monitoring means you can be notified if we detect any personal information you‚Äôve asked us to monitor is shared online. You‚Äôll also get step-by-step guidance from recovery and replacement specialists if essential items such as credit cards and IDs are lost.

comments: I straight up didn't install this app. I've never used it or opened it either but it was taking up lots of my battery (about 1% which is a lot for an app that I have literally never opened). I'm assuming my provider (Verizon, surprise, surprise) downloaded this app automatically during an update to my phone which is fantastic, since I was never alerted of this (read: sarcasm).

Complete Battery Hog. I have to disable the web protection settings or it chews up my battery life in a matter of hours. According to my battery usage stats, Verizon's "anti-virus scanner" uses up more battery than Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and Mobile Games. On some days, Combined. Samsung Galaxy S10.

I have been a subscriber with VERIZON for about 14 yrs. I have been more than satisfied with the cell svc, their products they sell, the support teams, and most of all the protection products they offer. This particular app is of the highest quality out on the market. Can't go wrong with this one!!!

This is trouble some to me I have a 1 in the app window all of the time I do not know what to do of the 1 in the app window need help clearing the 1 in the app window . Cause of this happening to people much in proving is needed to correct the problems with this app here????? Unknown if app window problem location/link & intternet problem double check from your end.

Since the app was installed i cannot access my printer to print emails from my phone. This app sucks. I originally thought it was my printer now I am finding out it is my phone. I have been a Verizon customer for years. I am considering a switch to another company.

title: Sweatcoin ‚Äî Walking step counter & pedometer app
description:
Sweatcoin is a new breed of step counter and activity tracker app that pays you digital currency - sweat coin ‚Äì for your steps to spend on gadgets, sports kit, fitness training, healthy nutrition and much much more ‚Ä¶

Sweatcoin converts your steps into a new digital currency called "sweatcoins". Spend sweatcoins earned on goods, services and experiences with our vendor partners or other users, donate to charity or exchange them with your friends and family for whatever you fancy. 

The more you move -> the fitter and healthier you become -> the wealthier you get. 

The movement has value!

With Sweatcoin you can also exercise at home or outside and be rewarded with sweat coins. 

Sweatcoin‚Äôs activity tracker will let you keep track of your progress. 
With Sweatcoin you will be able to redeem offers for free thanks to our marketplace with exclusive discounts and products. 

Whether you want to get in shape, lose weight or keep track of your fitness level, you‚Äôll find Sweatcoin the perfect app to stay healthy. 

You can use Sweatcoin on your smartphone (Android or iPhone) and in your smartwatch (currently on Apple Watch, stay tuned for Android Wear compatibility). 

FEATURES:

Pedometer: Sweatcoin will run in the background, wasting no battery, to count your steps as a step tracker or pacer. 

Marketplace: get exclusive offers for free, prizes and discounts that you will not find anywhere else. You can redeem the coins you get by staying active, making Sweatcoin the first health-based currency ever. 

Crowdfunding: If you want, you can also help causes that matter to you with your activity. Use your earned coins to help different charity projects by the NGOs that collaborate with us. We will give these organizations fiat currency (dollars, pounds, euros) once you‚Äôve donated Sweatcoins to their cause. 

Social sharing: ever wanted to organize a step competition with your friends? or create a group with your family and collaborate towards a common goal? Stay tuned, because we are revamping Sweatcoin with leaderboards, competitions, achievements and more (these features are currently in beta, so you might have to wait a few weeks to get them). 

Set up your goal: whether you have a New Year resolution or you just want to regularly challenge yourself, you can set up a goal and keep track of it on Sweatcoin. 

Security: Sweatcoin uses its own algorithm to count your steps. That means that, unlike other apps, we don‚Äôt track your location and we don‚Äôt have to share any information with a third party. Your data is only yours (and will always be!).

We update the Sweatcoin app regularly to make earning more effective and fun for you.
Please get the latest version for our new features, performance improvements and bug fixes aimed to help you be more physically active.
Thank you for walking with Sweatcoin!
comments: App worked great for the first couple of months. Now it won't track my steps. And if it does, it says that NONE of them are convertible. I've also had a lot of issues with steps being converted to sweat coins (it will track that I've walked 12,000 steps but only convert 100). I sent a request for help and never got a reply. Read one of the responses to a review and you guys tell people to submit tickets but you have an automated message respond saying that they pretty much never check it. Wth.

Love this app, its not easy to build sweatcoins but if you save them you can earn some pretty cool stuff. I walk a ton for work so its generally easy to accumulate them. The offers update every few days so it always feels fresh. They also have awesome humanitarian causes you can donate your coins to. I would rate this app 10/5 if I could. Its engaging yet not overwhelming, one of my favorites i constantly recommend the app to my friends and coworkers

Please fix my account. I have exactly 938,814 steps that keep adding up and wont caluculate to the sweatcoins. I have the right setting and everthing and no battery saver or anything. Im not sure if there is a problem with the app or if they are just scamming me when my coins actuly start to add up after 2 years.(update) i uninstalled and reinstalled and its counting again but i lost the 938,814 steps that never got calculated. Is there a way you could put these back onto my account.

Whenever I use this app or hit 2√ó boost it starts counting steps then it will stop like every 10 to 15 sec for at least 20 sec at a time , the timer is stil going but not counting the steps . I am 67 yrs old and was so excited about this app . Some days its so hard to get started excercising but I make myself so I can stay fit. Please fix this !!!

I've been a loyal sweatcoin user for over 2 years with no issues until recently. The app will continuously stop tracking my steps for no reason. I've re-installed multiple times and it never seems to work. Some days it decides to track my steps though. It's inconsistent, I already contacted support through the app and they didn't do anything to help or seem to care. I do over 15,000 steps per day and I've been subscribing to their 30 coin/month and it's basically been a complete waste.

title: IMDb: Your guide to movies, TV shows, celebrities
description:
IMDb is the world's most popular and authoritative source for movie, TV, and celebrity information. Watch trailers, get showtimes, and buy tickets for upcoming films. Rate and review shows you've seen and track what you want to watch using your Watchlist. IMDb takes you behind the scenes with exclusive IMDb Originals, celebrity interviews, and more. Stay up to date with entertainment news, awards, and events.

Sign in to:
‚Ä¢ Get personalized recommendations for shows and movies
‚Ä¢ Track what you want to watch with your Watchlist
‚Ä¢ Rate and review what you've watched
‚Ä¢ Save your favorite theaters
‚Ä¢ Create and share lists of movies, shows, and celebrities

Discover what to watch - and where to watch it:
‚Ä¢ Browse popular favorites and personalized top picks
‚Ä¢ Compare watch options to find the best place to watch any title
‚Ä¢ Read user and critic reviews
‚Ä¢ Watch the latest trailers, IMDb Originals, and clips

Explore:
‚Ä¢ Search for more than 5 million shows, movies, and entertainment programs - and more than 8 million cast and crew members
‚Ä¢ Read breaking entertainment news
‚Ä¢ Browse quotes, trivia, and goofs
‚Ä¢ Get complete event coverage from the Academy Awards (Oscars), Golden Globes, Emmys, San Diego Comic-Con, film festivals, and more
‚Ä¢ Check out Best Picture winners, top rated movies, popular shows, celebrity birthdays, and more
‚Ä¢ Receive notifications for the latest trailers, movie showtimes, and breaking news

Check showtimes and buy local movie tickets:
‚Ä¢ Use your current location to get nearby showtimes
‚Ä¢ Sort movie showtimes by start time, end time, genre, rating, and more
‚Ä¢ Buy tickets directly from your phone or tablet

IMDb is available worldwide in English (US/UK), Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Turkish, and Hindi.

Do you think we're doing something well? Is there something we've overlooked? Please post your feedback at https://getsatisfaction.com/imdb/categories/imdb_imdb_mobile
