recentChanges: "Do you understand the words that are coming out of my mouth?" Jackie Chan understood Chris Tucker perfectly well in Rush Hour, but like each of us, even he is susceptible to a misquote. To help Jackie and you keep your ears and memory in harmony, we enhanced the quotes, trivia, goofs, and other detailed information sections on movie and TV show pages. Now it‚Äôs easier than ever to avoid embarrassing misquotes and even dig in on details on your favorite people and titles. Thanks for using IMDb!
comments: It's a great and helpful app. I only have two complaints: 1. It should be easier to organise your list. I want to put the titles in a custom order, because sorting by rating puts them in wrong order due to multiple titles having the same rating. I also think the lists should instantly update when you give a new rating, now I have to wait a while before my list gets updated

I have never had such a great, useful, dependable, easy to use, informative, and valuable app. Valuable I have won a few bucks having IDBM as my personal bet settler. You should try it, you won't regret it. I continue to explore this app and find more things I can do with it. I really can't say enough about my IMBD app

Best app ever for film or TV lovers. Truthfully use this app multiple times a day, loads over an average week. Amazing for those "what have I seen him/her in before" moments; also those "who the hell dat" moments. Also settles many marital disputes for couples that watch a lot together. Great for watching suggestions and I especially like the Prime recommendations as a Prime user. Trailers are also useful. Goofs are funny to watch out for, location & OST details Great too. Love it - thank you.

I really like this app. I can watch tv shows and movies for free. I have read several reviews about problems playing trailers or anything. I have not experienced any of these issues. Everything has played perfectly. I have only been using this app for a little while but its worth having.

Could be a little less glitchy and more user friendly but overall great app. IMDb is the best! Better than Rotten Tomatoes by a mile for sure. I have been using IMDb for twenty years now and they've always proven to be the best in collective information about a movie, celebrity, tv show, etc.

title: Phone Tracker By Number
description:
Phone Tracker by Number app is a robust and accurate GPS tracker that helps you locate your phones and your kids. It is designed to help you find your kids' location by mobile number in a very accurate and fast way. Kids' Phone tracker app enables GPS location tracking between parents and their kids in a private network. Easily add an endless number of your family kids to your network and start tracking.

 Phone Tracker Service : Happily Serving 50 Million users around the world to locate their kids and even lost phones, App is translated to 44 languages. 

Features :

‚úì Totally free for an endless number of users. 

‚úì Get GPS notifications, when one of your kids are nearby.

‚úì  Phone tracker app uses both cell tracking and GPS tracking to optimize battery usage and accuracy of the location.

‚úì Find your lost or stolen phone easily using a family member's registered phone.

‚úì The app works with all mobile network operators.

‚úì You will get an instant notification when your kids move from one location to another. No need to refresh locations to get the latest location updates.

‚úì It pinpoints your kid's exact location and provides navigational help on a map so you can route to their location.

‚úì See the battery charge level of your family kids cell phones in each location.

‚úì  See all your kids as icon on the map that shows the exact address with the battery level for each of them.

‚úì  Keep track of the current location of your own cell phone. Track and log all the visited locations since you installed the app. 

‚úì  No need to ask where is my children, the Phone Tracker app is the location finder that puts this information at your fingertips. It sends you GPS location tracking alerts when your kids are moving along the way. 

Privacy Protection : Your privacy is our top concern, The app requires too few permissions to protect your privacy. The only needed permissions is to perform the main app function about location tracking so no need to access your photos, accounts. 

 How to use it to locate kid's phone 
1. Install the app and register using your phone number
2. Inside the App tap the send invitation button and select any number of your kids.

That's it! Once your child follows the invitation link and accepts the request both of you will be connected to each other in a private network so you can locate them in every location. 

Premium features :-

‚úì You can see the complete location history.

‚úì Locate any time - Get faster location updates by the location refresh button.

‚úì No Ads - Enjoy using the app without any Ads.


This app is not a spying or secret surveillance solution and the app can not be installed remotely or secretly. To join this service the user has to install the app himself and he has to accept the location sharing request. The user can stop tracking at any time by a single tap.

We love to hear from customers. If you have an issue or suggestion, please send an email to: support@onelocator.com

comments: I paid for this application but it gives me headache. When i started to locate my husband, it worked just for a day or two but now, it doesn't work anymore. Still‚Ä¶dissatisfied with your service. I tried the "refresh" button, but it didn't work. I pay almost Ôø•800 a month. I don't deserve your poor service. Fix it ASAP!

This app has not updated since first connecting with 3 other phone numbers over 21 hrs ago. I know for a fact at least one of them is not still at home! Every time I push the Refresh button, it simply takes me to the screen to sign up for the "no ads. Premium version" for $9.00+ per month!!!

Didn't pull up nothing right. Looked up a phone number wrong name with the number. Wrong address, wrong name. Everything was wrong. Suppose to have a 21 day Free trial but everytime I look up a number or email it charge me 0.50 when it should be free. This app is no good. Give it all 0 on all levels. 4.5 is a lie should be 0.0

This app is horrible. Worse than useless really. It hardly ever updates phone locations, we're not talking a couple of hours behind but a couple of DAYS behind. Completely worthless. Even when I close app and restart it, it still won't update the locations. If you ever really needed to know where someone was this would be NO help! Don't waste your time or storage space on this app! The developers response is not true. EVERY phone we had this on had this issue!

This app was great to start off with but after a few weeks it stopped working. I still have my son's location for 4 days ago, despite refreshing numerous times. I've found the only way to get it working again is to uninstall and re-install. Not ideal. I downloaded this app so I could make sure my son was safe on his way to and from school.

title: My Verizon
description:
The My Verizon app is the all-in-one hub of your Verizon experience, allowing you to keep track of account changes, easily switch to Verizon, and much more.

With My Verizon you can:

Switch and bring your phone to Verizon in minutes with auto-detection of your device and the ability to scan your ID for quick setup. Plus, check which offers you're eligible for.

View your account in one seamless feed.

Get on-demand support tools like Live Chat and step-by-step troubleshooting instructions as needed. Need extra help? Customer service is just a tap away.

Monitor data usage via a control center that lets you see how much data is being used, who is using it and how to get more when you need it.

Change or manage your account safely anywhere, anytime. Easily switch to a different plan or go Unlimited right from your device.

Make secure payments quickly. Manage and pay your bills easily, or simply enroll in Auto Pay.

Score rewards, once-in-a-lifetime experiences and exclusive perks from your favorite brands when you register for Verizon Up.

Shop phones, wearables, smart devices and accessories right from the app, and get delivery as quickly as the same day.

Control your entire Verizon experience, in just one app.

***The My Verizon App is now also available to conveniently serve all prepaid self-service needs. Make payments, enroll in Auto Pay, monitor usage, add data or change a plan directly on your prepaid device. Managing your prepaid account on the most 
reliable network has never been easier.***

Shop phones, wearables, smart devices and accessories right from the app, and get delivery as quickly as the same day.

Control your entire Verizon experience, in just one app.

***The My Verizon App is now also available to conveniently serve all prepaid self-service needs. Make payments, enroll in Auto Pay, monitor usage, add data or change a plan directly on your prepaid device. Managing your prepaid account on the most
reliable network has never been easier.***
summary: Take control of your account. Use the App to get account info on-the-go!
developerAddress: One Verizon Way, Basking Ridge, New Jersey
recentChanges:
Discover the latest releases, like the Apple Watch Series 6.

Explore our improved app navigation, designed to make shopping and account management easier.

We‚Äôve patched more bugs and continue to monitor your feedback.


For our latest on COVID-19, go to vz.to/coronavirus.
comments: No longer is functional on my Tab S2. When opening, it now displays, "We are sorry. We are having trouble connecting". Used to work great. Now it just takes up internal storage. Normal fixes (clear cache, reinstall, etc) do not work. Worked fine until just recently. All other apps on the tablet function, as intended. Only one does not, Verizon.

While the app itself can be useful, please don't allow yourself to fall for the Verizon Up reward program that the app will nag you about incessantly. You essentially agree to allow them to spy on everything you do with your phone, and harvest all kinds of your personal data in the process, by signing up for it. They aren't trying to be your pal, they just want your consent to profit even more off of your account.

It does not save my login credentials - I have to re-log in every time I open it, even when I have "Remember Me" selected & permissions on. Logging in is a two-step process so this wastes time. This is the connection my computer uses (a jetpack) & it has a data limit so I need to track it, which means I have to put up with this every day (I haven't found the same information on the website). I didn't have this problem with the old phone, which may have had an older version of the app. Annoying.

The app keeps me up to date with my data limit, I can pay my bill, look at my bill, and get my $3.00 Amazon gift card every month with the app. Make sure you take advantage of receiving and using your $3.00 gift card every month to offset your bill. It's a nice litte bonus at the end of the month that actually helps.

Very buggy along with their website. I been trying to fix my billings, plans, add-ons for the longest time and still seem to be getting the run around. App is worthless and keeps logging me off. Broken links or none what so ever. Now I am wondering if I made the right choice. When downgrading plans, make sure to un enroll in any add-on or you won't be able to un enroll afterwards and be charge each month. Check when changing plans that you don't get hidden or added fees.

title: eReader Prestigio: Book Reader

comments: The app is one of the best apps out there but the update has not been great at all. It does not give you an option of the voice you really prefer to listen to. At the moment, it forces you listen to different unwanted voices by selecting one section. Please list the voices namely for selections if you can. For example; Brian's voice, Adam's voice, Elizabeth's voice, etc., with individually distinctive voices to be selected from.

After the update, the text-to-speech function has been over the place. Took long pauses in between sentences. Inconsistent voice between sentences. Chages pitch and sometimes voice all the the. I have been using the app for so long and this was the worst update yet. I will change it after a fix. P. S. I'm using the Google TTS

I subscribed to the wavenet text to speech but I've not been able to use it. Clicking on the play button doesn't start it. I can't load any of the voice settings either. It goes into a loop and keeps loading forever. None of the text to speech functionalities work on my device.

The updated version is somewhat better, but it still shuts off randomly. The app keeps trying to force you into a 2.99 a month deal. Wth??? Are you making the app worse so we have to purchase this addition??? Still needs improvement. The updated version in text to speech DOESN'T pronounce ANY f's in the words. Poor update needs corrected asap.

The text to speech button disappeared with the most recent update. This is sad. Used to be one of my favorite apps. Still seems to work for epubs but tts is gone for pdf. 1. Text is still copyable. 2. It was working with pdfs until the update yesterday. As i said i use the app everyday and the ability to use tts on pdf disappeared yesterday after the update. I was in ths middle of listening to a book when the update happened

title: ASMR Slicing
description:
This is the most satisfying ASMR kinetic sand simulator cutting game. It's not just kinetic sand, there are multiple other awesome objects and shapes too! You've seen it in the ASMR videos and now you get to cut and slice and dice it yourself in this simulator!


Cut, slice and dice different shapes of kinetic sand and feel the amazing ASMR satisfaction. Many different types of objects available to cut! Feel the immense satisfaction!


Game Features:

- Realistic kinetic sand cutting and slicing simulator
- Many different types of objects to cut, slice and dice
- Smooth haptic feedback
- Relaxing ASMR sounds


Play now and start cutting!

"To opt out of CrazyLabs sales of personal information as a California resident, please visit our Privacy Policy: https://crazylabs.com/app"

comments: It *used* to be great... But apparently in a recent update they now made it so that you can't control the speed of the knife cutting. You used to drag it through the shape yourself and could cut as fast or slow as you liked. Now you just tap the screen and it cuts way too fast and they RUINED it.

The cutting table is the same colour as the things that you cut so it's not 'ASMR'. I'm on level 15 and they didn't give me anything so I have to keep going on the same kind of gift again and again. Don't anyone buy this.
Love it! The asmr relaxes me, calms me down, and alot more! I recommend downloading this! Keep up the good work asmr team!
It was okay, but it kept loging me in and out and I checked my internet and other games were working so there is a problem with this game, it keeps loving me in and out so I uninstalled it

The reason why I gave 3 stars is because to many ads like everytime you do a level an ad pops up like I know yall money but dang it ain't that serious like come on so if I get tried of it I just turn off my wifi

title: Eve Period Tracker - Love, Sex & Relationships App
description:

SEX & HEALTH UNLOCKED
+ Keep track of sex, moods & PMS symptoms.
+ Quick, elegant logging at any time of day or night.
+ See your health data and PMS symptoms visualized in beautiful charts.
+ Identify trends and patterns unique to your body.
+ Daily gem delivers insights, cyclescopes, quizzes, and fascinating women‚Äôs health topics every day.

INTERACTIVE PERIOD & CYCLE TRACKING

comments: It's really frustrating to look at the dial that tracks your fertility. Sometimes I want to look ahead to see when it will be at its peak or I know my husband and I got frisky on a certain day and I want to see what the likelihood of getting pregnant was. Also, now that I am pregnant (clearly the likelihood was pretty high) it would be great if I could pause the cycle tracking. I know there's another app for tracking pregnancy, but it would be great to not have a 9 month period cycle on Eve.

I changed to Eve because I was using Glow just to track my period these days but I'm a bit disappointed. The app looks nice icons and layout but it's a bit confusing (like where do I find my daily logs?!) and I feel like Eve is 80% locked unless you are a premium user ü•≤

I only use it to track my period/what cycle day I'm on and I've never had an issue with that part. What I would like to see an improvement in: 1.) Less gendered language throughout the app. Not everyone who has a period is a woman and/or likes being referred to as "lady" or "girl". 2.) Cut out the patronising, outdated and frankly gimmicky comments about my cycle. I would much rather have an informative, comprehensive look at it, which takes into account that not everyone is the same.
Sadly none of the moods and symptoms I logged in Glow apps is available in this app. Would consider switching, but don't want to loose all the data.

I use to really like this app. You could log everything and see all your stats. Now you have to pay to get most of that. Also the community use to be very supportive. Now it's negativity, hate, and women tearing women or men down. After seeing racism was accepted on this app I will now be deleting the app and won't be returning.

title: How To Deal With Stress
description:
This app contains about How To Deal With Stress

Stress is a part of our daily lives, so learning how to deal with stress can help you in many ways. Emphasize the causes of health problems so you can help avoid health problems. People who handle high pressure situations with easier access. There are a number of reasons to learn how to deal with stress, so find here some tips and knowledge to get started.


In this app, we will disscuss the following topics:

‚Ä¢ Stress Symptoms: Physical Effects of Stress on the Body
‚Ä¢ How to Deal With Stress and Depression
‚Ä¢ 35 Ways to Deal With Stress
‚Ä¢ Dealing With Stress Before It Becomes a Problem
‚Ä¢ How to Deal With Stress with Stress Reduction Techniques
‚Ä¢ 7 Ways Mentally Strong People Deal With Stress
‚Ä¢ 10 Tips to Manage Stress
‚Ä¢ Tips for Learning to Work with Your Stress
‚Ä¢ Practical Ways to Handle Stress
‚Ä¢ 10 Stress Busters
‚Ä¢ Simple Ways to Deal With Stress at Work
‚Ä¢ How to Deal With Stress During Pregnancy


And many more..


[ Features ]

- Easy & simple guide book app
- Periodic update of contents
- Support Offline Database 
- Shareable contents
- You can ask questions from our experts
- Send us your suggestions and we will add it


A little words about How To Deal With Stress:

Did you know stress can literally eat away your brain (and potentially making you stupider)? And we‚Äôre not being dramatic‚Äîit may even kill you!

Today we all have reasons to be stressed. Maybe you feel like you‚Äôre out of depth at work or at school, maybe you‚Äôve been fighting with your significant other, or maybe there‚Äôre a lot of things to take care about your family.

We‚Äôre so used to stress that we tend to think it‚Äôs normal. But we may just be overlooking how dangerous being stressed out can be.

One way of how to deal with stress is reading a good book by fireplace on a cold evening after work. Nothing could be better.

But reading in front of the fireplace might not be what you need to relax.

What will help you deal with stress?

There are two overarching principles. Let's look at these and you can decide what is better for your situation:

A. You know what your stress is.
B. You don't know what your stress is.

First, if your stress is gargantuan and completely overwhelming, you may need to take time and careful attention to find out what is going on that is causing you your amount of stress. This is going to take some hard work on your part. You may know right now what your major life stress. You may have several overwhelming stresses.

We cannot begin to take you through the process of how to deal with stress a major life stress in this short descriptions but suffice it to say, if you are suffocating because of the pressure, you must begin addressing the issue before it sets in and creates more symptoms and illness than it is right now.


Download How To Deal With Stress app now to read more..

title: Bumble ‚Äì Dating, Make New Friends & Business
description:
Welcome to Bumble, the app where women make the first move ü¶∏‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

More than 100 million boos have registered on Bumble to create meaningful relationships, find online friends and make purposeful connections. Bumble is a dating app that allows you to make new connections, whether you‚Äôre looking for a partner in crime, a new friend to complete your group Halloween costume, or to expand your professional network spooky fast. 

Making the first move on Bumble could change your life! 

DISCOVER OUR AMAZING FEATURES
- Top Filters: Find your right date or next BFF and get an unforgettable first online encounter
- SuperSwipe: See someone you really like? Send a SuperSwipe to get their attention
- Spotlight: Get more visibility by putting yourself at the top of the stack for 30 minutes
- Travel: Match with amazing people around the world without leaving your home


CHANGING THE RULES OF THE GAME
Continue to enjoy dating as you‚Äôve always done, finding love or friends is as easy as pie on Bumble, but women always make the first move.

- Bumble is a free dating app to download and use based on respect, equality and inclusion
- On Heterosexual matches, women have 24h to start a chat and men have 24h to respond 
- Other matches have 24h to start a chat or reply before the match expires (We promise that no one turns into a pumpkin after the match expires üéÉ)
- We offer the possibility to meet people in different fields with our 3 modes, Date, BFF and Bizz


WE‚ÄôRE NOT JUST FOR DATING ANYMORE
We‚Äôre the first app that combines the possibility to date, flirt or find your new boyfriend or girlfriend, meet new friends and make professional connections in one single app.

- Use Video Chat to make or respond to a first move and to know your matches better
- Send your videos and favourite pictures while you are chatting with new people
- Hide your profile with the Snooze Mode for as long as you want (you‚Äôll still keep all your matches, because no one likes a ghost üëª)
- Link your Spotify and Instagram account to make friends and get more dates


BOOST YOUR DATES THIS HALLOWEEN WITH PREMIUM
-  See everyone who has right-swiped you (your Beeline)
-  Extend your matches by 24 hours
-  Rematch with expired connections
-  Unlock SuperSwipe, Spotlight and Travel to make the most of your profile


THE BUZZ IS REAL
Bumble is much more than just a dating app, enter the truly inclusive dating community, discover single people who are looking for the same thing as you and find that ideal partner who will make you swoon. This is our commitment to our core values:

- We believe healthy relationships are fundamental to living a productive and positive life.
- We fight against old-fashioned heterosexual relationship habits, women always take the first step. 
- We've reformed the rules of the game to change the dynamics of dating. 



---
Bumble is free to download and use and always will be! However, we also offer an optional subscription package (Bumble Boost) and non-subscription, single and multi-use paid features (BumbleCoins).

https://bumble.com/en/privacy
https://bumble.com/en/terms

comments: Filters don't work at all when you set them (ex height, distance, etc.) After a few swipes, you're not allowed to swipe for the day. This app is annoying and needs to be updated as it has a lot of potential! I don't even know how many right swipes I get! I am told that there are no matches but then when I close the app, and open it in half an hour, then I have more matches. There are so many limitations to the app. I never get notifications on my Android phone even though the settings are fine

I think bumble is terrific. It's best feature is the profiles, which have long been great at encouraging users to build something that says a bit more about them. The quick facts allow a good cross-section of a person, while the questions encourage them to open up without authoring a long profile. The 24 hour limit also applies just enough pressure to give those early conversations momentum, while letting go of connections that weren't quite there, to encourage people to find something stronger.

My dating experience on here is very satisfying, I like how the app works. However, I have issues with receiving notifications, even when turning off battery saver or putting high priority from my phone settings. And also, please PLEASE don't send a notification to all my matches when my snooze is over, or at least let me choose whether I want to send the notification or not. It's very embarrassing for me.

80% of my matches never send that first message and when you do get one and reply, its like they deleted the app altogether. Basically any match will most likely waste your time and thoughts. The app would make more sense if it was called "dream crusher" or "crush crusher". And the truth is girls are even worse at messaging first so youre system right now just doesnt work!! And not worth a penny.

Account blocked for no reason given!!...avoid this app at all costs. I've had zero success on this app since April 2020 in comparison to others. I refuse to pay for any dating service long term and I've used the premium once. I went to check this morning and my account is blocked. There are no options to appeal nor are there any options to contact for the reason in doing so. Does the 'freedom of information act' not permit you to share with me the reasons for this action to be taken?

title: Daily Bible Verses
description:
Daily Bible Verses will offer encouragement in your daily life and provide inspiration and strength as you cope with life's challenges. God's plan for your life is that you have joy and live life to the fullest. If you are feeling overwhelmed, run down, and without hope, the Daily Bible Verses can lift your spirits and give you a fresh start! 

Read the verses from the Holy Bible about encouragement and experience God's healing power for our soul. Meditate on these verses through the day and share them with your friends so you can make an impact on someone else's day!

title: Magzter: Digital Magazines & Newspapers
description:
* World's largest digital reading destination with thousands of magazines and newspapers

* Get FREE unlimited access to 5,000+ magazines, newspapers and premium stories for 7 days

* Voted the #1 digital reading destination by readers and top publishers from all over the world

Magzter, the world's largest digital newsstand with thousands of magazines and newspapers in its catalogue, will change the way you read. From automotive, business, cooking, entertainment and fashion to lifestyle, news, sports, technology and travel, Magzter has magazines and newspapers across 40+ exciting categories to cater to your varied interests.

Why you'll love Magzter?

1. Enjoy reading your favorite magazines and newspapers anytime and anywhere on the go.

2. Magzter's ezRead feature 2.0 revolutionizes the digital reading experience by presenting magazine and newspaper pages in responsive layouts that are automatically optimized for any size screen ‚Äì smartphones as well as tablets. No longer is awkward panning and zooming required to read a digital magazine/newspaper article on a small screen!

3. Access premium stories across exciting topics, curated from the best-selling magazines and newspapers.

4. Download your favorite titles and read them later even when you're offline.

5. Bookmark your favorite pages to quickly access them later.

6. Build your own follower base and share what you like from Magzter on Magzter Connect, an exciting social community within the app.

7. Enjoy unlimited reading access at Smart Reading Zones.

Top titles on Magzter

Automotive ‚Äì Autocar, Car and Driver, Hot Rod, Road & Track, Top Gear

Business ‚Äì Bloomberg Businessweek, Entrepreneur, Fast Company, Forbes, Fortune, Inc.

Cooking ‚Äì BBC Good Food UK, Bon App√©tit, Food & Wine, Taste of Home

Entertainment ‚Äì Entertainment Weekly, OK!, People, Us Weekly, TV Guide, Vanity Fair

Fashion ‚Äì Cosmopolitan, ELLE, Harper's Bazaar, InStyle, Marie Claire, Vogue

Fitness ‚Äì Health, Men's Health, Oxygen, Yoga Journal

Lifestyle ‚Äì Esquire, GQ, Maxim, The Oprah Magazine

News ‚Äì Mother Jones, Newsweek, New York, Reader's Digest, The Atlantic, Time, India Today

Newspapers ‚Äì Business Standard, Daily Mirror, Daily Star, Hindustan Times, The Guardian, The New Paper 

Science & Technology ‚Äì Macworld, PC Magazine, PCWorld, Popular Mechanics, Popular Science, Wired

Sports ‚Äì Golf, Sports Illustrated, Surfer, Tennis

Travel ‚Äì Backpacker, Country, Cond√© Nast Traveler, Lonely Planet, National Geographic Traveller (UK), Travel+Leisure

Magzter's ‚ÄúAll-You-Can-Read‚Äù subscription model, Magzter GOLD, gives users unlimited access to 5,000+ best-selling magazines (including their back issues), newspapers and premium stories for one low monthly price. Sign up for a Magzter account from the app now and enjoy 7 days of FREE Magzter GOLD access!

After the free trial, payment will automatically renew unless you turn off renewal on your account at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription month. You can manage your subscription or turn off auto-renewal by accessing your play store account.

Love reading on Magzter?

Give a shout-out to us on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/mobilemagzter/) or on Twitter (https://twitter.com/mobilemagzter).

Please visit https://www.magzter.com/privacy-policy for our Privacy Policy and https://www.magzter.com/terms-and-conditions for our Terms & Conditions.

We value your feedback and welcome any comments you may have to help improve our services. Please write to us at help@magzter.com and we'll be happy to hear from you.

comments: Did not bother using it, once I saw the selection. Not even close to texture selection, they do not even have half of the Canadian magazines. Such as Ricardo, cottage life, and many other french ones. Plus the subscription price is overpriced. I am simply trying to find something close to what texture app use to be. 14.99 for reg subscription and premium was 19.99. this was a great app pluses u could share it on 5 devices.. this is totally over priced.

Thanks for responding to my problem. Now I can read from the app. But their is one more thing which is bothering me, why I can't read curtain magazines like TIME or Wired. Whenever I open it, it says this magazine is blocked in your region. I tried changing the country in the settings but still no use. If paying and can't read the stuff I am interested in what's the use of this app anyway. Looking for a quick response.

More magazines must have easy read option. Otherwise it becomes difficult to read the magazines on the go. Secondly the app needs to have an inbuilt dictionary. If these two changes are incorporated, me being a gold member would like to say that the app is perfect...

It is easy to read what interests readers and skipping other items. Comfortable access to headlines though access to detailed articles are confined to subscribers. By grading contents, more cheaper access can be given to students and teachers who have low affordability. Special concessions can be considered for home makers - for the yeoman service they do.

Very useful app, covering wide range of magazines from diverse field at nominal pricing. One can quench their thirst of reading magazines of their interest. Useful for all age groups. Digital versions are convenient to read anytime, anywhere. It is user friendly and simple to use.

title: Lose Belly Fat at Home - Lose Weight Flat Stomach
description:
Sweat just 10 minutes a day! Lose belly fat and flatten your tummy with our short and effective fat burning workouts at home! You will get a flat stomach in just a few weeks!

Belly fat covers your abs and harms your health. It can raise the risk of high blood pressure, cancer, and other diseases. Experts have pointed out that aerobic exercises help in burning calories and boosting the metabolism. Try the aerobic exercises in this app to get rid of the annoying belly fat and improve your health.

We have prepared systematic and scientifically-proven workout plans to help you lose belly fat and get a flatter stomach in a simple and fun way. No equipment or coach needed, you can easily do the belly workout at home or anywhere, anytime.

Why choose this workout app Lose Belly Fat?
- 100% free! No hidden charges!
- Quick and effective workouts maximize fat burning.
- Requires no equipment. Burn belly fat, lose weight and stay fit with just your body weight.
- Abs workout exercise with 3 difficulty levels (easy, medium, hard) designed by experts.
- Suitable for both beginner and pro.
- Beginner friendly.
- Animation and video guidance just like your personal workout trainer.
- Track your weight loss progress.
- Daily workout tracker to track burned calories.

title: T-Mobile Visual Voicemail
description:
T-Mobile Voicemail keeps getting better and better! The latest Visual Voicemail release provides UI enhancements for Voice-To-Text and the new Scam Shield‚Ñ¢ bundle, along with continued stability and performance improvements. T-Mobile Scam Shield‚Ñ¢ allows users to identify, block, and report likely scam calls. For more information, please visit webpage t-mobile.com/scam-shield.

With Visual Voicemail you can listen to messages in any order, respond in one click, update your contacts, and easily manage your inbox without ever dialing into your voicemail. 

No need to change your T-Mobile voicemail number or to reconfigure your voicemail forwarding - Visual Voicemail activates for free at first launch. You can also upgrade to Voicemail to Text for a small monthly fee and receive all your voicemails transcribed into text directly in the application inbox, as an SMS message, or to an email address.

T-Mobile Visual Voicemail may use infrequent, free SMS messages to communicate with the Voicemail server.

An Unread Messages widget is now included with T-mobile Visual Voicemail.  On most Android devices you can add the Visual Voicemail widget by long pressing on any free space on your home screen, selecting 'Add Widgets', and choosing the Visual Voicemail widget from the alphabetical list.

summary: View and Listen to your Voicemails
developerAddress: 12920 SE 38th St, Bellevue, WA 98006
recentChanges: The latest Visual Voicemail release provides fixes for enhanced performance, Android R support and an option to save selected voicemails on device.
comments: This app is a poorly engineered solution to a fake problem. Android comes with an excellent visual voicemail system, and it worked great for years, right up until T-Mobile shut down their support for it and made me install this piece of s--t. Update Oct 2020: It's now even worse. Every time I start it, it tells me it has to delete all my voicemails because it's "associated to a different account." It then tries to sell me "text to speech." At least now I know why it exists. It's a money grab.

Breaking third party integration so they can charge $4 a month is about as "carrier" a move as you could make. Voice to text isn't worth $4/mo, but it angers me that the so called uncarrier is ruining the capability for customers using third party apps. To top it off, this app they try to force on you is buggy. Late messages, annoying and pointless notifications, trying to trick you into extra fees. Too bad we don't have an FCC willing to protect consumers from scummy companies like TMobile.

Don't know what happened but finally this app is doing what it's supposed to. I now receive notifications of new voicemails and haven't received the Dreaded daily error in about a month. 3 stars so far as I shall wait to see if this app continues to work. Still, in one way sad that my expectations were so low that now that I can receive a voicemail ( something that should be so simple) I'm excited about it.

Worse voicemail set up I have ever used!! It just flat CANNOT be depended on. Shame on t-mobile for not paying attention to consumers and not doing something about this! Just read the reviews! The factory voicemail set-ups that come with phones (samsung, ect ect) work perfectly fine. This stupid app is a joke. Come on t-mobile....figure it out!!

Terrible performing app. Never get new voicemail notifications/sync on time. I always have to go into the app and manually refresh it to watch the loading wheel turn and turn until finally the voicemail appears. Often buggy and doesn't always find the voicemail when refreshing it. Very frustrating after previously having an iPhone with wonderful visual voicemail built in.

comments: Latest update removed the widget, which is the only reason I used this dictionary app over others. The release notes don't reveal this cut (nor the removal of the offline dictionary as a free feature), so the bait and switch just leaves a bad taste in my mouth. I don't care for the redesign, but it's not as much of an issue.

Endless problems with this app, after the recent update app crashes the moment I opened it. PLUS. Offline dictionary is utter useless. I cant search for anything when I'm offline. I don't even know the download progress of my offline dictionary. I regret paying for this app. I've been forcing myself to use this cause I paid for it but now this is way too much.

EDIT I absolutely love the new layout, it's so well designed that I'm fine with this app not having a dark mode. It's a overall a great app otherwise I wouldn't pay for all the bells and whistles, however its missing a dark/black theme, if it had that it would be the perfect dictionary app üëåüòé. (Thanks for taking your time to read this)

Just updated, now it doesn't work at all. It doesn't respond to any touch. Now crashing. Now it works a little bit before crashing. All my recents and searches are gone. This is frustrating, don't mess with my recents list.

Best dictionary and dictionary app ever. The latest redesign is beautiful, the offline dictionary download has been fixed, but it seems the speed of the app when showing the definition, even after the offline dictionary is downloaded, is considerably slower than the previous version.

title: Verizon Call Filter
description:
Your phone is your door to the world, and you shouldn't open it for just anyone. With Call Filter, you can screen incoming calls, auto-block spam and report any unwanted numbers. Or, upgrade to Call Filter Plus with Caller ID for added security. Put a name to the unknown numbers, make your own personal block list, and even assess the risk level of incoming calls. Enroll today and start answering with confidence.

 

Key Features:

‚Ä¢ Get real-time alerts on your incoming call screen so you can better avoid spam calls

‚Ä¢ Automatically send spam callers to voicemail with the spam filter

‚Ä¢ Report a number as spam so you can help improve our algorithm

‚Ä¢ See each spam call‚Äôs level of risk so that you can learn more about the caller

‚Ä¢ Manage other unwanted calls with a personal spam and block list

‚Ä¢ Block all incoming calls from international numbers

‚Ä¢ Search our spam database to see if a number has already been identified as spam

‚Ä¢ Identify unknown numbers by name on the incoming call screen, call log and eligible messaging apps, even if the caller is not saved to your contacts

‚Ä¢ Seamlessly update your contacts with newly identified numbers

 

Eligible customers get a 10-day trial of Call Filter Plus. Customers can choose to enroll in Call Filter to get just the basics (spam detection, blocking and reporting) for free, or subscribe to Call Filter Plus for all that and more for $2.99 per month, per line. Accounts with 3 or more eligible lines can subscribe to Call Filter Plus (Multi-line) for $7.99/mo by logging in to My Verizon. If you choose to enroll in Call Filter or Call Filter Plus via the app, the spam filter will be automatically set to block high-risk spam callers, but you can change your block settings at any time. Data charges apply.

 

Please reference https://www.vzw.com/support/how-to-use-call-filter/ and https://www.vzw.com/support/call-filter-faqs/ for step-by-step instructions on how to use the app and answers to frequently asked questions. For additional details on Call Filter and Call Filter Plus, please see https://www.verizonwireless.com/solutions-and-services/call-filter/.

comments: Absolutely the worst...DOES NOT filter the "unknown name" calls which are usually spoofed numbers anyway, and are scammers, even though there is a feature to filter "unknown name" calls....IT DOES NOT WORK!!! Verizon and all of the other cell service providers have yet to figure this s**t out, yet expect YOU to pay your f***ing bill every month. PISS POOR SERVICE!!!

This app is horrible, If I could give it Zero stars I would. I pay every month to use this app, but blocked calls still continue to come through, I get the notifications of the blocked calls, and they are able to leave voice mails. Every time this app updates it gets worse. All the damn money I pay a month for the service would think it would be a little but better but no Verizon is rip offs! This app was great until 10 updates ago, now it's junk! If it ain't broken, don't fix it!

Piece of Junk. The thing is enabled and I still get calls daily saying I won a free stay at a Marriott hotel. This call comes from a different number every day so blocking one number (on my phone) doesn't help so I thought this app would do a better job. I'd have better luck teaching my dog long division.

I seem to get more spam calls since they implemented this than i did before it existed. Half the time, calls marked "possible spam" are my actual health insurance trying to contact me. Worst part is, they charge for a version they claim is better. Anyone risking money on this app has lost their minds!! Blocking spam calls/texts should be the DUTY of the provider; NOT a service they charge extra for.

this app works okay but it doesn't truly block calls they will burp in to let me know I'm getting a block call that certainly defeats the purpose of blocking the calls. It also allows the block calls to leave voice messages. Unknown calls and restricted calls should automatically be blocked but they aren't. Calls it do not ID the callers should be blocked also automatically.

title: How to Deal With Anxiety
description:
This app contains about How to Deal With Anxiety. Learn everything and you will find tips and knowledge to reduce even get rid anxiety in any situations.

Health issues can make your life worse and hence they must be paid due attention. There are certain health complications that show their adverse effects at once. On the other hand, there are those that gradually build up and turn into something serious even before you know about it. Anxiety is one such disorder that can turn into a monster if you do not take measures to deal with it. Panic and anxiety disorders trouble millions of people worldwide. Anxiety is related to stress and is a psychological and physiological state where the person feels disturbed emotionally and mentally. Most of the people also refer to this complication as 'slow poisoning'. You should ideally be aware of the aspects that will help you deal with anxiety. Dealing with anxiety is not a very difficult process, especially if you happen to follow the right methods.


In this app, we will disscuss the following topics:

‚Ä¢ How to Beat Anxiety Without Medication, According To a New Scientific Study
‚Ä¢ How To Deal With Anxiety The Natural Way
‚Ä¢ 5 Ways to Help Reduce Anxiety in Children with Autism
‚Ä¢ 10 Things You Should Know If Your Partner Has¬†Anxiety
‚Ä¢ How to Overcome Job Interview Anxiety
‚Ä¢ How To Handle Anxiety At Work So It Doesn't Destroy Your Whole Day
‚Ä¢ 15 Easy Ways to Beat Anxiety Now
‚Ä¢ 7 Useful Strategies for Managing Anxiety and Burnout
‚Ä¢ How To Deal With Anxiety - 12 Tips For Managing Anxiety at Work
‚Ä¢ 9 Easy Ways To Deal With Everyday Anxiety: A Doctor Explains

And much more..


[ Features ]

- Easy & simple guide book app
- Periodic update of contents
- Support Offline Database 
- Shareable contents
- You can ask questions from our experts
- Send us your suggestions and we will add it


A little words about How to Deal With Anxiety:

How to deal with anxiety and stress may be a common question asked by most of us at this time and age. We experience anxiety and stress almost everyday of our lives. It may be caused by different factors which in turn affect our work, relationships and most of all, our health. 

There is an impending need to manage anxiety and stress so that our physical and mental well being is not compromised. Inability to sleep well, headaches, mood swings and loss of concentration are just some of the negative effects they bring. Never be enslaved again with the following tips on how to deal with anxiety and stress.

Remember that you don't have control of everything that is happening around you. Focus on current and important things that you have power over. Worrying about tomorrow only brings stress over things that haven't even happened yet. Live in the now and always try to look at the positive side of any situation.

Engage in activities that will increase your self confidence. Through this, you'll have more faith in your self to overcome stressful and anxiety ridden circumstances. How to deal with anxiety and stress is also just a matter of self empowerment. Make use of your best qualities and improve on the ones where you lack.

Find a hobby or any interesting activity that you could look forward to doing at the end of the day. May it be writing in a journal, gardening, scrapbooking or baking. Use it as a way for you to relax and loosen up. Have your mind presently involved in your chosen activity and block out stressful thoughts and set problems aside. Consider it as a "me,myself and I" time where you can recharge and regroup after a long busy routine.

Keep in mind that it is only you who can make or break your day. Anxiety and stress will impede your everyday living only if you allow them to.


Download How to Deal With Anxiety app now to read more..

‚Ä¢ 15 Easy Ways to Beat Anxiety Now
‚Ä¢ 7 Useful Strategies for Managing Anxiety and Burnout
‚Ä¢ How To Deal With Anxiety - 12 Tips For Managing Anxiety at Work
‚Ä¢ 9 Easy Ways To Deal With Everyday Anxiety: A Doctor Explains

And much more..


[ Features ]

- Easy & simple guide book app
- Periodic update of contents
- Support Offline Database
- Shareable contents
- You can ask questions from our experts
- Send us your suggestions and we will add it


A little words about How to Deal With Anxiety:

How to deal with anxiety and stress may be a common question asked by most of us at this time and age. We experience anxiety and stress almost everyday of our lives. It may be caused by different factors which in turn affect our work, relationships and most of all, our health.

There is an impending need to manage anxiety and stress so that our physical and mental well being is not compromised. Inability to sleep well, headaches, mood swings and loss of concentration are just some of the negative effects they bring. Never be enslaved again with the following tips on how to deal with anxiety and stress.

Remember that you don't have control of everything that is happening around you. Focus on current and important things that you have power over. Worrying about tomorrow only brings stress over things that haven't even happened yet. Live in the now and always try to look at the positive side of any situation.

Engage in activities that will increase your self confidence. Through this, you'll have more faith in your self to overcome stressful and anxiety ridden circumstances. How to deal with anxiety and stress is also just a matter of self empowerment. Make use of your best qualities and improve on the ones where you lack.

Find a hobby or any interesting activity that you could look forward to doing at the end of the day. May it be writing in a journal, gardening, scrapbooking or baking. Use it as a way for you to relax and loosen up. Have your mind presently involved in your chosen activity and block out stressful thoughts and set problems aside. Consider it as a "me,myself and I" time where you can recharge and regroup after a long busy routine.

Keep in mind that it is only you who can make or break your day. Anxiety and stress will impede your everyday living only if you allow them to.


Download How to Deal With Anxiety app now to read more..

title: Pill Reminder & Medication Tracker - MyTherapy
description:
MyTherapy is an ad-free, award-winning pill reminder and medication tracker. But MyTherapy is more than a free medication reminder: Combining a pill tracker, mood tracker and a health journal, e.g. with a weight tracker, this medication reminder app allows you and your doctor to put your treatment‚Äôs success into perspective. ‚è∞ üíäüîî

üíäKey Features 
‚Ä¢ Pill reminder app for all medications
‚Ä¢ Pill tracker with logbook for skipped and confirmed intakes
‚Ä¢ Support for wide range of dosing schemes within medication reminder
‚Ä¢ Track your tablets, dose, measurements, activities as a comprehensive health journal
‚Ä¢ Family sharing
‚Ä¢ Share your printable health journal with your doctor
‚Ä¢ Personalized tips for your treatment
‚Ä¢ Wide range of measurements for all conditions (diabetes, rheumatoid arthritis, anxiety, depression, hypertension, multiple sclerosis) e.g. weight, blood pressure, blood sugar levels

‚è∞Comprehensive meds reminder 
We designed a medicine reminder app that puts all your medication needs in one place: Pill reminders (e.g. for birth control pills), a comprehensive database of OTC and Rx medications, support for any dosage form (tablet, pill, inhalation, ‚Ä¶) frequency, and even refill reminders. And as the app is not only a pill alarm, but also a medication tracker, you just need to check its pill diary to make sure you‚Äôve taken that important dose. 

üíäA health tracker for your needs 
MyTherapy is the result of us closely working with people taking medications. People with diabetes use the built-in weight tracker and keep track of their blood glucose. Also, they use it as logbook for insulin and a medication reminder for Metformin etc. The built-in mood tracker supports you to keep track of your mental health or depression. Review your health using the blood pressure log, your mood diary or other aspects of your health journal. MyTherapy can be a different app to many, with some using it as depression app while others refer to it as stroke app, cancer app, or weight tracker.

‚è∞A tracker for mood, weight, blood pressure and more 
You can not only log your meds, but also track your mood and general well-being in the app‚Äôs mood diary. Record measurements e.g. blood pressure and weight. If you are living with diabetes and are on Insulin, you can use MyTherapy as diabetes logbook and track blood glucose. Overall, MyTherapy supports ~50 measurements. The app‚Äôs symptom tracker is popular e.g. with users living with multiple sclerosis, rheumatoid arthritis or cardiovascular diseases such as Atrial Fibrillation.

üíäMotivation to take your meds
Receive a beautiful picture of the day as motivation to take your medicine. Involve family and friends with MyTherapy Team and successfully manage together. And you can even have your family see if you‚Äôve missed a med despite the pill reminder, so they can help you stay on track.
MyTherapy is for you, no matter if you are taking antibiotic medicines or deal with hypertension, atrial fibrillation, diabetes, rheumatoid arthritis, multiple sclerosis, anxiety or depression that are often complicated. MyTherapy is medication tracker and health journal. Have peace of mind from medicine reminders and health tracker.

üîíPrivacy
MyTherapy is available for free and no registration is required! We comply with strict European privacy laws and do not release personal data to third parties. 

üîéResearch
It‚Äôs the collaborative efforts from users, their families and medical experts that makes our pill tracker app so simple. Check out our academic research partners on our homepage.

We are constantly aiming to improve the MyTherapy app to best meet your meds tracker needs and desires. Support us with your ideas, suggestions and feedback - either right from the app or via support@mytherapyapp.com. 

https://www.mytherapyapp.com

comments: Such a great & easy to use app. It's organised & kept me on top of all my medication intakes & I love the inspiring photos each day. Only 2 niggles I have is the reminder popping up over my navigation app whilst I'm driving (although I'm sure I can sort that if I look into my settings) & that I can't save those gorgeous daily pics to my gallery; I can only do it by screenshot but again, that's probably me not spending enough time figuring that out.

UPDATE Actually getting WORSE. Loses everything. Wow get out of tracking RX if you can't make this accurate. Dangerous. Started OUT ok. However it loses track of input for mornings sometimes. So I record the medication time given along with symptoms I track. When I go back in evening for twice a day medications it will show nothing entered for morning on some days. TERRIBLE if accuracy is important. It has gotten worse lately, so maybe it doesn't work with the latest ver of ANDROID

Great, but wish the symptom tracker had more. I'm using this to track my menieres medication and symptoms and it's not accommodated. It's not a rare disease, so unsure why. Please include tinnitus, dizziness, and vertigo in symptoms. Or the ability to type in my own.

Great remeinder app for my medications. i love the fact that it reminds you to take your meds, and the reminder doesnt go away until you check it off. i can be forgetful at times and this helps so much! Thanks for the great app

Meditation list missing meds. Doesn't have a way to record insulin shots. Doesn't seem to have a way to print or email medication or dose info to my doctor. Really could use some sort of manual or built in instructions. I was hoping for more. Very disappointed.

comments: Ive read a lot of the other reviews and I don't have most of the problems that others describe. I did not expect much out of a free dating app though so it probably would've been hard to let me down... The "match" is terrible however. It wont show you who you've matched with, you have to hope that you happen to come across that person in the stack. Definitely a lot of bots but they are pretty easy to spot. Just be realistic about this and it'll be fine.

So far so good no issues. The only problem I have is when I check out profiles a lot of the profiles haven't been logged into in months. If these women haven't logged in in months POF should send them an email saying if they're not going to log into their account at least on a weekly basis the profile should be deleted. I hate leaving a message then I go and look at the profile and it hasn't been logged in three or four months. POF delete old accounts that haven't been logged in.

Does not distinguish between non monogamous and monogamous people. The search is fustrating as it's either 1 option at a time or all. ( 3 out of 4 not possible) It would be great if one could not see the same people over and over again, especially when not interested. At times, there appears to be a number of fake andor sex trade worker profiles. Other than that, this is the best free place to find your next ex. Happy fishing!

What disappoints me about this app and others is 3 things. #1.There are so many fake profiles. Unless you know what to look for you get spammed easily. #2. the inability to be more specific with your choices of what your looking for. But #3 disappoints me the most. I have X number of people that like me. Yet I have to pay to be able to even see the people who actually like me? You are going against the very purpose of the app, just to make money. No wonder people are only here for hookups. üôÑ

After the latest updates seems they changed the format like where now you can't randomly choose a particular search area and for another instance you cannot unlike any of your ( likes) unless you're a paid member or unless only the person you had liked)pops up when you open the app,, then and only then you can choose to unlike the person or pay membership fee..

title: Lose Weight App for Women - Workout at Home
description:
The best lose weight app for women to burn fat and lose weight at home! With simple and effective fat burning workouts for women, you can lose belly fat, lose thigh and arm fat. Follow the 30-day plan and take just a few minutes a day to lose weight and get in better shape!

2-7 min fast workouts and HIIT workouts allow you to lose weight and keep fit anytime, anywhere. No excuse anymore! 

You can track burned calories and weight loss progress in graphs. No gym, no equipment needed, just use your bodyweight to tone your full body and get lean muscles.

4 Difficulty Levels
Designed by professional fitness coach, it has 4 levels for everyone, both beginner and pro. Different fat burning workouts every day, you can easily stick to it.

Fast Workouts for Women
Fast workouts, with the duration from 2-7 min, are specially designed for people with a busy schedule. You can do them anywhere, office, bed, home, etc. 

Body Focus
Fat loss workouts cover all body parts that women care about, belly, thigh, arm, butt. Focus on your trouble zone, training smart and maximize your fat burning result.

HIIT Workouts for Women
HIIT (high-intensity interval training), the super effective fat burning workouts with the after-burn effect, has been compressed into 2-7 min to help you lose weight anytime, anywhere. 

Workout at Home 
Workout routines for all your main muscle groups to shape your body. No gym and expensive fitness coach needed. Just perform the simple home workout and enjoy your fat burning result at home!

Feature
- 4 difficulty levels, suitable for everyone, men, women, beginner and pro
- Fast workouts
- Low impact workouts
- Customize your own workout routines
- No equipment, no gym, bodyweight workout
- Fat loss workout, abs workout, thigh workout, leg workout, arm workout, tummy fat burning exercise for female
- Workout reminder help you be more disciplined
- Sync workout and calorie data on Google Fit
- Track weight loss progress and burned calories
- Animations and video guidance
- Increases exercise intensity gradually

Women Workout at Home 
Take a few minutes a day to blast fat with our sport and women workout at home. Workout at home for women just use your bodyweight to workout at home.

Women Fitness App
This women fitness app has lose belly fat workout and women workout. All lose belly fat workout and women workout are bodyweight workout. 

Workout for Women
Women fitness app has belly fat burning workouts, butt workout for women, arm workout for women, leg workout for women and core workout for women. The belly fat burning workouts, butt workout, arm workout, leg workout and core workout are easy and effective.

Fat Burning Workouts & HIIT Workouts
The best belly fat burning workouts for women & HIIT workouts for women. Combine fat burning workouts for women and HIIT workouts for women to get the best results.

Fitness Coach
All sport, exercise, workouts are designed by professional fitness coach. Just like having a personal fitness coach in your pocket!

Best Weight Loss Apps

comments: Wow! I am so impressed with this App! It's very easy to use. It shows you how to do the exercises and it even counts the seconds for you!!! It's definitely motivating! I LOVE this app. It's AMAZING! There are exervcises for every training. You can even do exercises in your bed and office. This is so convenient and it also tracks your exercise and reminds you to drink water. I absolutely reccomend this app. It also helps you loose weight and keep you fit. Definitely recommend downloading this! Keep up the great work! üëç

Fantastic app with great fitness features! Way better than an app I paid 20$ for 3 months for. Ladies, give this a try. I'm finding myself doing a bit more and more each day. It's fun, easy, and comprehensive, yet challenging when you're comfortable taking that next step and increasing your duration and intensity. Very user friendly: great pause/stop functions and additional direction when you need a move or pose explained in greater detail. I should of just went with this!

Best of all. I have came across several apps to give me a proper plan to stick on. Out of all this is the best. Honest opinion. I wondered how it got high ratings and I downloaded. Ended up giving high ratingüòÇ Pretty sure you will fall in love with this app. Ads aren't that disturbing and the UI is pretty descent. Be honest with the app and it will give u a very good result. Go on with it.

I thoroughly like this app, I do have one issue but it isnt enough to drop a star in my rating. I would like the option to enter in workouts I have done not on the app. I do 20 minutes of cardio every morning and would like to track that with the rest of my things on the app. I will add the water reminder is incredible to have. I hate water and will go days without 1 sip other than to brush teeth so this is a huge help. Over all I enjoy using the app.

title: Duolingo: Learn Languages Free
description:
Learn a new language with the world‚Äôs most-downloaded education app! Duolingo is the fun, free app for learning 35+ languages through quick, bite-sized lessons. Practice speaking, reading, listening, and writing to build your vocabulary and grammar skills. 

Designed by language experts and loved by hundreds of millions of learners worldwide, Duolingo helps you prepare for real conversations in Spanish, French, Chinese, Italian, German, English, and more.

Whether you‚Äôre learning a language for travel, school, career, family and friends, or your brain health, you‚Äôll love learning with Duolingo.

Why Duolingo?
‚òÖ Duolingo is fun and effective. Game-like lessons and fun characters help you build solid speaking, reading, listening, and writing skills.

‚òÖ Duolingo works. Designed by language experts, Duolingo has a science-based teaching methodology proven to foster long-term language retention. 

‚òÖ Track your progress. Work toward your language learning goals with playful rewards and achievements when you make practicing a daily habit!

‚òÖ Join the community. With 300+ million learners worldwide, you‚Äôre part of a language community on Duolingo.

‚òÖ Every language course is free. Learn Spanish, French, German, Italian, Russian, Portuguese, Turkish, Dutch, Irish, Danish, Swedish, Ukrainian, Esperanto, Polish, Greek, Hungarian, Norwegian, Hebrew, Welsh, Arabic, Latin, Hawaiian, Scottish Gaelic, Vietnamese, Korean, Japanese, English, and even High Valyrian!

recentChanges: New on Android: language tips! Tap the Tips icon next to certain skills to get helpful explanations of grammar, pronunciation and useful phrases. Now available in our Spanish, French and Chinese courses, with more to come!
comments: I loved this app before the recent update!!! Before you could practice for hours and actually get somewhere with your learning. You could make mistakes and it would push you to get it right and that was so encouraging and rewarding and you felt like you were getting somewhere. Now with the hearts, as soon as you make 5 mistakes, thats it, end of session. Awful and very deflating. Yes I could pay to upgrade, but thats ¬£7 a month, over ¬£80 for a year!!!! Very very disappointed.

Fix the problem when we change email, the app keeps remembering the previous email. Create the option to delete courses or organize them by preference. The heart system is terrible, remove it. The application has too many bugs for silly things, it does not load the option to follow, sometimes the audio doesn't work. I don't uninstall it because they asked me to use it at school, but this app is terrible.

I can only recommend the Desk Top version of Duolingo, and even that is marginal. The mobile app is cumbersome and frustrating with having to earn and buy errors, unless you spring for the Pay version. Their slogan used to be "Make learning fun and free." Wll, let me tell you, the new Hearts system is not fun. And, I think their new update is solely intended to make people buy the Plus version. Also, both versions have some of the silliest sentences to translate. Why learn them if they have no purpose? I think there are better, more efficient ways to learn a new language.

The recent update to this app has made things unacceptable. The introduction of a 'hearts' system (when you get 5 things wrong in a row, you can't progress for the rest of the day) is anathema to the process of learning. What's more, I'm relatively sure the developers changed the accepted fields of words for answers smaller (phone is no longer an alternative to 'cell phone', an Americanism used nowhere outside of the United States). This is to push users into buying a subscription. Awful.

Very disappointed with the update to the heart system. It's to slow people down? Then just limit the number of lessons per day instead of hearts, but allow unlimited practice sessions. I'm learning nothing now because it feels like a test and I get too much anxiety with those. Mistakes are NORMAL when learning a new language! Even those who speak a second language for many years still make mistakes. Who cares if people go too fast? Worry about those who don't and use the app appropriately]!]

title: Babygogo Parenting - Baby Care & Pregnancy Tips
description:
From pregnancy to support for parents with school goers, we provide support for parents end to end. Ask yours and your baby‚Äôs medical questions to doctors live on the app, track your child‚Äôs growth with our growth chart, set vaccination reminders and store medical documents using Babygogo!

We also have 1000+ short, easily readable parenting articles that cover every possible parenting issues along with useful videos and graphics. 


What can you do on the Babygogo App?


    a) Interact with the community, read, watch and write

You can talk to doctors and experts about yours and your baby's health anytime you want for free. Our strong community of parents are here as a support group to help you through the challenges of parenting - be it regarding baby care or guidance and comfort for you. 

We understand the length and depths of the parenting challenges you face and hence have created 1000+ articles, albums and videos on baby care, baby development & baby food and immediate answers to all your baby health questions. 

We have an extensive list of articles and videos on baby food including food charts and nutritious recipes for weaning babies to school-goers. Our community also has parenting experts who conduct highly interactive weekly sessions that are beneficial for mommies and children!

title: Digital Secure
description:
Protect your private information from digital threats. 
Digital Secure is a one-stop suite of privacy and security tools for your mobile devices and home computers. Safeguard your internet connection and personal data with antivirus, anti-malware and identity theft protection so you can browse with peace of mind. 

Here‚Äôs what you‚Äôll get with Digital Secure.
You‚Äôll get free security and privacy tools, plus you can get advanced protection for $5/mo per line or $10/mo per account.

1. Security and Privacy
Protect your device from online threats and get around-the-clock peace of mind. 
Get warnings when connecting to an unsecure network, visiting risky websites or attempting dangerous downloads. Plus, you‚Äôll be able to see how installed apps are currently using your personal information. 

2. Safe Wi-Fi 
Connect with confidence to any public Wi-Fi. 
With Digital Secure, it‚Äôs easy to make any Wi-Fi connection private. You‚Äôll get an on-the-go secure VPN connection so you‚Äôll be able to keep personal data and online activities to yourself. 

3. Identity Theft Protection (IDTP)
Take control with always-on IDTP and social media monitoring, dark web surveillance and theft alerts.
24/7 cyber monitoring means you can be notified if we detect any personal information you‚Äôve asked us to monitor is shared online. You‚Äôll also get step-by-step guidance from recovery and replacement specialists if essential items such as credit cards and IDs are lost.

comments: Last update on Google play was sept 16, and today Oct 10 I am told my app is out of date. This is a security app, not tetris. Also, won't start automatically after restart sometimes. I have to manually start it (if I notice it's not running).

Hello, my phone has been spammed. I thought this app is supposed to protect against that. Now I don't know how to stop the spamming. I keep getting messages that my phone will be locked if I don't install and pay for Spam protection.

I haven't done the September update. I've read many customer comments and notice that the one common aspect to each one is the canned set of replies from the Verizon Care correspondent. Notably, that in each instance, the tone and tenor of the reply is condescending in a passive-aggressive manner. For example, inviting the dissatisfied customer to take yet another step, reaching out to customer care, to describe "your problem", again? It's a Verizon or digital secure problem. Start there eh?
Still kinda on the fence with this app since switching over from a very corrupt AT&T. I can say that because I've been with them for over 20 years. They went bad about 4 years ago. Thank you Verizon.

title: Wi-Fi Utility
description:
The Wi-Fi Utility app is a factory installed app for your mobile device that finds, manages, and automatically connects to available Wi-Fi hotspots. The app helps increase your device‚Äôs Wi-Fi connections while minimizing your cellular data consumption by only turning Wi-Fi on when and where needed.
 
This app is intended solely for TracFone Wireless or its brands subscribers.  Only active subscribers will receive the full benefit.

Improved Stability, and added Device Pulse features to the app. This allows a user to have a one stop access to important subscription and device information.

This release also provides for the Network Optimizer feature. This allows for continual improvements to call reception and network quality.

This application is to be used by handsets sold by TracFone Wireless Inc. only.
comments: Pre-installed app that you can't uninstall and constantly sends notifications about connecting to wifi. I pay for enough data to never use wifi and have zero interest in ever using WiFi. Thanks for nothing in advance because I'm sure there's going to be a copy paste response to this. I'm not interested in speaking to a rep and none of the other people in my situation are either. Just tell us how to uninstall this annoying app.

One of the worst apps. Not neccessary for me. Turns Wi Fi on when I am not using Wi Fi and drains my battery. I turn Wi Fi OFF ON PURPOSE. Yet this app thinks it knows more than me and turns it right back on behind my back. I have a weak battery and need all the power I can get. Get rid of this app.

Slow even when new data and brand new phone. This is open to become a serious. Its constantly running apps that are draining my limited wifi off my pc and never has any wifi on my data but sure wipes put my router. Im having to turn my phone completely off just to save my internet and my fata was talen by brand new minutes on my monthly data i pay for but iss not there. Only my home wifi thats being savaged by this app. Ive got little to zero satellite data left with the unauthed install. Smdh

For those of us who have unlimited data, This app is to shift the burden of providing internet off of mobile carriers and force other internet providers to supply service. It's a little like stealing. BTW most public wifi providers mandate that you can't re-sell their service...

Annoying... I turn my wifi off and it randomly turns it back on. This shouldnt even be a thing as it could auto connect you to dangerous hotspots that some people have put up just for the purpose of data theft.

title: Microsoft OneNote: Save Ideas and Organize Notes
description:
Organize your thoughts, discoveries, and ideas and simplify planning important moments in your life with your digital notepad. Microsoft OneNote lets you take notes on your phone and sync them across all your devices.

With OneNote, you can plan a big event, seize a moment of inspiration to create something new, and track your list of errands that are too important to forget. Take notes, write memos and make a digital sketchbook right on your phone. Capture pictures and add images to your notes.

Sync notes across your devices to access them anytime, anywhere. Save ideas and check your list at home, in the office, or on the go across your devices. Search your notes quickly and effortlessly.

Take notes, share ideas, organize and collaborate when you download Microsoft OneNote today. 

Capture Content And Get Organized
‚Ä¢ Write notes, draw and clip things from the web to get your thoughts down into your notebook.
‚Ä¢ Use OneNote‚Äôs flexible canvas to place content anywhere you want.
‚Ä¢ Scan documents and business cards straight into OneNote.
‚Ä¢ Save pictures and images to your notes.

Take Notes And Achieve More
‚Ä¢ OneNote is a digital notebook that brings 3-ring binders to the digital era. 
‚Ä¢ Organize notes with sections and pages to separate thoughts by theme at school, home or work.
‚Ä¢ Organize your notes using to-do lists, follow up items, marks for what‚Äôs important and custom labels.
‚Ä¢ Use OneNote as a notebook, journal or a notepad.

Save Ideas At The Speed of Light
‚Ä¢ OneNote syncs your notes across all devices and lets multiple people work on the content together, at the same time.
‚Ä¢ Use the notepad to list your thoughts down whenever something crosses your mind.
‚Ä¢ Notepad badge hovers on screen and lets you quickly write your thoughts down any time.
‚Ä¢ Sticky notes are helpful for quick memos.

Collaborate and Share Notes
‚Ä¢ Take meeting notes, brainstorm projects, draw attention to important points and organize key resources.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate in real time to stay in sync and on the same page.
‚Ä¢ Take notes and save ideas across your favorite devices, no matter what device your team likes to use.
‚Ä¢ Take notes during classes or meetings, mixing in text, voice, ink and web clippings.
‚Ä¢ Search your notes with a fast and powerful search function

Better Together With Microsoft Office
‚Ä¢ OneNote is part of the Office family and works great with your favorite apps, such as Excel or Word, to help you do more.

Write notes, save ideas and keep up with your to-do list with Microsoft OneNote.

You can find answers to frequently asked questions about OneNote for Android at http://aka.ms/OnenoteAndroidFAQ

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Requires Android OS 5.0 or later.
‚Ä¢ A free Microsoft account is required to use OneNote.
‚Ä¢ OneNote opens existing notebooks created in Microsoft OneNote 2010 format or later.
‚Ä¢ To sync your notes to OneDrive for Business, sign in with your organization‚Äôs Office 365 or SharePoint account.

This app is provided either by Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft‚Äôs End User License Agreement (EULA) for Terms of Service for OneNote on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: https://support.office.com/legal?llcc=en-us&aid=OneNoteForAndroidLicenseTerms.htm. Microsoft‚Äôs privacy statement is available at https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-us/privacystatement
