comments: UPDATE: Issue has been fixed. Full functionality restored. OLD: Ever since the update (10/5/20), I'm unable to add anything to my notes. When I click on the page the app restarts. I uninstalled/reinstalled the app with the same results. I need this to function as I use it to take notes in meetings. This is installed on a Chromebook running the most recent OS.

Recent update fixed issues I was having with trying to type, but then OneNote would close. Only giving 4 stars as I would love to be able to have some keyboard shortcut functions available since I am using a Pixel Chrome Tablet as if it were a PC. Otherwise, I love using OneNote.

I've wanted to take digital notes for a while, but I havn't been able to find an app that was efficient. This is the first app that has worked for me, and I absolutley love it. The color choices are awesome, and I love the ability to type, draw, insert pictures, and so much more. I would 10/10 recomend this to every android user.

The major problems I've been facing while using OneNote on my Samsung Tablet are - 1. Closing a notebook takes a lot of time. 2. There is no way of knowing how much is synced and how much is not. 3. Syncing takes a lot of time too. 4. They have given a provision of deleting a notebook from OneDrive, but it doesn't really go away from OneNote after deleting. 5. It doesn't work when the device is connected to Internet. It keeps lagging and sometimes even crashes.

Best Note App Ever. It sync to most of my devices. So I do not need my specific device to retrieve all my notes. It works even better with paste it notes. So handy for short reminder. I do online recording video and OneNote sync well with my phone and desktop. So I don't even need to buy additional USB writing pad. My Note8 and now Note10 will do the trick! Highly recommended for those taking a lot of notes and also using Windows to sync 'among' devices. My phone, laptop and desktop!

title: Wattpad - Read & Write Stories
description:
Wattpad. Where stories live.
Discover the world's most-loved social storytelling platform. Wattpad connects a global community of 90 million readers and writers through the power of story. Download it today to start reading or writing original stories.

Get your story discovered
Have your own story to tell? Get it discovered through the power of community and technology on Wattpad. Share an original story on Wattpad and share it with our community who are there to cheer you on throughout your writing journey. Think your story could be the next blockbuster? Wattpad Studios discovers untapped, unsigned, and talented writers on Wattpad and connects them to global multi-media entertainment companies.

Read original stories
Discover stories in over fifty languages from writers around the world! Whatever you‚Äôre into reading‚Äîromance, science fiction, mystery, comedy, action adventure, fantasy, young adult fiction, or fanfiction‚Äîit‚Äôs all on Wattpad. So whether you‚Äôre looking for more LGBT meet-cutes, cyberpunk fairy tales, or new technothrillers to devour, you‚Äôll find it all, and so much more, on Wattpad.

Connect with a community of story-lovers
When you join Wattpad, you become a member of an international community of story-lovers. Connect with other passionate readers & writers, comment directly in stories as you read them, and support writers as they create and share their original stories. You can even read together and share your library or create reading lists so your friends always know what you‚Äôre reading.

Start your own free library
Save your favorite stories to keep them with you wherever you go. Hooked on a story? Simply sync your account to easily pick up where you left off, whether you‚Äôre on your laptop, tablet, Kindle or iPhone.

Read the stories that inspired blockbusters
If you‚Äôve seen The Kissing Booth on Netflix, streamed Light as a Feather on Hulu or read New York Times best-seller Anna Todd‚Äôs series After, you may not know‚Äîthese stories were first discovered on Wattpad. Join the platform the entertainment industry scours to find its next big hit, and start reading tomorrow‚Äôs box-office sensation today.



Already a Wattpad fan? Follow us on Instagram, Facebook and Twitter to stay up-to-date on your favorite writers, stories, contests, and more!

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wattpad/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wattpad/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wattpad

comments: I LOVE THIS APP. I've had it for about 2 years now and it works perfectly. The updates are working and I don't experience any glitches and problems. All my favourite books are written on the app and getting to know the writers and the rest of the Wattpaders is really awesome and fun. I can write my chapters properly, only problem is, I'm worried it does not save or publish properly as it gives me false information and can be confusing. But nonetheless, great reading app!! Highly recommended.

Helloooo. I'm writing this to say that I like the previous version of wattpad. When I open the app, it doesn't take long for the stories to appear. Now, I still need to open the internet to see my library which is a bit of a hassle. If I may recommend, please return the previous versions. The one without the need to download offline stories, because seriously, I don't like the update. I've been on wattpad since 2011 and so far, this is the worse update for me.

The app itself is good but lately, i have been experiencing a lot of events such as one time I was writing a story that was worth about 600+ words but then a warning popped up saying "wattpad has suddenly stopped" which as you may know, all of the things i written wasn't saved. It broke my heart because I've been wanting to finish i but I have to restart and write it again. I hope that you can fix this. If so maybe the problem is my device.

I'm using wattpad since 2014. Every year I saw how it changed. I'm missing the old wattpad when there is no Ads (every chapter), you can read different stories without paying for it, and you can add many stories in your library. Idk, what are the creators are thinking, lol. I just hope that the next update will get more better (lessen the ads and remove the limit of stories you can add in your library for offline reading)

I totally want the Old Wattpad back. Everything is far different of what I used to love about this app. I've been using this app for almost 10 years and I know that the creator wants to improve it and earned money from it but this is too much. I have been experiencing some moments when I can't read because I need to connect to Internet but I'm already connected and that confuse me...

title: Camfrog: Chat Flirt Video, w/ Strangers & Friends
description:
Meet, flirt, chat with millions of members who are waiting to meet you! Be anonymous, chat with strangers, or be your true self chat to meet, flirt, and connect with people all over the world! 

Camfrog is video chat community that allows people to make new connections globally, on any compatible device! A stranger is just another friend waiting to be met, what are you waiting for? 

Camfrog provides free group video chat to meet new people and connect you with pals, peers, and find friends around the world. Join one of our thousands of group chat rooms to text, voice, and video chat live about music, politics, sports, and more ‚Äî whatever your interests, there‚Äôs a world of friends ready to talk. You can also use Camfrog to have private video calls with anyone you like.

Cam up for karaoke, find friends or meet new people internationally from the comfort of your computer or mobile device. Want a private conversation? Message or video call your pals directly with our one-to-one messaging capabilities to create your private chat room.

With more than 20 years of experience in social technology and video call, Camfrog is ready to help you meet new people and find friends through live group video chats or private video calls. Download the free app and explore our chat rooms now to video chat and find friends:

-FREE: text, voice, and live video chat with friends are free with download; upgrade to view more cams, join more chat rooms simultaneously, meet more new people and find more friends. Plus, no extra fees for international messaging or video call. Whatever your budget is, video and voice chats allow you to easily meet new people and find friends on Camfrog.

-EARN REWARDS: Earn free Virtual Gifts when you complete daily streaks like going on cam in a group chat or sending gifts everyday! Watch your progress increase toward earning free gifts!

-EXCLUSIVE VIRTUAL GIFT STORE: send and receive virtual stickers and gifts exclusive to the Camfrog ecosystem, with special appearances from pop culture characters and brands you love; when you start a live group video chat or private video call, try sending gifts as an icebreaker with a hello message to meet new people and find friends. Each gift sent or received earns points toward special status as a Camfrog member.

-DYNAMIC AND ADAPTABLE: works on any device. Camfrog will even run in the background of your device if you want to listen to your favorite chat room, have a private video call or live video chat with a friend while you do something else. Never miss a great moment (or international video call) again.

-PUBLIC OR PRIVATE: for the social butterfly looking to start a live group video chat, meet new people and find friends, join one of our thousands of live group chat rooms and hop on cam for a group video call; if you want something more private, try text messaging, video calling or voice calling your pals in a private one-to-one chat room.

-INTERNATIONAL COMMUNITY, LOCAL FLAVOR: whether you‚Äôre looking to meet new people, find friends, video call new friends, learn a new language, rock out to your favorite song, examine the social issues in your city elections or just start a live group video chat with like-minded people, Camfrog has a chat room for you. Can‚Äôt find a specific topic? Create a group and host your own chat room.

-UNLIMITED VIDEO: view an unlimited number of high-quality live cams in groups and rooms that interest you. Camera shy? Socialize via voice and text chat to meet new people who are live before hopping on a live group video chat or one-to-one private video call with someone.

If you like our apps, please take a moment to rate us. For bug reports or complaints, email helpdesk@camfrog.com. We read and reply to every message.

Like Us & Stay Connected!
Facebook: @Camfrog
Twitter: @Camfrog
Instagram: @CamfrogLive
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/camfrog
 
Terms of Service: http://camfrog.mobi/terms
Privacy Policy: http://camfrog.mobi/privacy

comments: Have tried on Google and Apple phones getting worse too many guys that won't leave you alone good chatting option is worthless screen sizes for the phone ridiculous. 100 2 1 finding a female without being redone by constant man I spend more time blocking and kicking off guys watching me when my profile clearly says I'm straight and just looking for females but spend more time just kicking creepers you can't even try to communicate with female for you have 10 dudes wanting to see you naked
Too many ads now popping up, and annoying volume boost when entering room.

Don't touch camfrog cloud rooms. It asks you to verify details including bank account. If you do not verify, account gets banned until you do. Your backed into a corner.....stay away from it ! Coming from an old user. title: ZINIO - Magazine Newsstand
description:
ZINIO is the world‚Äôs first and largest digital newsstand, giving you access to magazine content from the best publishers across the globe. For over a decade, Zinio has delivered over half a billion digital issues in over 200 countries.

Download ZINIO‚Äôs award-winning Android app, trusted by millions of magazine readers around the world. With over 6,000 magazines available, you can browse magazines and articles on your favorite mobile or desktop device. Access your magazines anytime, anywhere - read them online or save them to read offline!

Featuring the best in Tech & Science, Food & Home, News & Business, Art & Photography, Lifestyle & Hobbies, Fashion & Entertainment, ZINIO connects you with the stories that shape our world from the magazines that matter to you.

Subscribe or buy single issues of your favorite magazines, or read free articles curated every day by our editors, from the most popular magazines across the world.

KEY FEATURES:

‚Ä¢ OPTIMIZED FOR YOUR DEVICE: Easily toggle between the traditional magazine layout and the innovative text mode for a seamless reading experience, built for your Android device

‚Ä¢ DISCOVER, SHOP, AND ENJOY: The largest collection of digital magazines from around the world

‚Ä¢ EXPLORE FREE ARTICLES: Read select articles for free

‚Ä¢ OFFLINE READING: Download your magazines to your device to read them whenever and wherever you want, even without an internet connection

‚Ä¢ EXCLUSIVE SAVINGS: Access deals exclusive only to Zinio and save on your favorite magazines

‚Ä¢ BOOKMARK AND SHARE: Bookmark articles to read later, or share them with your friends

‚Ä¢ NEW ISSUE ALERT: Be the first to read the latest issues of your favorite magazines with new issue reminders

‚Ä¢ GLOBAL NEWSSTAND: Our magazines come from all of the best publishers worldwide, including USA, Canada, UK, Australia, Africa, Asia and Europe


CONNECT WITH US ON YOUR FAVORITE SOCIAL CHANNELS
Like us on Facebook (facebook.com/zinio) & follow us on Twitter (@zinio).

‚Ä¢ DISCOVER, SHOP, AND ENJOY: The largest collection of digital magazines from around the world

‚Ä¢ EXPLORE FREE ARTICLES: Read select articles for free

‚Ä¢ OFFLINE READING: Download your magazines to your device to read them whenever and wherever you want, even without an internet connection

‚Ä¢ EXCLUSIVE SAVINGS: Access deals exclusive only to Zinio and save on your favorite magazines

‚Ä¢ BOOKMARK AND SHARE: Bookmark articles to read later, or share them with your friends

‚Ä¢ NEW ISSUE ALERT: Be the first to read the latest issues of your favorite magazines with new issue reminders

‚Ä¢ GLOBAL NEWSSTAND: Our magazines come from all of the best publishers worldwide, including USA, Canada, UK, Australia, Africa, Asia and Europe


CONNECT WITH US ON YOUR FAVORITE SOCIAL CHANNELS
Like us on Facebook (facebook.com/zinio) & follow us on Twitter (@zinio).
summary: Read your favorite magazines on the world's first and largest digital newsstand
developerAddress:
Zinio Systems, Inc.
575 Lexington Ave
New York NY 10022-6102 United States
recentChanges:
* Minor fixes, updates, and performance improvements

For more information, please visit: support.zinio.com
comments: Constant download errors until update fixed the problem. Works as advertised now! Thanks for fixing.

Almost unusable. My subscriptions expired, but I never received an email informing me about that. When I ran the app it never notified me about expired subscriptions. When I tried to open a magazine, it simply wouldn't open - no error message, just eternal spinning waiting icons. I only realized what the problem was when I was able to open older issues but not newer ones. I tried to purchase a new subscription, but wasn't able to find any way to accomplish the task - I could only find an option to buy an individual issue, which was NOT what I wanted. I've had it with this really crappy app. I'm switching to Readly.

I have been using Zinio for quite awhile now. Magazines downloads are high quality. No problem there. The reason I am leaving Zinio is the constant barrage of offers and sales notifications. If you want to be notified when a magazine is ready for download you also get their marketing notifications. It's constant and there is no way to opt out from them.

Just like everyone else, cannot log in after a factory reset, says a unexpected error has occured and check conection when conection is 100% ok. Also need the ability to store magazines on sd card as this app eventually will fill internal memory so you have to ditch previous magazines that you have paid for to read new editions. Just not good enough. The app also says that if i log out all previous magazines will be lost, WHY? We need to have the choice to SAVE with the option to save as a pdf

I can redo the review as Zinio did sort out a problem that meant I could not get recent editions like several other reviewers. Unexpected error try again, network. All reviewers got the same cut & paste answer After uninstalling and re- installing 3 times over several days it finally worked again. Seeing the app version numbers my suspicion is a faulty update caused the problems. The last re install had a different app revision. Zinio could have been more upfront if this was the problem.

title: Free phone calls, free texting SMS on free number
description:
Houseparty with Dingtone group chat!
Dingtone, a free calling app allows you to make unlimited free phone calls, send free text messages to anyone. Dingtone also gives you a free number as 2nd line, a real phone number with local area code for free calling and free texting. You can call any mobile/landline phone numbers in over 200 countries and regions, your friends don‚Äôt need to install the app. 

Make free phone calls and send text messages
Get real phone numbers for your phone/tablet
Cheap or free international calls to 200+ countries and regions
Local phone numbers for you to choose: US, Canada, UK, Belgium, Netherlands, Australia, France, Sweden, Mauritius, Poland, Austria, Indonesia, Puerto Rico, Czech Republic, Malaysia, Denmark, Romania 
Free calls or texts to friends and families
Group phone calls and conference calls


Get a real US phone number for free
Add 2nd, 3rd line to your phone/tablet 
Call & text to any phone numbers for free


Free Calls & Free Texting
Dingtone lets you make unlimited free internet calls to anyone over WiFi, 3G/4G data network without using any cell minutes; Invite your family members and friends to use the free phone call app for free internet calling and free SMS, and start saving money now.

Real US Phone Numbers
Get a real US phone number as a second line without adding an extra SIM card. Enjoy crystal-clear phone calls and unlimited texts on phones and tablets.
 

Cheap or Free International Calls
Call any mobile/landline phone numbers in over 200 countries and regions at super low rates. Calls between Dingtone users are free. Caller ID is supported so that your friends know it is you who are calling.

Crystal Clear Calls
Voice calls are transmitted on Dingtone's high-quality dedicated VoIP network. With HD voice technologies, most free online calls between Dingtone users have superior clarity to existing regular phone service. Free calls and cheap calls are no longer cheap quality! With Dingtone, you can make or receive calls even under bad cellular reception.

Walkie Talkie Re-invented
Tired of typing text messages on the small screen? Dingtone transforms your phone into a real Walkie Talkie - simply push a button and speak. It works like a two-way radio! Push to talk and voicemail are perfectly tied into one clean interface. 

Amazing Premium Features
Dingtone provides various Premium features including visual voicemail, call blocking, call forwarding, call recording, etc.

Why use Dingtone?

Dingtone is super simple and fast. You can use it when you have no cell minutes or under bad cellular. Just download Dingtone and you can make free international calls, send free SMS.

Free phone calls home and abroad
Unlimited text messages to/from anyone
Great call quality, hd voice over cellular data & wifi
Walkie talkie mode for instant push to talk
Group conference calls up to 8 people
Group messaging with up to 100+ people

The best free calls & free texting app ever.

Learn more at http://www.dingtone.me
Need Help? http://dingtone.me/support

comments: Worst texting app for many reasons, first of all I earn credits but it uses them if I receive messages, but worst of all it makes bots to text you to use up all your credits, I've had over 60 credits and now all gone because they put bots to take your credits for receiving messages. You sometimes dont even get your messages on time at all. The offers never work. Worst texting app and if you wanted to text or call you might as well pay for a carrier service. Dont install or waste your time....

This app is really great if you know your email password. But, I finally found mine, and used it, and this app is great! You can call and text. obviously. But you just watch videos to get credits, and watchibg videos to talk to people isn't bad compared to paying each month. This app os great. LOVE IT!!!!

Typical Wifi texting App, filled with Ads nonstop and left to right. I forgot when I re-downloaded this you have to have "credits" that expire every 48 hours to text anything or call anyone which is so stupid. To get more credits you have to, you guessed it sit through 15 second to 1 minute adds for half a credit to 1 full credit each. I would've skipped the download button and tried remembering which other App is the REAL free one and doesn't use credits. Don't download, find other free one.

I accidentally un install the apps, I tried to install again and log in my email address but I can't log in even if I click the forgot pass word. Please help me. This is my second time, before you don't take an action about my problem on this apps. All my credit I didn't use it. Waste of time.. grrrr. I will rate your apps if you fix my problem.

I'm only giving 4stars easy to understand and set up, but I haven't tried calling with it, and have not received any calls yet, I'll be sure to edit the rating for you, ü§û,ok I have had this app for a while now and I absolutely love it, clear calling, easy to use and understand, I have shared with many friends and family, keep up the good work and THANK YOU üòâüòâ

title: Google Voice
description:
Google Voice gives you a phone number for calling, text messaging, and voicemail. It works on smartphones and computers, and syncs across your devices so you can use the app in the office, at home, or on the go.

NOTE: Google Voice only works for personal Google Accounts in the US and G Suite accounts in select markets. Text messaging is not supported in all markets.

  You're in control
  Get spam filtered automatically and block numbers you don‚Äôt want to hear from. Manage your time with personalized settings for forwarding calls, text messages, and voicemail.

  Backed up and searchable
  Calls, text messages, and voicemails are stored and backed up to make it easy for you to search your history.

  Manage messages across devices
  Send and receive individual and group SMS messages from all your devices.

  Your voicemail, transcribed
  Google Voice provides advanced voicemail transcriptions that you can read in the app and/or have sent to your email.

  Save on international calling
  Make international calls at competitive rates without paying extra for international minutes with your mobile carrier.

  Keep in mind:
  ‚Ä¢ Google Voice is currently only available in the US. Google Voice for G Suite users is available in select countries. Check with your administrator for access.
  ‚Ä¢ Calls made using Google Voice for Android can be placed through a Google Voice access number. All access number based calls use the standard minutes from your cell phone plan and may incur costs (e.g. when traveling internationally).

developerAddress: 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View 94043
recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Stability and performance improvements.
comments: Google Voice no longer works with the latest, official messaging app. Google is forcing us to use the Carrier Number, now. So, this app is no longer properly integrated with the Google ecosystem as it exists in 2020. It's so disappointing that I have to port my decade-old number BACK to the carrier just to use the latest default messaging app. What a mess, so frustrating, but I guess not the worst thing to happen in 2020 :/

I love Google Voice! When COVID-19 closed the schools I was able to keep in touch with my students and their parents without giving away my personal mobile number. I can call and send/receive texts on my phone and my computer. The best part is that I can copy text messages in their entirety and paste them directly into my Parent Contact Log. Indispensable!

Ive been with Gmail and Voice since they were in beta and invitation only. All they've done is improve over time. Always great call quality and its allowed me to always have the same number without caring about delays around porting my number when I've changed my carrier. Its the only number I give out. I never get spam or fraudulent calls. I suppose it's because of all that Google AI special sauce. Keep up the good work!

Works great on my primary mobile device, but will not receive calls on my spare phone. This appears to be a product defect, which limits GV's portability. Looking forward to a fix, which would earn it a full 5-Star rating from me. Update: Developer contacted me and it appears that I missed a key step. My bad. GV now rings through to both my primary, and spare phone. Upgrading to 4 stars. My secondary phone, LG Rebel 4, will vibrate only.

When people call, it goes straight to voice-mail. Even tho I have answered the call. They are leaving a message and I can here them and they can hear me and we both can hear the voice-mail recording but can't stop it. And 3 times I have been in the middle of a conversation with someone and it switches to a completely random person that I didn't call...and the person i did call can still hear our conversation (me and the new person) but we cant hear them. I will never use this service again.

title: The Grand Mafia
description:
Are¬†you¬†ready¬†to become the most legendary Mafia Boss?

Since¬†the¬†death¬†of¬†our¬†Old¬†Godfather,¬†the¬†Family¬†has¬†been¬†missing a strong¬†leader, one¬†that¬†can¬†unite¬†all¬†the¬†mafia¬†gangs.¬†You must¬†find¬†and recruit talented¬†individuals¬†from all corners of the¬†underworld¬†society,¬†ranging¬†from¬†thieves¬†and¬†mercenaries¬†to¬†athletes¬†and¬†businessmen,¬†to¬†strengthen¬†your¬†crew.¬†Fight,¬†dominate¬†and become the criminal mastermind who can¬†take¬†over¬†the¬†whole¬†underworld!

[Game Features]:

‚òÜTake Over the Underworld‚òÜ

Players will need to take on the law and battle other players to control the cities they reside in. Businesses will be up for grabs. Citizens seeking a better life will look to you as their savior. You will entice models and celebrities to join your life of crime with your dashing looks and mysterious charisma!

‚òÜLots of Thugs to Choose From‚òÜ

There are many different types of thugs within the game. Bruisers, Hitmen, Bikers and Mortar Cars are all at your disposal! Each type of thugs have their own stats. You will need to upgrade your loyal minions and choose the formations of your crews wisely. There will be times when you need to be aggressively offensive, times when you need to be overly defensive, and then there will be times when you need to have stealth on your side!

‚òÜTons of Faction Events‚òÜ

Once you have joined a Faction, you will be able to take part in numerous weekly and seasonal events. Want to take over the local government together? Want to clean up the streets of any unworthy punks who want to criticize your reign of terror? Stay tuned for various cool competitions!

‚òÜCustomizable Strategies‚òÜ

Every player will be able to develop their criminal empire differently. There are different skills, stats, characters and upgradable content within the game, which require your attention to strategy to individualize your army with fully-fledged mechanics. 

‚òÜConstruct, Invest and Date‚òÜ

How will you prioritize the development of your criminal empire? Will you take over local businesses? Invest in the right strategic upgrades? Improve the look of your Turf, so that it strikes fear into your enemies? Perhaps you‚Äôll just make everyone around you jealous by dating all the local hotties when they realize you‚Äôre the slickest crook in town!

‚òÜDifferent Styles of Fighting‚òÜ

This game offers various types of battles. Sometimes you will need to choose your special characters to tackle harder opponents. At other times you will have to organize massive Crews to invade the turfs of other players. There are be both interactive and idle battles to choose from!

‚òÜWorldwide Online Tournaments‚òÜ

You won‚Äôt be alone in this pursuit to live a life of a Mafia Boss! You will compete with players from all over the world to reach the top of your criminal career. Will you join forces with them to form a Faction, or meddle in their operations to take them down? Who will become the next godfather? Your actions will determine your fate!


Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/111488273880659
Official Line: @thegrandmafiaen
Official e-mail: tgmafia@yottagames.com

‚óèTips
‚Äª The app is free to download. There is some paid content available via in-app purchases.
‚Äª Please pay attention to your gaming time and avoid addiction.
‚Äª The content of this game involves violence (attacks and other bloody scenes), strong language, game characters wearing clothing of sexual characteristics.

recentChanges:
[New Content]
Unlock the new Investment ‚Äî 'Formation' at Lv.19 in the Investment Center, the unlocked Formation can be changed on the Underboss interface.

1.Added a 'back to bottom' button to the bottom right corner of the Chat interface.

comments: Great game, its a good way to pass the time. Bit difficult to grasp what to do in the beginning but once you get the hang of it then its great fun. 30/10/2020 Um.... what happened guys? This last update you just did has made this game glitchy.... sometimes i cant log into the game and have to delete and re-install... so far its been done 3 times.... not cool at all. Fix the problem please. Thanks.

The game has very good graphics and it could be a lot of fun to play if it didnt have players that harrassed and bully you constantly, I have only played for 1 week and I needed to quit, my group was constantly attacked everyday for 3 days by rich players. And were harrassed in there inboxes and made to feel uncomfortable. For no reason . Alot of people quit in my group , in the last couple days because of this. I will not waist my money on game, with players like this, I am uninstalling app.

Stuck on loading screen since last update or would give 3-4 stars, but already getting bored anyway just another typical forced to join a group to play online and get attacked by other players and forced to spend real money or wait forever to advance once you get to a certain point type game. But at least they haven't forced ads on players yet like most do.

Another update 2020 Oct 29. Game is a mess. Can't open app. Upon uninstall reinstall, app opens momentarily to find others saying app very buggy. App no longer works. Wow. Very fun UPDATE: Still a fun game. I have no problem spending a lot of money to have any chance of winning. Fine. What I DO have a problem with is that the players are "bots." Support and devs are non-existent. Report a bug (which they have a button for) and get ZERO reply. Sucks. And no fixes. Total BS. Wake up dummies.

Good graphics, nice game really enjoy it ..but the big issue with it is that when you opening it ,it loads for a few seconds and goes out completely and doesn't let you in ..and this happens after a while of playing ,after you've went out the game and want to go back in to play ...had to uninstall and reinstall to continue.... overall it's a nice game but the issue of not being able to go in the game after being out has to be fixed

title: Peak ‚Äì Brain Games & Training
description:
Peak is the fun, free brain training workout designed around you. Peak uses brain games and puzzles to challenge memory, language and critical thinking to keep your mind active. 

With brain games made in partnership with academics from leading universities like Cambridge and NYU, and more than 12m downloads, Peak is a fun, challenging brain training experience.

It takes just 10 minutes a day to complete a brain training workout. And, with 45 brain games for adults, and new brain training workouts every day, there is always a fun challenge waiting for you.


KEY FEATURES
 
- Free brain games to challenge your Memory, Attention, Math, Problem Solving, Mental Agility, Language, Coordination, Creativity and Emotion Control.
- Learn which categories your brain excels in, and compete with friends by comparing your brainmap and brain game performance.
- Coach, the personal trainer for your brain, helps you track your progress and improve.
- Cognitive brain training with games from expert researchers at Cambridge University, NYU and more.
- Works offline so you can enjoy Peak brain games wherever you are.
- Selected by Google as Editor's Choice.
- More than 45 brain games available and regular updates to keep you challenged. 
- Get personalised brain training workouts and in-depth insights with Peak Pro.
- Get access to Peak Advanced Training modules: intensive programs that train a specific skill, including the new Wizard memory game created with Professor Barbara Sahakian and Tom Piercy in the Department of Psychiatry at the University of Cambridge.
 

IN THE NEWS

‚ÄúIts mini games focus on memory and attention, with strong detail in its feedback on your performance.‚Äù - The Guardian

‚ÄúImpressed with graphs in Peak that let you see your performance over time.‚Äù - The Wall Street Journal

‚ÄúThe Peak app is designed to provide each user with a profound level of insight into their current state of cognitive function.‚Äù - Techworld


DEVELOPED BY NEUROSCIENTISTS
 
Designed in collaboration with experts in neuroscience, cognitive science and education, Peak makes brain training fun and rewarding. Peak's scientific advisory board includes Professor Barbara Sahakian FMedSci DSc, Professor of Clinical Neuropsychology at the University of Cambridge.
 
Follow us - twitter.com/peaklabs
Like us - facebook.com/peaklabs
Visit us - peak.net
Say hi - hello@peak.net
 

For more information:
 
Terms of Use - http://www.peak.net/terms-and-conditions
Privacy Policy - http://www.peak.net/privacy-policy
Payment Policy - http://www.peak.net/payment-policy

recentChanges: Your brain is unique and that‚Äôs why Coach creates personal workouts just for you. But we all have specific skills we want to challenge and so we‚Äôre introducing Workout Selection. You can select from a range of workouts, each one specially created for you. Interested in language? Try our language workout! Only have 5 minutes to train? Our 5 minute Coffee Break workout is perfect!
comments: It's a solid app with a lot of challenges. Some of them pretty simple and common, other instead are very difficult, I love this balance. I used to play Elevate last year and I decided to change for something different, however there are few games (especially math ones) that I wish to have here as well! Hoping to see some new game in the future (:

The games on here are very good and I enjoyed playing them. Whether they actually do anything for your brain or whether you simply get better at playing them is an interesting and ongoing question! My only criticism is that the language is very american-based and so can be quite challenging if you are UK English speaking because you don't understand what object you should be looking for for example in the find the object game. Overall excellent.

First few weeks things were good, . Now my R√†ting has gone from 4 to 2. I have free version and am supposed to watch videos. Yeh, right! I push play and screens says "loading video" but it Never does. After 30 sec, I get bumped back to play screen, very boring ! If I was not a bed ridden senior citizen w/covid complications, it would not bother me so badly. I rebooted my ph & reinstalled your app too many, times~NO change. I enjoyed what little I saw of Peak. Hasta la vista !

I like the app. It brings me a lot of mental challenges, that are quite interesting. It really increases our IQ. The only problem I am facing is performance. Whenever a game starts or even in the middle of the same, it stutters and freezes, randomly. It doesn't occur often, but it disturbs, especially on timing challenges. OTT, the app is look good üôÇüëçüèª

Honestly, I never leave reviews, but I really do love this app! I paid for all the content and most of the time when I buy in app purchases for more content, I am left pretty bored and dissatisfied, but Peak is the only app so far that hasn't left me feeling like that! So thank you, and I really enjoy training daily to get me into the zone for using my mind for the rest of the day, as well as being able to see the progress I am making compared to other people within my age group.

title: APUS Message Center‚ÄîIntelligent management
description:
APUS Message Center is one of the best free unified messenger app for android. It helps unify and manage all messages from SMS, WhatsApp, Gmail and 3rd party apps. It includes message management, notification mamagement, contact manager, dialer and call log. It will completely bring you a fuss-free experience. 

You can not only manage all kinds of messages (SMS, WhatsApp, Gmail, Yahoo mail, and 3rd party apps), but also find your contacts easily and make a phone call or view your call log in the new APUS Message Center. You only need this one application to grasp all the necessary functions. 

If you are always jumping between SMS, WhatsAppp, Facebook Messenger, etc. Please try APUS Message Center right now! APUS Message Center brings you a more intelligent, easier and smarter experience. 

Key FeaturesÔºö


‚ñ∑Message Management (Support Dual SIM) 

APUS Message Center provides not only free text service such as SMS, WhatsApp, Facebook and instant messages but also email apps such as Gmail. APUS Message Center fully supports dual SIM devices for SMS, so you won‚Äôt miss any important messages. And it is also easy to search for contacts and message texts from dual SIM card. 

‚ñ∑Contact Manager

In APUS Message Center, you can find one contact‚Äôs multiple social information and connect with them by dragging to the app you want. Eg. SMS, Dialer, Line, WeChat, WhatsApp, Telegram, Viber, etc. 
‚ñ∑Notification Management 

APUS Message Center also provides notification manager.It will clean your unimprortant notifications from your notification bar and help you get rid of messy notifications. 

‚ñ∑Phone Calling

After you check a missed call or chatting with someone, you can directly make a phone call and view your call log in APUS Message Center. 

‚ñ∑Group Messaging

Tired for your orderless notification bar? Try APUS Message Center now, you can check any notification (Gmail, WeChat, WhatsApp, Skype, Facebook messenger, instant messaging, etc ) you want by using APUS Message Center. It will always organize your important messages so that you can read more simply and conveniently find all notifications at one stop any time. 

‚ñ∑Quick Reply

When there is a new message from SMS or WhatsApp, a message bubble will pop up to remind you to view the notification. Then you can read and reply messages of SMS and WhatsApp from pop-up notification bubble, without exiting the current app, and quick reply the message directly. 

‚ñ∑Regular Reminder for Messages 

Notification bar will push so many notifications everyday, what if you miss some important messages? Don‚Äôt worry, APUS Message Center always reminds you about the messages from these app: Messages, Call, WeChat, Gmail,  WhatsApp, Facebook messenger, Twitter, Snapchat, Skype,  Tinder and so on. 

You‚Äôll never miss important calls or unread messages (SMS, Gmail, Yahoo mail, social media apps notification)! 

‚ñ∑Easy Search

Within just one second, you can find notifications, Messages, SMS, Contacts, Calls, email (such as Yahoo mail and Gmail) without fuss by entering keywords. All messages and contacts are collected in one app. 

APUS Message Center is an intelligent, simple, easy and fast messenger and message management tool for android, comes with collecting all messages, such as SMS and 3rd party apps messages. You can enjoy contact manager, phone calling, regular notifications, dual sim support, quick reply, group messages. 

The conversation apps currently supported by APUS Message Center include but not limited: WhatsApp, Hike, Facebook, Facebook Messenger, Gmail, Yahoo Mail, Instagram, Twitter, Snapchat, Wechat, QQ, Skype, LinkedIn, Imo, Kakao, VK, Tinder, Yandex mail, Hangouts and more. 

Contact usÔºö
- Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/APUSGROUP
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/apusgroup
- Mail: apusmsgcenter@gmail.com
- Official website: http://www.apusapps.com

title: Icing On The Cake
description:
From the makers of I Peel Good, Icing on the Cake is your next obsession. Put your cake decorating skills to the test! Relax and channel your inner baker in Icing on the Cake. So many fun pastries for you to rotate, pipe, decorate and smooth out? Can you make the perfect cake? Fun and easy to pick up but don‚Äôt miss a spot... Will you be the first one to finish them all?


Color and decorate the perfect wedding cake or birthday cake. The tasty end results will leave you feeling hungry for more! Any time is cake time.

Game Features:


1. Zen Out

Ice ice baby! Take your time and relax and create the perfect cake


2. Smooth Smooth Icing

The most realistic food simulation game there is. The realistic cakes will leave you hungry.


3. Bake ALL the cakes

Endless amount of cakes for you to ice and smooth. Can you put the icing on all of the cakes?


4. Feel the smooth

Play, relax, and feel satisfied with every cake you ice. Feel the realistic sensation of icing and spreading.


Whether you like icing, like smoothing or just want to spin and color, Icing on the Cake will take you there. This is the best and most zen cake simulation game there is. Good luck putting Icing on the Cake down!

title: Tango - Live Video Broadcasts and Streaming Chats
description:
Tango is a social live-streaming platform where Broadcasters get the tools they need to manage and grow their Broadcasting business. The place to meet new people, showcase talents, and make friends all around the world!

Live video streaming is the exciting new place for content creators to earn online by turning your Broadcasts into a business! 

Monetize your social community by live-streaming your talents - singing, dancing, playing music and much more. This is a chance to start your Broadcasting career and earn money with our quick, simple and easy payouts. 

Get the tools you need to grow and become a full-time broadcaster. Grow your social business, engage with fans and followers, and accumulate as many virtual gifts as possible that can be cashed out for real income. DUAL broadcast with friends and other streamers to create cool live-streams and earn more from each gift!

Turn your hobby into a profitable business with Tango Live. Meet and engage with new people and friends around the world and show your talents and content in a new way - earning money through gifts from fans that you can redeem for real cash. 

As a viewer, you can discover a world of talented live-streams. Watch and engage with your favorite broadcasters, and chat with them directly. Play games and give gifts to show your support and become a VIP to get special status.

Download the free app to discover Live video streaming. Simply go live and monetize your fans in real-time! 
 
Unlike Bigo, LiveMe, and MeetMe, Tango allows you to live-stream your world on your terms, with the people and fans who matter most to you. 

Here's 5 real reasons to join Tango Live:

GO LIVE, GET FANS
- Show off your talents and get discovered online: singing, dancing, cooking, traveling, gaming.
- Get fans, receive gifts, earn money for free.
- Do dual broadcasts with your friends and random people via Live Party.
- Beautify your live-stream with special filters and masks.
- More viewers = more Popular. Rise the ranks and top the leaderboard to become #1! 

WATCH LIVE STREAMS AND CHAT WITH BROADCASTERS
- Enjoy live video streams and chats on your phone or on web.
- Watch new and popular broadcasts streaming live 24 hours a day.
- Meet talented people around the world and chat with them directly!
- Swipe to view broadcasters' top moments and live reactions (Tango Moments).
- Play interactive games with streamers.
- Send exclusive gifts and special collections to support your favorite streamers. Cute kitties, animated emojis, hearts, cars, pearls, romantic gifts, and other special items!
- Follow your favorite broadcasters and be the first to know when they go live

VOICE AND VIDEO CHAT ROOMS
- Public and private chats: stream your world with who you want.
- Create a personal group video or message chat for private group conversations with special fans and friends (Live Family)
- Send exclusive gifts and special collections to support your favorite streamers. Cute kitties, animated emojis, hearts, cars, pearls, romantic gifts, and other special items!

BECOME A PART OF SOCIAL COMMUNITY
- Talk and chat with talented people nearby or from all over the world.
- Create a personal group video or message chat for private group conversations with special fans and friends (Live Family).
- Share your special stories and promote social events on your profile page for all to see!
- Participate in online live streaming events: song contests, dance festivals, music competitions.
- VIP status for the best fans: Send gifts to your favorites and enjoy exclusive status.
- We have an active global community of millions talented broadcasters: artists,  dancers, singers, gamers, bloggers and more. 

STAY IN TOUCH
Facebook: @TangoMe
Instagram: @Tango_app
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOrHDkd9DLJVZBWP2UN9msg
Twitter: @TangoMe
Snap: tango-live
TikTok: @TangoMe

Your feedback helps us improve TANGO LIVE. If you have any questions or offers please contact us at support@tango.me

title: Cookie Jam‚Ñ¢ Match 3 Games | Connect 3 or More
description:
Over 100 million people are playing our deliciously sweet match 3 games! Cookie Jam is filled with thousands of fun and challenging candy puzzles! Match 3 cookies & candy in order to clear the board and beat the cookie puzzle! Cookie Jam match 3 games are free to play and tons of fun! Play now!

Candy matching reimagined in this sugary connect three game
Welcome to a match 3 saga of tasty candy puzzles and jelly games. Blast through dessert themed islands and help Chef Panda crush cookies before they crumble in Cookie Jam - the SWEETEST match 3 game online! Play thousands of candy puzzle games for free, with new puzzles every week so you never run out of challenging jelly games to play!

Swap candy colored treats and crush delicious cookies and cakes. It‚Äôs no wonder people say Cookie Jam is the BEST MATCH 3 GAME EVER! We have thousands of match 3 games and candy puzzle games to enjoy! Each cookie puzzle comes jam-packed with candy matching fun and jelly matching thrills!

Chef Panda has an order to fill and you can help. Connect three or more treats to fill orders and push through levels in this relaxing swapping game. Match 5 treats to wipe the board clean with a powerful cake crush booster. Discover countless new levels and collect awesome boosters in the ultimate match three game online.

KEY INGREDIENTS:
üç™ Free to play cookie matching fun for everyone!
üç™ Never-ending fun with THOUSANDS of unique levels with new ones added weekly
üç™ Deliciously sweet supply of candy crushing power-ups and combos
üç™ Swap, crush, and jam your way through fantastical bakery themed islands
üç™ Earn rewards and sweet prizes with limited-time events
üç™ Connect to Facebook to seamlessly sync across multiple devices and challenge friends!

LIKE: https://www.facebook.com/PlayCookieJam
FOLLOW: @playcookiejam
DEVELOPER INFO: Jam City is the leading developer in truly cross-platform social gaming! Check out our other free match 3 games and puzzle games! You'll love to swap, match, and crunch through ever expanding levels and events. Check back often to see all the new candy, cake, and sweet treats that we've added! You'll love to crush through each sweet puzzle. Begin your bakery adventure on this free match three game today!

comments: Love the game but shouldn't have to pay for more coins. Should get them on the wheel sometimes. Never do. Free play time clock should stop until you get back to play. Can't play 24 hours straight. I want to, but humanly impossible. Fix that please. Thank you for responding! I got the coins on my last spin. Great! Still need to fix the free play we get. I had several hours but fell asleep before I could play. Lost the remaining time. Please fix that. Thanks!!!!

The constant attempts to sell you more lives and game time is beyond annoying. Also, games seemingly are programmed for you to lose with only one move left, trying to frustrate you into buying more moves. Update: Sure, you don't have to purchase additional game time or moves, but I could also walk from Chicago to New York all without having to pay for gas, bus fare, or a plane ticket. Just like I will eventually arrive at my destination, I will also eventually complete the game level.

I have had this game for awhile, but recently it's become frustrating that lives do not regenerate. I will play at night, run out of lives, and the next morning there are still 0 lives. Sometimes I can restart my phone and it resolves, other times, nothing works. It's only a fun game when you can actually play it. :(

Used to love this game, until it became a money eater. Not really as much fun now, especially since the pandemic, when I don't have the extra money, try to play for a stress reliever, Not more stress. Now won't even give daily bonus even if You log in Every Day, when You get so far, it cuts You Off because You won't pay for more, SAD...

Love this game! ‚ù§ ever since update, you don't receive extra spins and always get the same things. You very seldom receive the coins. Now its even harder to win the new air ships. I haven't won a new since July, just not fun like it use to be. Now you have win 30 levels to win an Air Ship. Not fun at all...you do the Cookie walk no coins, and again no extra spins. Really thinking about getting rid of the game. So disappointing.

title: Design Home: Play + Save
description:
Looking for a new creative hobby? Play Design Home today - a relaxing, fun game that allows you to live the life of an interior decorator. Sharpen your decorating skills in daily Design Challenges and style visually stunning three-dimensional spaces with access to real, high-end furniture and decor brands. Unlock 'My Homes' to access bathrooms, kitchens and more customization options to bring your dream homes to life! It‚Äôs quick, it‚Äôs fun and you can connect with a vibrant creative community while learning about diverse d√©cor styles - thus improving your design skills and gaining inspiration that you can even apply in your real life.

* Relax through play and express your creativity in daily Design Challenges.
* Unlock rewards as you polish your amazing abilities as an interior decorator.
* Level up to access 'My Homes' - with dream homes of your very own to design as you wish!
* Play with real life, high-end brands as you learn about different interior design styles.

comments: I really love this game, it is addictive. I recommend a few changes or I need to back away from playing. To decorate the way you'd like, it cost too much money. I think once you've earned an item it should be yours to keep. You only get to use it 5 times then you have to keep re-purchasing. Also, the "My Homes" doesn't keep up with your pace, you can only collect 50 keys then you just lose them. I wish when going through items to purchase you could sort by price. 5 stars down to 3, sorry!

I absolutely like this game. The designs and inventory are pretty. I like the fact that they give you diamonds every day and have a chance to earn money on a design with out having to spend any money. This comment was when I first started playing the game. I have been p!aying for a few months now and I sense the frustration as others do about the voting process. It really needs to be rethought. It is not fair and gives stars when not due and no stars when due. People see differently!

Love this app, but I would love some real review so I can learn how to.get the 5.0 scores all the time. Also, the app expects you to buy too much all the time with what is required. It makes it hard to just play in the app. We need more daily challenges. Update: I really like this app but it is so hard to do more than 1 challenge because everything costs so much in diamonds. Too expensive.

Design home is my daily stress reliever. Although I love this game, I have to say that it is always taking forever to load and it is not my connection though it says I have a bad connection. For the few years I have been playing it I haven't complained but I'm at level 51 and just trying to load an option takes forever and sometimes I'm told item can't be found right nowü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. It's a little frustrating but still absolutely love this game. Please let me know if there is a way to improve this?

Game is great.. expensive if you want to keep up...but it never ever connects for me the 1st time . and it's not my interent it's your server...One time I have to use my interent then I have to use my data..and most times I have to go back and forth 3 or 4 times to see which it will take...and this is every single day a few times a day .it never is the same and takes forever to load when it finally gets working.. but I do love the game! I am addicted just wish you would fix those 2 things...

title: Lucky Day - Win Real Money
description:
Lucky Day is a 100% Free Sweepstakes App! 

Lucky Day is a free mobile gaming app that allows users to win money and prizes, no purchase is necessary.

Lucky Day offers free scratcher, lotto, and raffle games for a chance to win real money and rewards. With daily opportunities to win up to $100,000 in cash instantly, earn rewards, or enter raffles! 

Lucky Day is a free lifestyle experience on your mobile device. We change lives daily by offering hundreds of games for our players to scratch and have a chance to win real money instantly.

Play your free daily lotto and scratch cards for a chance to win real money and prizes. New scratch cards are available daily for your chance to win up to $10,000 instantly. You can also enter sweepstakes contests, raffle giveaways, and the daily lotto. 

Our mission is to give everyone a free chance to have a Lucky Day because we believe you shouldn‚Äôt have to risk losing for the chance to win! 

Lucky Day is 100% free to download and play with no in-app purchases or deposits. 

Lucky Day Features: 

WIN REAL MONEY

comments: Been playing for awhile and got enough coins to cash out for a voucher, however everything is showing as sold out. I'm using the UK version so maybe people will have a better experience in other countries. Update I have logged in several times through the day and all show as sold out. I also do not understand the new piggy bank, how do you collect nuts and bolts?, how do you heist from other players?

It was good. Then it was not so good, introduced piggy bank... A way to spend tokens in hopes of winning more. Prize was tokens and blackjack hands. New piggy is worse.. I don't even get tokens, just get jerked around by the piggy. I know I will never get the last nickel to cash out at$10, doesn't bother me, liked the gift cards. I know I will never get anything from the piggy. I just keep coming back hoping I will get one last gift card. And I cannot find your help center.

Worst app ever!!!. Once you are approaching the minimum withdrawal then they won't give you any cash anymore and, I am just 0.15 away.They just let you watch a lot of advertisements over and over again. I won't recommend this app. Now they have an update to heist from some other players too. Nah it just goes on in circles over and over again.No withdrawal has been made.I have been playing it for a while. Highly won't recommend this app.

Waste of time. Period. Deleting now with no regrets despite being $0.25 away from cashing out (For 1-2weeks of multi-daily check-ins to the app). My gut says I'll never see a dime and my time is better spent elsewhere on games and activities I actually enjoy. Download at your own risk, but don't say I didn't warn you! Edit: After that response, I'm confident that I'm right. They make vague and empty promises so they can make more money through their scam.

Has been slow for cash payouts but I have gotten a few gift cards.. Now this app sucks. Doesn't pay out. You get enough tokens and all of a sudden its sold out... used to be legit. Beats paying for scratchers but man change the payout system back to what it was a year ago and I will change my rating back to 5 stars. Took a legit app and made it a SCAM or just near damn impossible to get any gift cards. Fun to pass the time but doesn't pay out anymore üôÉ

title: Weather & Hurricane Tracker: The Weather Channel
description:
Weather your way: face severe weather with The Weather Channel, the world's leading weather provider*. Get live radar updates, severe weather alerts, and check weather conditions on the go. Hurricane season and tropical storms are here, so be prepared with local weather maps, storm radar news and your local weather forecast.

Live weather radar, weather maps, forecast, and an accurate storm and hurricane tracker - available wherever you are! Get the local weather info you need to prepare for what's ahead: a tropical storm, a hurricane, or bright blue skies. Living in an area prone to severe weather? Our storm radar and severe weather alerts have got you covered. We provide an accurate weather forecast to help you plan up to 15 days in advance, with NOAA alerts and severe weather recommendations.

Enjoy the weather and don‚Äôt worry about getting caught in a storm. Check our forecast with a detailed weather tracker and accurate weather maps. Track your local weather and live weather radar to prepare for what's ahead - rain or severe weather like a tropical storm or hurricane. Our practical GPS weather maps, storm radar & hurricane tracker help you face whatever the clouds may bring.

Track extreme weather alerts thanks to our live weather radar! Discover The Weather Channel‚Äôs top 4 features:

1. Weather your way! Get a personalized weather map and check weather conditions in a new way. Discover a live weather radar, a storm tracker, and our Feels Like feature.
2. NOAA severe weather alerts - Get push notifications for all severe weather updates with our storm tracker. From a tornado to a hurricane or tropical storm, we help you stay safe.
3. Track weather alerts & conditions - Stay alert with our hurricane tracker, and get weather alerts with our storm radar.
4. Smart videos! Discover visuals of NOAA alerts and track on a GPS map the development of a storm.

Stay alert: track local weather and plan outdoor activities with confidence.
‚Ä¢ Weather maps & weather forecast news give you what you need to know. See what to expect before setting foot outside, from temperature to wind chills.
‚Ä¢ NOAA alerts, a hurricane tracker, weather forecast up to 48 hours and live radar ensures you‚Äôre not caught in a storm!
‚Ä¢ Daily temperature, a UV index and weather maps let you know if you need to bring a light jacket or your umbrella!

Keep informed on the latest weather news.
‚Ä¢ Stay prepared during extreme weather and earthquakes.
‚Ä¢ Live radar and alerts from our tornado and storm tracker: all you need to stay alert.
‚Ä¢ Tornado and storm tracker: our live radar helps you track extreme weather.

Enjoy our Premium version! Get the information you need regarding local weather & temperature.
‚Ä¢ New and improved radar, featuring a precipitation start/stop timeline and 24 hour future radar.
‚Ä¢ Get 96 hours of extended forecast.
‚Ä¢ Forget about ads.

-----
Privacy & Feedback
‚Ä¢ Our Privacy Policy can be viewed here: https://weather.com/en-US/twc/privacy-policy ‚Ä®
‚Ä¢ Our Terms of Use can be viewed here:http://www.weather.com/common/home/legal.html‚Ä®
‚Ä¢ If you have any questions or suggestions, please get in touch at android.support@weather.com

The Weather Company is the world‚Äôs most accurate forecaster, according to the most recent, comprehensive study available (2010-2017) from Forecast Watch https://www.forecastwatch.com/static/Three_Region_Accuracy_Overview_2010-2017.pdf

*The World's Leading Weather Provider: Apps from The Weather Company, parent of The Weather Channel, are the most used weather apps worldwide based on average monthly active users via smartphone in 2019. Comscore Mobile Metrix¬Æ, Worldwide Rollup Media Trend, News/Information ‚ÄìWeather category incl. [P] Weather Company, The and [M] Weather Channel, The, Jan-Dec. 2019 avg.

App Annie: The Weather Channel app combined had over 50 million monthly active users worldwide each month from January through December 2019, over 2M total 5 star ratings and was downloaded 155 million times.

recentChanges: Complications
comments: This was my go-to app until about a month ago. I have to go out and then reload it frequently to get the current info. It often gets stuck at a time hours earlier. It's raining and it does not note that. Another app has 37% chance of rain in my current location (which is about right), and this app says 6% while it rains. I'm uninstalling it in favor if a better, more accurate app. I rely on relative accuracy with updates because I plan outdoor activities.

The widget has started routinely saying "weather data not available". When it does actually show the weather, it is usually not current, actually showing the weather from hours & hours ago. Also, it takes a really long time to start up, which it didn't used to do. Whatever "improvements" have been made to this app have been horrible, & have made it much slower & much worse than it used to be. I'm looking around for other options, so I can unload what has unfortunately become a major turkey.

I had this app for years and it began to have really low speed opening up. I uninstalled it and went with another app. The speed on it was fine, just had a lot of ads. I went back to The Weather Channel app hoping it had improved. IT HAS NOT!!! It just keeps spinning and draining my battery. It's been 15 minutes and still spinning. Poor, poor performance. Not pleased with this at all.

TOO MANY ADS!! There is a ad that you are forced to watch after every video!! Also the sound quality is VERY POOR on almost every video, then the ad comes on and is extremely loud. It's annoying to have to constantly adjust the volume level for every video and ad! This app has been getting worse with every update!! The other weather apps are much better and more detailed. Sorry Weather Channel but I think I will be uninstalling your app now and I don't recommend it to anyone.

Wish I had never updated this app. My old weather channel app was so much better. Every time I try to shrink the map, there's very little to no response. I have to tap the screen and then try to shrink the map so I can see a broader View, but almost every time I do that, the app has to restart. The old map showing national weather would respond very well to the touch of my fingers. Not so anymore.

Skout is the global network to meet and chat with new people and do fun things!

comments: At first it was nice to use , it was good but I was surprised that it didn't take 24hours where many people chatted with you and then suddenly I was fooling around I couldn't get in just loading in loading . Until , I let it go first and it took 24hours like that , so I though I would log out first but it was even harder for me because I could not open my account , it always turned out that my email add was blocked and I did not commit any violation . I'm so disappointed to install this apps üòí

Every 24 hours, the app blocks my account. I have not broken any terms and conditions but still I get blocked out of my own account. Very frustrating as they don't even give you a warning. I hot blocked in the middle of conversations and didn't even get a chance to exchange information with the people I liked. All day I'm bombarded by disgusting messages from men but they don't get blocked. When I signed in using a different email, the same men found me again and messaged me.

Every since the first time I used this app it was pretty chill and fun too. But then after the first time I went live the app has been crashing since yesterday. I go on the app for 3 seconds and the app crashes. It took me almost 30 minutes just to get the app to stop crashing so much this morning to finally get my live stream to work. But now I can even go on the app to the setting or nothing bc the app crashes in 3 seconds or less everytime I try to use the app.

It's a very awsome app, giving the user the ability to meet alot of new and exciting people. The only problem that I have discovered so far is often the app refuses to allow the connection between myself and another party hopefully this error corrects itself when or if I switch to a better service provider, other than that it's awesome. Good job team SKOUT keep up the good work. We love you

V 6.28.0 is broken on my note 20 ultra 5g. Once it goes through the "pledge" things everything breaks. The screen frequently refreshes and forces to the meet tab and crashes when navigating the chat messages. I installed a 6.26.0 apk and it was OK until it auto updated and broke again. I've now disabled auto updates and reverted back again to 6.26.0. I've sent a crash report, fix it!

title: Lose Weight App for Men - Weight Loss in 30 Days
description:
The best weight loss app for men to burn fat and lose weight at home! With super effective fat burning workouts, you can lose belly fat, eliminate man boobs, lose love handles. Follow the 30-day plan and take just 5-10 min a day to lose weight and keep fit!

Low-impact option provided, friendly to people who are overweight or have joint problems. No gym, no equipment needed, just use your bodyweight to lose fat and build muscles. You can track burned calories and weight loss progress in graphs.

3 Difficulty Levels
It has 3 levels for everyone, both beginner and pro. Designed by professional fitness coach, it focuses on men‚Äôs trouble spots, abdomen, chest, helping you achieve fast weight loss and build abs. Different workouts every day, you can easily stick to it.

Low-impact Option
With gentle and effective weight loss workouts, low-impact mode allows you to minimize the force placed on joints and reduce the risk of injury.

Get Rid of Men Boobs

I'm surprised. The Lose Weight App offers a decent workout routine. I've actually conducted military physical training on a daily basis for the last 17 years. This app is just as effective for a QUICK workout as long as you DO THE EXERCISES CORRECTLY. Don't cheat your body; take the appropriate break the app gives you, always do the full count or more and try to beat your record on timed exercises. If you do it right without skipping days you'll see results.

title: Sleep Log Pro: The CBT-I sleep diary for insomnia
description:
The pocket sleep therapist using CBT-I methods for chronic or occasional insomniacs.

We suffered from insomnia for decades, with all the usual symptoms that result from rarely or never getting a good night‚Äôs sleep: constant fatigue, fuzzy memory, mood swings, diminished cognitive capacity, symptoms of depression, weight gain.

But our approach for dealing with these persistent sleep issues was haphazard at best. It wasn‚Äôt until we finally decided to take a systematic approach to tackling our sleep problem based on the principles of CBT-I, cognitive behavioral therapy for insomnia, that we finally solved the sleep puzzle.

Our quality of life has improved enormously since then. Sleep is no longer a hit-or-miss proposition. Going to bed at night is no longer coupled with the stress of wondering ‚Äúwill I or won‚Äôt I‚Ä¶?‚Äù We now have the tools, methods and strategies we need to consistently get a good night‚Äôs sleep almost every night. 

And on those nights when sleep remains problematic, we no longer suffer stress and anxiety connected to insomnia‚Äìinstead, we‚Äôre confident that our brain will apply its own internal methods to ensure we make up for the sleep deficit during the following nights, as long as we continue to track our sleep and potential correlations.

Sleep Log Pro is built around the concept of sleep efficiency. Sleep efficiency is defined as the length of time asleep divided by the total time spent in bed. Successful approaches to sleep therapy are generally based on gradually improving one‚Äôs sleep efficiency and thereby training the brain that bed is associated with sleep. 

But we go much further, helping track moods and activities experienced during the day that can have a positive or negative effect on that night‚Äôs sleep. Sleep Log Pro currently helps track 14 factors grouped by moods, activities and chemicals‚Äìsuch as anxiety, exercise, and caffeine intake‚Äìon a daily basis, then correlates those factors with your sleep patterns. Here‚Äôs what we help you track, all factors that can positively or negatively affect your night‚Äôs rest:

‚Ä¢ Happiness
‚Ä¢ Excitement
‚Ä¢ Stress
‚Ä¢ Anxiety
‚Ä¢ Daylight
‚Ä¢ Exercise
‚Ä¢ Meditation
‚Ä¢ Work intensity
‚Ä¢ Screen use
‚Ä¢ Tobacco use
‚Ä¢ Alcohol consumption
‚Ä¢ Sugar consumption
‚Ä¢ Caffeine intake
‚Ä¢ Sleep medication

What Sleep Log Pro doesn‚Äôt do

Sleep Log Pro is a sleep and behavioral diary, logging, analysis and visualization tool, not a traditional sleep tracker. We don‚Äôt use automatic methods to track the duration or quality of your sleep at night. In our opinion, app-based methods for tracking sleep are generally unreliable and usually require keeping your device very close to, or even on or in, the bed, which itself can disturb your sleep rhythms.

Intense focus on tracking and visualization of your nightly sleep cycles can also lead to a unhealthy condition called ‚Äúorthosomnia‚Äù, an obsession with getting a perfect night‚Äôs sleep, which will have precisely the opposite effect than intended. 

Your sleep cycles will vary naturally depending on your sleep needs any given night. You‚Äôre the best judge of how well you slept and how rested you feel. That‚Äôs why we use your own subjective estimates of these vital factors, rather than trying to tell you how you should feel based on a chart.

Free version

Prefer not to invest your hard-earned cash just yet? Try our ad-supported, free version: Sleep Log Free. And sleep well!

We want to hear from you! Send your questions, comments and suggestions to thesleeplogapp@gmail.com.

recentChanges:
Now featuring nap tracking!

Do you often sleep during the day? Now you can track your naps along with your nightly sleep data; set goals for your nap frequency and duration; and see what effect any naps you might take during the day may have on the duration and quality of your sleep at night.
comments: I love the app and use it every day. The only problem I have is that when you enter when you went to bed the latest it will allow you to enter is 11:45pm. Last night I went to bed at 12:15am. Unfortunately I cant reflect that now becUze it wont let me roll over the day.

The sliders you use to log sleep, awake, and habits times are hard to use. They can slide to values other than the ones you're recording by accidentally touching them as you're navigating around the screen. I don't care for the interface much. Discontinuing. Wish I could get my money back.

(email feedback didn't get through) The main issue that needs fixing is scrolling through the sleep log where you enter data. You have to be very careful where you put your finger as any touch and swipe up/down will change the sliders of options you've already selected. That's not normal android app behavior. The UI needs some work. Edit: Developer replied. Updated rating and will rate higher following next update.

**EDIT: Since my review, the developers started working on a nap feature. I am really excited to use it, and its so nice that the developers are responsive and care. Thank you!! It's a really nice app-- but I can't add daytime naps? I may have narcolepsy and was hoping I could log all of my hours slept per day into the app- but it only accounts for overnight sleep, when a majority of my sleep happens in naps throughout the day.

The interface might be slightly confusing at times, but overall, it's a very useful app. One thing that I feel is missing is the option of choosing the way I finally woke up, i.e. naturally or because the alarm clock went off. That's a very significant factor in my case and it would be good to include it in the analysis.

comments: Updated 10/31/20: The app is totally unusable. I uninstalled and reinstalled it, but I can't hit a single button on it. Completely useless. Original Review: Used to work great, but lately it has all kinds of bugs whether it suddenly decides it won't accept my payment method anymore or errors out when I try to place an order. It freezes and often forgets to clear my order bag after I've successfully picked up an order. So many headaches lately, I don't know what went wrong. Ued to love this app.

Constantly buggy and glitches. I've used it successfully but it typically requires constantly uninstalling and reinstalling the app or religiously clearing your cache. The deals screen often says you've already used a deal and have to wait an hour even when you haven't ordered in weeks. Overall, a frustrating experience for something that should be a convenience.

Updated 10/2020: I've done everything including uninstalling and re installing. The app doesn't work at all. love this app when it actually works. More than half of the time, I can't pull anything up on it, or it is frozen and nothing on it will work. "Connectivity issues" is what it stated. Those issues are not with my phone, because i have service and wifi. Please fix!!!! It's pretty hard to use the app while there when I can't even get in to it.

Fantastic app, works every time. Orders being automatically submitted and requiring "reopening" every time I switch apps is annoying but no big deal. One of the best developed fast food pre-order apps. The restaurants, maybe 1.5 star. They must be hiring illiterates, or they glance at the screen and throw in guesses for anything forgotten. The "hot&spicy" chicken patty isn't very spicy going down but DON'T LET IT BACK UP. Seems it turns into the fire of hades in your guts. Omg I cried, no joke.

Well, a couple years later, new phone, different Android version, still freezing on the opening screen. so unreliable (CLEARING CACHE DOES NOTHING!) - your food isn't that great that your app should be so problematic. Business 101 - don't make it difficult for people to do business with you. BK works great EVERY time - BYE!

comments: My experience with this app has been a very positive one. This is my fall back app to watch movies when cable TV gets stale. I like to escape in an entertaining movie and can usually find that here. Many older and off the wall movies which works perfectly for my taste. Also some newer movies available. The ads are few and placed about every 20 minutes or so with 1 to 3 at a time. Much better than any other service period. Broadcast TV and cable TV should learn from this. Highly recommended !

Tubi is a good app. I had to change to a tablet, and why did I do that. Now I cannot watch anything without that condemned little circle going round and round every 10 secondsü•∂üò¨üò¨ Now I know we already have at least 3 ads going on in between recesses. These are still ok. But that blasted circle really gots*to*go. I don't know how its gonna happen, but its gotta go. If I cannot watch the movies, it makes no sense keeping the App. Same thing happened on a different phone. I'm hoping for the best

I like that I can pause or fast forward. I miss being able to hit the continue watching part because I usually have limited time and then have to start the show over. For example I was in season six of my kitchen rules and for whatever reason the continue watching part was removed and now I have to rewatch episode one or fast forward several seasons to get back to where I was.

I'm surprised by this app. I didn't think I would like it, but, thanks to the new chromecast with Google tv, I'm trying streaming apps I wouldn't have before. The ads aren't too frequent, and they don't last more than 2 minutes total. And the content is pretty diverse -- a nice supplement to the paid subscriptions I have. I just wish 1. The navigation was a bit smoother/more intuitive, and 2. I could exclude certain types of ads (such as political) from my account.

It was a great app I had no trouble. I for some reason the app is not working you should delet it and intall it again. Other wise it is juast google play. It happened to me and I just donlowed it again and it worked. The other time it was every thing in google play that was not working so the app is perfectly fine and great. I am giving it five stars.

title: Cricket Visual Voicemail
description:
Some voicemails are important. Others are a waste of time. We designed Cricket Visual Voicemail to help you see your way to the messages that matter.
Visual Voicemail lets you:
¬∑         View a list of your voicemail messages
¬∑         Play, delete, or save messages in any order
¬∑         Pause, stop, replay and fast forward messages while playing
¬∑         Reply to messages by returning the call or text message
¬∑         Easily change your recorded greeting
¬∑         Save important messages to your phone or memory card.
¬∑         Easily export voice messages
 
Important to know: Receiving voicemail on the Visual Voicemail app will not count against your high-speed data quota. Downloading this app and responding to voicemails using email will count against your high-speed data quota. 
During initial setup the app may send a free one-time SMS to your Cricket Voicemail service to authenticate your account.

Problems Upgrading?

Don‚Äôt sweat it! We‚Äôre here to help. Contact us on Facebook (m.me/cricketwireless) or Twitter (@cricketsupport) for the fastest reply. You may also chat online at www.cricketwireless.com/contactus or call 1-800-CRICKET.
