comments: App no longer works. I am having the same problems as everyone else: The app notifies you of the message but upon clicking on it, the message time says 0:00/ out of nothing and does not play and is not transcribed. I keep force stopping and deleting the cache but these messages don't load for hours. I don't use the standard call-in voicemail and haven't had a password set up for years. Really frustrating because obviously voicemails tend to be time-sensitive.

ADS??? Are you serious?! Why on earth would you "update" this app to include ads? Not to mention, I haven't been receiving my voicemails lately. This is not a good look for me. I love Cricket Wireless. Been a loyal customer for years, but I don't like where this is going.

Flaky is the best way to describe it. Sometimes a VM will show up in the app within a minute of a message left. Sometimes hours later, like 6-12 hours later. Sometimes not at all. I cannot figure out when it'll flake out. And now you jerks PUT ADS in there too? Time to dump you turds.

doesn't work anymore. updated and half the time the messages aren't transcripted and i can't listen to any of them through this app anymore. have to call my voicemail like it's 2005. üëçüèº excellent 15 steps backwards all around here in 2020.

This app used to work great... but since the update I can't get ANY of my messages to play and it takes 20 minutes for the messages to even transcribe. I mean... what happened. If I have to use the vm that came with this phone then I might as well delete this app.

recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Fix bug
comments: Surprisingly great app considering its free. I have only tested the "Full body" and "Lower body" challenges so far and they are great. The only complaints are: - Not enough stretching at the beginning and end of the training. - The "full body challenge" essentially targets the upper body. Would have like a program for the whole body, 3-5 days a week! Good job guys (and girls)!

Great in home workout! I have gotten a few new phones since using this though, and my progress doesn't come with me. For instance, I did the 30 day challenge a while back, but when I get a new phone the last parts of that circuit are locked unless I do it all again. That's my only knock. Been using this for a long time and really happy with the compressed, useful workouts.

I used many apps but I have to admit that this is the best work out app. Can you imagine that I built a muscular body out of this app. No heavyweights needed, just a set of instructions and guidance to follow. The app is well designed, with work out plans, a section where you add your weight and calculate your BMI, and a full report given to you after every exercise. On top of this, there are no ads to bother you and you can even use it offline. In a nutshell, this is an awesome app!

Voice guided, no intrusive ads, what more can I ask for? If you're not a beginner and know the "theories" of working out, this is useful. I seriously doubt the "intermediate" chest workout could be done perfectly by even an "advanced" person, as the rest intervals are waaaay too low.

Tried doing the upper body and lower body routine 28 day challenge, and it was a great experience. The first 3 days all of my body was sore (haven't worked out in months). It targets certain parts of your body every day and gets more intense as days pass. Even has descriptions, gifs, and video examples in case there's confusion. I learned alot of different stretches and workouts to add to my own custom routine. And this was only 1 part of the app. Also the ads are so unintrusive!

title: Last Day on Earth: Survival
description:
The survival shooter Last Day on Earth is set in a post apocalyptic world: in 2027 the world saw an outbreak of an unknown infection that destroyed almost all the human race. And it didn‚Äôt stop there. All those dead started turning into zombies and those few survivors that have resistance in their blood are trying to survive on the ruins of the once great world.

And now the survival of your character is only in your power! Keep an eye on your character‚Äôs life stats such as hunger and thirst, collect valuable resources for crafting, create weapons and transport of different types or use what you have at hand: a bat or a road sign. Everything will come in handy for killing dozens... hundreds‚Ä¶thousands of zombies!

Defeat intruders to your land not only with your power but also cunning ‚Äì construct fortifications with traps or go raid other survivors‚Äô territories for the sake of rare loot and resources. After all people can do anything to survive. 

Hardcore fans will have plenty to do in tough seasonal locations. Before going to a desperate trip, equip your survivor with the most crushing weapon to hunt wild animals and destroy crowds of mutated zombies. One can reach seasonal location on a transport that‚Äôs available for crafting. Moreover if you pass the wall on the west of the map you will enter an online location where with a special costume on, you will be able to interact with other players. 

Explore the large and deep-laid world of Last Day on Earth! Upgrade your hero, equip your house, loot abandoned territories, hunt wild animals and other survivors ‚Äì the new world has new rules. 

Will you survive in conditions like these? If so, what price are you ready to pay?

comments: I love this game, it is a good one, but lately I have found a lot of server connection errors specially in this last update so try to fix this problem as soon as you can. I also have a suggestion for a multiplayer game in the original base same like the crater in the next season it would be wonderful to share tasks with friends, also please try to make more free rewards than paid ones to be suitable for young players and unemployed people, thanks.

I normally would give this 5 stars, but there are loading problems for me in this game. I'm afraid I'll lose all my progress and $$ that I've spent. Hopefully this will be resolved by support which I have emailed and I can switch this review to 5 stars. I love the game, but the problems right now are pissing me off. I want my progress back, didn't waste a couple of years playing this game to lose it all. Hopefully I'll hear from support soon

This games was alot of fun until I found out that all it takes is one glitch to cause you to lose everything. I actually PAID MONEY to obtain items that would've otherwise taken forever to get. All was going great until a random glitch because the SEASON UPDATE and I lost everything. No change of ever getting it back now. I talk to customer report, and they doesn't care about the customer instead they just replay us with witty remarks. And that not helping at all. I want my stuff get back

Still a grindy money grab. This game will never leave beta. You put time and money in it and updates just wipe away progress. It seems that the developers don't care about my time or nor do they respect me as a consumer. I'm out this game reminds me of a abusive relationship. You get nice flowers every month to forget the daily pummeling. Don't believe me look at the reaction below.

5 star for THE BEST ONLINE ZOMBIE GAME I ever played! But if you are a newbie, there are things need to consider. > The intro loading is a bit longer than usual game. > The game mechanics is based in real life situation so it is a bit hard. (Not all) > Don't forget to enjoy!!! #ComeToOurClanWeDoHelpEachOther. III % (Clan Name)

Love this app but can someone tell me how to stop stations playing on my playlist? It should auto to the next song not the next song from the previous artist.

Current Tinder Gold subscription price starts at $14.99 USD/month, and one-month, 6-month and 12-month packages are available. Prices are in U.S. dollars, may vary in countries other than the U.S. and are subject to change without notice. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. If you don‚Äôt choose to purchase Tinder Plus or Tinder Gold, you can simply continue using Tinder for free.

All photos are of models and used for illustrative purposes only.

Privacy: https://www.gotinder.com/privacy
Terms: https://www.gotinder.com/terms
summary: App to Match, Chat & Date with New People - online, near you & around the world!
developerAddress:
Tinder
8833 W. Sunset Blvd.
West Hollywood, CA 90069
recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements
comments: Push notifications declaring I have matches and should start conversation only to get in and there's nothing. Either don't do the push notifications like that until they've been there a little, or if it's bugging, fix it; I don't mind if someone unmatches but I'd rather know that's why they're not showing up so I'm not left thinking the app is sabotaging it? Definitely wouldn't spend money on it like that.

Totally miserable experience. Repetitive match suggestions, they keep appearing even after I reject them. Overpriced super expensive extras. All my matches, conversations, media and settings were lost after a website update - I was unable to continue with my connections - no reaction from support. And that was a paid "gold" account! Complete waste of money, time and energy.

Wouldn't recommend. Dudes swipe right, in order to match but don't talk. It makes no sense. If you're interested in someone and match them, why be unresponsive? It is very immature and wastes everyone's time. Therefore I am giving a low rating. There's great potential, but people need to stop being immature and actually talk to their matches.

Installed the app and cannot log on either with Facebook, phone or email. Constant errors keep popping up when trying to log into an existing account. Edit October 2020. Since found out I have been banned from Tinder. When I spoke to them, they will not tell me why I have been banned and they didn't do appeals. How can you ban someone and not tell them why or to even get their side of the story!!!

Ive been on tinder acouple of times in the past and it was easy without and real problem or bug. I downloaded it again last night and it won't open and keeps saying "we're experiencing some issues". Who's messed around with it? I mean there's no actual chance of meeting anyone on there, but it was perfectly fine and straightforward before.

title: Ferns N Petals: Flowers, Cakes, Gifts Delivery App
description:
Online Florist: Flowers, Gifts, Cakes Delivery Anytime Anywhere

Ferns N Petals or FNP is redefining the idea of gifting with its feature packed Android app. You can order flowers, cakes, gifts and much more with a single online florist shop mobile app in your phone. This online gifting store can help you send blooming fresh flower bouquets, yummy cakes, delicious chocolates & chocolate bouquets, soft toys, personalized gifts anywhere in India & abroad. Some of the salient features of FNP app are fast and easy gift finder search, reminder set up, multiple payment options, social logins, pin code finder, midnight/same day/one day/international deliveries, notifications for upcoming occasions etc.

Occasions are truly made memorable by our online flower and gifts FNP app:

‚Ä¢ Birthday Flowers, Cakes & Gifts- Send flowers, exciting gifts & mouth-watering cakes to the birthday boy/girl on the same day with our florist app.
‚Ä¢ Anniversary Flowers- Make anniversary celebrations a memorable affair with gift ideas from our online flower & cake shop.
‚Ä¢ Love & Romance Valentine‚Äôs Day Flowers & Gifts- Shower your beloved with exciting flowers, valentine special serenades & gifts on Valentine‚Äôs Day through our florist app.
‚Ä¢ Diwali Gifts- Make Diwali celebrations of your loved ones special by sending them wonderful gift hampers.
‚Ä¢ Congratulations, Good luck, Thank You, Miss You, Housewarming, New baby- Whether it is about offering congratulations or saying thank you, good luck, get well soon or I am sorry to your loved ones, you can buy diverse range of floral bouquets & arrangements for any situation with our Android mobile app.
‚Ä¢ Sympathy & Funeral- Express your heartfelt sympathy & emotions to the huge loss by ordering online flowers such as White Lilies.
‚Ä¢ Karwa Chauth Gifts- Make the nuptial bond strong by sending gifts to your wife on Karwa Chauth.
‚Ä¢ Mother‚Äôs Day, Father‚Äôs Day, Friendship day- Express the endless love for your parents & make your friendship eternal with stunning flowers & gifts.
‚Ä¢ Raksha Bandhan & Bhai Dooj- Express your love & emotions to your siblings by gifting them a Rakhi surprise through our app.
‚Ä¢ Christmas Wreaths & Gifts- Redefine your home d√©cor with these appealing Christmas wreaths and amazing gifts.
‚Ä¢ New Year Flowers & Gifts- Mark the beginning of a new year with wonderful online gifts, gift baskets & flower arrangements from our florist shop.

Variety of Product Types to Choose from on FNP:

‚Ä¢ Flowers: Choose from stunning floral bouquets & arrangements that are crafted from a wide range of exotic flowers like roses, lilies, orchids, carnations etc.
‚Ä¢ Cakes: Buy exciting cake flavours such as Black Forest, Chocolate Truffle, Vanilla, Butterscotch, Red Velvet, Pineapple, Fresh Fruit, Cupcakes & lot more.
‚Ä¢ Chocolates & Chocolate Bouquets- Ditch away the old traditional way of gifting chocolates with these chocolate bouquets and chocolate boxes.
‚Ä¢ Personalised Gifts- Make them feel special by shopping personalised coffee mugs, personalized cushions, personalized photo frames, personalized jewellery etc.
‚Ä¢ Plants- Go green by gifting good luck plants, green house plants, air purifying plants etc.

Shipping & Deliveries- Ferns N Petals delivers all 365 days with following delivery options: 

‚Ä¢ Same-day standard, Morning, Fixed time (you can ask for a specific time delivery) and Midnight delivery ‚Äì all at just 2 hours‚Äô notice.
‚Ä¢ We are also introducing a Super-Fast 60 Minutes Cakes delivery in metro cities from April'17, where the cakes would be delivered in less than an hour.

350+ Cities covered across India: 

Delhi, Bengaluru, Mumbai, Pune, Gurugram, Kolkata, Noida, Hyderabad, Chennai, Lucknow, Thane, Ghaziabad, Jaipur, Chandigarh, Ahmedabad, Patna, Dehradun, Faridabad, Kanpur, Indore, Nagpur, Guwahati, Bhopal, Ranchi, Kanchipuram, Allahabad, Baroda etc.

comments: My experience with this app was very bad. The cake was not at all good, both in presentation and taste. Also the note delivered was hand written, it should be in printed form and even I select the option to not show my name, still they wrote my name. Its been more than 7 days when I raised complaint and still they haven't done anything. I will never order from FNP again.

Till now its best .... Thankyou so much for reaching us to the best !!! Just there is a problem while making a payment!! Please look at the payment process it does get completed on the spot instead of fetching any link in mesaages or emails, or it just works like that !! Thankyou üòä Hello there, Its an humble request can you please open one of your frenchiese here in dhule maharashtra, i hope you'll consider my opinion ‚ù§

This is an excellent app to deliver gift items to any place at any item. But I dont like the way tickets are addressed. Generally you should close a ticket when the whole issue is addressed. I just see someone just replying to it and it is closed automatically. And there are no app notifications to let us know there has been a reply in the ticket we raised nor for its closure. Though the motive is to provide a better service, this is irritating.

This is one of the best app ever if want to surprise your near and dear one..I was out of town and wanted to make my husband's birthday very special, but i thought without me how it would be possible, but fnp made it memorable. They gave the Beautiful and tasty cake. It was awesome, my husband was very happy i recommend to go for fnp everytime. I missed to add they delivered it before time. Thank u fnp..keep growing üëç

Pathetic app and service. Usually product cost is high and we understand it is for service. But the service is really very very very bad no use of paying high price then usual. FnP has spoiled my special day by informing that service can't be provided before 2 hrs of that occasion whereas I did a advance booking almost 4 to 5 days before. Not gonna recommend this app for its services neither I'll be using it anymore.

title: Mood Messenger - SMS & MMS
description:
The best rated alternative to your default Android SMS & MMS App
 Simple, smooth and effective
You can customize almost everything and you have access to awesome features like the typing indicator and real timer caller id.
If you are frustrated by the default Android texting app you must try Mood Messenger
¬†
Fully Customizable (per contact if you want):
- Bubble shapes & colors
- Backgrounds & over 100 themes
- Fonts & text size
- Notifications (LED, sounds, vibration, format)
- Animated Emojis - iOS, Android or Emoji One style emojis
- Choose over 100 free themes
- Dark mode
¬†
Awesome features :
- Typing indicator to see when your contact is writing
- Chat Encryption between Mood Premium users
- Group conversations
- Real time Caller ID - no more number guessing!
- Easy & Fast messaging from the After Call Screen
- Private conversation to hide messages and protect them with a password
- Spam blocking to blacklist annoying messages
- Animated GIF library
¬†
- Dual SIM
- Easy location sharing
- Schedule your messages
- Delay sending to avoid mistakes
- Pin important conversations at the top of the list
¬†
So if you want a crash free, user friendly SMS & MMS texting app with dozens of awesome features, look no further and give Mood a try.
Mood messenger is compatible with most brands of phones like Samsung, Huawei, Wiko, Sony and HTC.

comments: I have used this app for years and loved it. I loved the background themes the most. But since the update, nothing works right. I've been noticing that I'm not getting messages in real time. They come much later and sometimes only if I open the app to check. When I get off a call, which should have nothing to do with the text app, there's a blank text screen on the page with a huge ad at the bottom. I'm looking for a new app. This one no longer suits my style.

The new update is horrible. I try to text and it blacks out my text window so its hard to see. It shoves a ad the size of a third of you screen which tries to get you to accidently hit it, which then erases your current text. Between the ad strip on top and the large banner ads on the bottom this app no longer is fast and easy to use. To slow dodging ads.

Not sure what happened since the last update, but now when i send a message, i get a failed to send error, after the green dots go back and forth for a while. I never get the green check. I have had to go back to my old sms client to keep from getting this error. Back to the same issue after this update.

I used to love this app, but I HATE the new style that came with the most recent update. Now, now matter how small the font is, when you're typing a text it will only allow two to three words on each line and it breaks up long words even though there's plenty of space in the bubble. This makes it really hard to proofread your texts. Also, I can never reply to 5 digit text numbers and the developers have not helped me fix this. Currently looking for a new app.

To walk from, or even past an app like this I couldn't do so. How awesome it definitely is, does remain on five with me. But only do I request one thing; if having either a modified or simply rain-based theme. Alongside the hopes of having a rain theme, I also was going to mention that while typing the texts, why our words don't cover the entire area while doing so now? Could that be fixed as well. Thank you.

title: Elevate ‚Äì Mental Health Inspirational Self-Care
description:
Are you facing a new challenge, dealing with life's ups and downs, or exploring a next step in your life? Then download Elevate and get motivational content that will inspire you to be successful in every part of your life.

Elevate is giving people the tools to overcome adversity and manifest their best selves with bite-sized daily pieces of wisdom, guidance, and inspiration. If you‚Äôre looking to stay focused on reaching your future goals, you will truly benefit from the Elevate app‚Äôs unique and inclusive community.

With the Elevate app, you will be given tools and direction that you need to develop willpower and stamina and achieve your goals. All you need is a little coaching and motivation!

This newfound success thinking will allow you to feel and firmly believe that you can achieve all your goals no matter what life throws at you! Check out the amazing app features that are focused around optimizing your health and wellness!

Add A Bit Of Inspiration To Your Life Every Day
Do you suffer from stress & anxiety, depression, or other mental health disorders that are leaving you feeling down about living a stagnant lifestyle? Then start your day off right with 800+ unique inspirational Elevate of the Day passages from a variety of topics at your fingertips. Designate your time preference (whether day or night) to receive your special passage at a time that fits your lifestyle!

Maintain Your Goals With Self-Improvement Challenges
Give yourself a boost in positivity and begin taking your daily living and healthy habits to the next level with hundreds of engaging self-care challenges to choose from. These challenges will help you open your mind, body, and emotions and achieve overall wellness and balance.

Keep Pushing Forward With Interactive Motivational Content
The Elevate app guides you on how to focus and manifest your dreams with curated inspirational videos and audio podcasts. Learn tips from self-help, relationship, and success coaches that can improve your well-being, help you rise above hardship and transform your life.

Make Empowered Connections In An Inclusive, Safe Community
It‚Äôs time to get inspired! Join our diverse community of like-minded individuals and engage in meaningful conversations around a variety of topics of interest. Inspire and lift each other up by sharing your life‚Äôs self care testaments, goals and experiences.

Track Your Progress And Growth 24/7
Elevate provides users with an intuitive platform to track their personal growth and improvement status at all times. Monitor how well you‚Äôre building success habits and get unique suggestions on how you can improve. Gain points and unlock achievements when using Elevate and share your progress to your friends!

Personalize Your Profile And Unlock Achievements
Unlock uber perceptive analytical data that gives you the insight you need to kick your self-care, health and wellness into high gear! Enhance your user experience when it comes to personalizing your profiles, filtering, and sorting daily inspirational and self-care content with user preference, progress, and goals.

üì≤ Download the Elevate app for free today and start experiencing mental, physical, and emotional success!

---------------

We hope that you enjoy using this app and that it helps you achieve your goals and live the life you always wanted to live in the future. Please reach out & let us know about your unique iOS mobile app/tablet user experiences! contact@getelevateapp.com

comments: This app is a life saver !! I struggle with anxiety and sometimes very overwhelmed. This app has kept me motivated and uplifted. It is also nice to see brown faces that look like me that I can relate to. I recommend this app for anyone looking to conquer there day and become apart of an amazing community.
Bought the monthly subscription, but the app won't recognize it and won't allow me to access content. For an app that's supposed to help manage stress... well, it's doing the other thing.

I came across the app on Facebook. Even though it claims to be a mental health app for everyone, every picture I've seen seems to only reach out to one demographic. (Caucasian) Mental illness is something that is prevalent to all races, however it would be nice to see that the brown community is being included. That being said there are some good areas of the app that very useful. Please change the marketing so Everyone feels it's something they can benefit from.

title: Uber Eats: Food Delivery
description:
Find Food Options For Your Budget. 

Hungry? Find the food you crave and order from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your food order in real-time. Get your food delivered by delivery people using the Uber Eats app.

FIND YOUR FAVORITE RESTAURANTS
Browse nearby restaurants and search for food by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, meal. Choose from a variety of food to order: Pizza. Burritos. Burgers. Sushi. Chinese food. Skip the line and reservations. Order food using the Uber Eats app now.

SIMPLE ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That‚Äôs it.
Order food to be delivered by delivery people as soon as possible.
Or, schedule your food order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER AHEAD, PICKUP, OR DELIVERY
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and go to the restaurant to get your food. Or, choose the new no-contact delivery option and request your order be left at your doorstep.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated delivery time to your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY
Join the thousands of others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order their favorites restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Abu Dhabi, Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Bogota, Brisbane, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Dubai, Hong Kong, Johannesburg, Glasgow, Liverpool, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Moscow, Mumbai, Nashville, New Delhi, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, Rio de Janeiro, San Diego, San Francisco, Sao Paulo, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Vienna, Warsaw, and Washington DC.  Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in Australia, Belgium, Brazil, Canada, Colombia, France, Japan, India, Mexico, New Zealand, Poland, Russia, South Africa, Spain, Taiwan, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States, and more.

THE APP CHOICE OF MILLIONS

Over 1 billion orders have been delivered by delivery people using the Uber Eats app. Join the millions who choose to order food using the Uber Eats app to get their favorite food today.
The Uber Eats app was selected as a Google Play "Editor's Choice" and was part of the "Best of 2018 Awards" for User‚Äôs Choice.

Visit ubereats.com for more details!

Order delivery in Australia, Belgium, Brazil, Canada, Colombia, France, Japan, India, Mexico, New Zealand, Poland, Russia, South Africa, Spain, Taiwan, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States, and more.

THE APP CHOICE OF MILLIONS

Over 1 billion orders have been delivered by delivery people using the Uber Eats app. Join the millions who choose to order food using the Uber Eats app to get their favorite food today.
The Uber Eats app was selected as a Google Play "Editor's Choice" and was part of the "Best of 2018 Awards" for User‚Äôs Choice.

Visit ubereats.com for more details!
summary: Delicious. Convenient.
recentChanges:
We update the Uber Eats app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback keeps the Uber Eats running.

Have a question? Tap Help in the Uber Eats app or visit help.uber.com.
comments: The app keeps crashing. It closes suddenly. I thought it was because of my buggy old phone, but now I'm using another phone model and it works well but the app keeps closing. I asked my friends and they told me it also occurs with them. I can't even order. Plus the attendance is the worse. I lost one account because I lost my old phone and the number was gone as well, then I couldn't recover it, I asked for help and the support never came. iFood never did that to me.

I pay for the monthly pass... And I am pissed off because it won't connect. And yes I've uninstalled and reinstalled. I've turned my phone one and off.... I needed up using Doordash with no problems only it cost me more money because I don't have a pass there. I'd like my 10 bucks back at this point. Uber needs help and no matter who I email I never hear anything back.

After half a year, the app didn't improve. Application is full of bugs. Even cannot register in the system. A Year ago it didn't accept my email address, half a year ago it did, but didn't show the keyboard for the first name/last name fields. Half a year later (oct 2020) still the same issue. Guys, how is it possible to create such a bad app? Shame

Worst app. Doesn't even run properly. App tries to connect to server but can't. After half an hour finally connects and asks for address and looks for food and bang no response. Just the same screen with address option. Looks like it is searching for food in Mars that's why there is no food around me. And the same process repeat again and again.

I can't get the app to open when on wifi. I have to take it off wifi on my android in order for it to work. Otherwise I get the same message "try again" and no matter how many times you click it , it won't open the app. I have a brand new S20 Ultra and it hasn't worked on my previous android wither.

title: VZ Navigator
description:
Try the all new VZ Navigator FREE* for 30 Days and then pay only $4.99/month thereafter, or use it when you need it for just $0.99 for 24 hours of use.
VZ Navigator is a premium navigation application that provides the most complete, accurate, and easy-to-use navigation assistance available. Enhanced 3D maps, intuitive local search and natural turn-by-turn voice guidance get you to your destination quickly and efficiently.  Advanced features such as Doppler weather radar, gas prices, and movie showtimes give you valuable information to help save time and money. 

Simple and Adaptive Maps
With a focus on optimizing the user experience, the map has been totally redesigned.  Every feature, from the advanced gestures and unified color scheme to the high-fidelity landmarks and transparent 3D buildings has been expressly composed to balance simplicity and capability. Customizable map layers include real-time traffic, satellite view, Doppler weather radar, and favorites.

Personalized Local Searches
Search has been enhanced and is now better than ever. With TripAdvisor ratings and reviews integrated into points of interest, choosing local places to visit is a snap.  With our improved Gas Station search, effortlessly view and compare all nearby stations and prices on the map.  Our Movie search has also been overhauled to be easier to use, whether you‚Äôre just browsing or looking for specific movie or theater.  Additionally, you can add any store brand or place category to your Explore panel, allowing one-tap to find your favorite places no matter where you go.

Streamlined Navigation
Helping you confidently and safely maneuver around streets and highways on your journey is our primary goal.  Visual & Voice Lane Guidance and Realistic Highway Signs ensure you‚Äôre always in the right place at the right time while preparing for maneuvers.  Natural Voice Guidance provides references to real-world landmarks like stop signs and traffic lights to help you make turns with confidence.  Our navigation experience has been refreshed with real-time traffic integrated into your route, along with one-touch access to your upcoming maneuvers and route overview.  Plus, take advantage of our customizable Speed Limits & Alerts to stay safe ‚Äì and possibly even avoid a ticket.
*Offer valid for new VZ Navigator subscribers. Limited time offer. Customer will automatically continue with the $4.99 monthly subscription after the 30 day trial period ends. Unsubscribe anytime using the ‚ÄúMy Account‚Äù menu option in the app or by calling 1.800.922.0204 within 30 days of downloading the app to avoid being charged.

developerAddress: One Verizon Way, Basking Ridge, New Jersey
comments: From what I can see this map is just ok. I'd like to find one satellite map, just one out there that could show me where I live in actual true Time, picture in focus, up close in focus! Not a big blur of I don't know what? The area where I live from a satellite view in Focus. I want to see the eight acres in my backyard in focus. I'd like to see my car in front of my home. Not cars that used to live here years ago. I've been here eighteen years and haven't seen one map with a picture of one of my cars in my driveway. Anybody got any good ideas for a good focused View. True time?

Was ok this morning, but it chipped out and I deleted it, now I can't get it to download, my signal is weak here though, I'll try again tomorrow, if it's still not working I'll have to call Verizon and see what's wrong, morning after STILL having trouble installing this app., I'll keep checking,still won't install at noon, will check again later,getting less stars, used to like this app, finally after 3 days lets me install it, hopefully it's updated and better
The app beeps every so often to let you know you're over the speed limit, which is annoying. It should let you set a limit over the posted speed in order to not get a ticket.
Consistently Reliable I've used Verizon Navigator for years and it has always worked very well. I definitely rely on it to get me there on time.
Love this app, just wish map was updated because it may take you on dirt road when you could have gone another mile on pavement. Like the ability to choose between routes.

title: Choices: Stories You Play
description:
One choice can change everything! With romance, drama, horror and more, Choices has the best collection of story games in the world!
‚ú¶ Customize your main character
‚ú¶ Fall in love, solve crimes and embark on epic fantasy adventures
‚ú¶ Pick your story from our constantly growing library with weekly chapter updates
‚ú¶ Control what happens next in immersive visual stories!

Current stories include:

‚ùñ THE FRESHMAN - Welcome to Hartfeld University! In this college drama, you‚Äôll make new friends for life and find true love romancing your schoolmates. Will you date bookish James, party girl Kaitlyn, football hero Chris... or all three at once?

- Dress your character in fashion-forward outfits for events like a sorority rush.
- Choose a date for the elegant and romantic Winter Formal.

‚ùñ THE CROWN & THE FLAME - Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown! Assume the role of the hero in this interactive narrative adventure.

- Form alliances and relationships to build your army.
- Dress in elegant fashions and powerful armor.
- Crush enemies in an epic battle!

‚ùñ PERFECT MATCH - Sign up for the high-tech matchmaking services of Eros Incorporated, and master the dating game! Create your look, meet your perfect match, and fall in love in this thrilling mystery story!

- Customize your date to be your perfect match.
- Roleplay as a guy or a girl.
- Investigate a mystery with twists you won‚Äôt see coming!

You might also love:

‚ùñ BLOODBOUND - You're applying for a job with brilliant CEO billionaire Adrian Raines. Urban fantasy meets romance in this sexy vampire thriller!

‚ùñ HIGH SCHOOL STORY - It's your first day at a new high school! Make friends, find love, and attend the Homecoming dance. Relive your teen years in your very own High School Story!

...PLUS more new stories and chapters EACH WEEK!

FOLLOW CHOICES:
facebook.com/ChoicesStoriesYouPlay
twitter.com/playchoices
instagram.com/choicesgame

Choices is free to play, but you are able to purchase game items with real money. You may limit the ability to make in-app purchases by creating a PIN in the Settings menu from within the Google Play Store.

PRIVACY POLICY & TERMS OF SERVICE
- Please read our privacy policy at http://www.pixelberrystudios.com/choices-privacy-policy/
- By playing Choices, you agree to our terms of service http://www.pixelberrystudios.com/choices-terms-of-service

ABOUT US

Choices is from the team that has been bringing you narrative games for over a decade. We created the top 25 hit games, Surviving High School and Cause of Death, the first games with episodes, for EA. After leaving EA, our team regrouped as Pixelberry in a small office, set out to continue creating story driven games with heart and launched the two interactive hit games, High School Story and Hollywood U.

Our team has now grown to over a dozen of the most experienced game writers in the industry. In our 10 years of creating story games together, we‚Äôve seen heartbreak, marriages, great adventures, and even Pixelbabies.

Stay tuned for more new interactive story games to pick from in Choices!

- The Pixelberry Team

recentChanges:
RISING TIDES: When a natural disaster hits your town, your sister insists it's related to climate change. But will the town listen?

NEW CHAPTERS EACH WEEK
Prepare for a new year in high school in My Two First Loves! Then gear up and get ready for new chapters of Open Heart, The Royal Heir, and Rising Tides!
comments: The stories are really good, and the charater designs look nice. The only thing is I wish there were no gem choices. It makes it hard to play the game the way you want, and the only way to get them is from reading chapters or ads. I can eventually get enough for some choices but it takes a while. The VIP subscription is really expensive too. Still, it's a good game with no pop up ads, And therr are a lot of different stories of many genres to choose from!

Everything about this game is great ‚Äî the stories, the characters, the graphics, the music. But I am giving it two stars because the pricing model is terrible. Each chapter of each book typically contains three premium choices which tend to cost 15+ "diamonds" each. The only effective way to get diamonds is to spend actual cash ‚Äî even if you pay the $15 a month for VIP, you get only 10 additional diamonds a day. VIPs don't even get a discount on diamond packages. Sad.

I love this game, but the only problem is when it comes to keys and gems. When you don't wanna pay for these things you end up having to wait FOREVER for them to re-gen. I see a way to fix this as being able to re-gen 5 keys instead of just 2, or make the keys re-gen faster. For the gems maybe they could give out 5 gems every 12 or so hours instead of 24. Overall the game is great, and these are the only problems I have with it.

It is a fun game just costs too much to be able to make the good choices. Should have more options available at least for the closet without having to use so many. Should be more ways to get more free diamonds or make the choices with having to use less of them. There should be way more options to get way more diamonds especially for VIPs. But no there isn't. Everything costs. Or you have to wait forever to build up enough diamonds to even finish a chapter. Not right.

This game is addictive. I loved it very much but the Graphics are blurry when it comes to the real part of love making. The developers should work on it and make the conversation more lengthy and seductive instead of going directly to love making. Moreover, the sound effects and music needs improvement by adding moaning, crying and laughing and ecstasy sounds to the game so that one should feel he/she is actually itself a character and not a spectator. 18 plus version is also needs to be added.

title: iHeartRadio: Radio, Podcasts & Music On Demand
description:
Your Music, Your Stations, And #1 For Podcasts. All Free.

Stream unlimited music, thousands of live radio stations, podcasts and playlists for any mood or activity, all in one app. The iHeartRadio app for Android Phone and Tablet is easy to use and best of all, it's FREE.
 
Download the iHeartRadio Android app today and start listening to your favorite live radio stations, podcasts and music playlists!


The Best Live & Local Radio Stations
‚Ä¢ Discover thousands of local AM and FM radio stations live near you and from cities across the globe.
‚Ä¢ Our Radio App allows you to tune in to top radio stations, music, breaking news, sports, talk and comedy radio shows.
‚Ä¢ Hear sports radio stations like ESPN Radio, Fox Sports Radio, FNTSY Sports Radio, and more.
‚Ä¢ Listen to top sports personalities discuss the latest news around the NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL, NCAA, Soccer, Golf, and Tennis.

The iHeartRadio Podcast App - now #1 for Podcasts
‚Ä¢ Our Podcast App features the most popular podcasts from NPR, Gimlet, How Stuff Works, ESPN Podcasts, Big Money Players Network, TED, Wondery, and from popular personalities like The Ron Burgundy Podcast, Anna Faris Is Unqualified Podcast, The Herd with Colin Cowherd Podcast, The Joe Rogan Podcast, Ben Shapiro Podcast, Bobby Bones Podcast, Armchair Expert with Dax Shepard, Chelsea Handler Podcast, and more.
‚Ä¢ Follow your favorite podcasts and download podcast episodes to your Android device to listen offline, without the need for WiFi.
‚Ä¢ Explore popular and trending shows with our iHeartRadio Podcast App charts. The Top 100 Chart refreshes every Monday.
‚Ä¢ Our podcast app and podcast player allow you to experience podcast playback at your desired speed of 0.5x, 1x, 1.25x, 1.5x, and 2x.


Free Music Playlists - perfect for any moment
‚Ä¢ Listen to thousands of hand curated song playlists on the free iHeartRadio Playlist App. Organized by mood, activity, decade and genre to make it easy to find something that‚Äôs the perfect soundtrack for any moment.
‚Ä¢ Enjoy the sound of 'Your Weekly Mixtape' - music discovery made easy. A weekly playlist of songs we‚Äôve curated based on the music you love and the music you‚Äôre listening to right now. We‚Äôll refresh your mixtape every Monday with a new batch of tracks we know you‚Äôll vibe to throughout your week.
‚Ä¢ Explore our Cloud based audio options directly from your phone.

Play Free Artist Radio Stations
‚Ä¢ Use our library of millions of songs to create personalized music stations based on your favorite artists and  genres like Country, Top 40, Pop, Hip Hop, R&B, EDM, Rock, Alternative, Classical, Indie, Folk, Gospel, Christian, Dance, and more.


The Ultimate Station Made Just for You
‚Ä¢ 'My Favorites Radio' collects all of the songs you love in one free personalized station.

Premium Features
Listen absolutely free with ads, or take control of your listening experience with iHeartRadio Plus‚Ñ¢ and iHeartRadio All Access‚Ñ¢.
‚Ä¢ Search and play any song, album and playlist with our library of millions of songs on demand
‚Ä¢ Save and replay any song with our music app from the radio
‚Ä¢ Enjoy unlimited skips
‚Ä¢ Download music to your Android Phone or Tablet to listen offline from Google Play
‚Ä¢ Create unlimited music hits playlists

Join our community!

‚Ä¢ Instagram: http://bit.ly/1e1AOUS
‚Ä¢ Twitter: http://bit.ly/1HZk5KQ
‚Ä¢ Blog: http://bit.ly/1GiT59D

For Feedback and Help
Tell us how we can improve by sharing your thoughts at https://help.iheart.com

recentChanges:
Thank you for choosing iHeartRadio. We update our app regularly to improve your experience and make it faster and more reliable, as well as bringing diverse radio stations, new and popular podcasts and music. This update includes:
* Listen to what your favorite stations love. Radio Stations can now build their own playlists or promote their favorite playlist on their Live Station Profile page.

comments: The app works most of the time but does get hung on occasion. The worst part is that even though it recovers, every time it happens it replays extra commercials instead of continuing the audio stream. I did read response from the author, and brief connection interruptions may be occurring. The interruptions occur most frequently during a popular segment so might be backend. My main point still stands, a less than 2 sec interruption should not have the app replay extra ad, just recover stream.

This app doesn't work at all. It keeps on giving me a message saying try again later. This was my very first time installing this app. I tried to purchased the "All Access" version, but I kept on getting a message that said try again later. So this is the reason I gave it one star. I wished I couldn't get it no stars. Fix asap!

I use the app a lot and have enjoyed it for many years. One of the stations I enjoy listening to is The Tchaikovsky Large Symphony Orchestra. It used to be amazing and play a great variety of classical composers. Lately, it has started playing a lot of other genres, like classic rock, Lynard Skynard, rap, Snoop Dog and Dr Dre, and country, Johnny Cash, just to name a few. I believe someone adjusted the algorithm, it would be great of it could be fixed.

The version on device is up to date. The device is less than a year old. It crashes often - like just stops in middle of broadcast. Often cuts top of the hour news short - usually during the weather it just jumps to a commercial. Constantly asks user to upgrade to premium. Since this review originally posted, it has crashed about a half dozen times. All these problems are relatively new. Needs quite a bit of improvement.

app is good but avoiding the subscription pop up is annoying and video ads playing 30 secs every time you switch stations is a bit much. Ads already play on the stations so it's overwhelming and is much less enjoyable than listening to a podcast show on other apps. I only use free versions of news and talk apps. I'll use more if app becomes better.

title: Talk 2 Life Coach
description:
Why Choose Life Coaching :  Life coaches assist their clients in improving their daily lives, relationships, careers as well as dealing with habits and traumatic experiences that he/she is finding difficult to overcome.

The objective of Life Coaching : Life coaches can help you clarify the goals you wish to achieve in your life and identify the obstacles holding you back. The objective of life coaching is to build/create strategies that are required in overcoming each obstacle you face and reaching the best possible outcome for you.

Having me as Your Life Coach : Each Client‚Äôs needs, wants, and desires vary, therefore working with me as a life coach is a unique experience, and sessions are designed according to your personal progress.

‚ÄúI WILL TEACH YOU HOW TO CREATE A SHIFT IN YOUR LIFE ‚Äì FROM HELPLESSNESS TO HOPEFULNESS!!
TO LOVE YOURSELF and TRUST YOURSELF!!
BOOK A SESSION WITH ME TODAY AND HELP YOURSELF!‚Äú


                                         WHAT CAN I HELP YOU WITH?

‚Ä¢	I JUST Want to Talk to someone : 
This service is offered to clients who simply require a session to talk ‚Äì They need a listening ear, someone to be objective in the conversation and provide possible guidance based on the current circumstances.  

‚Ä¢	Anger : I need help to manage my Anger outbursts.  It is creating chaos in my life. It is affecting my Family and social relationships and/or Job.

‚Ä¢	Grief : I need help in coping with my pain.  I am grieving the loss of someone dear to me.

‚Ä¢	Trauma : I need to Deal with my Traumatic experience/s. It is affecting all aspects of my life. I feel stuck and crippled by the experience. (e.g. sexual or physical abuse, a natural disaster such as a hurricane, flood, fire or earthquake, a serious car accident, sudden unexpected or violent death of someone close, serious injury and major surgery or life-threatening illness)

‚Ä¢	Career : I need help to identify my career choices / or I am unhappy with my current Career choice.  It is not satisfying and I want Change.

‚Ä¢	Spiritual Coaching : I am seeking a deeper understanding of my Life/ I want to have a sense of purpose/ I want to be able to heal myself and connect to my inner guidance.

‚Ä¢	RESTART : I need help in rediscovering and recreating Myself.  
These sessions are designed to help people who have made or were forced to make MAJOR Life changes and need support and clarity in restarting and rebuilding their Lives.
descriptionHTML:
Why Choose Life Coaching : Life coaches assist their clients in improving their daily lives, relationships, careers as well as dealing with habits and traumatic experiences that he/she is finding difficult to overcome.

The objective of Life Coaching : Life coaches can help you clarify the goals you wish to achieve in your life and identify the obstacles holding you back. The objective of life coaching is to build/create strategies that are required in overcoming each obstacle you face and reaching the best possible outcome for you.

Having me as Your Life Coach : Each Client‚Äôs needs, wants, and desires vary, therefore working with me as a life coach is a unique experience, and sessions are designed according to your personal progress.

‚ÄúI WILL TEACH YOU HOW TO CREATE A SHIFT IN YOUR LIFE ‚Äì FROM HELPLESSNESS TO HOPEFULNESS!!
TO LOVE YOURSELF and TRUST YOURSELF!!
BOOK A SESSION WITH ME TODAY AND HELP YOURSELF!‚Äú


WHAT CAN I HELP YOU WITH?

‚Ä¢ I JUST Want to Talk to someone :
This service is offered to clients who simply require a session to talk ‚Äì They need a listening ear, someone to be objective in the conversation and provide possible guidance based on the current circumstances.

‚Ä¢ Anger : I need help to manage my Anger outbursts. It is creating chaos in my life. It is affecting my Family and social relationships and/or Job.

‚Ä¢ Grief : I need help in coping with my pain. I am grieving the loss of someone dear to me.

‚Ä¢ Trauma : I need to Deal with my Traumatic experience/s. It is affecting all aspects of my life. I feel stuck and crippled by the experience. (e.g. sexual or physical abuse, a natural disaster such as a hurricane, flood, fire or earthquake, a serious car accident, sudden unexpected or violent death of someone close, serious injury and major surgery or life-threatening illness)

‚Ä¢ Career : I need help to identify my career choices / or I am unhappy with my current Career choice. It is not satisfying and I want Change.

‚Ä¢ Spiritual Coaching : I am seeking a deeper understanding of my Life/ I want to have a sense of purpose/ I want to be able to heal myself and connect to my inner guidance.

‚Ä¢ RESTART : I need help in rediscovering and recreating Myself.
These sessions are designed to help people who have made or were forced to make MAJOR Life changes and need support and clarity in restarting and rebuilding their Lives.
summary: Talk 2 Life Coach -Easy Access to Life Coaching Services @ a Click of a Button!
developerAddress: MORNINGSIDE , DURBAN, KZN, SOUTH AFRICA
comments: A very interesting app. Easy to navigate. Easily understood. Most convenient. Certainly a must have.
Easy to use. Easy booking system and life changing coaching sessions
Fantastic app and convenience at your fingertips.
Easy and quick service!
Amazing App! Easy to use

title: Candy Crush Jelly Saga
description:
There's a new player in town, the wiggling, jiggling Jelly Queen and she's here to challenge you to a game of Candy Crush Jelly Saga!  Whatever your favorite moves, you better hope they're Jellylicious enough to take on the mighty Jelly Queen.
 
The unstoppably spreadable game!  New Candy Crush Jelly Saga is full of delightful game modes, features and boss battles featuring the Jelly Queen!  Playing as Jenny, show off your Jellylicious moves and take turns switching Candies against the jiggling Jelly Queen. Every sweet move will spread more Jelly and whoever spreads the most will win the level!
 
There are splendid new Candies, a marvelous new booster and a dreamy treetop world to explore in the Candy Kingdom too!

Royal Championship is the new VS Mode in Candy Crush Jelly Saga. Players will compete 1:1 in fast paced game rounds in real time! Win a big bundle of rewards by completing a consecutive win streak and finishing in the top half of the leaderboard. The higher the position, the bigger the reward! Have you got what it takes?

Take on this delightful Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!
 
Candy Crush Jelly Saga is completely free to play but in-game currency, to buy items such as extra moves or lives, will require payment with real money.
 
You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device‚Äôs settings.
 
Candy Crush Jelly Saga features:
> Over 3000 Jellylicious Levels
> Real Time VS mode   	
> Boss Modes   	
> Marvelous game modes including: Spread the Jelly & Release the Pufflers  	
> Tasty Color Bomb Lollipop booster    
> Mesmerizing new Candies  	
> Dreamy new treetop world and a host of quirky characters led by the Jelly Queen and her stooges.  
> Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master

For players that Facebook Connect, there are leaderboards for you and your friends to compare your Jellylicious scores
 
Easily sync the game between mobile and tablet devices and unlock the full game features when connected to the internet	
 
Now you can express yourself, jelly-style! Be sassy like the Jelly Queen or cool like Cupcake Carl with our sweet Candy Crush Jelly Stickers!
 
Facebook @CandyCrushJellySaga
Twitter @CandyCrushJelly
Instagram @CandyCrushSaga
YouTube @CandyCrushOfficial
 
Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Candy Crush Jelly Saga!
 
Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in game help centre or by going to https://soporto.king.com/contact

recentChanges: Get ready for a jellylicious update! New sweet levels and graphics are coming your way! Also, you will soon be able to challenge friends around the world to an exciting Jelly Duel in our Player vs Player feature. Watch out for updates coming soon!
comments: I enjoy this game, very addictive!Recommend it to everyone wanting to play and improve their brain. I disagree with those claiming that at some level you must use money. I have played this game for years and refuse spend a dime. I have patience and detrrminationand try to learn from the failures. Usually do.Just give us more FREE weapons. Great game!

Very beautyful game. But in the championship game i want not to lose my progress.Why? As in football, and in other games , and in this championship ,the tickets that we collect is not, good to cancel.The best player,is he , who , for 48 ours ,play and win more games that enother player. .For example ! I collect 3 ,tickets in, 3 games.When I go in 4 game ,the colors are not in my favore ,so the progress stop.But is not right, to lose the tickets.

Hello King. GLITCH! Level 730! I beat a player and it still will not let me progress. Why incorporate sudden forced competitions into a game I've been playing for so long? AND if you're going to do so.. why not make it optional only? If this issue isn't cleared by morning I am uninstalling and KING won't get another dime from me. Ridiculous and unfortunate. It was a good game.

The game is fun to play but the Royal Championship is somehow unfair. It always unfavor players who are one win away from getting the treasure boxes. The other player would have an advantage because they would be given opportunities for combos and would normally win after a few moves. There should be fairness in giving out combos so that the game should be fair. Edit:It's so unfair that everytime I'm near getting the chest box, I always get disconnected or there's a problem with the game.

Stuck at level 60. It's blatantly obvious that this is one of those levels that is intended to make you pay. They will not give you what you need to progress until after 30 to 40 times of going through this level they get sick of looking at you and give you what you need until you hit the next one which is intended to force you to pay. I've found this with this company many times before and I'm not surprised it's in this one as well.

title: Smart Launcher 5
description:
We designed Smart Launcher for people who need a more efficient and smart way to use their Android devices. Smart Launcher is a home screen replacement that automatically sorts your app into categories and integrates modern solutions to let you perform your daily tasks faster and easier.
What's in Smart Launcher?
Automatic app sorting
Apps are automatically sorted in categories, you won't have to waste time organizing your icons anymore! The advantages of the automatic app sorting have been recognized also by Apple which introduced it in their App Library in iOS 14
Ambient theme
Smart Launcher automatically changes the theme colors to match your wallpaper.
Adaptive icons
The icon format introduced with Android 8.0 Oreo is fully supported and available for any Android device! Adaptive icons means not only customizable shapes but also beautiful and bigger icons!
Designed to be used with one hand
We moved the items you need to interact the most in the bottom part of the screen where they are easier to reach.
Ultra immersive mode
You can now hide the navigation bar in the launcher to maximize the screen space
Smart search
The Smart Launcher search bar allows to quickly find contacts and apps or to perform actions like searching on the web, adding a contact or performing a calculation.
Built-in clock widget with weather
The built-in widget has been redesigned to show info like alarm, next event and weather.
On screen notifications
Smart Launcher will now show you which apps have active notifications without requiring to download an external plugin. This makes the feature more stable and reliable.
Gestures and hotkeys
Both gestures and hotkeys are supported and configurable. You can turn off the screen with a double tap or show the notification panel with a swipe.
Customization
Smart Launcher is completely customizable thanks to many options. Hundreds of themes are available to downloads and icon packs are fully supported
Protect your apps
You can hide the apps you want and if you want to keep them secret, you can protect them with a PIN.
Wallpaper selection
Smart Launcher includes a very efficient wallpaper picker that allows you choose between many sources of pictures. You can also backup your wallpaper before to try a new one!
Smart Launcher is community-driven project, regularly updated with new features to support the most recent Android APIs and new devices. You can join our community and find out how to become a beta tester using this link: https://www.reddit.com/r/smartlauncher

summary: An amazing balance of customization and simplicity
developerAddress: Via Scaloria 129 c/o st. D'amico, Manfredonia (FG)
recentChanges:
SL 5.5 is finally here!
- Scrollable categories
- Editable themes
- Customizable fonts
- Wallpaper parallax
- Resizable icon labels

Build 34
- Folders have now a more modern look and animations.
- If you set folder columns number on "Auto", the system will automatically select the best arrangement depending on the icons in the folder.
comments: Incredible launcher!! I highly recommend! It gives your device such a smooth, organized feel. Plus, it looks simply beautiful. Also, there are an absolutely astounding number of customizable features included in the free version (which is basically ad-free as well). But since I knew I'd be sticking with this launcher for a long time to come, I forked out the one-time fee for the lifetime service, and now my customizable options are practically limitless! And I gotta say, it was worth every cent!

I bought the Nova Launcher years ago and swore by it for a long time. Problem is, that launcher is stuck back in the times when I first bought it. Smart Launcher 5 is exactly what I needed to feel like I am using a modern launcher with modern features, look and animations. The free version gives you pretty much everything you need. I bought the pro version because it was 50% off, wanted to support the developers for a great product, and because there are a couple pro features that I'll use.

Hands down, best launcher out there. There's even no competition. I've tried it all. Back in th days I had Nova pro and before this I had Poco. But this!! This is a whole new level!!! Downside is most of the good stuff are premium, but that's not even expensive for full time access, it's like 4 bucks or something, and it's money well spent. Keep up the good work! ‚ù§Ô∏è

I am speechless at the amazing flexibility of this launcher. I know that I am going to pay for the lifetime pro at some point when I exhaust all functionalities! There is just one issue I'm having that I have not found a fix around: In the news page, for tech and gaming categories I get no news, instead there is a box "index: 1, size: 1". I would appreciate some advice on how to solve this.

SL is awesome. I am using it for over 5 years now. It is (and was) the default launcher for me on every phone I have. I purchased premium only for ascetic reasons when ads were added to the free version. While updates are not abundant, it is apparent that the devs are considering feedbacks. The scrollable app page was a very much demanded feature. Finally it arrived and it is a breeze to use. It took some years, but I am very impressed. Now I have a powerful launcher with a lightweight UI.

title: Amazon Shopping - Search, Find, Ship, and Save
description:
Product Features

* Customers are able to shop millions of products on any of Amazon's sites around the world from a single app
*Use Alexa to help you shop‚Äîjust use your voice to search for products on Amazon, track your orders, and reorder your favorite items. Tap the microphone icon and say ‚Äúwhere‚Äôs my stuff?‚Äù to access open orders. Reorder products by saying ‚Äúreorder paper towels‚Äù or ‚Äúbuy more batteries‚Äù.
* Take advantage of 1-Click ordering, customer support, Wish Lists, create or find a baby or wedding registry, order tracking, and more
* Scan product barcodes and images to compare prices and check availability using Scan It
* Check out Gold Box Deals - including the Deal of the Day and Lightning Deals, and get automatically notified when new deals become available
* Send and share links to products via email, SMS, Facebook, Twitter, and more
* Sign-up for automatic shipment notifications to know when your order ships and arrives
* Buy with confidence, knowing that all transactions are securely processed


Product Description

The Amazon Shopping app lets you shop millions of products and manage your Amazon orders from anywhere. Browse, shop by department, compare prices, read reviews, share products with friends, and check the status of your orders.
Compare prices and availability by typing in your search, scanning a barcode or an image with your camera, or using your voice. Never miss a deal with easy access to Lightning Deals and the Deal of the Day. You can also sign-up for shipment notifications to know when your order ships and arrives. You have full access to your Shopping Cart, Wish Lists, payment and Prime shipping options, Subscribe & Save order history, and 1-Click settings, just like on the full Amazon.com site. All Amazon Shopping app purchases are routed through Amazon's secure servers to encrypt and safeguard your personal information.


Important Note Regarding Permissions
Please note that the Amazon Shopping app requires access to the following services to operate properly:
* Contacts: Allows you to send Amazon gift cards to your contacts or invitation to install the Amazon app.
* Camera: Allows the Amazon app to access your camera on the device. You can use your camera to find products by scanning the cover or its barcode, to add gift cards and credit cards, or to add pictures in the product reviews.
* Flashlight: Allows the Amazon app to turn on the flashlight. You can use the flashlight to find products with the camera feature even in low-light or dark conditions.
* Microphone: Allows the Amazon app to access your microphone to use your voice to search and interact with your Assistant.
* Location: Allows the Amazon app to access your location to help you discover local offers and select addresses fast.
* Account: Allows you to share products on Amazon with your friends and families through Facebook or other social networks.
* Phone: Allows the Amazon app to pre-populate the Amazon Customer Service number on your phone‚Äôs keypad.
* Storage: Allows the Amazon app to store your preferences so that some features can load and run faster on the device.
* Wi-Fi: This permissions is used when setting up either a Dash Button or Dash Wand using the Amazon Shopping app.

OS Requirements: Requires Android OS 5.0 or higher and a rear-facing camera. The Amazon App for Tablets is available on Google Play. Search for "Amazon Tablet" to install the app and begin shopping.

developerAddress:
AMZN Mobile LLC
410 Terry Ave N
Seattle, WA 98109
recentChanges: AmazonSmile customers can now generate donations for their favorite charity. Just open Settings from the menu and tap AmazonSmile.
comments: Two aspects worth a mention; 1. You can get wildly different search results from the app and the Amazon website on a PC so if you're searching for an unusual or rare item you may miss out on options and choices in your purchase if you don't conduct a search on both platforms, 2. Searching by title for a movie on DVD very often doesn't offer 'DVD' as a category in the 'category' filters; it always offers 'Prime Video' however which is an unacceptable hard sell.

Hi all! I am updating my review and hoping to report a new suggestion for the Amazon app. I like the new set up of filters on the top bar when shopping because I use certain filters on everything I search to find the best quality items from trusted sellers. However, the "category" filter option is too far over. It should be one of the first shown in the row. In order to filter for only items shipped and sold by Amazon, I must first select the Category. Please move the Category filter over. Thx!‚ò∫

You're app and pc site will not allow me to see pages. I keep getting captchas and errors constantly. I can't shop on the app because of my vision, but because I get the same on the pc, I'm always having to delete and download it again. I can't shop the way I want if I can't use the site anywhere... I'm shopping more elsewhere because no one will help me. The rating system is also so deceiving. I used to depend on reviews, now it's a joke! Everything has gotten rediculous. Please fix it.

This is the worst to search for anything or buy anything on! Doesn't allow you to choose the category you want and it doesn't even have a grid system so you can look at more items so it takes forever!! I only have this for updates on my shipping. This actually used to be a really good app about two years ago, but the more they update the worse they get!!

This app is very easy to navigate & has never failed me. Customer service is excellent at Amazon... Only Exception was during the lockdown when you could not get to a real person through customer service & had to use email. The 1 thing that drives me bonkers is in the Subscribe & save section if a product is not being delivered especially if you have had it on a monthly basis for over a year , there is no way to communicate with anyone in subscribe & save to address your issues.

title: Tripadvisor Hotel, Flight & Restaurant Bookings
description:
Plan your vacation and book an amazing trip, with millions of travel recommendations and reviews from travelers like you on hotels, must-do experiences, top places to eat and other nearby vacation hidden gems. Tripadvisor is the perfect travel planner, helping you book a table at restaurants and compare low prices when booking hotels and flights for your next trip.

The Tripadvisor app is the ultimate travel planner, and is free and easy to use:

‚Ä¢ Access over 830 million reviews of hotels, flights, things to do, vacation rentals, and restaurants from travelers like you
‚Ä¢ Use our planning tool, Trips, to save and organize your travel ideas for hotels, restaurants, tours and attractions and see them together on a map
‚Ä¢ Find great deals on hotels by comparing the lowest prices from more than 200 booking sites worldwide
‚Ä¢ Search and book the world‚Äôs largest collection of tours, attractions and experiences
‚Ä¢ Modify or cancel most tour, attraction and experience bookings for free
‚Ä¢ Access mobile tickets for booked tours and activities
‚Ä¢ Use Google Pay or PayPal to make tour or activity bookings
‚Ä¢ Find great food wherever you are and reserve tables at local restaurants
‚Ä¢ Compare airfares and find great deals on flights
‚Ä¢ Browse and book Travelers‚Äô Choice award-winning hotels, experiences, restaurants and more
‚Ä¢ Get answers on specific questions from other like-minded travelers in the Tripadvisor forums
‚Ä¢ Add your own reviews and photos of places you‚Äôve visited
‚Ä¢ Quickly discover nearby hidden gem travel recommendations, find and book must-see things to do while on your trip as well as reserve tables at great restaurants
‚Ä¢ View traveler and local recommended places on a map while on your trip

While on a trip, use the app to view nearby hidden gems, hotels, restaurants and top vacation tours and attractions on a map -- then save ideas for later, or book your favorites on the spot and visit a city later. The Tripadvisor travel planner app uses your location to send you great travel recommendations and we  share this information with trusted third party partners to provide you with a better experience. Note that your location is collected even if the app is in the background.

‚Ä¢ Modify or cancel most tour, attraction and experience bookings for free
‚Ä¢ Access mobile tickets for booked tours and activities
‚Ä¢ Use Google Pay or PayPal to make tour or activity bookings
‚Ä¢ Find great food wherever you are and reserve tables at local restaurants
‚Ä¢ Compare airfares and find great deals on flights
‚Ä¢ Browse and book Travelers‚Äô Choice award-winning hotels, experiences, restaurants and more
‚Ä¢ Get answers on specific questions from other like-minded travelers in the Tripadvisor forums
‚Ä¢ Add your own reviews and photos of places you‚Äôve visited
‚Ä¢ Quickly discover nearby hidden gem travel recommendations, find and book must-see things to do while on your trip as well as reserve tables at great restaurants
‚Ä¢ View traveler and local recommended places on a map while on your trip

While on a trip, use the app to view nearby hidden gems, hotels, restaurants and top vacation tours and attractions on a map -- then save ideas for later, or book your favorites on the spot and visit a city later. The Tripadvisor travel planner app uses your location to send you great travel recommendations and we share this information with trusted third party partners to provide you with a better experience. Note that your location is collected even if the app is in the background.
summary: Browse traveler photos for inspiration and map out your own travel plans.
recentChanges:
We frequently update the Tripadvisor app to make it even more useful to travelers like you. Here‚Äôs what‚Äôs new:

‚Ä¢ Various performance improvements and bug fixes to help you find great places nearby, wherever you are
comments: The 'Go to App' when away from home. I like to read several reviews on anywhere I may visit. Gain a picture of what to expect & look for possible pointers for what to try, see or sample. We are all different & "one man's meat is another man's position." Any venue can have an, "off day" ditto waiter, receptionist, chiefs, etc. It's an 'over view' I seek, a feel for a place. NB: don't just read reviews of places - but also reviewers reviews! Be aware of 'planted' (paid) reviews & reviewers.

Good with booking a hotel, bad for booking a flight on Tripadvisor. The reason being is that I look on a different booking site for flight prices, compared this to expedia and expedia is the best bet for booking a flight as their prices make sense to me. Step up your A-game in the case of booking a flight Tripadvisor please!

The best app for finding your way around a new place. It has all the restaurants and is almost always reliable, and is very useful for finding other things like attractions too. I wish it would remember more things when you switched off the app (ie switching to WhatsApp and then back) as its a pain to have to find the page you were just on, but it's still really a great app.

You ruined the app. It used to be my go to app for restaurants and hotels, now it can't even find a location less than 1km from me. Not only that, when I did pull it from the map (which is also wrong) it said it was closed. What a joke. Don't expect me to use this app anymore.
Frustrating at times, asks if you want to limit your results to the specific area you search for, but even when you do that, it still includes loads of suggestions that are further away....

title: Pet Rescue Saga
description:
Pet Rescue Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Saga & Farm Heroes Saga! 

Match two or more blocks of the same color to clear the level and save the pets from the evil Pet Snatchers! Moves are limited so plan them carefully.¬†Your puzzle skills will be tested with hours of block busting fun!

Take on this puzzling Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!¬†

Pet Rescue Saga is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Pet Rescue Saga features:
‚Ä¢ Eye-catching graphics and colorful gameplay¬†
‚Ä¢ Lovable pets of all varieties, puppies, bunnies, piglets and many more!¬†
‚Ä¢ Diamonds, exploding bombs, colorful paint pots, locked animal cages and much more¬†
‚Ä¢ Spectacular boosters and bonus rewards unlocked after many levels¬†
‚Ä¢ Easy and fun to play, challenging to master¬†
‚Ä¢ Hundreds of pet puzzling levels - more added every 2 weeks!
‚Ä¢ Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
‚Ä¢ Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the Internet

Already a fan of Pet Rescue Saga? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:¬†
facebook.com/PetRescueSaga¬†
twitter.com/PetRescueSaga¬†

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Pet Rescue Saga!

We'll travel far and wide! As long as we're together, it's always great fun! Join us and keep exploring the Pet Natural History Museum! It includes:

-New episodes: 'Treasures of the Ancients' and 'Glitzy Gazing'! With these NEW LEVELS, there are now more than 3700 levels of fun for you to enjoy
-More missions, challenges, and surprises!
comments: Used to be a brilliant game and loved playing. However within the past week app constantly crashes, especially when trying to use Boosters. Thinking it was an issue with my phone I uninstalled and reinstalled apps, lost all my boosters, silver coins etc the only thing that saved was the level I was at. Instead of being a relaxing game it's now really frustrating to play.

It's a fun game but you have to admit you cheat. How do I get all but 1 pet off the board and you don't drop pets or the color blocks. If my booster is able to be used you cannot bc it kicks you out of the game. Why do you have us fill the piggy bank and then want us to pay for get the gold bars? They should be free. Why is there no way to win tickets to the circus? This game needs to be tweaked a lil bit and the cheating should stop. Just my opinion though.

This game is becoming a total nightmare for a lot of its Players... it has gone cheat crazy ! I have played it on several devices since 2013.. at first the game was fun & enjoyable...how ever over the past 18 months..it has Had sooooo! Many flaws...cheats...unresponsive ! constantly lags. If you notify the team.. u simply get A very automated! Sorry & ur told to sign in & out of Facebook. .this will solve the issues... well it dose NOT! Solve the constant issues & nor dose it help. üò°

This my favorite game but I have to start over I just wish there's was a way to get back to place I was at this is so easy but I was in the hardest part it helps your mine stay focused and you don't think about nothing because you will want to come back to this game
Updated and glitches all over. If you play a previous level in another section, when you finish and don't check "Next", it takes you back to your current level. FRUSTRATING

title: Venmo
description:
Why use Venmo?

Because it‚Äôs the money app for splitting the cost of almost anything‚Äîright then, right there.
Because it makes settling up feel like catching up. 
Because you can add a note to each payment to remember the moments, not the money. 

What do people use Venmo for? Plenty of things, like:

Meals
Split the group dinner tab without the napkin math.

Rent
Transfer money to roomies for your share of rent and utilities.

Activities
Settle up for fun stuff like concert tix and road trips.

Surprises
Send a penny to say hi, or 5 bucks for good luck.

Still reading? We‚Äôll let you in on a little secret: we‚Äôre more than just a way to pay friends.
- We offer the Venmo Debit Card, so you can shop with your Venmo balance everywhere Mastercard¬Æ is accepted in the U.S., plus earn cash back rewards at select retailers. Terms apply: https://venmo.com/rewards/
- Get your Venmo money in the bank, fast. Use Instant Transfer to get your cash in minutes using an eligible debit card or bank account. 
- Check out with Venmo on some of your favorite apps, like Uber, StockX, Grubhub, and Zola. 
- We‚Äôve got your back‚Äîsecurity is very important to us, and we prioritize making you feel safe and secure by taking security measures to protect your account. Plus, we‚Äôve got a stellar customer support team, ready to solve any issues.


Card is issued by The Bancorp Bank pursuant to license by Mastercard International Incorporated. The Bancorp Bank; Member FDIC. Mastercard is a registered trademark, and the circles design is a trademark of Mastercard International Incorporated.
