recentChanges: We worked on various improvements and bug fixes
comments: This app used to be good. I tried to add another bank account to use to send money and it did not accept my amount to verified. I never had problems sending money before. Then I tried the original bank account to send money. It keep saying cannot process try later. It's been three days and still now working. What a shame. I loved this app before, now I dont. Have to find another way to send money.

There isno feedback on payments and I had to exit and re-open the app to see my payment was sent. The settings suck, if something is on and you want it off, the app starts linking your accounts instead of being an off or on option. Whatever you do, don't accidentally break their rules or they will ban you for life and not give you an appeal option. The parent company will persecute you of you treat anyone the way they treat their customers.

I have had venmo since they started. I have not had any issues, I use it to accept payments. It makes budgeting easier for me as I use my venmo to make misc purchases that I don't want to use for my main account. No issues for me ever. I found venmo because originally I was with cash app. Someone hacked my acct and cash app penalized me and closed my account with no option to open again. Venmo saved the day! i love this app, my favorite part is the emojis!

App keeps freezing and crashing out of nowhere. It still runs fine, but at least 2 or 3 times now I've sent money to someone and the app freezes while the money is sending. Only way to escape is by exiting the app through task manager. The money always goes through to the other person but this shouldn't happen. Also often the app will just freeze while I'm scrolling through transactions. Sometimes it resolves itself, sometimes it doesn't. Otherwise, I would rate this app 5 stars.

The app keeps freezing randomly all the time, while navigating through it. It doesn't matter what I'm doing, it could be scrolling, tapping on something, etc., I have to restart the app each time. I also don't get notifications until I manually open the app. After which I keep getting the same notification again after I've closed the app!

title: WEBTOON
description:
Find new stories or share your own with WEBTOON‚Ñ¢, the largest webcomics community in the world.

‚ÄãHome to epic sagas, short stories, manga, and daily comic strips, access thousands of creator-owned comics anytime, anywhere across 23 genres, including romance, comedy, action, fantasy, and horror.

‚ÄãDive into WEBTOON‚Ñ¢ ORIGINALS, award-winning comics which update weekly. Discover new voices on CANVAS, where creators self-publish their series to a vibrant, diverse audience.

‚ÄãJoin WEBTOON‚Ñ¢ and find YOUR story today.

comments: it's still buggy. getting worse, even. the more I use it, the more it crashes and lags. I would rather have that fixed than a new design. and now the coin purchase isn't working either, and sometimes tapping the heart to like does nothing. there was nothing wrong with the layout, please fix the bugs. I want to be able to read the comics. even now, I would like to be able to buy more coins and I literally can't

Firstly, I saw many, many advertisements on instagram for this app and decided to give it a shot. And I'm in love with webtoon now. No joke. There are a lot of other web comic apps, but this one seems to be the only one without a pay wall from what I have found. You can buy coins to read ahead with a fast pass, or be patient and wait for weekly updates on many of the series. Overall good experience and lots of amazing stories.

Honestly, while I do enjoy this app, I'm kind of annoyed that they removed the option to buy $20 worth of coins. That and I get they need to make money, but let's be realistic here, the whole "one free comic a day of comics that are completed and were once entirely free to read in a day" thing is kind of meh. You can pay to read them more often, even though the comics again were ENTIRELY FREE BEFORE. You wanna read a 70 chapter story? You have to do it over 70 days, unless you wanna pay.

I love the contents of this app, but I can't ignore the constant glitches. One of the worst ones is that I have participated in 2 seperate events for free coins, and when I went to collect my reward it glitches and I lose out on the free coins. As far as I can tell there is no way to contact them when something like this happens. A Google search for support just takes you to there FAQS forum which doesn't help. I guess use the app, but don't bother with the events.

I used webtoon nearly daily about 6 months ago, then my phone broke and I had to wait to get a new one. I forgot about Webtoon, but once I remembered it, I was excited. All my favorite storys must have gotten tons of new episodes. And then, the new Pass was revealed. I didn't mind fast Pass,Daily pass is stupid. Part of the charm to the comics is that you can spend 30 minutes sitting down enjoying your story chapter by chapter. Now imagine taking all of that away, to 1 chapter. Very short read.

title: Vedic Healing Mantra - Meditation, Chanting
description:
This is a guided meditation app powered by mantras and mudras(hand yoga) that is based on ancient Vedic knowledge and wisdom. The app offers you unique 48+ mantas, mudras and meditation techniques for dealing with 48+ types of diseases including chronic and terminal illnesses.

Compiled by our ancient seers and sages, thousands of years ago, these mantras are powerful sound vibrations that are capable of stimulating certain glands, nerves, energy centres and altering vibrations in every molecule and cell of your body. Each sound has a distinct vibration and energy and hence each mantra has a different effect. As a result a person with any health problem experiences a profound healing effect.  

Mudra vigyan or science of yoga mudras involves simple hand positions or gestures to energise different parts of the body and help to allow flow of prana throughout the system. According to Ayurveda, diseases are caused by lack or excess of any of the five elements ‚Äì air, fire, water, earth and ether that causes imbalance in the body. The use of mudras directs the flow of energy in a way that balances the five elements and thus facilitates healing.
 
It is said that   a positive state of mind has a positive impact on your body. The root of an illness is in the mind.  Meditation is a powerful tool that helps in clearing your mind from negativity, anxiety, worry and other conflicts. When your mind is totally calm, alert and contented, it drives your body to perform better.  Which is why, in meditation healing happens. Meditation prevents stresses from entering your body system. When you meditate, you can silently use mantras to stay connected to the breath and the practice.
 
The Vedic Healing Mantra App has brought the best of mantra, mudra and meditation techniques that are neatly combined to give you desired health outcomes. These ancient techniques when used in the right combination can give you a renewed sense of well-being and a new lease of life.

We are in times where we juggle multiple roles to meet the challenges of everyday life. The Vedic Mantra Healing App is designed to bring you good health, happiness, harmony as well as spiritual growth in an easy format that will help you connect with your core and make you feel balanced and complete through mantra, mudra and meditation.
So, stay connected, feel safe and be healthy.
 
Find Mantra Mudra and Meditation techniques for Good Health and Disease.

-Stress & Depression

title: State of Survival: Survive the Zombie Apocalypse
description:
"It's been six months since the zombie apocalypse began. The virus has infected the city. Six months of terror, horror, survival, and fighting against zombies. You are a survivor and your friends are in a brave fight against monsters. Build a city that survives the constant waves of zombies. Welcome to the State of Survival. Ready for a strategy survival game!

The zombie infection has ripped across the country taking all of civilization with it. Now it is survival time, as the surviving military and government have gone underground. The world belongs to the infected now. It is time to build a city with a strategy to survive zombies and monsters. The plague is expanding faster, and the people need a hero! They need a survivor, since the only goal is to survive!
In this adventure, you can make friends or fight against other survivors. Shoot zombies with your sniper gun in fps mode. Death is coming and the battlefield is just for heroes, so build an army!
Do whatever you can to survive this horrible war. It won't be easy to win the battle. The infected are everywhere and you have a war against the zombie army on your hands! Resources are scarce and you must salvage what you can from the carcass of society. Build a new city, squad, and strategy to survive in this MMORPG. Become a zombie hunter! It's time for survival.

It's a new world out there. A new shooting survival multiplayer! Build a strategy and create your own story. You can plant a bomb or shoot the zombies in this strategy survival game! Gather gold, coins, and anything necessary to survive in this destructive time. Shooting is not always an option, you must build a PVP army! Target the zombies, end the horror, and survive the war! This game is completely different than other war games.

Rebuild
In the absence of the military, build up your settlement to form a safe haven for your survivors and the foundation for your post-apocalyptic zombie world. It is time for your tactics to become real! Fight vs. this virus of the walking dead! It's combat time and you need to fight the invasion! Survive if you can!

Rescue
In this survival game, you get to save survivors from the battle to increase your numbers and strength to fight each infected zombie. Locate those with special abilities, as they will be the heroes of the plague war! Shooting time!

Research
The zombie army disease is mutating rapidly. As a survivor you need to learn whatever you can to understand it and build your strategy before the invasion of the zombies. Whoever can control the infection controls the world! There's a war out there and it's all about survival! Stop the apocalypse!

Socialize
There is strength in numbers. Make allies and forge strategic partnerships to survive the horrors of the infected wilderness in this strategy survival game. Join armies to pulverize anyone who tries to take advantage of you in the battle and be ready for the war against the zombies and the apocalypse. Your survival is at stake!

Rip up the Rulebook
It's humanity 2.0. Rewrite the rules on how you want humankind to survive and defeat the invading army. This is a survival strategy versus zombies shooter game and there's no military to rescue you. It's completely different than other military war games.

Customer Service Email: sosgame@kingsgroupgames.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheSoSGame
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVSyGzN8MqTfZ9W3pHC5Htg"
descriptionHTML:
"It's been six months since the zombie apocalypse began. The virus has infected the city. Six months of terror, horror, survival, and fighting against zombies. You are a survivor and your friends are in a brave fight against monsters. Build a city that survives the constant waves of zombies. Welcome to the State of Survival. Ready for a strategy survival game!

The zombie infection has ripped across the country taking all of civilization with it. Now it is survival time, as the surviving military and government have gone underground. The world belongs to the infected now. It is time to build a city with a strategy to survive zombies and monsters. The plague is expanding faster, and the people need a hero! They need a survivor, since the only goal is to survive!
In this adventure, you can make friends or fight against other survivors. Shoot zombies with your sniper gun in fps mode. Death is coming and the battlefield is just for heroes, so build an army!
Do whatever you can to survive this horrible war. It won't be easy to win the battle. The infected are everywhere and you have a war against the zombie army on your hands! Resources are scarce and you must salvage what you can from the carcass of society. Build a new city, squad, and strategy to survive in this MMORPG. Become a zombie hunter! It's time for survival.

It's a new world out there. A new shooting survival multiplayer! Build a strategy and create your own story. You can plant a bomb or shoot the zombies in this strategy survival game! Gather gold, coins, and anything necessary to survive in this destructive time. Shooting is not always an option, you must build a PVP army! Target the zombies, end the horror, and survive the war! This game is completely different than other war games.

Rebuild
In the absence of the military, build up your settlement to form a safe haven for your survivors and the foundation for your post-apocalyptic zombie world. It is time for your tactics to become real! Fight vs. this virus of the walking dead! It's combat time and you need to fight the invasion! Survive if you can!

Rescue
In this survival game, you get to save survivors from the battle to increase your numbers and strength to fight each infected zombie. Locate those with special abilities, as they will be the heroes of the plague war! Shooting time!

Research
The zombie army disease is mutating rapidly. As a survivor you need to learn whatever you can to understand it and build your strategy before the invasion of the zombies. Whoever can control the infection controls the world! There's a war out there and it's all about survival! Stop the apocalypse!

Socialize
There is strength in numbers. Make allies and forge strategic partnerships to survive the horrors of the infected wilderness in this strategy survival game. Join armies to pulverize anyone who tries to take advantage of you in the battle and be ready for the war against the zombies and the apocalypse. Your survival is at stake!

Rip up the Rulebook
It's humanity 2.0. Rewrite the rules on how you want humankind to survive and defeat the invading army. This is a survival strategy versus zombies shooter game and there's no military to rescue you. It's completely different than other military war games.

Customer Service Email: sosgame@kingsgroupgames.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheSoSGame
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVSyGzN8MqTfZ9W3pHC5Htg"
summary: Build an empire to survive waves of zombies. Create your strategy and fight!

comments: Good game, I hated seeing the ads all over the place making it seem like something else entirely, but I downloaded this because it would get me extra diamonds in the Animal Restaurant game. So far I love it but I'm at the point where it's taking hours to do tasks and soon it will be days and weeks according to what others have said. It's a shame, since it's a well made game but at least it's not as egregious as FFXV A new empire.

Great game to begin with but soon becomes boring when your settlement is constantly attacked by rival factions to bully you out of the game. I've got better things to do than play games with immature players who think it's clever to attack players who are weaker than them. There's insufficient opportunity to defend yourself against attack, and no control over more powerful players hitting weaker players over and over again. Plenty of aspects of this game need improvement. Not good for players.

Dont get me wrong, guys. I am still playing it to the very end (which is right after the corner) but i just cant give this game more than a one star. Why? Well... The game itself is good, if not for absurd donate system. There are certain items u just cant get without donations NO MATTER WHAT YOU DO. When i discovered this ( after like 2 months of playing) this fact alone just CRUSHED me, killing any joy and will to play, because no matter how long and hard i try, ftp player wont reach the top.

Good but after last update now game will not load. Tried to reload last update still have same issue. Version 1 9 42 1000 day 3 still does not work. I wonder if you are working on this problem. Just updated game t0 1 9 43 1014 still no change game stoped mid way in the load of base. Still can't load game, no new up dates. Nothing new game still will not finish loading. Hopefully the next update will work, this one was very poor.

Great game.. been playing for sometime now. However it be nice if we could expand more of our settlement with added features such as building vehicles to travel instead of always walking. Make first vehicle free but upgrades are earned same as hero's. Through progression of game play... second review still love the game but still think changes can be made for better game play.. thanks kingsgroup holdings definitely would recommend if these slight changes can be made

Be careful, as an official fruit operator take your job seriously and let the fruits leave your clinic happy.

Have fun and keep operating!

recentChanges: +Bug Fixes
comments: The game is bugged. I've been stuck on the same level without being to progress for several weeks. Ads are terrible. They're between every round and then some. I paid to remove them because the game is entertaining enough to want to be able to play but not 45 minutes after I paid to remove ads I haven't been able to play the game anymore. The ad I saw and downloaded it from showed the game being more complex than it actually is. It's just repetitive of the exact same things.

Ad before a level. Ad during a level. Ad after a level. Ad to get tools. Then after you get the too, yep you guessed it, ANOTHER AD!! The ads are nearly twice the length that the levels are! This isn't a game but a place for adverts. If you want people to actually enjoy this game then perhaps have an ad after every two to three levels. Ads ads ads. This game is not enjoyable! Uninstalling!!

I don't get ticked off by ads, the game is great but I have two requests. One: More decor, furniture, and the other one. One stopped at 20 , the other 21 and I haven't finished the other one. Another thing: Level 43. When I started, I cut open the aubergine and saw nothing. It's still screaming, there's no tweezers, and when you touch it, it zooms in. Please fix this!

There are way too many adverts for this game to even be playable. I think I got four levels in and on all four levels there was an advert before, during and after the level, then to get new tools, guess what? Another advert. Then to get decor for your office? Another advert. I get in, free games have adverts, but I should spend more time watching them than playing the game. And I only got to level 4 because I kept telling myself not every level will be like this. EVERY LEVEL IS LIKE THIS.

I got up to level 46 but I cannot go further for a bug won't let me get into my next tool. However there are many bugs that are good as well. Turning your internet off will not only get rid of all ads, you can still press "watch ad to claim" on all tools and bonus prizes and not have to watch an ad to get your reward. You will instantly get it. However you need to restart the games a few times after restarting your game in order for this to work.

comments: Change the distribution of the ads. Big block up front and, less ads in the middle. This layout is just really disruptive. If the app were glitch free it would be more acceptable but, it's full of bugs ON TOP of all these disruptive ads. I keep getting a buble notice about an "Error Changing Position."

Does not work. They wont let me sign up. I want to be a member, but it just keeps saying "we cannot create an account for you at this time." I even read and agreed to the terms and conditions of the app and they still wont let me. Also, when I try to play a movie, the ads are endless. And when they end, it's just a screen with the crackle logo. I would rate this -1/5 stars if there was an option to do that. Plz do not install. Download Tubi or Pluto instead.

This has to be the most bug filled app I've ever downloaded. There's actually some good content on here but actually being able to watch it after casting to the TV is near impossible. It often will start playing shows that are next to the one you click on and after ads will frequently restart the episodes.

Note to Samsung TV users: Do not DOWNLOAD the app! Please use smart view through your phone instead... You will have little or no freezing.... Downloading the app to your set, you will experience freezing (and a lot of it)!
Nice to have access to the content, but ad times a long AND if you pause at any point, it revert to the last Ad and replays all of them.

Stress is the most common cause of ill health, probably underlying as many as 70% of all visits to family doctors. The good news is that you can learn ways to manage it. Becoming proficient in stress management is essential for developing self-security and the ability to effectively deal with the pressures.

Stress management should be crucial part of our daily lifestyle in order to beat stress and live a relaxed and happy life.

Well, there are thousands of reasons behind stress development however; there are so many ways to get rid of stress easily.

So, are you suffering from high level of stress?

title: Metro Name ID
description:
Stop unwanted calls with Metro Name ID and say goodbye to scammers, telemarketers, and other questionable callers. With Name ID, you can block these callers, and block or manage any other phone number. Name ID also identifies callers‚Äîeven if they‚Äôre not in your address book‚Äîletting you choose who you talk to. Reverse number lookup is included as well, so you‚Äôll never have to wonder who called you.

Metro Name ID features:

- Identify and block likely scam calls 
- Identify and block unwanted callers
- Identify and send call categories to voicemail‚Äîtelemarketers, surveys, political callers, and more 
- Identify unknown callers
- Report call violations 
- Reverse number lookup

Is there a way to delete some of the old nbrs?
I'm so glad I have this! With so many scams I've gotten where I dont want to answer any calls but now, stopping them has been easy. Although, I wish it included text messages as well.

I am a maintenance supervisor and I'm busy all through the day and it's really nice to not be getting a lot of unnecessary phone calls to interrupt me while I'm doing things I truly appreciate this app and all that it does for me thank you so very much.

title: Becca - Breast Cancer Support
description:
Becca provides support and inspiration to help you live well after breast cancer.

Get daily support, tips and information to help you move forward after breast cancer. Find what you're looking for with Becca's categorised tips and suggestions. Real-life stories highlight common concerns that people recovering after breast cancer treatment may experience. Becca has categories on side-effects, menopausal symptoms, fatigue, diet, exercise, body image and more! 

Becca content is now available in Welsh. 

HOW IT WORKS
‚Ä¢Every day you‚Äôll receive five personalised flashcards with hints, tips, information and blog posts to support you as you move forward after breast cancer treatment
‚Ä¢Save your favourite cards so you can read them later
‚Ä¢Reach out and get help from our community of thousands, as well as from our team of specialists

Have you finished treatment for primary breast cancer? Maybe you know someone in recovery? Life after breast cancer can be a scary time and you may feel like you need more support than ever ‚Äì Becca is here to help you on your journey:

‚ÄúBecca has really helped me to start living in the moment.‚Äù - Kim Hulme

Becca ‚Äúdirected me to relevant and trustworthy sites ‚Ä¶ with good advice and ideas to help me cope.‚Äù ‚Äì July Honey

‚ÄúI found the Becca app to be inspiring, full of helpful advice ‚Ä¶ a must-have for anyone to help them move forward after breast cancer treatment.‚Äù - Betty Hart

Get support, guidance and tips from the Becca app.

Becca has been developed by Breast Cancer Now. We are the largest UK-wide charity providing world-class research and life-changing support for anyone affected by breast cancer. Our aim is that by 2050 everyone who develops breast cancer will live, and receive the support they need to live well now. Becca is the app to help you adjust to life after breast cancer treatment. 

When you‚Äôve finished breast cancer treatment it can be hard to know how to move forward ‚Äì people may expect you to feel well and return to normal, but life after cancer can be confusing, lonely and overwhelming and you may feel like you need more support than ever. It‚Äôs normal to feel upset, anxious, stressed, depressed and tired ‚Äì Becca can help you to get support to move on and find your ‚Äúnew normal‚Äù. 

With Becca you‚Äôll receive daily articles, hints and tips. We collate information and support from a variety of sources, including specialists, online publications and the breast cancer community to help you move past cancer.

We share new content from our community of breast cancer bloggers. From medication side effects to stories from surgery, from advice on relationships to dealing with menopausal symptoms, our bloggers tackle the toughest topics about breast cancer recovery. 

We suggest podcasts, recipes, makeup tutorials, exercise regimes and more to support you in your cancer recovery. With articles from qualified dietitians, nurses and medical professionals, Becca can help you to get the support you need to find your ‚Äúnew normal‚Äù. 

Becca may also have offers from carefully selected partners.

Life after breast cancer can be a lonely time ‚Äì Becca can help you find the support network you need to get back on your feet. Sometimes it can be hard for family and friends to understand what you‚Äôre going through ‚Äì we understand recovery can be tough and Becca can help you to find the information and resources you need to find your ‚Äúnew normal‚Äù.

With articles and blog posts by other inspirational people moving forward after breast cancer treatment, get the information and support you need to get your life back on track after breast cancer. 

Becca is a safe place to seek support, information, and find the latest news and research to help you in your recovery after breast cancer.

Becca requires an internet connection to run.

I just downloaded this app. But it keeps closing before even being launched. Help!
A great idea but such a shame it keeps crashing

comments: I have been using this for years. Tried many others as I am a perfectionist and I will be staying with sign now, it is the best.
Extremely simple to use. Great for quick signing.

It been a blessing to have this app especially during this COVID-19 pandemic. I've been able to sign school forms and also documents for the purchase of our new house. The app makes it easy, convenient, and safe to continue getting things done. Thank you ‚ù§Ô∏è
I had a hard time using the sign is App. I had to have the Company I needed to sign with send the documents twice. This last time it was completed correctly.
Very user friendly and a vital app in this day and age of technology.

title: Hole.io
description:
The most addictive game!

Enter the arena and face the other holes in a fierce battle. 
Eat everything in sight with your black hole and expand it to eat more! Show them who is the biggest hole in town!
descriptionHTML:

Enter the arena and face the other holes in a fierce battle.

summary: Eat the world
developerAddress: 4 rue Jules Lefebvre, 75009 Paris
recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: Highly addictive! You have been warned! HA! Love this game! Update late 2020...I've dropped my star rating due to the fact that the number of ads in this game has been increased nearly three fold. It's just too many ads!! I know the developers want to make some money, and they deserve it. I do not begrudge them, but come on folks! This is WAY too many ads!

I love this game! If you dont play this game, know that this game gives off the opposite of plenty of time, if we had more time, i would be level 49, i think the game creator should add more time, like 5 minutes or some thing but you can still install it

I'm baaaack, and still loving this game. Some say we're playing against the computer robots but who cares as long as I win. My question is in Battle Royale..... U say last hole standing wins, but when there's 2 last holes, why don't the one with the crown win? Doesn't seem fair for both to reach the max [19]. No Ties when one reaches 1st with crown. 1st Max [19] with crown, takes All. Default king or queen, I am still Queen üëëeven when I bow out and hand the crown to U!

This honestly WAS my favorite game. Had it for Years as did my family. These insufferable asshats have now made it so that the game literally STOPS after one minute - ya, SIXTY SECONDS - and you are forced to watch an ad before continuing for another sixty seconds, when the game finishes and you are forced to watch yet another ad. Are you freaking serious?? I am uninstalling after years of play, and so is my entire family. Don't put up with these ads people! Find games with reasonable ad time!

I love this game, yes, but after they got rid of wireless play and put a half time in the middle of the game it just makes the game kind of annoying, the half time feature is just a waste of time definitly meant to get more adds in so the creators can get more money.

title: Tiny Scanner - PDF Scanner App
description:
Tiny Scanner is a little scanner app that turns android device into a portable document scanner and scans everything as images or PDFs.

With this pdf document scanner app you can scan documents, photos, receipts, reports, or just about anything. This pdf document scanner app is lightning fast and gorgeously designed for both phone and tablet.

IS THAT A SCANNER IN YOUR POCKET?

Tiny Scanner is a pdf document scanner app that turns your mobile into a portable scanner. Scans are saved to your device as images or PDFs. Name and organize your scans into folders, or share them by:

- Email
- Wifi directly to your computer
- Dropbox, Evernote, Google Drive, OneDrive or Box(Available in subscription mode)

This document scanner app has all the BIG features you need:

* Scan in color, grayscale, or black & white
* AI Powered OCR(different languages, editing results, handwritings recognition, copying, sharing or saving as txt, etc.)(Available in subscription mode)
* Can be used in office, school, home and anywhere else you want
* Page edges are detected automatically
* 5 levels of contrast for crisp monochrome texts
* Set page sizes for PDF (Letter, Legal, A4, and more)
* Thumbnail or list view, sort scans by date or title
* Tiny Scanner is optimized to run very fast.
* Quick search by document title
* Protect your documents with a passcode
* Universal ‚Äì a single app that works on phone and tablet too!

The free version is an ad-supported version and has some function restrictions, we also offer an ad-free version with no function restrictions which is available as in-app purchase.
All Premium Features:
- Scan documents unlimitedly
- Batch Mode Scanning
- AI Powered OCR(different languages, editing results, handwritings recognition, copying, sharing or saving as txt, etc. 200 pages per month)
- All sharing options(Google Drive, Dropbox, Onedrive, Box, Evernote.)
- Send documents to the preset Mail Me address
- Add signature

Payment models for Premium Subscription:
- $3.99/month
- $19.99/year(3 days free trial)

Please note the subscription is automatically renewed unless you choose to cancel the subscription at least 24 hours before the end of the current period in Subscriptions on Google Play.

Permissions Used in Tiny Scanner:
1. Storage: Tiny Scanner needs this permission to store docs in your phone.
2. Camera: Tiny Scanner needs this permission to use camera to scan docs.

GOT QUESTIONS? CAN'T FIGURE OUT HOW TO DO SOMETHING?
If you have any problem about this scanner app please email us at tinyscan.a@appxy.com, and we‚Äôll help you figure it out.

Follow us on Twitter: @Appxy_official
Like us on Facebook: Appxy
Follow us on Google+: Appxy

comments: I was very happy with the app before, but After the last auto update to the new version all my documents are disappeared. Also I have already paid for extra features before. I am not interested in starting a subscription.

10/2020 For the last several years I have used this app, but with the most recent update I'm considering removing it. The app no longer shows my documents, and still shows nothing after I try a restore. Hopefully this is a minor bug that's fixed soon.

Fair warning- these guys are Grade A scammers. You know what's not fun? Rushing to turn in a paper only to have the scanning app you've been using without issues suddenly lock, with no warning, unless you pay them 20 dollars, just casually holding you hostage. In a panic, you fork over 20 dollars because what else are you gonna do? Anyway your paper ends up late, AND you're out 20 bucks. The kicker? They then ask you to rate the app. The only clickable option? 5 stars. These guys are dirtbags.

Was perfect for years. Always used it to turn in homework. Now it doesn't save anything to your phone. Use CamScanner instead. It offers a student version that's way better and saves a PDF to your phone.

Great app up until the update. I cannot find my tiny scan folder in my files on my android. Now I scan and can't figure out where my pdf is going. Have done everything to figure it out and cannot seem to find it.

comments: This is related to Sprint TV ... There's an app for Apple and Microsoft called "Sprint TV" service is relaying on company MobiTV ... I thought it was preloaded but I think it was migrated from an older phone, I finally got to uninstall it since I dont use or have Sprint TV

The worst app ever! It crashes and freezes consistently 5 times a day. This is not when I am not using the app at all. Will be uninstalling as what is the point of it?? There is nothing in here I get free. This is an outdated app that needs removing. Not to mention the malware it comes with that took forever to remove! Oh yeah and the hidden Neilsen Measurements app included free of no charge to spy on your every move. NO THANK YOU. MY CONSENT NEVER GIVEN.

I have never used this app, and I don't need it. Came pre-installed on my old Note 5. Last update was August 2018. Can't uninstall, can't disable, but I cleared cache, cleared data, blocked all permissions, blocked notifications, forced stopped, restricted background data, and stopped the app from automatically updating. Since I did all that, I haven't had any problems with it!
Ive been with Sprint for a long time and I can get any thing I had trouble with, I have all ways gotten help, with out any hesitation at all.

I never use this app and I can't uninstall it or even disable it. If I can't disable or uninstall it then that means I need it. But it isn't needed it's just an app for you to buy more sprint. Pay more money to sprint.

title: Candy Crush Friends Saga
description:
The newest game from the Candy Crush Franchise!  With updated graphics, fun new game modes and a host of friends to help you blast through hundreds of levels!
 
Your Candy Crush Friends have been scattered throughout the Candy Kingdom - Join this match 3 puzzle game to find them! This friendly bunch have their own unique powers to help you to create sweet candy combinations and blastthrough blockers!
 
Switch and match candies to unlock rewards, friends, and sweet collectable outfits! The more candies you collect the greater your power on the game board!
 
This fun new Candy game is filled with delicious treats - cookies, jam, chocolate and more! Your favourite game modes, but sweeter than ever!
 
Candy Crush Friends Saga features: 
‚Ä¢	Hundreds of levels to play ‚Äì collect your favorite friends along the way! 
‚Ä¢	Your Candy friends are your allies ‚Äì they are ready to help you blast through levels!
‚Ä¢	Watch Yeti and his friends dance when you win levels!
‚Ä¢	Fun new game modes; dunk the cookie in the chocolate & free the octopuses and the mammoths!  
‚Ä¢	Keep your friends in a sticker book and change their outfits!
‚Ä¢	Explore sweet new worlds in 3D!
‚Ä¢	Easy to play but challenging to master!
‚Ä¢	Play whenever, online and offline. Easily sync the game between devices and access full game features when connected to the internet. 
‚Ä¢	Take on this epic saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!
 
If you need help and support, you will find helpful and extensive FAQs in our in-game Help Center, click the ? to launch it.
Share opinions and have sweet discussions with other members of the Candy Crush Friends Saga community. https://community.king.com/en/candy-crush-friends-saga/
Visit www.candycrushfriendssaga.com and discover delicious game guides and tasty blogs to satisfy your candy cravings.

Candy Crush Friends Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment with real money. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device‚Äôs settings. 
 
By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; https://king.com/termsAndConditions

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy.  If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in game help centre or by going to https://soporto.king.com/

The new scarily fun Trick or Treat event has begun! Travel down the Trail of Treats and play new spookylicious levels. Win a witchy costume for Olivia, perfect for any Halloween party!

Update your game to get:
* A new area: Trail of Treats
* 10 spooky and fun levels starring Olivia and her Friends
* Halloween-themed Star Chaser
* New Epic Olivia the Witch costume
* Boosters galore throughout the event

comments: I have played this game now for around 2 years and loved it until last week. Every time you watch a video for extra items, lives or to play on at the end of a level the game crashes. I have completed everything they recommend and even reinstalling this and still crashes. I have now lost all my lollipop hammers (10 of each). Messaged them (King) and not willing to help or admit there is a problem which clearly there is from others comments below. Very disappointed after all this time.

Sometimes you can watch a video to either have a special candy or to get a few extra moves, however quite frequently when the watch video button is clicked, it just shuts the app down completely. It would be 5 stars if it wasn't for this really annoying bug. Please fix and I'll change my rating.

Game is always crashing. Sometimes I don't get rewards after watching adds. Events never work. And it's impossible to contact anyone about it. I've tried and I got a copie pasted email back. Useless. Update, a few days after writing my review I lost all my candy ( the lollipops) that I've been collecting for years. Literally Year. Gone

I have been playing this for a while now, and it does get tricky every now and then, but it is very playable . However this morning, when the game loads, then the level screen, then play, then watch video, the game shuts itself off! And then back to starting the app again, has this been caused by an update, as last night it worked perfectly. Overall my impressions are good, nice graphics, pleasing sounds, some levels do get annoying, but that is all part of the game, 85/100.

Great game with lots of free treats. You can get stuck for 2 or 3 days though, even on a classic level,. 7 months later I'm still playing but now it switches off when I try to download an ad. I've taken advice to switch off my tablet completely but it has not improved. Pity because it's a great game.

Take aim and unleash Papa Pear to bounce and boing around a wacky world of fruity pegs, hazelnuts and crazy chillies. Exciting adventures await you in the Fruity Forest, Pearsylvania and beyond. BOING!

Take on this epic Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

recentChanges:
Enjoy a fast, fun and smooth gameplay! We have been improving the game so that nothing keeps you from having a pear-fect Papa Pear experience! Our goal: bring a 100% glitch free game!

We are constantly working on improving the game so keep on commenting and rating Papa Pear Saga after each release. Thank you tons for your support!
comments: Needs events or something to make power ups easier to get Some levels are damn near impossible without them and the gold is expensive af. ** love the game overall! Have been playing for a long time! I've made it past over 300 levels but this entire time it's kind of been a lackluster game compared to some of 'your' others

Its always challenging to figure out how to defeat a level. The only levels I really dont enjoy are the ones where there are chains over the buckets and you have to hit a matching color "face" thing to open it and the "face" changes color and changes which bucket it opens.That one is too confusing trying to figure out the pattern without wasting pears to shoot.

Simple and fun,but there are some REALLY hard levels that can take even days to beat,such a simple and long game shouldn't have such hard levels. There should be an option to skip levels for free if,for example,you fail to beat it in 10 - 15 lives or maybe even less.

I click the little circle on the top right corner and it says to put my fb information and when I do , says invalid token access .. what does that mean? why can't I see which level my friends are on ? Please fix

It's an entertaining and addictive game, but it has some major cons. You only get 5 lives and you have to wait a certain amount of time before they regenerate, even though this game is clearly designed to make you constantly fail and replay levels. 5 lives is not enough, a game like this shouldn't even be using the "lives" format, it just ruins the experience and makes me stop playing since I have no more lives. This game is all about luck, not skill, which is extremely annoying and lazy.

title: Last Shelter: Survival
description:
To survive or to turn into one of the walking dead, the choice is yours!

Unique Features

-World Wide War
Battle enemies across the globe, lead your Empire to greatness and fight until the last man's standing.

-Realistic Graphics
 Everything from the units to the maps to the heroes seems very realistic and creates a complete post apocalypse experience. 

-Build Your Wasteland Empire
Absolutely Free City Building, facilities upgrading, R&D, warrior and survivor training and powerful hero recruitment just for the sake of living a new day to conquer the new world!

-Hero System
Whether you like to attack your enemies from distance, defend at close quarters, or enjoy developing your base or farming, there are TONS of heroes that can help you with all that!

-Strategic Gameplay
One set of units just simply cannot conquer, Warriors, Shooters and Vehicles, you have to know your enemy and yourself to walk this World War Z kind of wasteland

-Alliance Warfare
Whether it's going against different servers, or fighting for the title of the president at home, your alliance will always be backing you up, as long as you find the right people of course.

Join us on Facebook & Twitter
https://www.facebook.com/LastShelterSurvival/
https://twitter.com/LastShelterSurvival"

Absolutely Free City Building, facilities upgrading, R&D, warrior and survivor training and powerful hero recruitment just for the sake of living a new day to conquer the new world!

-Hero System
Whether you like to attack your enemies from distance, defend at close quarters, or enjoy developing your base or farming, there are TONS of heroes that can help you with all that!

-Strategic Gameplay
One set of units just simply cannot conquer, Warriors, Shooters and Vehicles, you have to know your enemy and yourself to walk this World War Z kind of wasteland

-Alliance Warfare
Whether it's going against different servers, or fighting for the title of the president at home, your alliance will always be backing you up, as long as you find the right people of course.

Join us on Facebook & Twitter
https://www.facebook.com/LastShelterSurvival/
https://twitter.com/LastShelterSurvival"
summary: The Zombies are coming, the last shelter is almost in ruins,rebuild and survive!
developerAddress:
RM C 21/F CENTRAL 88, 88 DES
VOEUX RD CENTRAL
HONG KONG
recentChanges:
Alliance(Coming Soon)
Alliance members must leave the Alliance before they can immigrate; Alliance R5 must remove all members from the Alliance before they can immigrate. Tthe Alliance's Allegiant State will change with the Alliance R5's immigration.
comments: Overall it's fun. It's hard to advance quickly without paying. Joining a strong alliance is important, otherwise you become a farm for everyone, making it even harder to level up. The game can require a lot of your time, which makes it difficult to join a super active alliance if you want to have a real life. It would be nice to have a doomsday option available in lieu of eden.

Though most games design their algorithms to promote purchases to progress in the game but Last Shelter provides misleading information on their packages to sell which is highly unethical and malicious in nature. I tried to report the same few times but there is no support from the developers. You cannot even view your last purchases packages nor the complaints raised against them. There is literally no log or history of anything which is very weird. Finally, I have reported the same to Google and looking for a resolution. I strongly believe that the developers must follow some basic morals and not dupe its users openly. I still play this game as I have made a lot of friends here. Also, I believe that only if we persist against there kind of malpractices then only we can make the gaming industry reliable and fun. Thus would continue playing this game for my friends and continue fighting the battle. Cheers!

Updated review..... Some of the gameplay has changed for the better. However this is still a multi million pound Chinese based money maker and pay to win is still a key component. The tasks and battles are all Beijing times, daily reset is 3am in UK so I lose out on lots of stuff. My advise is to not take it too seriously and don't spend money until you know you like it, as there is no such thing as fair in this game, it's a full on war game, but very addictive, fun and annoying. 2 year player.

Avoid it. This a MMORPG game AND a 200% pay 2 win. Don't think going far without any penny. Of course, you'll always find ONE player who reached lvl 25 for free... He needed 8 months at least, 8 farms and... 6 hours/d without any day off. Welcome to your NEW no-life, at the expense of other games ! You'll see it when you reach lvl 25 and T10 (best permanent army so far), because if you play casual like me, (2 y), you'll still be upgrading and must shield your base each weekend (or run fast).

Fun game so far. You need patience and persistence to build a solid base. Spending money is bonus but not mandatory in early levels. I've been playing less then a month. Update: Now after several months of playing, you definitely need to invest either in game packages or more time building farms or both to grow and be competitive. Hard to grow beyond base 18-19 otherwise.

title: YoTeCuido Alzheimer
description:
YoTeCuido es una app muy f√°cil de usar pensada para resolver las dudas y preguntas a las que se enfrentan muchos cuidadores y afectados de alzh√©imer en su d√≠a a d√≠a.

Realizada por Lapisoft en colaboraci√≥n con la Asociaci√≥n de Familiares de Enfermos de Alzh√©imer de A Coru√±a (AFACO), sus contenidos parten de la experiencia de cuidadores y familiares, as√≠ como de enfermos y cuidadores profesionales. 

En YoTeCuido encontrar√°s multitud de informaci√≥n pr√°ctica contada de manera sencilla, organizada en las siguientes secciones:

-Entender el alzh√©imer: con informaci√≥n general sobre la enfermedad y un apartado en el que podr√°s ver fase a fase los s√≠ntomas y cuidados espec√≠ficos recomendados. 

-Dudas sobre: dividida por √°reas tem√°ticas (alimentaci√≥n, salud, enfermer√≠a, comunicaci√≥n, recursos legales y sociales‚Ä¶), en esta secci√≥n encontrar√°s respuesta a muchas de las dudas y situaciones a las que te enfrentas cada d√≠a.

-Rutinas: incluye rutinas f√≠sicas (estiramientos) adaptadas a cada una de las fases y actividades de estimulaci√≥n cognitiva que puedes realizar diariamente en casa.

-Recursos: encuentra la Asociaci√≥n de Familiares m√°s cercana a ti (por comunidades), variedad de manuales y libros relacionados con el alzh√©imer y un glosario con los t√©rminos m√°s frecuentes.

-Cuidador: secci√≥n espec√≠fica para los cuidadores, ofrece respuestas relacionadas con su labor, ejercicios de estiramiento pensados para ellos y una serie de consejos para que el cuidador tambi√©n se cuide.

-Contacto: Si todav√≠a tienes preguntas pendientes o situaciones que no sabes c√≥mo afrontar, puedes enviarlas a trav√©s de esta secci√≥n. Adem√°s de obtener respuesta, tu pregunta se incorporar√° a la app para que pueda ayudar a otras personas.

Para agilizar la consulta, la app cuenta con un buscador desde el que podr√°s encontrar exactamente la informaci√≥n que necesitas.

title: Live Transcribe & Sound Notifications
description:
Live Transcribe has a new name‚ÄîLive Transcribe & Sound Notifications. It's an app that makes everyday conversations and surrounding sounds more accessible among people who are deaf and hard of hearing, using just your Android phone.

Using Google‚Äôs state-of-the-art automatic speech recognition and sound detection technology, Live Transcribe & Sound Notifications provides you free, real-time transcriptions of your conversations and sends notifications based on your surrounding sounds at home. The notifications make you aware of important situations at home, such as a fire alarm or doorbell ringing, so that you can respond quickly.

On most phones, you can directly access Live Transcribe & Sound Notifications with these steps:
1. Open your device's Settings app.
2. Tap Accessibility, then tap Live Transcribe, or Sound Notifications, depending on which app you‚Äôd like to start.
3. Tap Use service, then accept the permissions.
4. Use the Accessibility button or gesture to start Live Transcribe or Sound Notifications.

[New] Sound Notifications:
‚Ä¢ Get notified of potential risky situations and personal situations based on sounds happening at home (for example, smoke alarm, siren, baby sounds).
‚Ä¢ Get notifications with a flashing light or vibration to your mobile device or wearable.
‚Ä¢ Timeline view lets you go back in history (currently limited to 12 hours) to see what was happening around you.

Real-time transcription:
‚Ä¢ Transcribes in real-time. Text appears on your phone as words are spoken.
‚Ä¢ Accurately captures the nuances of how words are used in context.
‚Ä¢ Choose from over 80 languages and dialects, and quickly switch between two languages.
‚Ä¢ Add custom words that you use frequently, like names or household items.
‚Ä¢ Set your phone to vibrate when someone says your name.
‚Ä¢ Type responses in your conversation. Bring up your phone‚Äôs keyboard and type your words for a continuous dialogue. Transcriptions still appear while you type.
‚Ä¢ See the volume of the speaker‚Äôs voice compared to the loudness in your environment. You can use this sound indicator to adjust your volume when you speak.
‚Ä¢ Use external microphones found in wired headsets, Bluetooth headsets, and USB mics for better audio reception.

Referring back to transcription:
‚Ä¢ Choose to save transcriptions for 3 days. Saved transcriptions will stay locally on your device for 3 days, so you can copy and paste them elsewhere. (By default, transcriptions are not saved.)
‚Ä¢ Search within saved transcriptions.
‚Ä¢ Touch and hold text in transcription to copy and paste.

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Android 5.0 (Lollipop) and up.

Live Transcribe & Sound Notifications was made in collaboration with Gallaudet University, the premier Deaf and hard of hearing university in the US.

Join the Google Accessible community to provide feedback and receive product updates. For help using Live Transcribe & Sound Notifications, visit contact the Disability Support team.

Permissions Notice
Microphone: Live Transcribe needs microphone access to transcribe the speech around you. The audio is not stored after the transcription is processed. Sound Notifications needs microphone access to listen for sounds happening around you. The audio is also not stored after processing is finished.

comments: Very helpful for me, since I am legally deaf. Sometimes I have trouble understanding someone that talk very fast and low, and in loud environment for example like Walmart paying for my items and the cashier had some questions and I had a hard time understanding her, thankfully this app came in very handy. I also have a speech impairment due to my deafness, and sometimes others have trouble understanding me, again this app made my day. Thanks a million, Michael

I'm deaf/ hard of hearing. I came upon this app. Read where it can detect knocking at the door. I can't hear people knock, so I decided to down load the app. Unless there is absolutely no noice and someone pounds on the door. The phone doesn't tell me when someone knocks. Back to my flashing light doorbell. I would need an app the can distinguish between sounds at any volume, including music, human speech, or tv and between someone talking to me and just near me having a conversation.

I am just learning to use this app. So far, so good. Am trying to discern just how accurate are the transcriptions under different circumstances: indoor and out, telephone, TV dialog, children's voices and other, including effects of ambient noise. As of now, results of my "tests" are encouraging.

I'm profoundly deaf and hoped I might be able to use this to alert me to sounds at home instead of relying on old fashioned equipment. It doesn't seem to pick up anything except really loud sounds and that's with the phone held close to the source. It doesn't detect door knocking or the phone ringing or the microwave beeping or any of the things it's supposed to. The transcribing feature works - though it doesn't seem to do well with Scottish accents - so I don't think there's a problem with my microphone. I wonder if it might be an issue with sensitivity but there isn't any option to configure the microphone, which is maybe something the developers need to add? Disappointed as I've seen a similar feature on a friend's Iphone and it seemed to work perfectly. Time to give up on Android devices when it comes to accessibility I think.

I gave it 4 stars coz' there are times that there are missing words & I would like to suggest for you to have an editing mode, All caps, upper or lower case, and to have a key word as a command or a button maybe? Take this words as an example: PLUS SIGN plus sign (as a word) + (as a sign) yeah, I hope you get my point somehow cause I swear you're going to bring this app on another level if you can. Love lots and Take care to all of us during this pandemicü§ç God Blessü§ç

title: AT&T Navigator: Maps, Traffic
description:
Beat traffic, find cheap gas price options easily, share your travel details, explore local places and more with AT&T Navigator.

No matter what the journey, navigate your way around traffic in real-time using AT&T Navigator, now powered by more than 100 million traffic sources; whether it‚Äôs your daily commute, shopping with friends or taking in local city attractions. Use AT&T Navigator to plan your trip with real-time traffic updates, GPS-enabled multi-route recommendations, one-touch traffic avoidance, commute times and more.

We‚Äôre making it easy to navigate when a GPS signal isn‚Äôt available with downloadable maps. When downloadable maps are active, this feature minimizes app data and battery usage. You can also easily share your journey from anywhere along your route with our Share ETA feature. Send your friends and family a temporary link displaying your ETA and a live map of your route so they get your travel details even before you arrive.

Powered with more than 142 million local reviews and ratings from Yelp and TripAdvisor, AT&T Navigator also lets you discover top local restaurants, best places for coffee and drinks, hotels and other recommendations. See what the Yelp and TripAdvisor communities have to say about shopping, restaurants, hotels, bars and nearby attractions. AT&T Navigator will be your trusted guide to help you explore your city with detailed maps and recommendations no matter if you want to eat, shop, drink or play.

SUBSCRIPTION CHARGES & OPTIONS
New to AT&T Navigator? Try AT&T Navigator for free* for the first 30 days and enjoy a robust set of navigation features. Unless cancelled, at the end of the 30-day period your account will automatically be billed $9.99 per month. You may cancel at any time. See Subscription Cancellation & Changes for additional information. 
A free**, limited features version of AT&T Navigator called Basic Maps is available after you download the AT&T Navigator app. 
**Data & messaging rates may apply for app download & usage. 
*First 30 days free for new subscribers only, otherwise $9.99/mo. Cancel w/in 30 days or you will be billed $9.99/mo. Cancel anytime at att.com/mobile purchases or call 800.331.0500 (or 611 from your mobile phone). Basic Maps option is avail. w/ no monthly subscription charge. Data & messaging rates may apply for app download & usage. Compatible phone w/elig. data plan req‚Äôd. Phone‚Äôs internal memory space is needed to use offline maps feature. App may use personal info, including location. Use governed by AT&T‚Äôs Privacy Policy found at att.com/privacy.  AT&T is not responsible for any third party content and services including coupons.  Participating merchants are solely responsible for the processing and redemption of coupons and related offers. Other charges & restr‚Äôs may apply. Visit http://att.com/navigator for additional terms & conditions.

You took the time to tell us what you love about AT&T Navigator, and what you want changed. We listened and made some updates. Let us know what you think. Send your comments to support@telenav.com, Subject: AT&T Navigator for Android.

We want to keep hearing what you love about the app and what we can do to make it even better for you.

comments: Quick,easy,eliminates the frustration of blind driving,"gives you an overhead view" Thanks.
this app can be really slow at times but for the most part i really like it and it is very helpfull
All of the directions given with the AT&T Navigator or exact! And if I hadn't had the Navigator I would never have found my way around out west and in Las Vegas!

I like that it gives you the location you are currently located in, upon opening the application for usage. The only reason I gave it 4 stars, is because if you are on the AT&T network, it would make more sense to not need to have paid for a monthly subscription, and also because the basic mode, that is free of charges to utilize, but only if you do not agree to the upgrade charging your phones billing account, does not use verbally (spoken) directions, to assist the device owner, or individual using the application for navigation, to hear the directions; you must look at the device you are using to see the navigational directions in this application, which I personally feel is a contradiction to the "It Can Wait" campaign.

this is a sleazy app. I just got off the phone with AT&t after finding out that I've had a 2-year reoccurring charge for this application. I have never used this app I only use Google maps, so when I ask for e-mail verification or some kind a verification where I would have agreed to the monthly charge they stated that sometimes it comes through text messaging so if you click on the link that is your agreement for your monthly payments. At least I got a $30 credit out the $240+ I already paid.

title: Live Talk - free video chat
description:
Livetalk allows you to talk and make friends with people from all over the world.
‚Ä¢ Over 30 million downloads worldwide!
‚Ä¢ Featured in Google Play Store in many countries!

‚ñ∑ Discover & Connect!
Live Talk allows you to meet someone new with a single tap.
You can easily explore new cultures and people from all over the world.
- Meet new people from all over the world through live video calls (using 3G, 4G, Wi-Fi)
- Select your gender and start building new conversations
- Enhance your chat experience with facial recognition

‚ñ∑ Share Live Talk with people around you and make more connections
Please leave a review on the Google Play Store. Your review will help make Livetalk a better service.

‚ñ∑ Creating a better and enjoyable community at Livetalk
The Livetalk team is committed to creating a service that anyone can use safely. We believe our users are able to meet new and genuine people. Please respect other users to keep the community at its best!

‚ñ∑ Protection of Personal Information
- We only collect your Gender information, which is stored locally and not sold nor shared to third parties.
- Information what you say directly to the other party once you connect can not be seen by other users.
- Please take caution when delivering sensitive information, because you are responsible for the information you provide to the other party once you connect.

Some of the screens are from Olivia Carneiro licensed under the ShareAlike 4.0 International(CC BY-SA 4.0)
https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Olivia_carneiro.jpg

Some of the screens are from Adventurejay licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 (CC BY 3.0)
http://adventurejay.com/blog/index.php?m=12&y=16

title: Weebly by Square
description:
Over 50M artists, makers and creative entrepreneurs around the world have already created a website or online store using Weebly.  Enjoy the freedom to create, launch and grow your online business or website directly from your phone or tablet, wherever, whenever.  Enjoy a simplified process of building your site with our easy drag and drop builder.  Tell your unique story and build your brand with Weebly.     

"Weebly's clear, usable interface, attractive themes, strong commerce features, mobile capabilities, and site portability earned it a PCMag Editors' Choice for modern site builders." - PC Mag

‚ÄúThey have extended their reach into a full-service platform that provides not only organization and design, but ecommerce, a new robust app center for third party plugins, analytics, cloud hosting, and most recently, completely new mobile apps for site editing on the go.‚Äù - Forbes 


Android Mobile and Tablet Features:

Create your online store:
‚Ä¢ Use the intuitive drag-and-drop builder designed specifically for touchscreen
‚Ä¢ Add products to your site using images directly from your photo library 
‚Ä¢ Customize your site with fully responsive online store themes offered on Weebly desktop

comments: "Always Keep Me aigned In?" -Needed. This would be a 5 star review if there was an option to always keep me signed in. Can't even get past the CAPTCHA even though I 100% got it right. It just says try again over and over. Edit: I registered from google and logged in from the app. But 3 stars for the initial problem.

Just downloaded but i'm very disappointed with this app. I could'nt even sign up with the app i had to sign up using the browser and for me to login through the app it brought me to a blank page. Same thing with Squarespace. Very bad
Nice site maker. It takes time to get used to because the massive amount of features. But overall, very good.
I just got on Weebly and like it so much that I signed up for a year. I like the ease of editing and not having to track someone down to help me work on it.

comments: Wish there was a website instead of just an app, and a widget for Android would be nice too since widgets have been around forever üò≠ CS doesnt answer questions properly and seems to pick pre made answers at random instead of reading your questions, and you can't reply to them once they answered, you have to create new ticket..

I bought the BTS membership February 1, 2020 and still haven't gotten my membership box to this day. I understand with covid there is a delay but I work for the postal service and its not that big of a delay anymore from overseas. No updated emails about delays, no communication. Hard to purchase certain shows too. Another 2 1/2 months later still nothing.

i purchased army membership in april 2020 but still not get my army membership kit..also everything i try to purchase (includes merch),there is a message showing"cannot be shipped ro India"..i mean its so frustrating as now international flights also started but they are always showing this that they can't ship in india anything

Overall a good app. It would be nice if completed orders listed an estimated shipping date!! Most items are presale with shipping dates months away & it's hard to keep track when you have multiple orders! I completely understand that shipment dates are subject to change but when there are multiple rounds of presales you can't even check the product listing for the right shipping information.

title: Casey's
description:
Order a famous made-from-scratch Casey‚Äôs pizza, for carryout or delivery, with the all-new Casey's app. Browse our menu, see the best deals, customize your pizza, and place an order fast! And when it's time to order again on Friday, you can reorder your favorites with just a few taps.

Download the Casey's app today ‚Äì and create an account to join Casey‚Äôs Rewards ‚Äì so you can earn points, save your favorite order, set a default credit card, and search for nearby gas prices.
descriptionHTML:
Order a famous made-from-scratch Casey‚Äôs pizza, for carryout or delivery, with the all-new Casey's app. Browse our menu, see the best deals, customize your pizza, and place an order fast! And when it's time to order again on Friday, you can reorder your favorites with just a few taps.

Download the Casey's app today ‚Äì and create an account to join Casey‚Äôs Rewards ‚Äì so you can earn points, save your favorite order, set a default credit card, and search for nearby gas prices.
summary: Order pizza and earn points
recentChanges: This Casey‚Äôs app update is all about our 3 million Casey‚Äôs Rewards members! Quickly see how many points you‚Äôve earned for each transaction with the new Points History screen. You‚Äôll also be able to browse your offers with an all-new category sorting feature, making it even easier to find the offers you‚Äôre looking for. Enjoy!
comments: I like the food ordering options but other functions are pretty clunky. As far as rewards and needing to save them, why not just have it tied to your phone # instead of having to electronically 'clip it'? I'm turning off push messages too........way too many of them. I get it, you're selling pizza but not everyday is pizza day. Loll

I like Casey for convenience and has a good variety of what they carry including gas. Their employees are always very courteous and friendly. I do wish their new app that they want you to update but I do not have enough space to do this on my phone. I think we should still receive our points until we can get our phone corrected. Our Cellphone Company is having problems getting their help to the customer so I am stuck. The store itself is great in El Paso and we go to alot of Caseys because we dr
Easy to place my order, see daily deals and save deals and view my points so I can choose to use them or to wait until I accumulate more points.

Seems mostly okay, but has one bizarre flaw - I arrived well before the scheduled time, tapped the "I'm Here" button, and instead of acknowledging that information and maybe reminding me of the promised completion time, I got a baffling message instructing me to try again closer to the promised completion time. It is impossible to even fathom the motivation behind that insane response, so I must assume it is a software glitch or a practical joke.

When I first downloaded and used the app several months ago it owrked fine. Now I cant log in or order anything. I have uninstalled the app and reinstalled to no avail. It appears that other users are having the same problem. For now I have stopped using the app or trying to order pizza. Your loss.

title: Foursquare City Guide
description:
Foursquare City Guide will lead you to the perfect spot -- anywhere in the world.  Get helpful, positive tips from our trusted global community and keep track of where you you've been and where you want to go, all in one place.

Looking to check in or become Mayor of your local coffee shop? Download our sister app, Foursquare Swarm. 

With Foursquare City Guide you can:
-Join a community of people just like you who love to explore and seek out hidden gems. 
-Read short tips written by real people all over the world. (No negative rants or businesses paying for positive reviews.)
-Make lists for any occasion! Keep a running to-do of neighborhood hot spots, or places you want to try while traveling.
-Add tastes, rate places, and lifelog where you‚Äôve been to get hyper-personalized recommendations.
-Follow friends, brands, and influencers and uncover the best experience possible with millions of tips about off-the-menu items, speakeasy entrances, wifi passwords, and much more.
-Keep a history of the places you‚Äôve been. Never forget a memory, photo, or the name of that incredible pizza place you went to while visiting Rome. 
-Find exactly what you‚Äôre looking for. Faster.

A note on battery:
We've spent years developing the location technology that powers Foursquare City Guide, making it extremely power efficient. But, as with all apps of this type, please note that continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

By using Foursquare you agree to the Terms of Service (http://foursquare.com/legal/terms), Privacy Policy (http://foursquare.com/legal/privacy) and Cookie Policy (http://foursquare.com/legal/cookiepolicy).

recentChanges: Android 11 support, bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: Man, this app has problems. Created a list of places, but when I click on the on the icon to view it on a map it says "Hm, something went wrong. Try again." It also says that I have not been to any of these places even though I have clicked that I HAVE been to said places. The lists is kind of the whole reason I downloaded this app. It will only allow you to sign up using a Facebook or Google sign-in. If you don't have one of those, or don't want to use one, then tough luck! Probably uninstall..

I can't upload photos of the places, successfully! The updates about the places are not reflected/ reflecting after giving enough time say more than 24 hours! And so, rated only 3 stars! Fixing the issue i might ready to give 5 rates, for this app!
Love the app. However, it is missing one major component, which I think would be extremely useful and helpful... Adding "pet friendly" to the list of filters.

The best tool for browsing bars, restaurants and other interesting POIs, my daily driver. If some place exists on this planet, you can bet it will be shown in Foursquare. Used to have a perfect integration with both Navigon and Sygic Truck navigations. Sadly, it has been removed from Sygic Truck lately, making my life much harder, as I depend on pois due to my job. Amazing app, 6 stars if possible!!!

I have been using the app for more than 2 years. I wish the visuals were updated and screens became more intuitive. For example I cannot access my menu when browsing, I have to go back to the home screen. Also there is a bug if you want to upload a photo of a cafe. I have a feeling the app was never touched/improved since 2 years.

title: Soap Cutting - Satisfying ASMR
description:
The most satisfying ASMR soap cutting game for antistress. You've seen it in the videos and now you get to slice, cut, and shred some amazing soaps yourself while listening to relaxing sounds and getting a tingling ASMR sensation.

Besides the relaxing sounds and ASMR effect, there‚Äôs nothing more satisfying than getting to slice and shred soap when you‚Äôre feeling stressed, making Soap Cutting the #1 antistress game of the year.
The ultimate satisfaction that comes from slicing and shredding all the different types of soap is unlike anything else! If you‚Äôve never experienced ASMR or soap cutting, just wait - this game is the best antistress tool you could find. So what are you waiting for? Start slicing!
 
 
Game Features:
- Realistic soap cutting
- Many different types of soaps. You will recognise them.
- Carve the soap
- Relaxing sounds
 
Play now and start cutting!

To opt out of CrazyLabs sales of personal information as a California resident, please visit our Privacy Policy: https://crazylabs.com/app

comments: I absolutly luv this game! It is super satisfying. You get new knife's to cut with, and you find super cool objects inside each soap that you cut. It's so calming! :3 However, one thing i dont like is that if you want to open your "mystery gift" you have to watch an ad. I dunno! maybe thats just my device but otherwise this is such an amazing game! Keep up the great work! :D

Pretty good game after all, but you need minimize the advertising. That's really annoying after each game, there's an ad. And please get rid of the vibrating... This game is played for satisfaction but it clearly annoys me on how much ads and vibrating is. When you are cutting, my phone starts vibrating and it's really unsatisfactory. Kindly make changes..

I LOVE this game, it is so satisfying and fun to do!!! The only thing that I don't really like about the game is just that there is an add after every single round, but then again I don't mind because the adds will give me something to look forward to (the satisfaction) but I would definitely recommend this game üëç‚ô•Ô∏èüëç‚ô•Ô∏è

I love this app, its relaxing and because its offline it can work when you are bored without wifi unlike some games. It's a good app and you should get it because it lives up to expectations, plus you can unlock more soap knives in different styles and colours. Also if you dont have a lot of soap, dont want to ruin it, but you want the same satisfying feeling as other vids well this game is totally for you.

I love this app! It makes a very unsatisfying noise once you are done with a level.And all of the soaps make the same sound when you cut them.But all of the good things about this app make the bad things seem very tiny.I love how satisfying this is!I wish i could soap cut in real life but my parents don't let me.I love all of the different knife types!They are very awesome.I would play this all day!Thank you CrazyGames,I hope you keep making amazing games!Plus, your ASMR slicing game is awesome!

title: Visual Voicemail by MetroPCS
description:
MetroPCS Voicemail keeps getting better and better! With Visual Voicemail you can listen to messages in any order, respond in one click, update your contacts, and easily manage your inbox without ever dialing into your voicemail. 

No need to change your MetroPCS voicemail number or to reconfigure your voicemail forwarding - Visual Voicemail activates for free at first launch. You can also upgrade to Voicemail to Text for a small monthly fee and receive all your voicemails transcribed into text directly in the application inbox or via SMS message.

MetroPCS Visual Voicemail may use infrequent, free SMS messages to communicate with the Voicemail server.

An Unread Messages widget is now included with MetroPCS Visual Voicemail.  On most Android devices you can add the Visual Voicemail widget by long pressing on any free space on your home screen, selecting 'Add Widgets', and choosing the Visual Voicemail widget from the alphabetical list.

developerAddress: 3655 131st Ave SE, Bellevue, WA 98006
recentChanges: Our latest Visual Voicemail release provides bug fixes, stability, and performance improvements.
comments: This app was good a couple years ago. But in the last couple years it has gotten worse and worse. It's always trying to sync and never does. This app needs to be redone. I like that I don't have to listen to every single message. I can visually see who the message is from. I like being able to erase certain messages without having to listen to them every time. This could be a great app if you would FIX the problems. Seems like everyone has the same issues. I've been with metro for about 10yrs.

Keeps sending me messages that say the app is "running" and the app will not synchronize properly. VERY ANNOYING. Metropcs can't figure it out. Tried getting them to fix the problem three times but they don't know how to do it!!! Will probably have to uninstall the app, lose all of my archived messages and pic's and reinstall to see what happens. Also, NEVER set your permissions to ALL! Doing so will let messenger change your contact list, phone call information, distributes private info also!!

I n hoping this update haz fixed all its snags, it wont sync, it leaves a tickertsape note acrossmy phobe staging it " keeps trying to connect to uou ,but cant get thru"! Now i tried getting on the app on my phone but after setting my new passcode per the apps request , and using my phones last 4 numbers like suggested by app! Then it wouldnt accept the phones numbers, i have to call my phone to get into my VM"s so the app really is worthless! Lets jooe it has been fixed or im dropping it!

I used to be able to delete old VM's, multiple at a time. I don't have to listen to them but I have to click on each one individually and delete it. Why can I no longer select more than one and delete messages I know I don't need to listen to?
Always been great visual voicemail. Where can I locate the 2020 update version? I received a text message from Metro to get the update. Thank you. Susanne
