comments: Bad experience. Don't download load it I didn't read the review and its lame that you have to put in Facebook and gmail in order to meet with people then the other problem is that if you haven't log in your phone number and want to unlink the websites you have to add the number in order to unlink it. DO NOT INSTALL. if you don't believe me and other people experience it yourself.

Sooo many fake accounts(robots)(Bots)(AI)(Artificial Intelligence). Too many people using the same exact message. Nobody says anything real. For what it's worth the app feels nice and the programmer should be proud of their own craftsmanship.
Its a good app just needs to improve more and they should think of some advantages for the senders as the senders invest huge amounts in the app

Do not download. The layout is confusing, invasive, and refuses to respond through their customer service email when they have no option to permanently delete unless you want to link Facebook, google, and your phone number. I didn't read the reviews and tried on a whim. Seriously, don't install it. If there were such a thing as negative stars or turds, this app deserve the lot of those. Has anyone successfully deleted their account from there?

Tiktok is BY FAR better. I spent 4 hours trying to figure out this app, and customer service did NOT help. The app DOES have potential, but the problem right now is, there needs to be an entire rescripting of the English version of this app. User guidelines are vague and not well written. FAQ does not hold enough information. The 24-7 customer service bot is all AI and there is no actual person, unless they give you an email.. which I am still waiting for.. App is fun, but still needs work.

title: what3words: Never get lost again
description:
what3words is an easy way to identify precise locations. Every 10 foot square has been given a unique combination of three words: a what3words address. Now you can find, share and navigate to precise locations using three simple words.

Use what3words to:
- Find your way anywhere in the world using just three words.
- Plan exact meet-up locations.
- Help people find your apartment, business or airbnb entrance.
- Always find your way back to your parking space.
- Save key work locations, from incident reporting to delivery entrances.
- Save your favourite memorable spots ‚Äì a sunset, a waterfall, proposal location.
- Guide people to accessible entrances.
- Help emergency services find you.

You can find what3words addresses in travel guides, website contact pages, invitations, travel booking confirmations and more ‚Äì anywhere you would normally find location information. If you‚Äôre invited to a friend‚Äôs home, ask them to share their what3words address.

Popular features:
- Compatible with navigation apps including Google Maps
- Save your favourite locations and categorise them into lists
- AutoSuggest prompts you with intelligent suggestions
- Available in over 40 languages
- Navigate offline with compass mode
- Dark Mode support
- Add a what3words address to a photo

If you experience any problems or have any questions, email us at support@what3words.com

comments: This app is awesome. Just one issue needs to be improved asap. I use my tablet as my sat nav and it is fitted to my truck's windscreen all the time in landscape mode. The problem is this app can't work in landscape. It always forces portrait mode and to use it I have to take my tablet off the holder which is pretty annoying if you have to do it many times over the day. Please change it

A great way to clearly identify specific places on the Earth's surface so no more ambiguous descriptions like "I'll meet you at the car park" (where in the car park and which one of the four calf parks do you mean?!). Also it's fun and provides creative ideas. See what the space your front door occupies is called for example and see if that inspires any fun ideas!

I cannot rate this life saving app highly enough. It's very accurate and reliable. I would like some of the users to consider that when under life changing pressure, and you have to think fast, speak in short concise accurate sentences amid chaos, in order to get help efficiently, remebering just three words, rather than a sequence of long numbers in order to get the emergency services to your location can make the difference between life and death. Thank you for this app.

As an emergency service worker, I've used this app on several occasions to locate an incident and its proved to be invaluable. Fire, ambulance and police, along with all other emergency services and breakdown organizations can access the app so its a perfect location finder if you're out in the middle of nowhere, broken down in your car, fallen an injured and needing help. Definately worth downloading, if only to sit quietly on your phone until needed.

Excellent Location Finding App - Lacks smart watch/wearable integration. I love this app, it's quick and simple to use IF you have your phone with you. If you're out running without your phone then unlike thousands of other great apps with smart watch integretion what3words is no good to you at all! In those possibly emergency situations when you want to name an exact location, you'll need to rely on Google Maps! *** Response developers: 3WordGo requires a login to an Uber account!

comments: This game is a wonderful offline game. I have no signal at my job. The signal strength literally has the circle with a slash through it and this game is still 100% playable. The controls are easy, you get skins for your weapons, and you can even purchase a battle pass if you want more rewards. The only downside is that they always ask if you want to purchase a certain gun after each game you win, but it's not overwhelmingly annoying. Perfect offline game!

title: Easy Taxi, a Cabify app
description:
Easy is now a Cabify app. In one app we offer you various ways of getting around the city: taxi, car with driver, scooters‚Ä¶ with more options being added all the time. Download our app and ride around the city quickly, affordably and safely. 

Why choose Cabify?
Our users highlight:
- Safety: in the app you‚Äôll find various different safety functions such as seeing your journey details, sharing your journey with a friend in real time or activating automatic notifications to advise someone when you‚Äôve arrived at your destination.
- Availability:with more services in just one app, you‚Äôll have more cars and taxis available to you and therefore it‚Äôll be even easier to get a journey. 
- Price: discover the various transport options we offer in your city, with a range of price and services. And don‚Äôt forget to activate your notifications to receive our best promotions. 
- Carbon neutral: CO2 emissions in your journeys with Cabify are offset via a project that protects part of the Amazon rainforest. Ride environmentally responsibly!
- Quality: we strive to offer you the best service and we have dedicated passenger and driver support team.
- Transparency: we show you the estimated price before you order your journey, so that you can travel totally relaxed. In some categories taximeter may apply.

What services are available?
Download our app to see our various services and discover which are available in your city.
- Cabify Lite: the ideal option if you want to ride with a private driver at a good price. You can select your preferences such as radio station or car temperature.
- Easy Taxi: the taxis from Easy are now in Cabify. An ideal option for those who want to get around quickly and affordably.
- Cabify Executive: ride with the same options as Lite but in a superior type of vehicle. 
- Easy Economy: get around in taxi at an even more affordable price. 
- MOVO: we‚Äôve integrated MOVO‚Äôs options, such as scooters, into our app. 
- Cabify Pets: for those who never want to be separated from their furry friend!

And many more categories! Get the app and see which ones are available in your area.

How can I order a taxi or private car?
Riding with Cabify is very easy. Follow these steps and you‚Äôll soon be exploring every corner of your city:
1. Download Cabify and register.
2. Choose which payment method fits you best: cash payment, card payment‚Ä¶ the app will show which options are available in your city.
3. Tell us where you want to ride and which service you prefer: Cabify Lite, Easy Taxi, MOVO‚Ä¶
5. We‚Äôll show you the estimated journey price. 
6. Ready! A taxi will come to pick you up.

Where is it available?
Easy‚Äôs taxis and Cabify‚Äôs cars are available in more than 90 cities across Latin America and Europe. You can find us in: Argentina, Brasil, Chile, Colombia, Ecuador, Mexico, Peru, Spain and Uruguay. 
See the full list of all our cities and fares on our website: cabify.com

comments: Keeps telling me that something is wrong with my payment method. I have added every card I have.

"Price not available - something went wrong in calculating the journey price." I always receive the same message no matter if I choose short or long trips. I tried in different and several days, routes and times. Why should I insist to be a customer with you? And don't ask me to explain more since it is very clear. S√£o Paulo city, south area.

A safe option for rides at reasonable prices. The problem is that it has difficulties finding user's location, which means you have to wait longer until the app finds you, and it won't let you choose your address manually as in other similar apps or simply write it. I haven't been able to use it lately, because it doesn't find my location and while waiting for it, it uses a lot of your data. Please fix it!

The app is safe and great most of the times. But sometimes, in the peak hours, looks like the app assign a service without the authorization of the car driver, when I had called those call drivers to ask why are they moving in other direction, they said they didn't accepted the service and the app assigned it. This makes the person to lose time waiting for a car that is not going to arrive.

I tried to use the app to get a ride home on New Year's Eve and it kept on closing on me. Now I'm trying to change to a new credit card but no matter what I do it won't let me confirm the new card. Prior to this it worked fine, but not much use now if I can't even get the app to work.

title: Moovit: Timing & Navigation for all Transit Types
description:
Moovit is one app for all your urban mobility rides üöçüöáüöòüõ¥. 

üèÜ"If you need to get anywhere by mass transit, you need Moovit...it will open up a new world for you, even if you just travel domestically" - USA Today.üèÜ 

Transportation is an integral part of urban living. Whether you ride the trainüöÜ, subwayüöá, busüöç, light railüöà, ferry‚õ¥Ô∏è or metro, use dockless scootersüõ¥, bikesüö¥‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è, ride-sharing like Uberüöò, getting the best urban mobility information is critical. Enter Moovit! Moovit guides you from point A to B in the easiest and most efficient way. Get train and bus times, maps, live navigation and real-time schedules with ease so you can plan your trip with confidence. Find critical alerts and service disruptions for your favorite lines. Get step-by-step directions of optimal route bus, train, metro, bike, scooter or a combination of them. 

Moovit guides more than 865 million users in over 3400 cities  throughout the world. Commuters will find updated bus times and train times, transit maps, and, where available, real-time line arrivals. Locate nearby bus stops and train stations, travel with on-the-go live navigation guidance, receive get-off alerts at your destination to ensure a smooth ride.This is why Moovit has been named one of the best apps of the year in 2016 and 2017 by the Google Play and App Stores, respectively.

üöç Real time arrivals. View real-time arrival updates, which are taken directly from GPS devices positioned on buses and trains. Avoid wasting time guessing train times or bus times.

‚åö Real time alerts. Know about issues ahead of time by receiving service alerts such as emergency or unexpected disruptions, delays, traffic jams, new construction, and more so that you can plan ahead if your bus time or train time changed.

üîî Live Navigation. Get step-by-step bus directions and other transit directions with live guidance from A-to-B: Know how long you need to walk to your station, view the arrival time of your line, receive get-off alerts at your destination & more. 

üì±Users reports. Moovit‚Äôs users report issues found with stations, line service, and schedules so that we can inform all nearby riders about what‚Äôs going on in their area.

üö©Favorite lines, stations, and places. Get easy access to lines, stations, and places you ride and visit all the time. Plus, get real-time updates if/when there are changes to your Favorite lines in case of your bus time or train time is impacted!

üö¥ Bike routes. Get bike routes in addition to the bus, subway, train, or metro trip plans. If you ride bikes (yours or shared) we can plan a route that includes the train or bus. Moovit will help you plan a trip that meets your transit-needs. Bike docking stations are updated in real-time. Bike trip plans are only available in supported metro areas.

üó∫Ô∏è Maps view. View all stations, routes, and lines on the subway or bus map. Additionally, maps are available in PDF for when you‚Äôre offline, or underground on the subway. 

Moovit is the #1 urban mobility app in the world. We‚Äôre proud to collaborate with public transit agencies across the United States, including:
* MTA
* NJ Transit
* MBTA
* LA Metro
* SFMTA Muni
* BART
* Caltrain
* CTA
* Metra
* WMATA
* MTA Maryland
* TriMet
* Sound Transit
and additional hundreds of public transit agencies

You only need one app on your phone to navigate nearby buses and transit in the U.S. and across 106 other countries and in 45 languages. If you‚Äôd like to know bus times and train times in London, Barcelona, Madrid, or Rome, or, if you need to find out when the last bus leaves a certain bus stop in Rio de Janeiro, S√£o Paulo, Melbourne, Seoul, Moovit has you covered.

Feel free to contact us:

https://moovitapp.zendesk.com/hc/requests/new 
moovit@Facebook, Twitter

Get train and bus times, maps, live navigation and real-time schedules with ease so you can plan your trip with confidence. Find critical alerts and service disruptions for your favorite lines. Get step-by-step directions of optimal route bus, train, metro, bike, scooter or a combination of them.

Moovit guides more than 865 million users in over 3400 cities throughout the world. Commuters will find updated bus times and train times, transit maps, and, where available, real-time line arrivals. Locate nearby bus stops and train stations, travel with on-the-go live navigation guidance, receive get-off alerts at your destination to ensure a smooth ride.This is why Moovit has been named one of the best apps of the year in 2016 and 2017 by the Google Play and App Stores, respectively.

üöç Real time arrivals. View real-time arrival updates, which are taken directly from GPS devices positioned on buses and trains. Avoid wasting time guessing train times or bus times.

‚åö Real time alerts. Know about issues ahead of time by receiving service alerts such as emergency or unexpected disruptions, delays, traffic jams, new construction, and more so that you can plan ahead if your bus time or train time changed.

üîî Live Navigation. Get step-by-step bus directions and other transit directions with live guidance from A-to-B: Know how long you need to walk to your station, view the arrival time of your line, receive get-off alerts at your destination & more.

üì±Users reports. Moovit‚Äôs users report issues found with stations, line service, and schedules so that we can inform all nearby riders about what‚Äôs going on in their area.

üö©Favorite lines, stations, and places. Get easy access to lines, stations, and places you ride and visit all the time. Plus, get real-time updates if/when there are changes to your Favorite lines in case of your bus time or train time is impacted!

üö¥ Bike routes. Get bike routes in addition to the bus, subway, train, or metro trip plans. If you ride bikes (yours or shared) we can plan a route that includes the train or bus. Moovit will help you plan a trip that meets your transit-needs. Bike docking stations are updated in real-time. Bike trip plans are only available in supported metro areas.

üó∫Ô∏è Maps view. View all stations, routes, and lines on the subway or bus map. Additionally, maps are available in PDF for when you‚Äôre offline, or underground on the subway.

Moovit is the #1 urban mobility app in the world. We‚Äôre proud to collaborate with public transit agencies across the United States, including:
* MTA
* NJ Transit
* MBTA
* LA Metro
* SFMTA Muni
* BART
* Caltrain
* CTA
* Metra
* WMATA
* MTA Maryland
* TriMet
* Sound Transit
and additional hundreds of public transit agencies

You only need one app on your phone to navigate nearby buses and transit in the U.S. and across 106 other countries and in 45 languages. If you‚Äôd like to know bus times and train times in London, Barcelona, Madrid, or Rome, or, if you need to find out when the last bus leaves a certain bus stop in Rio de Janeiro, S√£o Paulo, Melbourne, Seoul, Moovit has you covered.

Feel free to contact us:

https://moovitapp.zendesk.com/hc/requests/new
moovit@Facebook, Twitter
summary: Real-Time Transit: bus times, train times, subway maps, live directions & alerts
recentChanges:
We are constantly working to make your public transit experience even better. We are always searching for better routes, updating new schedules, mapping out new stations, and working behind the scenes to make sure our app works smoothly.

Every update is carefully thought out by our team with your experience in mind.

Enjoy our app? Give us a five-star rating in the Google Play Store. We would love to hear your ideas and suggestions, send us feedback via support@moovit.com
comments: Overall, it is a splendid and very accurate GPS navigation (for BUS/TRAIN/etc specifically,) but I do not feel the app itself is updating everything necessary. I seen a bus or two that I am familiar w/ and I seen it besides me on the other bus that is visible on the app (however fast those things are updated,) but overall, I DIG this app ü§ôüèæüíØ

The routes it provides are often not efficient. For example, I was doing BART from San Francisco, then bike to It's Your Move in Oakland. It told me to get off at Rockridge. In fact, it's faster and cheaper to get off at MacArthur, the station before Rockridge, AND that also shortens my bike ride by 0.5 mile. Another example, it didn't follow BART's timed transfer stations for connecting trains. I had to go through emails after emails with Moovit to get them to acknowledge the issue. Horrible.
Great little app. Whether you need a route to walk, ride or drive this is the app to get you there. And they are good with keeping up with improvements. Great Job Moovit!!!
Can't see when the alternate bus is due. Only captures next bus. Want to see both so know whether to wait. One bus quicker. Would be good to be able to save alternates for buses.

Found this app after Google maps stop publishing public transport information.. Best app love it and i recommend to others who want to use it.. Best part is it actually remembers where you started from so you can return home incase you forget your address as a tourist..

title: My Boo - Your Virtual Pet Game
description:
Meet Boo, your very own virtual pet! Enjoy countless hours of fun in this addictive and entertaining game brought to you by Tapps Games!

Each Boo is like a real pet that needs lots of attention, and your task is to take care of it in the best way possible. Feed it, wash it, take care of its health, put it to sleep and play with your Boo - while you have lots of fun with over 20 thrilling mini games that will surely keep you entertained and your Boo happy as a puppy! 

If your Boo is hungry, you can find an array of delicious and nutritious food in the pantry: from yummy tacos to some tender barbecue ribs, or even a portion of octopus sashimi if you‚Äôre in the mood for a more exotic food! Your sweet tooth will be satisfied with mouthwatering candies, such as pumpkin pies, milk shakes and colorful lollipops!

You can also dress up your boo any way you like! Go to his closet and style it like your favorite movie or book character! Choose its hair and accessorize, from top hats to a regal crown, or even a leprechaun hat! Choose your attire! From formal to fun - and every style in between! You can buy new accessories to customize your Boo as you level up!  

Your boo will get dirty from time to time, and like any other pet, a bath is necessary! Taking care of your pet also entails giving it some medication whenever needed, and you can play with magic potions and energy drinks! You can also decorate its house with fun posters and decorative rugs - not to mention redo the walls with beautiful wallpaper and some fancy flooring! You‚Äôll LOVE this BOOtiful game so much, you won‚Äôt be able to leave it alone!

HIGHLIGHTS
‚Ä¢ ADOPT your Boo, give it a special name and watch it grow up! It‚Äôs so cute!
‚Ä¢ DRESS it up with countless outfits to give your Boo the best look! Just they way you want!
‚Ä¢ FEED Boo with candy, cookies, fruits, pizza or even sushi for a treat! Yummy!
‚Ä¢ TICKLE, play keepie uppie, trampoline or jump rope with your Boo to keep it happy and smiling!
‚Ä¢ TUCK your Boo in when the day is over and Boo is tired!
‚Ä¢ BATHE your Boo to keep it clean and happy!
‚Ä¢ DECORATE every room of your Boo's house with dozens of awesome items!

And a lot more! There‚Äôs always so much to do in My Boo!
You will never get tired of your cute little pet monster!

MINI GAMES
Have fun with exciting mini games and earn coins to buy items and food for your Boo!

‚Ä¢ Boo Mix - Match Boos
‚Ä¢ Piano Boo - Tap the Boos and avoid the white tiles
‚Ä¢ Basket Boo - How many points can you score in this basketball game?
‚Ä¢ Matching - A match-3 style game to combine Boos
‚Ä¢ Bubble Pop - Launch and combine Boos of the same color

And many more!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

comments: I love this game! It is so interactive. Its actually like having a pet because you have to feed it, play with it, clean it, and you have to let it sleep to get energy. I have this game on multiple devices. It is an awesome game. I really recommend it.

This game is awesome in my opinion you can care for it and play games most of them take finger and hand eye coordination so if you need to practice some of the games will help you can go outside and collect food from the trees just like animal crossing

title: Protection Prayers
description:
Life can sometimes be unpredictable and scary, which is why faith in God is a powerful tool for navigating the unknown. Prayer, in particular, can help people cope with and overcome the worries and fears that can be crippling in a world plagued by various problems and evils.

There is a long tradition in the Jewish faith of God being seen as a protector - the feast of passover celebrates this, and this theme permeates much of the Old Testament writing. In the Christian faith, not only does the Lord promise to be with his people always, but His presence is said to guard their inner beings. When Paul wrote to the Church in Philippi, he encouraged them with these words

When we pray for God's protection, we can remind ourselves that we live in this long tradition of faith in a God as guard and protector. 

Protection is on our minds daily. In a world filled with hatred, danger, and violence, how should we respond? Our children and families are at risk, and we shoulder the responsibility for their security. What can we do to shield them from harm? How can we enlist God's help for their safety?

God has ordained prayer as the vital force we can all use to guard us and our loved ones from the evil around us. If that's your desire, here are several prayers that might help you voice your thoughts to God

God is the great Protector. His name in Hebrew to describe this is Jehovah-Nissi. He is the One who defends, delivers, covers, preserves, shelters and watches over us. Sometimes we need to call upon Him in our prayers for protection.

title: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
description:
Be together whenever, with our free* all-in-one communication app, complete with unlimited text, voice, video calling and group video chat features. Easily sync your messages and contacts to your Android phone and connect with anyone, anywhere.

NEW! WATCH TOGETHER
Watch videos, tv shows, and movies with your friends over Messenger Video Chat and Rooms when you can't be together. Capture every moment and reaction in real-time.

NEW! CUSTOM REACTIONS
Lost for words? Now you can customize your reactions, with lots more emojis to choose from, including  üéâ and  üî•.

NEW! CHAT THEMES
Choose from fun themes and colors, like Tie-Dye or Love, to make your chats more personal.

GET THE GROUP TOGETHER WITH ROOMS
Send a link to group video chat with anyone, even if they don't have Messenger. Host up to 50 people with no time limits.

FREE VIDEO CALLS TO STAY CONNECTED
Keep your friends and family close with unlimited live video chatting - like FaceTime, but works across devices (Android, iOS, etc.). Host group video calls with up to 8 people, with high-quality audio, high definition video, and interactive video features like face filters.

UNLIMITED FREE TEXT & PHONE CALLS
Skip exchanging phone numbers and simply send a message to your Facebook friends, even if they‚Äôre across the world. Enjoy high-quality voice and text messaging on mobile, tablet, and desktop.

TURN OFF THE LIGHTS IN DARK MODE
Give your eyes some rest with a sleek new look that darkens the colors of the chat interface.

RECORD AND SEND VOICE AND VIDEO MESSAGES
When text just won't cut it, just hit record and send. Say, sing, show, or shout it out loud.

EXPRESS YOURSELF WITH STICKERS, GIFS, AND EMOJIS
Use custom stickers to show your creative side. You can even add effects and filters to video calls.

SEND FILES, PHOTOS, AND VIDEOS
There‚Äôs no limit to the number of files you want to share with your friends.

PLAN AND MAKE IT HAPPEN
Make plans to get together with polls and more. Suggest a meeting spot or tell friends where you are by sharing your location with just a few taps.

SEND MONEY SECURELY AND EASILY (within US only)
Send and receive money securely and easily with friends and family right in the app by adding your debit card, PayPal account or reloadable prepaid card (single-source cards eligible for sending money only).

CHAT WITH BUSINESSES
Easily connect with your favorite businesses to make reservations, get customer support, find deals and more.

BRING SMS INTO MESSENGER
No need to open multiple apps to stay in touch. Use one app for SMS and Messenger.

COMPATIBLE ACROSS PLATFORMS
Chat with friends across an array of devices, like desktop, Portal, and others.

Privacy Policy: https://www.facebook.com/about/privacy/

LEARN MORE about Messenger texting and group video chat at: http://messenger.com (https://messenger.com/)
* Data rates apply

comments: PLEASE NOTICE THIS. I want to suggest some feature in this app. I don't know how do you work on updating it but I wish you notice this suggestion and give it a shot. In the "Search in Conversation" feature can you add the date not just the words in a conversation. I remember the dates but not the conversation making it harder to find what I'm looking for. THANK YOU!!! üòä

I use messenger a lot as I like to text people and video chat them. Messenger has been even more helpful during these times as it gives me a way to communicate with my family members and friends. I love the effects you can use on video calls but you should be able to get all of them on every video call and not just a few of them. Apart from that I love Messenger and good job!

Please optimize the application. I think it takes up too much space for a messaging app. Yes there are tons of features, but it becomes redundant since your other applications can also do the same (for example, the great similarities with Instagram when it comes to the camera). In terms of bugs, I don't know if Facebook or Messenger is at fault, but when viewing messages from Facebook, Messenger always prompts for a sign in. As for suggestions, I think a message scheduler would be great.

This new "update" is awful. I hate the color scheme. It jumps around, freezes up and is so glitchy. Also I don't get my messages when they are sent most of the time. Also I hate having the little red indicator on the bubbles to tell me how many messages I have. It's like they were trying to make a bad user experience

Im not able to sign into messenger on my new s20+. When i sign it it says "logging in" then immediately says "logging out" and "something went wrong please try again later".. this has been going on for a week. Signing into messenger lite was no problem at all though.  I tried signing out of all sessions, waiting a day, re installed the app multiple times, confirming this was me, signing into without a sim card etc etc..

title: Booking.com: Hotels, Apartments & Accommodation
description:

We love hearing from you! Leave us a review and let us know what you think of our app.
descriptionHTML:
Travel and save on the world‚Äôs best hotels with Booking.com! Find great deals on hotels or apartments to rent and book accommodation for your next trip in just a few minutes.

Hotels, apartments, hostels, vacation rentals, motels & more - browse over 27 million options across the world! Discover daily deals and save on your next hotel, apartment, or villa booking.

Vacations to go! Find accommodation, compare hotel deals & save with our free app. Here are 5 reasons you‚Äôll love using the Booking.com app to find hotels the next time you travel:

1. Hotel comparison - Compare your favorite hotels and get the best price on hotel rooms.
2. Accommodation search - Use our in-depth filters to find the best deals on hotels for your next trip.
3. Hotel deals for any budget - From motels & hostels, to B&Bs and resorts, to luxury hotels, inns, homes, houses, apartments & vacation rentals, find your ideal accommodation. We‚Äôve got it all.
4. Hotel booking made easy - Find a room nearby you, complete your hotel booking in just a few taps, and easily manage your reservation on the go.
5. Hotel reviews - When you‚Äôre planning to visit a city for the first time, it‚Äôs best to be informed. Read over 135 million verified reviews from other bookers.

Want to get away from home? Download the highest-rated travel app now and join thousands of bookers like you finding unbeatable hotel & apartment rental deals!

Hotel Deals & Accommodation

‚Ä¢ Hotels, apartments, homes, hostels, vacation rentals, motels, bed and breakfasts & more - compare hotel deals now!
‚Ä¢ Secure the best deal for your next holiday booking today. You can cancel for free at most hotel rooms and apartments if you change your mind.

Hotel Comparison & Search Filters

‚Ä¢ Filter hotels by price, review score, WiFi quality and other things important to you.
‚Ä¢ Travelling soon? Book hotels at the last minute (or far in advance).
‚Ä¢ Search cheap hotels by city, attraction, landmark, or hotel name with just one tap.


Want the perfect trip planner? Manage your hotel booking on our free app

‚Ä¢ Get paperless confirmation of your reservation.
‚Ä¢ Make changes to your bookings whenever, wherever.
‚Ä¢ 24/7 customer service in more than 40 languages.
‚Ä¢ Contact your host, view check-in times, and write reviews.
‚Ä¢ No booking or credit card fees.

-------------

We love hearing from you! Leave us a review and let us know what you think of our app.
summary: Book travel accommodation & save! Compare hotel deals, apartments & hostels
recentChanges: We added some important info about our properties. Our listings now include details on each accommodation's cleaning practices, social distancing measures, and other health and safety policies.
comments: Good app. Finally showing room sizes in the search results. Please add room size filters to save time searching. Hotel star rating often does not match the real rating, for example many 5 stars properties are actually 4 stars or unrated. Prices can often be misleading as they do not include fees and taxes until the final step of booking, and then the final price can end up to be significantly higher. Final prices should be listed at early stages and we should be able to filter by them too.

I made a booking and then I found a cheaper price though someone else at the same property. I tried to cancel the booking and have the cancellation fees waived and when it came time for me to hit the confirm the fee waiver button it went straight to cancelled for $65.00. I literally found the other price less than five minutes later and immediately cancelled the booking.......smh. Bad Business.

Terrible app. Too many bugs to list, and I couldn't even write them to tell them about it because the Google Recaptcha just kept asking me to select images over and over again. Oh, and after trying 5 different times to book a flight, I got "reservation failed" with no explanation. One time, when I went back to reserve, the same flight I tried to book initially went up $70. Oh, and you'll have to scroll back about 420 times to enter your DOB cause you can't enter it manually. What a joke.

Frankly the app is really great. I usually check the googles and find hotels online. Then i open up booking and compare prices. 90% of the time the mobile booking app has deals and tends to be cheaper by $10 to $30. Not much but that extra $10 can go towards a meal or something else like the mini bar. I love it and i recommend to all my travel buddies.

Fast to download, every bit of information you could possibly need is right there so you don't have to search elsewhere for numbers & dates & times, and extremely easy to use & understand. Very pleased with this app.

title: Adobe Scan: PDF Scanner with OCR, PDF Creator
description:
The free document scanning app from Adobe turns your device into a powerful portable PDF scanner that recognizes text automatically (OCR).

Use this mobile document scanner to turn anything ‚Äî receipts, notes, documents, photos, business cards, whiteboards ‚Äî into an Adobe PDF with content you can reuse from each PDF and photo scan.

HOW ADOBE SCAN WORKS:

With the free mobile scanner app, you can make anything scannable. Use the quick PDF scanner to create a photo or PDF scan. Scan and go right back to other important things.

‚Ä¢ CAPTURE DOCS, BOOKS, TAX RECEIPTS AND MORE. 
Scan anything with precision with this mobile PDF scanner app. Advanced image technology automatically detects your documents for borders, sharpens scanned content, and recognizes text (OCR). 

‚Ä¢ ENHANCE SCANS WITH THE SCANNING AND EDITING APP. 
Touch up photo scans and documents from your camera roll. Whether it‚Äôs a PDF or photo, you can preview, reorder, crop, rotate and adjust color.

‚Ä¢ REUSE WITH THE OCR SCANNER. 
Turn your photo scan into a high-quality Adobe PDF document that unlocks content through automated text recognition (OCR). You can reuse content after scanning PDF documents thanks to OCR. Using it as a book scanner can digitize bulk pages, fast!

WHAT CAN ADOBE SCAN DO FOR YOU?

Need a business card scanner? The Adobe Scan photo scanner is so easy and powerful to use, you‚Äôll say, ‚ÄúThis is the best free PDF scanner for me.‚Äù

‚Ä¢ SCAN ANYTHING, ANYWHERE, ANYTIME. 
Capture forms, tax receipts, notes, and business cards with this mobile scanner. The Adobe Scan scanning app can be used as a library book scanner or business receipt scanner and even lets you scan multi-page documents and save with a single tap.

‚Ä¢ RECYCLE CONTENT. 
The Adobe Scan to PDF scanner makes any content scannable and reusable. Free, built-in optical character recognition (OCR) lets you reuse scanned content by creating a high-quality PDF that you can work within Adobe Acrobat Reader. Even turn Adobe Scan into a tax receipt scanner so you can highlight expenses with ease.

‚Ä¢ CLEANUP. 
Remove and edit imperfections, erase stains, marks, creases, even handwriting.

‚Ä¢ QUICKLY FIND DOCUMENTS IN PHOTOS. 
This powerful scanning app automatically finds documents and receipts in your photos and turns them into PDF scans, so you don't have to. Automatic OCR turns text into content you can edit, resize and reuse documents. Do you have lots of expenses? The business receipt scanner will help collate all of your expenses together.

‚Ä¢ SAVE BUSINESS CARDS TO CONTACTS. 
Scanning business cards turns Adobe Scan into a fast business card scanner and reader. Contact information will be automatically extracted while using the business card scanner, so you can quickly add to and organize your device contacts.

‚Ä¢ GET MORE DONE ON THE GO. 
Save each PDF scan to Adobe Document Cloud for instant access and sharing. Even lengthy legal documents become manageable and scannable with the Adobe Scan scanning app, which lets you search, select, and copy text. You can also open a PDF scan in Acrobat Reader to highlight key sections and add comments to your documents. 

‚Ä¢ GET CONNECTED. 
The Adobe Scan document scanning app connects you to the world‚Äôs best document services that let you do even more with your PDFs. Edit PDF and photo scans, convert to Microsoft Office, fill and sign, and send for tracked signatures. 

Terms & Conditions: Your use of this application is governed by the Adobe General Terms of Use 
http://www.adobe.com/go/terms_en and the Adobe Privacy Policy http://www.adobe.com/go/privacy_policy_en

Do Not Sell My Information: https://www.adobe.com/privacy/ca-rights.html

Download the best free mobile scanner to convert photos and documents into PDF files wherever you are. With OCR technology, you can easily digitalize books, business cards, and business receipts and access them via the Adobe Document Cloud. Scan photos to high-quality PDFs and share easier than ever before.

recentChanges:
IMPROVED:
‚Ä¢ Performance and stability.
comments: It's a very good app, but the photo editing options are less. It would be very helpful if there more editing options especially in the colour option. Also, saving the pdf is taking a lot of time. If the time for saving is reduced it would be very helpful. Other than this, the app is great. I can smoothly share assignments using this app. There are no ads in this app which is great! Overall it's a good app but it could be made better by adding some more editing options.

Good app. But this app tends to lag at times. Please make the generation of PDFs faster because it takes a lot of time and because of it, I could not submit my assessments on time. Though the copies were checked, but I had to listen to warnings from teachers. Please make the generation faster. Otherwise it is a very useful app and is handy too.üôÇüôÇüôÇ

Finally we have a phone scanner that works about as well as a flat bed scanner! I've tried a few of these types of apps in the past, and they usually had issues. But this one seems to have hit the bulls eye on everything. The auto-detect borders almost always works, the adjustments are easy, the file size is reasonable, the touch-up/edit features work very well, and it doesn't erase your entire scan if your screen turns off because you had to step away for a second (like DropBox does). No complaints about this app so far!

I'm using this to scan my answers to exam questions, then i make them pdf and send to my instructor. This is the best because I can select different filters for better look and legibility. When I pick a filter, I can shoot photos back to back without stopping and it will turn all of them to my selected filter. Also, it has auto-detection for documents. When I direct my camera to a document, it understands the context i dont even need to shoot or crop, it does everything by itself. Super useful

my main issue with this app is that it cannot pick up each section of a certain document consistently, e.g I'll scan a document and half of it is very light and difficult to identify, while in reality it is just as dark as the other half of the page, though this may also be partially attributed to background lighting. nevertheless, this app simplifies processing and downloading scanned documents and for me, is more effective than a standard camera.

title: My Singing Monsters
description:
Welcome to My Singing Monsters! Breed them, feed them, listen to them sing! 

Raise a monster pet, then feed your musical monster to help them grow. Take care of a collection of fun monster characters in this free musical game for the whole family!

Create an island full of Singing Monsters, then watch your song evolve as you breed and upgrade happy monster pets. Design and build unique decorations to make your world look just the way you want, then share your creation with friends! You'll love exploring the wonderful fantasy land of the Monster World!

Download My Singing Monsters today ‚Äî Happy Monstering!

FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Collect and level up over 150 cute and funny monsters ‚Äî dragons are so last year‚Ä¶
‚Ä¢ Customize your islands with cool decorations and catchy music
‚Ä¢ Enjoy awesome graphics and character animation
‚Ä¢ Play with friends around the world
‚Ä¢ Discover new updates and events year-round
________

STAY TUNED:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MySingingMonsters
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/SingingMonsters
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mysingingmonsters
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/mysingingmonsters

PLEASE NOTE! My Singing Monsters is completely free to play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. My Singing Monsters requires an internet connection to play (3G or WiFi).

HELP & SUPPORT: Get in touch with the Monster-Handlers by visiting www.bigbluebubble.com/support or contacting us in game by going to Options > Support.

recentChanges: We squashed a few bugs to improve your gameplay experience. Thanks for playing and Happy Monstering!
comments: I mean, really just a stellar game. No real need to pay to win, good music (if it's to your taste), pretty smooth animation (in th later updates), very rewarding. Outside of the game itself, the fanbase is generally really nice, it has a respectable presence on the internet, and the creators very actively interact with the players. There's more to say, but the top reviews pretty much say it all. I reccomend just getting the game and trying it out. Also, would reccomend the prequel, Dawn of Fire

Great game, I have only played for a little bit and all ready love it. The progression is fast enough so you don't get bored an microtransactions are optional. I love the idea of your monsters making music and it adds a whole new level of wanting to get more monsters rather than a game that just let's you look at them. At least give this game a try.

I love this game, and I have a few ideas that would make this game SO MUCH BETTER! All I ask is that you respond to me because I would love to get your opinions on these! First, I think when looking through islands in the friends thing, and of course composer songs, you should add a search for artists and the names of songs. That would be a lot faster and easier. Second, I feel like you should add more monsters in the market on the composer island. Maybe trumpits, and add the Ghast as well. Thx!

This has to be one of the best games ever made. So creative to make singing monsters and put it into one perfect game. The free diamond offers actually worked for me, and then got Epic Noggin and Epic Punkleton in less than one hour using the diamonds! I got really lucky that time! Im rating this five stars and nothing can change that. I highly recommend you play it.

Really clever and well-done. You can tell the game designers put a lot of effort into the game. I bought a small pack of gems ($1 worth) several years ago that removed ads and opened up the option for some additional structures. That was a dollar well spent to support a game that's more than earned it, and my only purchase to date. I appreciate that although they make it well worth it to make a purchase, it's far from necessary to enjoy and do well. (Hint: patience + mini mines = diamonds)

title: RezilienciApp‚Ñ¢ - Be resilient!
description:
According to many studies, the conscious development of our resilience - that is, our emotional resilience - is the key to long-term high performance and good health.
We have little influence over the stressful events that affect us in our day-to-day lives, but how we equip ourselves to overcome these situations is much more in our control.
Over the long term, coping with stress can be strengthened in three main areas: Bio (body), Social (relationships) and Psycho (spiritual, psychological).
RezilienciApp‚Ñ¢ supports the user in developing habits and organizing activities in these three areas. The concept and content of the application was developed by Andrea Moldov√°n, work and organizational psychologist, coach, trainer and sports coach, who has based on the research results available in this field and her own experience.
Using RezilienciApp‚Ñ¢ is simple and time-saving - you can check the activities you have done in an area daily. It is recommended that you perform 5 activities per day in each area, and this way you can fill in all three areas of resilience most effectively in the application. Also, check your sleep quality, well-being and energy level each day!
The recommended application use time is at least 3 months. Good luck and we wish you a good challenge!
The RezilienciApp‚Ñ¢ Team

title: Slices
description:
Slices is a fast-paced, super addictive, action-puzzle game that will get you hooked! 

Tap in one of the outer circles to place the slice. Complete a circle to blow it up and always keep an eye on the timer. 

Have fun ;-)

Key Features
- Fun and easy to learn game play 
- Unlimited use of power-ups
- Amazing graphics and soundtrack

summary: Fast paced color-matching puzzle game you won't be able to put down
developerAddress: Akat Mahallesi Besiktas Istanbul Turkey
recentChanges:
Improved algorithm for upcoming Slices.
Bug Fixes & Improvements

Enjoy!
comments: I wouldn't say its addicting or fun or anything. I'd say, it's good for people that just want a game, they don't care what game it is. I like it a lot, don't get me wrong, its a great game but everytime I play it, I feel like I deserve more. This game is awfully good but surprisingly bad. The levels do get a bit challenging as you move on, but with that, it lags my phone. Sometimes, when I watch an ad, it takes me back to a level I already finished, which is annoying. 3 stars because it's boring

Your game is terrible, you only get like 10 moves. I would not download this, it takes up a lot of data. It is really bad. Please fix the moves, then I'll give you a better rating. I'd suggest you to not download this game before they fix this bug. I get strict sometimes, because I can't just find a good game to play when I'm bored for example: when I'm using a hotspot; when im on a roadtrip. Please fix this bug, then I might give you 4, or 5 Stars. And the Ads are constantly playing.

Fun game. Ads are ridiculous and I am never going to watch an ad just to break one of the pies. For everyone out there, PUT ON AIRPLANE MODE. And also future apps, use airplane mode and never watch a stupid ad again. I will gladly pay $1 to remove ads, but anything above a dollar is not worth it. I understand why games need ads, but an ad forced upon you in the MIDDLE OF A GAME? Nope. I won't support that. Make removable ads a buck and I'll give this 5 stars.

This game should tell us how many moves we have. Literally every other game that does something similar to this will tell us how many moves we have left. Is this intentional? I don't think it should be. Also, there is nothing fast-paced about this game. If you want it to be, maybe add a timer or different levels of difficulty if you haven't already. Each level of difficulty will give you a certain amount of time to complete the level. I'd enjoy the game a lot more if it was like that.

VERY POOR, PLAY THIS IN AIRPLANE MODE! This games developers obviously want nothing more than an ad revenue. I will never understand how a game will make you watch so many ads just to get past 1 level. As soon as you score a whole pizza (every pizza) there is an ad. They don't even wait for the level to be completed. Not worth $2.99 for no ads.

title: Prime Video - Android TV
description:
Prime Video gives you two ways to instantly stream Videos on your Android TV device. Buy or rent your favorite titles or join Amazon Prime and get unlimited access to award-winning Prime Originals as well as thousands of movies and TV shows at no additional cost. 

Browse titles, search for your favorites, or enjoy movies and shows recommended just for you. For our terms of use and usage rules, see www.amazon.com/video/terms. Amazon, the Amazon logo, and Prime Video are trademarks of Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements.
comments: App UI is very bad, first of all the app roll out should be like Netflix so that most Android TV's can install it. Amazon should discontinue this app and port the one on FireTV as it has the X-Ray feature and Video Preview. The Prime Video App on FireTV has a much Clean and Decluttered UI and is pretty smooth although it does have dependencies on the core apps of Fire TV as that App doesn't have standalone login. (Even though the specs of my Android TV are higher than the FireTV 4K and yet the Android TV app lags a bit)

- does not remember series, season and episode that was being watched which requires cumbersome navigation - can't properly restart already watched episode, since it starts at the end and almost immediately jumps to the next - does not save state when app is going to background, preventing easy continuation -owned material not shown on the start page even when recently watched With those fixed, it would be a good app.

Was not able to install it on my new android tv. The website says registration is successful, however the registration is not recognized by the app within the tv. No proper error messages. Disappointed with my experience.

App constantly crashes and locks my entire TV up. All other apps are fine. Whenever it does work it starts to buffers, freezes and crashes. Connection is 500 Mbps wired to my router on a fiber connection.
Does not work on Air TV Mini. Will not let you register the device, as others have mentioned.

title: Nova Launcher
description:
Nova Launcher is a powerful, customizable, and versatile home screen replacement. Nova brings advanced features to enhance your home screens, but still remains a great, user-friendly choice for everyone. Whether you want to completely overhaul your home screens or are looking for a cleaner, faster home launcher, Nova is the answer.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉThe Newest Features: Nova brings the latest Android launcher features to all other phones.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉCustom Icon Themes: Nova supports thousands of icon themes available in the Play Store.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉNight Mode and Dark Theme: Have night mode come on automatically at a specific time, or just leave it on for a dark theme.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉCustomizable App Drawer: Vertical or horizontal scroll, page effects, and card or immersive options are just a few of the things you‚Äôll find available for the app drawer.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉSubgrid Positioning: With the ability to snap icons and widgets in between grid cells, it‚Äôs easy to get a precise feel and layout with Nova in a way that‚Äôs impossible with most other launchers.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉBackup and Restore: Moving from phone to phone or trying new home screen setups is a snap thanks to Nova‚Äôs backup and restore feature. Backups can be stored locally or saved to the cloud for easy transfers.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉSpeed: Nova is highly optimized, with smooth and snappy animations that will even older phones a fast and fluid feel.


Do more with Nova Launcher Prime
Unlock Nova Launcher‚Äôs full potential with Nova Launcher Prime:

‚Ä¢‚ÄÉGestures:  Swipe, pinch, double tap, and more on the home screen to execute custom commands.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉApp Drawer Groups: Create custom tabs or folders in the app drawer for an ultra-organized feel.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉHide Apps: Remove apps from the app drawer without uninstalling them.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉCustom Icon Swipe Gestures: Assign swipe gestures to home screen icons or folders for custom actions.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ‚Ä¶and more. More scrolling effects, unread counts, and others.


This app uses the Device Administrator permission for optional screen off/lock functionality.
descriptionHTML:
Nova Launcher is a powerful, customizable, and versatile home screen replacement. Nova brings advanced features to enhance your home screens, but still remains a great, user-friendly choice for everyone. Whether you want to completely overhaul your home screens or are looking for a cleaner, faster home launcher, Nova is the answer.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉThe Newest Features: Nova brings the latest Android launcher features to all other phones.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉCustom Icon Themes: Nova supports thousands of icon themes available in the Play Store.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉNight Mode and Dark Theme: Have night mode come on automatically at a specific time, or just leave it on for a dark theme.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉCustomizable App Drawer: Vertical or horizontal scroll, page effects, and card or immersive options are just a few of the things you‚Äôll find available for the app drawer.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉSubgrid Positioning: With the ability to snap icons and widgets in between grid cells, it‚Äôs easy to get a precise feel and layout with Nova in a way that‚Äôs impossible with most other launchers.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉBackup and Restore: Moving from phone to phone or trying new home screen setups is a snap thanks to Nova‚Äôs backup and restore feature. Backups can be stored locally or saved to the cloud for easy transfers.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉSpeed: Nova is highly optimized, with smooth and snappy animations that will even older phones a fast and fluid feel.


Do more with Nova Launcher Prime
Unlock Nova Launcher‚Äôs full potential with Nova Launcher Prime:

‚Ä¢‚ÄÉGestures: Swipe, pinch, double tap, and more on the home screen to execute custom commands.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉApp Drawer Groups: Create custom tabs or folders in the app drawer for an ultra-organized feel.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉHide Apps: Remove apps from the app drawer without uninstalling them.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉCustom Icon Swipe Gestures: Assign swipe gestures to home screen icons or folders for custom actions.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ‚Ä¶and more. More scrolling effects, unread counts, and others.


This app uses the Device Administrator permission for optional screen off/lock functionality.
summary: Customize your home screen!
developerAddress:
Kevin Barry
3501 N. Southport Ave #270
Chicago, IL 60657
USA
recentChanges: Fixes and optimizations
comments: Been using it for a long time, but then I noticed the battery drain when I got my redmi note 9 pro. Compared poco and Nova, both without any widgets, and Nova had more battery consumption. For now I'll stick to poco. Maybe when I get a new phone (or install a custom ROM) then I'm trying Nova again üòÅ
Works like it was preinstalled smooth lots of features easy to use you would think it came with your phone if tried over 5 or more apps like me this is the last one excellent choice. üëçüèæ
By far one of the best launcher out there. Definitely worth a try.

Used to be great but as my devices have gotten bigger I've noticed that the inability to place folder icons at the bottom of the folder is really becoming an issue, especially if using one hand. Folders are becoming useless in that regard, it's easier just to create another home screen and do your best to organize.

The only flaws I see with Nova and Nova Prime are as follows: I found it hard to set up the backup and restore directories. I always feel I can't to double-check the destination. I failed to do do and list all my customizations on a factory reset. When adding apps to folders, there is no search function. You shouldn't have to scroll through hundreds of apps to find one. Also, there is no way to start a folder without having two existing shortcuts already grouped to a folder.

title: Toy Blast
description:
IT‚ÄôS TOY BLAST TIME! THE ULTIMATE MATCHING PUZZLE GAME PLAYED BY MILLIONS OF USERS EVERY DAY!

Match the cubes of the same color and combine boosters for huge explosions to blast your way through thousands of levels!

Fun is at the tip of your fingers, with the most fascinating puzzles you will ever solve!

There are countless possibilities, and your talent in solving puzzles will be key in mastering Toy Blast.

Experience the greatest adventures through infinite episodes in the most colorful lands of Toy Blast.

TOY BLAST FEATURES:
‚óè Unique and simple gameplay - just tap the matching cubes
‚óè +3500 puzzles, easy and fun to play but challenging to master
‚óè Fun events every day: Star Tournament, Crown Rush, Treasure Hunt, and Daily Challenges!
‚óè Star Chest - open and win amazing rewards as you progress through levels
‚óè Legends Arena, where you can compete with the best players
‚óè Daily prizes from the spin wheel
‚óè Dozens of adorable characters and toys to keep you company on your adventure
‚óè Numerous boosters and powerful combos to help you solve puzzles
‚óè Leaderboards to compete with your friends and players all over the world

developerAddress: Turkey
recentChanges:
It's time for a green new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Gardening is a lovely hobby, and Mr. Mouse is enjoying it vigorously! You should see his little greenhouse! One can find all kinds of beautiful plants in there, and breathe in the fresh oxygen.

Be sure to update to the current version of Toy Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!
comments: Fun game...longest I have ever kept a game on my phone. LOVE that I don't have to sit through commercials in order to play or anything!! A few years, when I first started playing, I had the ability to win time...I miss that. Made it more fun to win an hour (up to 24 hrs) of free play time. Guess they lost too much $$ on people not buying items to help them pass a level. Oh well.

I love this game. Great way to pass the time. I do have a couple of things. What if for every 100 levels you get one of each boost and 25 coins? Maybe bring back challenge of unlimited lives for a 24 hours? Sometimes it sucks when it takes 3 days to complete one level, it gets frustrating and boring. I have spent many hours playing this game and spent some money and do really enjoy it.

I absolutely loved this game until it got to the higher levels (im on level 3564) I have spent plenty of money on this game because once you only get 5 free lives and when your out it takes 20 minutes to get another life. I understand the levels will get harder but I think its ridiculous to only get a new life every 20 minutes. I don't want to have to delete this app but I can't continue to spend $1.99-$12.99 just to be able to play continuously.

I actually really love this game. there's no ads (!!!!!!) and there's really no need to spend money if u are patient. it's pretty much entirely luck based so as long as u are patient and keep trying u can pass any level. my only complaint is some of the levels seem unnecessarily hard which can get very frustrating but other than that I would highly recommend this game

Play game all the time my only problem is that you have to continuesly have to update after doing 50 levels beyond 4000, and my Facebook friends dissappeared. Hey Doodle Bob I am a real person playing this game and yes I passed level 4000. I can honestly say, I have NOT spent any money on this game and do not plan on it. Just wait for lives to add up and continue to play.

title: Learn Languages with Memrise - Spanish, French
description:
Download Memrise and learn Mexican Spanish, Spanish, French, German, Japanese (Kanji), Italian, Korean, Chinese, Portuguese, Russian, Arabic, Dutch, Swedish, Norwegian, Polish, Turkish, Danish or even English.

Join over 50 million people. Have fun. Learn your fave language and impress the hell out of yourself with what you can achieve.  Let real native speakers teach you their language from the streets of their home town through our Learn with Locals video clips.

Give us a try ‚Äì your first lesson's on the house.

Here's why we're different:

We've got killer learning science behind the scenes. It speeds up your learning and helps you remember your new words, as if your mind keeps hitting the save button. Not that you'd notice. You're too busy watching fun video clips, seeing real locals in bucket-list destinations and playing little quiz-type games. The opposite of textbook learning.Wherever you Memrise, you're a million miles from the classroom.

Then the good bit happens. You're in the moment, a local wants to talk. Do you freeze up? No. Not on our watch. You recall the key phrases you learned. You speak naturally. Not perfect but it's still good banter. You aren't worried. You're just going for it. You're balls-out confident. You did it.

Mic drop.

Download Memrise to:

- Learn with locals: we took real native speakers and shrunk them into the app. Your miniature friends help you learn fun, conversational phrases. A few swear words too.

- Practice games: our science does one-to-one coaching with your mind, while you have fun with Speed Review, Listening Skills, Difficult Words and Classic Review.

- Improve your pronunciation: so when you say 'beaucoup' (a lot) you never accidentally say it 'beau cul' (nice butt). Record yourself and our smart tech will tell you if you got it right or need to try again.

- Learn anywhere: download your course to learn in places that don't have signal and seem to be stuck in the 80s.

- Build an entertaining habit: learn as much or as little as you want. You only need 5 minutes a day to improve. Perfect for making your loo break a lot more fun.


Memrise, the best language learning app for: Mexican Spanish, Spanish, French, German, Japanese (Kanji), Italian, Korean, Chinese, Portuguese, Russian, Arabic, Dutch, Swedish, Norwegian, Polish, Turkish, Danish or even English.

-----------------------

PLEASE NOTE:
You need a Memrise subscription to access all courses and features. But the courses and features that are available vary depending on the language of your device.

Once purchased, subscriptions will automatically renew unless cancelled before the end of the current payment period. Subscriptions can be managed or cancelled in your Google Play Store account.

-----------------------

In-app Permissions - To enable some of the features of the Memrise app we may need to ask for your permission. For example, we'll ask to access your microphone if you'd like to practice your pronunciation skills. You can change permissions at any time in your settings.

-----------------------

Follow us on social media for inspiration on your foray into the language learning world:
* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/memrise/
* Twitter: https://twitter.com/memrise
* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/memrise/

Privacy Policy: https://www.memrise.com/privacy/
Terms of Use: https://www.memrise.com/terms/

comments: I really want to like this app because it has a lot of content. It should be, and was, simple and intuitive. But they keep changing it in ways that actually degrade the customer experience. Click the "immerse" button and the wheel spins perpetually. Try the help button and the same thing happens. They are turning what was a good hammer -- a simple, useful tool -- into a bloated, mediocre multitool that does everything -- badly.

You cannot go back and review the sections, like Grammar. Once you have completed a section you lose access to the full learning content even if you pay for a subscription. I was very disappointed with this feature otherwise I found this to be optimal language app compared to other options and I tried several .

Very easy to use app . A very good app . Tons and tons of languages to learn from here . Most important , it is free . Very user friendly app and inexpensive to use on . Highly recommend. Now I know 12 languages but I recommend more click to learn languages pages . ( No typing ) to be exact . A very good way to learn languages .

I could not think of one fault about this app. It is fantastic! So far, I've not had any problems and I've had the app for almost a month now. It is a great way to practice French in the holidays, when I'm not at school as my teachers can set class courses. I've also started learning Italian independently and all the FREE features have definitely helped. You can do so so much and I just wish I could write a longer review because MEMRISE IS INCREDIBLE! So much better than other language apps. ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§

I've used, three of the top language apps. And this, is the fastest, and best way, to learn a langyage that I've seen so far! Great Work!! I can't waiit to get paid, so I can get the upgraded version. I am so excited. I have to learn German fast... What a time for my Direct Deposit ti be messed up, without a payment for 2 months! S. title: Dubsmash - Create & Watch Videos
description:
Dubsmash believes in the power of representation through video. By empowering all creators and communities to thrive on the platform, we aim to celebrate each others differences.

Dubsmash‚Äôs algorithms are designed to promote creativity and diversity. We support POC creators and aim to ensure a safe environment for all communities on the app.

We take your privacy seriously. Based in New York, we don‚Äôt collect usage data for anything other than making the app work better for you and our communities.

BLACK LIVES MATTER.

--- 

Current Features:
Record or upload any video to the app using a sound on the Create tab, or add one from your library
Add effects, filters, stickers, text, and more to make your videos stand out
Post your video to Dubsmash for it to get likes, comments & views
Watch the latest and most relevant videos for you on the Trending Feed, or catch *everything* you follow in the Following Feed
Share your Dubsmash videos off-platform to Instagram, Snapchat, WhatsApp, iMessage, YouTube, TikTok, Musical.ly, Funimate, Flipagram and more!
Discover what‚Äôs happening around you on the Explore tab
Find your public & private posts, saved videos, favorite & uploaded sounds on your profile, plus add a bio and pic to your profile to help your followers get to know you
Direct message with users you‚Äôre connected to in the app

---

Download Dubsmash for free today!

Ideas? Feedback? Or just bored n wanna chat? We want to collaborate with and listen to you, so we can make the app better for YOU and our communities - not for advertisers or shadowy overlords.  ***DM us on Instagram @dubsmash or in the app!***

comments: Good but needs one more feature When you make videos, there should be an option to slow down or speed up the video you are making like TikTok and Musically because it would make it a lot better and people can be more creative with their videos

I gave this app 2 stars beacause when try to upload a video to dubsmash it takes to long and I don't have the time to be waiting that long and also when I make regular videos like with out uploading a video it keeps on telling me to try again like it won't let me post the video.

Why can't I reload my old videos from my original account?! They already have friggen tik tok bring back the old dubsmash, I had so many videos that I can't bring back up, which should be attached hed to my email, have always been attached hed to my email when I reload this app!! Suuuuper sad panda!!!!

It's has been really slow lately and if you want to upload a video from you gallery it won't let do so when it says that you can sometk.es you can't even post a video cuz it well say something like error. I only had this app for three days
Not bad. I love it. No problem with the sounds. But there is one problem. The uploading of video is so long time taken.and the saving video too.anyway thanks dubsmash for my career

title: Stack Jump
description:
How high can you climb?

Jump to stack blocks and build the biggest tower imaginable!

Improve your highscore in endless mode, complete the 36 challenges and unlock all 20 characters!
descriptionHTML:
How high can you climb?

Jump to stack blocks and build the biggest tower imaginable!

Improve your highscore in endless mode, complete the 36 challenges and unlock all 20 characters!
summary: How high can you climb?
developerAddress: 4 rue Jules Lefebvre, 75009 Paris
recentChanges: - Minor tweaks and bug fixes
comments: This game is fun. I enjoy the different scenery and the different cute animals but why is it that every time I hit 100 the game stutters ? I'd rather not know I reached that "milestone" if it means the game wont stutter. And I've been playing this for awhile before I reviewed. The stutter happens. Every. Time. Kinda makes u feel like the game is rigged. Purposely making u lose because it stutters. Super irritating, hence the 3 stars. Woulda gave it 5.

So I was going to get the little character for using 30 second chances but when I got to 29 second chances it didn't let me watch any more ads for second chances which was very disappointing :( other than that the map creations and the characters are absolute cuteness!
It's good but it's kinda common and boring you know
I'm still in level one because the game is to fast
Perfect couldn't get any better than this

comments: It has a lote of ads but but its a good game i am in llllllllllllllllllllllllllloveeeeeeeeeee with thus game download now!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Really good cooking game. But too many ads. Still good tho. Just need to reduce the ads. When you cooking, an ad pops out. When you done cooking, an ad pops out. Want a new knife, An Ad Pops Out. Want a new tableware, An aD pOPs OUt. Want to double your money, AN AD POPS OUT. but the game itself is Nice and Fun, Without the ads.

ngl this game is actually not bad, i always play this on my freetime when i was not using pc, i actually wanted to rate 5 but there are things here, so in the contest, the food that the competitor made isn't randomized, and the ratings by the customers like the cutting and ingredients are always "ok" by the customers, and i don't think you need to cut the ingredients that you prepared if you want to blend the ingredients, however the game is a okay for me do keep it up devs!

I thought this would be like those other boring cooking games, but this is actually entertaining! Im actually having lots of fun playing this, it runs well, the ads aren't annoying, and over all the cooking is pretty fun! All i ask is to fix the chopping part a little so its easier, but thats it c:

This isn't really a game? You just tap and drag without any order. You literally just tap whatever you feel like and drag your finger over those things and "win", moving onto the next tap anything and swipe your finger for a second level. If you love winning and hate effort, this is probably the download for you!

comments: Initially the app was the best that I could ever have...but just after 1 week it turned out to be a total mess... My phone became too slow, i received the notifications too slow, i couldn't hear anything on the call and the worst was that it automatically took control over the system and modified all my settings... I wasn't able to manage any app. It was really really too disturbing and disappointing.

Being able to customise the icons would be a great edition like you used to be able to do. Getting rid of the prime or making it cheaper would also be better, with no ads popping up when I turn my screen on. Icon packs and more selections of themes would be great, along with being able to customise your own themes. Oh and the icons being closer together on the home screen along with 2 more app slots added to the Dock. If these can be added then you'll definitely get more stars.

In the beginning it was one of the best launcher app but now it is the only worst app. You write any complaints, except the automated, you don't receive any reply from them. For more than 3 weeks I was trying to get some "themes" using the app. It opens but nothing shown and nothing can be downloaded. But the "Premium" page and "Wall Paper" page are working.

I love it. Thanks for this application, now my phone looks cool now. And there so many theme's you can download for free. And i'm very happy because every time i use my phone that have "cool theme" it will give me a nice mood so i use it everytime now. But before i didn't know this app, My phone theme is so booring that's why i didn't use it a lot. So now i'm glad that i see this application on youtube post. Thank you very much. Sorry for my english. Heheh

Now all of a sudden I get a new phone and I have to pay almost a $100 a year to keep the app. I"ll go someplace else and look for another app. As much as I love this app. and would stick with this app forever I am not gonna pay $100 a year for it. I would see a 1 time charge of a few $ but thats all.

title: Encouraging Bible Verses and quotes
description:
Scriptures that will offer encouragement in your daily life and provide inspiration and strength as you cope with life's challenges. God's plan for your life is that you have joy and live life to the fullest.

If you are feeling overwhelmed, run down, and without hope, the Bible can lift your spirits and give you a fresh start! This collection of verses from the Holy Bible are filled with encouragement and will have you experience God's healing power for our soul. Meditate on these verses through the day and share them with your friends so you can make an impact on someone else's day!

Inspirational Bible Verses - Read inspirational quotes and Scripture from the Bible that can help encourage your spirit as you in times of doubt, loss, mourning, sadness, or hopelessness. The Holy Bible has many passages that can uplift your mind and heart, giving you the strength you need to get through each day.

Below is a collection of encouraging Bible verses that can lead you into a deeper understanding of who God is and what His plan is for your life. He wants to "prosper you and not to harm you, to give hope and a future" (Jeremiah 29:11) You can also send these to a family member or friend in need and be assured that God can work miracles when we choose to believe His promises! Use these verses to be inspired and motivated to continue believing and having faith!

title: Light-It Up
description:
Warning: this game WILL hook you - jumping games have never been so awesomely addictive. 
It‚Äôs a dark world out there for a teeny little stickman like you, and it‚Äôs about time you light-it up and make the colors glow. 

Swing, jump, flip and slide your stickman body from one neon color shape to another to make them glow and light-it up. 

Collect stars as you swing, jump and flip to raise your score, in the funnest of all jumping games. 

Just when you start to feel like a stickman boss and are loving that color glow, things get complicated (or ‚Äústicky,‚Äù if you will) as you jump, flip and pass levels. Color shapes start moving, rotating and even exploding, and lethal spikes become a constant threat to your poor little stickman life.

If you miss a jump, if your swing‚Äôs a dud, if your flip isn‚Äôt on point, or if you hit a spike‚Ä¶ you fall into oblivion!

So what do you say, stickman? Ready to swing, jump, flip, light-it up and glow, in the brightest of all jumping games?

To opt out of CrazyLabs sales of personal information as a California resident, please visit our Privacy Policy: https://crazylabs.com/app
