recentChanges: Bug fixes for smoother playing
comments: It's decent. Good balance between being too difficult amd not difficult enough. The major problem is that once you hit lvl 50 the ads get to the point where you could probably sue for harassment. Lol, jk. Before lvl 50 there are ads bout every 3 or 4 tries. Reasonable. But after 50 its an ad after every single attempt which has led me to delete it.

Really cool concept, easy to learn, and relaxing even on difficult levels, however, I'm not giving 5 stars for 2 reasons, and I really hope the developers listen to me on this. TOO many ads, I have to turn off my internet because I can't even skip the "Retry?" screen, and there is an ad literally after every death. I understand that there's a profit to be made, and there's VIP, but tone it down a little, it crashes the experience. The other one is a suggestion: An endless mode, think about it

Very fun and addictive. Very pleasing visuals. The ads on the free are not too frequent. A fair and good balance of them. There is no one off as free option and the weekly fee is a little excessive. Would be 5 star if there was an option to remove ads for a one off fee and they can keep the weekly for the other parts of they want.

is literally this is literally the fun ever and plus when you pick new skins are the superheroes and when I play I pretend to be a superhero because I get to jump and go on top of the ships that light up and it is so fun this is like the funnest game I've ever done thank you so much for making this game one point about the ads it's really great at but sometimes every time I'm done with around it is starts an atom you're actually like 20 or five a bunch of seconds and I'm kind of annoyed.

The gameplay is simple but enjoyable but the adds are unbearable. Full screen video adds between each short level with sound that interrupts Bluetooth streamed audio. The juice just isn't worth the squeeze.

title: DiDi-Rider
description:
Your ride is just a few taps away in Australia, Japan and selected countries of Latin America through our DiDi Rider app, offered by the world‚Äôs leading on-demand transportation network. 

To use our service in Brazil, please download the ‚Äò99‚Äô app in the App Store. 
To use DiDi in China, please download the ‚ÄòDiDi-Greater China‚Äô app in the App Store (China mainland / Hong Kong SAR). 

Requesting a trip is simple: 

1. Download the app and follow the instructions to create an account. 
2. To request a trip, select your pickup and dropoff locations.   
3. Once we‚Äôve found a driver, you‚Äôll be shown the driver and vehicle information. Please note: all our driver-partners are vetted before joining our platform. You can also check the driver‚Äôs pickup route and estimated time of arrival (ETA). 
4. At the end of your trip, pay hassle-free using your preferred payment method directly in the app. 
5. Safety first! Take a minute to learn how to set Trusted Contacts, use the Emergency Button or share your ride status using our in-app Safety Toolkit. 

Visit https://www.didiglobal.com/international-business for more information.

recentChanges: - Optimised user experience and implemented bug fixes
comments: Pros: Usually a little bit cheaper. Cons: Takes a long time to get a ride. App looks and feels worse than others. Other: Had a promo where they'd give you a voucher if another rideshare was cheaper, but refused to honour it, despite all instructions being followed. So wouldn't recommend on morality grounds as they don't seem to care about their word or their customers.

Worked fine the first time. Easy to set up and use. Then i tried to use it again later that day. Kept telling me that i needed to confirm card details, even though i had said i was paying by paypal and it worked fine on paypal earlier that day. I took the time to confirm the card details, still gave me the same error. In the end i just used uber. Uninstalling - I need rideshare apps to be reliable, not make me spend 10 minutes working around a buggy app when im in a hurry

Have had the app for 12+ months, nil issues so far but could be improved. Recommend. Pro: usually cheaper than other apps Cons: can b difficult/long wait to find driver, esp outside of normal hours, or outer suburbs. Also, drivers OFTEN accept then reject last minute- frustrating & no compensation offered. Comment: worth having simply to comlare against other ride share apps, and for use in city areas during daylight hours (more reliable). Despite above, my experiences have been positive.

Absolutely the worst app I have ever used! Everytime I try and book a driver it comes up with "system error" tried updating the app and still not working. I will happily pay more to use user, at least I can actually book a ride!!!
It takes forever to find a driver and then when it does they don't follow the map taking longer than necessary to get to the destination then charging me more for the trip. This app is a joke.

title: Free Guided Meditation & The Prayer Wheel Program‚Ñ¢
description:
Invite the Power is a guided meditation app and modern prayer program designed to awaken your intuitive nature to better recognize guidance. With our app you'll take the practice of combining meditation and prayer to unimaginable heights for a more balanced and fulfilling life with purpose. With our app you'll improve your ability to cope with life‚Äôs challenges & move forward.

Invite the Power has two principles, you can practice meditation to develop inner peace and beat stress while at the same time learn the spiritual technique of prayer to effectively get answers to everyday problems

Topics include: Thankfulness, Love, Forgiveness, Protection, Asking or Intention-Setting, Inspiration, Listening or Intuition and Letting go.
 
DOWNLOAD INVITE THE POWER FOR FREE AND ENJOY THE FOLLOWING FEATURES:

* Guided Meditation: Find a meditation session for sleep, relief from stress and anxiety, as well as short 2 min. reset meditations and longer 20 min. deep meditations.

*An Introductory Course to the Prayer Wheel Program: A progressive course that teaches you the fundamentals of prayer along with more advanced practices.

ABOUT the Creator of The Prayer Wheel Program‚Ñ¢

The Prayer Wheel Program was developed by well-respected psychiatrist and physician Dr. John Thornton from Toronto, Canada. The Prayer Wheel Program was designed initially for clinical use in practice, and can be used by anyone, no matter what their background or beliefs.

The overwhelming research demonstrating the healing power of prayer is why Dr. Thornton developed The Prayer Wheel Program, a non-denominational step-by-step guide to what he refers to as, ‚Äúthe ancient technology of intention-setting.‚Äù Dr. Thornton found that it frequently brought rapid therapeutic results to significantly change lives. 
 
We‚Äôre proud to bring you this ground breaking program and we‚Äôre confident that with continued use you‚Äôll see amazing results.


What is Prayer?

We define prayer as an ancient technology that precedes religion and was used for intention setting, dialogue, and guidance, and if you apply it in the fashion described, you‚Äôll be able to set your intentions, you‚Äôll be able to have a dialogue, and if you will listen carefully, you‚Äôll learn all about guidance.

What is Meditation?

We define meditation as an ancient technology for brain training, relaxation that has the potential to achieve spiritual enlightenment. Studies have shown that daily meditation has great benefits, including better sleep, less anxiety, and better mental focus.

Discover How to Take Control of Your Life & Manifest Your Dreams Through the Power of Prayer and Guided Meditation.

Subscription Pricing:

Invite the Power offers a Free4ever Plan and two auto-renewing subscription options:
$12.99 per monthly (7 day Free Trial Period) or $5.83 per month paid yearly (7 day Free Trial Period).

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

Your Invite the Power subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term. You can cancel your subscription anytime, but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

title: Exploration Lite Craft
description:
An amazing infinite blocky open world to build, craft and explore. Exploration Craft lets you be the reality crafting god! 

As a miner and adventurer, you need to build constructions out of textured cubes in this 3D block world. You may also need to combat against evil monsters in the evening using the weapons mined and crafted in the daylight. Explore, mine resources, craft tools and weapons, grow plants, raise you own mounts and cast magic spells. There are no limits to your creativity and imagination in this lite and pro version of the game!

Game Features:
- Deep tutorial and tons of 3D elements
- Procedurally generated open world sandbox environment
- Create your own castles using blocks and other elements
- Train and raise mobs/mounts to help you fight against monsters

comments: Really good game, I been playing it for two days already and I love it. But something happened: it lagged in my home and it's seems I can't move. The screen moves, I can craft and destroy blocks but I can't move. I made a new world and it works just fine, I'm kind of sad that I'm losing everything from the first one, since I made a lot of progress and I had a lot of things. I will try to play again in the new world but if the problem happens again I will rate it lower

I FOUND THE GAME FINALLY. This game was my whole childhood. When I couldn't afford Minecraft, I would play this, and I remember spending hours building things. If for some reason you can't spare 10 bucks to get Minecraft, this is definitely one of the better rip-offs out there. If I could recommend one thing however, maybe implement a feature that would allow you to transfer worlds? I would be very curious as to what the world I spent hours making looks like.

Very good game, good graphics. D game is cool cuz u can go to other dimension its so cool like this is d best game ever. But am rating it a 4 star bcuz in other mine crafts u can fly but this one u can't fix that and also make a setting to on/off d zombies and creepy things so u won't be scared when playing. If ur reading this download d game cuz its cool download u won't regret it.

Excellent Game . But there are some problems- 1. The blocks are disappearing whenever i am visiting the snow fields 2. Please let me know why it is happeningüôèüôè

It doesn't shoot far enough and takes too long/awkward to draw. Other than that it's pretty awesome, although a world map would be very very useful along with having the compass.
